To assess the trade costs or plausible protection effects associated with NTMs, the computable general equilibrium (CGE) model is employed with partial removal of NTMs from the baseline scenario with NTMs. The disaggregated impact of a reduction in NTMs indicate disproportionate gains in trade (both imports and exports) across the various sub-sectors, with highest gains derived by the sub-sectors with relatively high AVEs, namely dairy products, bakery products and animal feeds. The simulation findings further show that the overall impact of a reduction in NTMs on trade is larger in the long-run relative to the short-run, suggesting slow responses to such policy changes, as NTMs present themselves as a package and not as an instrument.
ch_abstract: 马来西亚进口密集型食品加工行业受到进口方面非关税措施（NTMs）的严格监管。然而，这些非关税措施的从价等值（AVEs）在食品加工各子行业间差异显著。为评估与非关税措施相关的贸易成本或潜在保护效应，研究采用可计算一般均衡（CGE）模型，在基准情景中部分移除非关税措施进行模拟。非关税措施削减的分行业影响显示，各子行业贸易（包括进口和出口）收益不均衡，其中从价等值较高的子行业——乳制品、烘焙食品和动物饲料——获益最大。模拟结果进一步表明，与非关税措施削减相关的贸易总体影响在长期大于短期，说明企业对这类政策调整反应迟缓，因为非关税措施是以政策组合形式存在而非单一工具。
tags: Non-Tariff Measures, Imports, Exports, Ad-Valorem Equivalent, CGE, Malaysia

title: A Multicommodity Spatial Price Equilibrium Model with Exchange Rates andNon-TariffMeasuresfor Agri-Food International Trade
abstract: International trade of agri-food products is essential for food security and the well-being of societies. Governments have increasingly turned way from tariffs as policy instruments and are, instead, applying non-tariff measures (NTMs). The  evaluation of such policies that include: quotas, subsidies, quality standards, as well as sanitary and phytosanitary measures,  through the rigorous quantification of their impacts on the flows, prices, as well as quality levels of agricultural commodities, is highly needed, as is the inclusion of exchange rates. In this paper,  we construct a multicommodity spatial price equilibrium model with exchange rates for the international trade of agri-food products that includes: quotas, subsidies, quality of the commodities, along with possible deterioration in transport, minimum quality standards, and ad valorem equivalents to quantify NTMs associated with agricultural products that can affect the health and well-being of humans, animals, and plants. The methodological framework is that of the theory of variational inequalities. The extensive numerical examples are focused on wheat exports from Ukraine to Middle Eastern and North African (MENA) countries during wartime.  The numerical examples include sensitivity analysis for ad valorem equivalents and governmental subsidies as well as quality coefficients with important insights for decision makers and policy makers concerned about food security affected by volumes of available agricultural commodities, their quality, as well as their supply and demand prices.
ch_abstract: 农产品国际贸易对粮食安全和社会福祉至关重要。各国政府正逐渐放弃关税作为政策工具，转而采用非关税措施（NTMs）。亟需通过严格量化这些政策（包括配额、补贴、质量标准及动植物检疫措施）对农产品流动、价格和质量水平的影响来评估此类政策，汇率因素也应纳入考量。本文构建了一个包含汇率的农产品国际贸易多商品空间价格均衡模型，该模型涵盖：配额、补贴、商品质量、运输过程中的可能损耗、最低质量标准，以及与农产品相关的非关税措施的从价等值——这些措施可能影响人类、动物和植物的健康与福祉。方法论框架基于变分不等式理论展开。大量数值模拟聚焦战时乌克兰向中东和北非地区（MENA）国家的小麦出口案例，其中包含对从价等值、政府补贴及质量系数的敏感性分析，为关注粮食安全的决策者提供了重要启示——粮食安全受农产品可用数量、质量及供需价格的多重影响。
tags: non-tariff measures, sanitary and phytosanitary measures, spatial price equilibrium, variational inequalities, agriculture and international trade, food security

title: Non-TariffMeasures, and the Post-Bali Agenda: Strategies for Small States and Vulnerable Economies
abstract: This paper first looks at the considerable progress made during the Doha Round in the context of the NAMA negotiations on non-tariff measures (NTMs) and discusses ways in which to retain the forward momentum as the WTO struggles to define its negotiating agenda for the next few years. The paper also discusses strategies and approaches for those most impacted by these measures, namely small and vulnerable WTO Members.
ch_abstract: 本文首先探讨了多哈回合非农市场准入（NAMA）谈判中在非关税措施（NTMs）方面取得的重大进展，并讨论了在世贸组织努力确定未来几年谈判议程之际保持前进动力的方法。本文还讨论了受这些措施影响最大的成员（即世贸组织中的小型弱势成员）可采取的策略与应对途径。
tags: WTO, Doha Round, NAMA Negotiations, Non-Tariff Barriers, Small and Vulnerable States, Trade and Development

title: The Trade Effects of Tariffs andNon-TariffChanges of Preferential Trade Agreements
abstract: The recent literature on preferential trade agreements (PTAs) emphasizes the distinction between the extensive and intensive margins. What has been missing is the distinction between tariff and non-tariff changes under PTAs. Tariff reduction is a quintessential feature of PTAs. But member countries of a PTA often pursue deeper integration through agreements on nontariff matters as well. Some member countries, however, may want to use non-tariff barriers to compensate for tariff cuts. The current study isolates the effects of tariff and non-tariff changes under PTAs. It involves the construction of a new dataset of bilateral tariff rates for 90 importing and 149 exporting countries over 1996-2010, covering the Harmonized System 2-digit level of product varieties. Given the complexity of non-tariff arrangements, we allow for heterogeneity across three different types of PTAs, namely custom unions (CUs), free trade agreements (FTAs), and partial scope agreements (PSAs). We further consider heterogeneity within each of these three PTAs regarding responding time, partner type, and product type. The key findings are: (i) nontariff changes under PTAs on average increase both the intensive and extensive margins of trade; (ii) PSAs do not have discernible trade impacts unlike FTAs and CUs (iii) CUs have a stronger trade impact than FTAs; (iv) the impact of CUs comes mostly from non-tariff changes, while that of FTAs comes from both tariff and non-tariff changes; (v) non-tariff changes associated with CUs have a stronger trade effect than those associated with FTAs, which in turn are stronger than those associated with PSAs (vi) non-tariff changes take a longer time than tariff changes to impact on the intensive margin; (vii) non-tariff changes under FTAs and CUs between industrial and developing countries increase the exports from the former to the latter more than the other way around; and (viii) there is substantial heterogeneity across sectors in their response to trade liberalization.
ch_abstract: 近期关于优惠贸易协定（PTAs）的文献着重探讨了集约边际与扩展边际之间的差异，但尚未关注协定下关税与非关税措施变化的区别。关税削减是PTAs的核心特征，然而成员国也常通过非关税领域的协议推动更深层次一体化。部分国家却可能试图以非关税壁垒弥补关税削减的损失。本研究分离了PTAs框架下关税与非关税措施变化的影响，构建了1996-2010年间90个进口国与149个出口国在协调制度2位码产品层面的双边关税新数据集。鉴于非关税安排的复杂性，我们区分了三类PTAs的异质性效应：关税同盟（CUs）、自由贸易协定（FTAs）和局部范围协定（PSAs），并进一步考察这三类协定在响应时间、伙伴国类型及产品类型上的内部差异。主要发现包括：（i）PTAs下的非关税措施变化平均提升贸易的集约与扩展边际；（ii）不同于FTAs与CUs，PSAs未显现显著贸易影响；（iii）CUs的贸易促进效应强于FTAs；（iv）CUs效应主要源于非关税变化，而FTAs效应来自关税与非关税双重变化；（v）CUs相关非关税措施的贸易效应最强，FTAs次之，PSAs最弱；（vi）非关税措施对集约边际的影响存在更长时滞；（vii）工业国与发展中国家间的FTAs与CUs非关税措施更显著促进前者对后者的出口；（viii）不同行业对贸易自由化的响应存在显著异质性。
tags: Preferential Trade Agreements, Tariff, Non-tariff Measure, Gravity Model

title: Non-TariffMeasuresand the World Trading System
abstract: With the success of the World Trade Organization and its predecessor, the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade, in reducing conventional tariff barriers, much of the recent focus of regional and multilateral trade agreements has switched to non-tariff measures, both border and behind-the-border policies. This paper considers the recent empirical and theoretical literature on non-tariff measures in the world trading system. It provides a set of stylized facts based on available data on non-tariff measures and reviews the key methods used to estimate their trade impact. It considers the theoretical treatment of these measures in the trade literature with a focus on the rules and institutions that govern non-tariff measures in the world trading system. It discusses some of the major issues regarding international cooperation in these policy areas, in particular whether such cooperation should entail deep integration (involving precise legally binding obligations) or shallow integration (which allows countries greater discretion in the setting of non-tariff measures). Finally, this paper reviews some of the specific features the World Trade Organization uses in dealing with non-tariff measures such as national treatment rules and non-violation complaints, and considers policy options beyond the WTO such as harmonization and mutual recognition of standards.
ch_abstract: 随着世界贸易组织及其前身关税与贸易总协定在削减传统关税壁垒方面取得成功，近期区域和多边贸易协定的焦点已转向非关税措施，包括边境政策和境内政策。本文梳理了全球贸易体系中非关税措施的最新实证与理论研究，基于现有数据总结出一组典型事实，并回顾了评估其贸易影响的关键方法。文章探讨了贸易文献中对这些措施的理论处理，重点关注全球贸易体系中规范非关税措施的规则与制度。同时分析了这些政策领域国际合作的主要议题，特别是合作应选择深度一体化（包含具有法律约束力的精确义务）还是浅度一体化（允许各国在制定非关税措施时保留更大自主权）。最后，本文考察了世贸组织处理非关税措施的具体机制，如国民待遇规则与非违规之诉，并探讨了世贸框架外的政策选择，包括标准协调与相互认可。
tags: International Trade and Trade Rules

title: A Compilation of ReportedNon-TariffMeasures: Description of the Information
abstract: The compilation of NTMs for goods and services described in this paper cover 53 countries, and it was constructed so as to focus upon members of the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation forum (APEC) and the proposed Free Trade Area of the Americas (FTAA). 3 The compilation is organized by country, category, generic barrier, specific barrier, sector, product, source, and year. It provides information on goods and services and gives the reference source for each entry. The information contained is expected to be of potential use to researchers and policymakers.
ch_abstract: 本文所述货物与服务非关税措施的汇编涵盖53个国家，其构建重点聚焦于亚太经济合作组织（APEC）成员及拟议中的美洲自由贸易区（FTAA）。该汇编按国家、类别、通用壁垒、具体壁垒、行业、产品、来源及年份进行组织，提供货物与服务相关信息并标注每条记录的参考来源。所载信息预计可为研究人员和政策制定者提供潜在价值。
tags: Non-Tariff Measures, database

title: Non-TariffMeasuresand the WTO
abstract: In this paper I sketch out the rough contours of the challenge faced by the WTO in dealing with non-tariff measures (NTMs) as seen from the economic theories of trade agreements.  The key questions for the WTO - the answers to which largely dictate the choice between shallow and deep approaches to integration - appear to be two: Is it the terms-of-trade problem or the commitment problem that WTO member governments seek to solve with their WTO membership?; and Is it market clearing or offshoring/bilateral bargaining that is now the most prominent mechanism for the determination of international prices? I suggest that evidence on the first question points to the terms-of-trade theory and hence toward shallow integration, but that answering the second question may be the key to identifying the best way forward on NTMs for the WTO.
ch_abstract: 本文从贸易协定的经济理论出发，勾勒出WTO在处理非关税措施（NTMs）时面临挑战的粗略轮廓。WTO面临的核心问题——其答案很大程度上决定了选择浅层或深层一体化路径——似乎有两个：成员国政府加入WTO究竟是为解决贸易条件问题，还是承诺问题？当前决定国际价格的核心机制究竟是市场出清，还是离岸外包/双边议价？我认为第一个问题的证据指向贸易条件理论，因而支持浅层一体化，但第二个问题的解答或许才是WTO确定非关税措施最佳推进路径的关键。
tags: terms of trade, commitment, border measures, behind-the-border measures, offshoring, bilateral bargaining

title: Estimating the Economic Effects of ReducingNon-TariffBarriers in the EEU
abstract: The report provides the first comprehensive assessment of the effects of non-tariff barriers on mutual trade in the EEU and gives recommendations as to how to remove them. It is based on a poll of 530 Russian, Kazakh and Belarusian exporters. In the research non-tariff barriers are divided into two groups. The first group includes non-tariff barriers such as sanitary and phytosanitary measures, technical barriers to trade, quotas, prohibitions, and quantitative controls. The second group comprises price and competition controls (the institute of “special importers,” sale restrictions, restrictions on public procurement, various subsidies). The second group of barriers is often referred to as “sand in the wheels,” because it hinders the movement of goods and in principle can be fully removed. The authors have come to a conclusion that this very group of barriers possesses a more negative influence on trade. Therefore, the main policy efforts should be directed at removing “sand in the wheels” of mutual trade.
ch_abstract: 该报告首次全面评估了欧亚经济联盟内部非关税壁垒对相互贸易的影响，并提出了消除这些壁垒的建议。报告基于对530家俄罗斯、哈萨克斯坦和白俄罗斯出口商的调查。研究中将非关税壁垒分为两类：第一类包括卫生与植物检疫措施、技术性贸易壁垒、配额、禁令和数量管制；第二类涵盖价格与竞争管控（如"特殊进口商"制度、销售限制、公共采购限制及各类补贴）。第二类壁垒常被称为"车轮中的沙子"，因其阻碍商品流通且原则上可完全消除。研究团队得出结论：此类壁垒对贸易的负面影响更为显著，因此政策重点应着力清除相互贸易中的"车轮沙子"。
tags: Non-Tariff Barriers, Trade, Eurasian Economic Union, Econometrics

title: Trade Protection and the Role ofNon-TariffBarriers
abstract: A growing share of modern trade policy instruments is shaped by non-tariff barriers (NTBs). Based on a structural gravity equation and the recently updated Global Trade Alert database, we empirically investigate the effect of NTBs on imports. Our analysis reveals that the implementation of NTBs reduces imports of affected products by up to 12%. Their trade dampening effect is thus comparable to that of trade defence instruments such as anti-dumping duties. It is smaller for exporters that have a free trade agreement with the importing country. Different types of NTBs affect trade to a different extent. Finally, we investigate the effect of behind-the-border measures, showing that they significantly lower the importer’s market access.
ch_abstract: 现代贸易政策工具中，非关税壁垒(NTBs)所占比重日益增加。基于结构引力方程和最新更新的全球贸易预警数据库，我们实证研究了NTBs对进口的影响。分析表明，实施NTBs会使受影响产品的进口量减少高达12%。这种贸易抑制作用与反倾销税等贸易防御工具相当。对于与进口国签订自由贸易协定的出口商而言，这种影响较小。不同类型的NTBs对贸易的影响程度各异。最后，我们研究了边境后措施的影响，发现它们会显著降低进口国的市场准入水平。
tags: non-tariff barriers, trade protection, gravity equation

title: Non-TariffMeasure Estimations in Different Impact Assessments
abstract: The reduction of non-tariff measures (NTMs) has become the key policy variable to evaluate modern and deep free trade agreements (FTAs), such as the Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership (TTIP). In this chapter we overview the two main approaches to estimating NTM reductions associated with the implementation of FTAs. We then detail how these reductions are estimated in different impact assessment studies of TTIP, we compare and analyse the main differences in these estimations and how they affect the overall economic impact of TTIP. We find that accounting for differences in the expected NTM reductions can explain a large share of the discrepancies regarding the overall potential economic effects between different impact assessments of TTIP.
ch_abstract: 非关税措施（NTMs）的削减已成为评估现代深度自由贸易协定（如跨大西洋贸易与投资伙伴关系协定，TTIP）的关键政策变量。本章概述了估算与实施自由贸易协定相关的非关税措施削减的两种主要方法。随后，我们详细分析了不同TTIP影响评估研究中这些削减的估算方式，比较并探讨了这些估算的主要差异及其对TTIP整体经济影响的作用。研究发现，考虑预期非关税措施削减的差异，能够解释不同TTIP影响评估之间关于潜在整体经济效应分歧的很大一部分原因。
tags: Non-tariff measures, trade cost estimations, gravity models, CGE models, quantitative trade models, Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership

title: Anatomy ofNon-TariffBarriers in India-Lanka Free Trade Agreement
abstract: This paper attempts to answer one crucial research question, why the utilization of India Sri Lanka Free Trade Agreement (ISFTA) route for trade is very poor by the India exporters (13%) as compared to their Sri Lankan Counterpart (65%) even after one decade of its implementation? The available studies have blamed the non-tariff barriers (NTBs) which are hamstringing growth of trade between these partners development of international trade. However, these have considered NTBs as sub set of non-tariff measures (NTMs) which are quite narrow sense of finding the hidden barriers within the International trade process. Therefore, this paper has analyzed in detail the logistic process involved in international trade between India and Sri Lanka to understand various NTBs sheltered within this logistic process. Further, the paper has identified issues which are not directly beyond the logistic process which are affecting the international trade between these two countries.
ch_abstract: 本文试图回答一个关键的研究问题：为何印度-斯里兰卡自由贸易协定（ISFTA）实施十年后，印度出口商对该贸易路线的利用率（13%）远低于斯里兰卡出口商（65%）？现有研究将这一现象归咎于阻碍双边贸易发展的非关税壁垒（NTBs）。然而，这些研究仅将非关税壁垒视为非关税措施（NTMs）的子集，这种狭义视角难以全面揭示国际贸易流程中的隐性障碍。为此，本文详细分析了印斯两国国际贸易涉及的物流流程，以识别潜藏在该流程中的各类非关税壁垒。此外，研究还发现了超越物流环节、直接影响两国贸易的其他问题。
tags: Non-Tariff barriers, Free Trade Agreements, India Sri Lanka

title: North Korea’sTariffandNon-tariffSystem: Implications for Integration into the International Economy
abstract: The purpose of this study is to analyze North Korea's tariff and non-tariff regimes to reveal the direction of North Korea's trade policy and the structure and characteristics of its legal and institutional framework, and to identify priority reforms in trade-related laws and regulations as North Korea seeks to open up and integrate into the international community. According to the Tariff Rate Manual (2005), North Korea imposes tariffs at the 8-digit HS code level, and there are a total of 10,529 imported goods with specified tariff rates, mainly import duties, but also export duties on some export-controlled goods. A key feature of North Korea's tariff rates is the low overall level of tariffs. Based on the basic tariff rate in foreign currency, the average nominal tariff rate was 5.5% and the average real tariff rate was only 4.6%. In 2005, the average nominal tariff rate for all countries in the world, including about 150 WTO members, was 8.1%, which is higher than North Korea's nominal tariff rate of 5.5%, so North Korea's tariff rate is low compared to the global average.North Korea's non-tariff barriers were established for the purpose of establishing a centralized governance system for national management of foreign trade, with the goal of building a self-reliant national economy, enhancing the quality of the national defense forces, and strengthening the party-state system. North Korea's foreign trade is subject to state management and control under the principle of state monopoly and is conduct-ed in accordance with state plans, and foreigners are not allowed to trade freely.The direction of North Korea's trade reform is toward “tariffications,” which means re-moving non-tariff barriers and increasing tariff barriers to close the resulting gaps in trade regulations. North Korea should eliminate the non-tariff system and replace it with a tariff system because it is difficult for North Korea to communicate with the inter-national community due to the distinctive characteristics of trade in a socialist country.
ch_abstract: 本研究旨在分析朝鲜的关税与非关税制度，以揭示其贸易政策导向及法律与制度框架的结构特征，并确定朝鲜在寻求开放和融入国际社会过程中贸易相关法律法规的优先改革方向。根据《关税税率手册》（2005年），朝鲜在HS编码8位税目层面征收关税，共有10,529种进口商品设有明确税率，主要为进口税，同时对部分出口管制商品征收出口税。朝鲜关税体系的核心特征是整体税率水平较低：以外汇基准税率为准，名义平均税率为5.5%，实际平均税率仅为4.6%。2005年全球约150个WTO成员在内的世界各国平均名义关税率为8.1%，高于朝鲜5.5%的名义税率，显示朝鲜关税水平低于全球均值。. . 朝鲜的非关税壁垒是为建立国家对外贸易集中管理体系而设立，其目标在于建设自立民族经济、增强国防力量素质及强化党国体制。朝鲜对外贸易遵循国家垄断原则，接受国家管理与控制，按国家计划执行，禁止外国人自由开展贸易活动。. . 朝鲜贸易改革方向是"关税化"，即取消非关税壁垒并通过提高关税壁垒来填补由此产生的贸易监管空白。朝鲜应废除非关税制度并代之以关税制度，因为社会主义国家特有的贸易体制特征使朝鲜难以与国际社会进行有效沟通。
tags: North Korea's tariff system, North Korea's non-tariff system, trade barrier of North Korea

title: Non-TariffBarriers in Ukrainian Export to the EU
abstract: The economic relations between the EU and Ukraine have intensified in recent years. Following the 2004 enlargement, Ukraine became the direct neighbour of the EU. At the same time, the country has been developing rapidly and both local production capacities and demand for foreign produce have been increasing. Ukraine also become more open to external partners. All this is reflected in the gradual effective trade integration with the EU; i.e. in growing bilateral trade flows. The overall EU tariffs for Ukrainian products are rather low and other tradition protection measures apply to selective sectors only. Moreover they are expected to disappear gradually within the next few years, following Ukraine WTO entry and expected establishment of the free trade area in manufacturing goods between the EU and Ukraine. However, there exist other so called 'non-tariff’ barriers to trade that protect and will protect the EU market. For a relatively poorer country these barriers may turn to be prohibitive. This is probably the cause that there is general perception about Ukrainian export to the EU still being below its potential. The goal of this report is to explore whether the non-tariff barriers impede Ukrainian export to the EU and to what extent. This report is published about the time when the free trade agreement between the EU and Ukraine is negotiated. The authors hope that the findings will turn useful for designing the extent of this agreement and contribute to the discussion about it by showing the extent of non-tariff barriers faced currently by Ukrainian exporters. The report starts from the overview of Ukraine trade policy (chapter 1), with the special emphasis put on economic relations between the EU and Ukraine. Evolution of bilateral trade flows is discussed next (chapter 2). This is supplemented with the brief discussion of recently conducted surveys on barriers hampering Ukrainian exports (chapter 3). The experience of some current EU members from Central and Eastern Europe, which together with gradual phasing out of tariff and traditional protection measures in the 1990s faced growing non-tariff barriers to trade with the EU, seems to be relevant for Ukraine. Chapter 4 reviews the exposure of CEECs exports to the EU’s non-tariff barriers, and describes how the countries were changing its trade-related legislation towards the EU laws in order to tackle these barriers. Chapter 4 also shows the extent of the EU’s technical barriers to trade in different sectors and how well CEE enterprises were prepared to meet them, once the EU commodity markets opened up completely for the new EU members in 2004. Results of the survey on non-tariff barriers to trade that are faced by Ukrainian exporters to the EU are presented in chapter 5. This is the main empirical contribution and the focus of this paper. The survey covered such areas as certification of origin, customs procedures and technical standards. Finally, chapter 6 concludes with policy recommendations. The authors are grateful for the assistance received from the State Committee of Ukraine for Technical Regulation and Consumer Policy and Association of Light Industry Producers of Ukraine. This publication was made possible due to the financial support provided by the 2006 Foreign Aid Programme of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Poland.
ch_abstract: 欧盟与乌克兰之间的经济关系近年来日益紧密。2004年欧盟东扩后，乌克兰成为欧盟直接邻国。与此同时，该国发展迅猛，本土产能与对外国商品的需求持续增长，对外开放程度也不断提高。这些变化体现为乌欧贸易逐步实现有效融合，即双边贸易流量持续增长。欧盟对乌克兰产品的总体关税水平较低，其他传统保护措施仅适用于个别行业。随着乌克兰加入世贸组织及乌欧工业品自由贸易区有望建立，预计这些壁垒将在未来几年内逐步消除。然而，欧盟市场仍存在并将持续存在其他所谓的"非关税"贸易壁垒。对相对欠发达国家而言，这些壁垒可能形成实质性阻碍。这或许正是普遍认为乌克兰对欧出口仍未达潜力的原因所在。本报告旨在探究非关税壁垒是否阻碍乌克兰对欧出口及其影响程度。报告发布之际，正值乌欧自由贸易协定谈判期间。作者希望研究成果能为协定范围的设计提供参考，并通过揭示乌克兰出口商当前面临的非关税壁垒程度推动相关讨论。报告首先概述乌克兰贸易政策（第一章），重点分析乌欧经济关系；随后探讨双边贸易流量的演变（第二章），并辅以近期出口阻碍调查的简要分析（第三章）。上世纪90年代，中东欧国家在逐步取消关税和传统保护措施的同时，也遭遇欧盟日益增多的非关税壁垒，这段历史经验对乌克兰具有借鉴意义。第四章考察中东欧国家出口受欧盟非关税壁垒影响的情况，阐述这些国家如何通过调整贸易相关立法向欧盟法律靠拢以应对壁垒，同时揭示2004年欧盟商品市场向新成员国全面开放时，不同行业面临的技术性贸易壁垒程度及中东欧企业的应对准备情况。第五章呈现乌克兰对欧出口商遭遇非关税壁垒的调研结果，这是本报告的核心实证贡献与重点内容。调研涵盖原产地认证、海关程序和技术标准等领域。最后，第六章提出政策建议。作者感谢乌克兰国家技术法规与消费者政策委员会及乌克兰轻工业生产者协会提供的协助。本出版物得益于波兰外交部2006年对外援助计划的资金支持。
tags: Ukraine, EU neighbourhood, trade, non-tariff barriers to trade (NTBs), technical barriers to trade (TBTs)

title: On the Heterogeneous Effects of Market Access Barriers: Evidence from Small and Large Peruvian Exporters
abstract: We examine the extent to which market-access barriers in Latin America affect small and large Peruvian exporters to the region. Using a dataset that allows us to distinguish between tariffs and different types of non-tariff measures introduced by Latin American countries between 2000 and 2014, we find that large Peruvian exporters benefit rather than lose from the introduction of tariffs and non-tariff measures in their destination markets. Their export value increases and the probability that they exit the export sector decreases as they face new market-access barriers abroad. The reverse is true for small exporters, which are hurt by more stringent market-access barriers.
ch_abstract: 我们研究了拉丁美洲市场准入壁垒对秘鲁大型和小型出口企业的影响程度。通过采用能区分关税与各类非关税措施的数据集（涵盖2000至2014年间拉美国家实施的贸易政策），本研究发现：当目标市场实施关税和非关税措施时，秘鲁大型出口企业反而从中获益而非受损。这些企业在面临国外新设市场准入壁垒时，其出口值呈现增长，退出出口领域的概率也相应降低。而小型出口企业则遭遇相反境况，更严格的市场准入壁垒对其造成了冲击。
tags: Firm Heterogeneity, Non-Tariff-Measures, tariffs

title: Regulatory Heterogeneity AsNon-TariffBarrier in Services Trade
abstract: International trade in services is hampered by non-tariff barriers that originate from national regulations. Not only the level of regulation in home or export country matters, but also the inter-country differences in regulation for service markets. Regulatory measures tend to affect fixed costs rather than variable costs. The fact that regulations often differ by market, means that the fixed costs of complying with regulations in an export market are in fact sunk market-entry costs. Our theoretical model demonstrates that policy heterogeneity between countries has a negative impact on bilateral service trade. We quantify bilateral policy variety through a new indicator that is applied in a gravity model for explaining service trade among EU countries. The empirical results support our theoretical prediction: the degree of regulatory heterogeneity is inversely related to the level of bilateral service trade. The results are applied to simulate the possible impacts of recent EU proposals for the services market. It shows that making more use of mutual recognition in regulation could increase bilateral trade in commercial services among EU countries by 30% to 60%.
ch_abstract: 源自各国法规的非关税壁垒阻碍了服务贸易的国际化发展。不仅本国或出口国的监管水平至关重要，服务市场监管的跨国差异同样影响深远。监管措施往往影响固定成本而非可变成本。由于不同市场的法规常存在差异，企业为符合出口市场法规所承担的固定成本实质上构成了沉没性市场进入成本。我们的理论模型表明，国家间政策异质性会对双边服务贸易产生负面影响。我们通过构建新指标量化双边政策差异，并将其应用于解释欧盟国家间服务贸易的引力模型。实证结果验证了理论预测：监管异质性程度与双边服务贸易水平呈负相关。研究结果被用于模拟欧盟最新服务市场改革提案的潜在影响，显示若在监管中更多采用相互认可原则，欧盟国家间的商业服务贸易额可增长30%至60%。
tags: services trade, policy heterogeneity, non-tariff barriers, EU

title: Critique of Impact Assessment of Regional Trade Agreements UsingNon-TariffMeasures
abstract: A recent study undertaken by Kawasaki (2017) uses a computable general equilibrium (CGE) model to estimate the impact of removal tariffs and non-tariff measures on trade flows and the overall gross domestic product (GDP) of the remaining 11 countries in the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP11) partner countries. This note attempts to provide insights into such estimations so as to help in real impact assessments of the tariff and non-tariff provisions of agreements such as the TPP11. It warns that policy makers who seek to rely on such studies need to be aware of the large number of assumptions that underlie the quantification of the non-tariff measures, including that regulation is necessarily negative for trade, and other limitations of the methodology used. The paper also notes these are only one aspect of the broader economic impacts of an agreement that includes chapters on intellectual property, investor protections, government procurement, and state-owned enterprises, among others.
ch_abstract: 川崎（2017）最近的一项研究运用可计算一般均衡（CGE）模型，评估了取消关税与非关税措施对《跨太平洋伙伴关系协定》（TPP11）11个成员国贸易流量及整体国内生产总值（GDP）的影响。本说明旨在解析此类评估方法，以协助对TPP11等协定中关税与非关税条款的实际影响进行研判。研究提醒政策制定者：若援引此类研究结论，需注意非关税措施量化过程中隐含的大量假设（例如将监管必然视为贸易阻碍），以及所用方法论的其他局限性。该文同时指出，此类评估仅能反映协定全面经济影响的一个维度——TPP11还涵盖知识产权、投资者保护、政府采购、国有企业等章节内容。
tags: CGE models; TPP11, Measuring NTMs

title: Regulatory Convergence AgainstNon-TariffBarriers in ASEAN and the Effectiveness of the ASEAN Trade Repository (ATR)
abstract: The regulation of non-tariff barriers in the context of ASEAN has many complications. One of them is the difficulty of defining and (NTBs) classifying NTBs. This limits the scope of the regulation of NTBs in the existing WTO covered agreements as well as in the ASEAN Economic Community instruments including the ASEAN Trade in Goods Agreement (ATIGA). This paper tries to address that issue by resorting to the soft approach. The soft approach tool selected is the ASEAN Trade Repository (ATR). This paper analyses the electronic content of the ATR which like any regional trade portal embodies the non-tariff measures (NTMs) introduced by ASEAN Member States (AMS) and the laws, regulations and orders on which they are based. This paper finds that the success of the ATR in addressing the NTMs depends on the success of AMS’ National Trade Repositories (NTRs). This paper finds that for most AMS, there is connectivity between ATR and NTRs. But there are challenges to the effective implementation of the ATR. This paper concludes by linking the analysis of the ATR to addressing the inadequacies in the regulation of NTBs in ASEAN. The ATR facilitates the identification of NTMs which should be eliminated as NTBs.
ch_abstract: 东盟框架下非关税壁垒的监管存在诸多复杂性，其中之一便是对非关税壁垒（NTBs）进行定义和分类的困难。这限制了现有世贸组织涵盖协定以及包括《东盟货物贸易协定》（ATIGA）在内的东盟经济共同体文件中对非关税壁垒的监管范围。本文试图通过软性方法解决这一问题，所选工具为东盟贸易信息库（ATR）。文章分析了该信息库的电子内容——与其他区域性贸易门户类似，该平台收录了东盟成员国实施的非关税措施（NTMs）及其依据的法律法规和政令。研究发现，ATR在应对非关税措施方面的成效取决于东盟成员国国家贸易信息库（NTRs）的建设水平。多数东盟成员国的国家信息库已与ATR实现联通，但ATR的有效实施仍面临挑战。本文最终将ATR的分析与弥补东盟非关税壁垒监管不足相衔接：该信息库有助于识别应作为非关税壁垒予以取消的非关税措施。
tags: Non-Tariff Barriers, Trade Liberalisation, ASEAN Regional Integration, Trade Facilitation

title: Теоретические вопросы применения нетарифных мер регулирования во внешней торговле (Application ofNon-TariffBarriers)
abstract: Russian Abstract:В работе исследуется чувствительность физического объема импорта иностранных товаров к нетарифным мерам регулирования внешней торговли для России и некоторых других стран постсоветского пространства.  Даны оценки адвалорного эквивалента каждой рассматриваемой нетарифной меры для различных товарных групп. Полученные автором результаты могут быть использованы для оценки мер таможенно-тарифной политики правительства. English Abstract:In this paper the author investigates the sensitivity of the physical volume of imports of foreign goods to non-tariff measures in  regulation of foreign trade in Russia and other former Soviet republics. The author gives estimates of the ad valorem equivalent of each non-tariff measure for various commodity groups. Research ﬁndings can be used for the assessment of customs and tariff policy of the government.
ch_abstract: 中文摘要：本文研究了俄罗斯及其他前苏联国家在对外贸易管制中，外国商品进口实物量对非关税措施的敏感性。作者估算了各类商品组中各项非关税措施的从价等值。研究成果可用于评估政府实施的海关关税政策。
tags: tariff barriers, foreign trade, Russian economy

title: Нетарифные Меры и Структура Торговых Потоков (Non-TariffMeasuresand the Structure of Trade Flows)
abstract: Russian Abstract:Понимание  процессов  того,  как  количественно  меры внешнеторговой политики  (тарифные  и  нетарифные)  влияют  на  развитие  российских отраслей,  является основой  принятия  решений  об  использовании  различных  мер промышленной  политики,  а изучение  их  влияния  на  экспорт/импорт  и  продуктовое разнообразие  представляется актуальном  в  свете  выработки  сбалансированной промышленной  и  внешнеторговой политики. Целью  данной  работы  является  проверка  гипотезы  об  отрицательном  влиянии тарифных  и  нетарифных  мер  защиты  внутреннего  рынка  на  импорт/экспорт  на  данных классификации  HS  до  6(8)  знаков,  а  также  гипотезы  о  разной  степени  влияния  мер (тарифных и нетарифных) защиты внутреннего рынка на продуктовое разнообразие отраслей конечных и промежуточных товаров, оценке адвалорных эквивалентов нетарифных мер по отдельным товарным группам на уровне до 6(8) знаков классификации HS, оценке влияния тарифных  и  нетарифных  барьеров  на  структуру  товарных  потоков  и,  в  частности,  на структуру экспорта. English Abstract:Understanding the process of quantitative influence of foreign trade policy measures (tariff and non-tariff) on the development of Russian industry is the basis of decision-making process on using of different measures of industrial policy and the study of their impact on the import/export and product diversity is an important part of the development of a balanced industrial and trade policy. The main purpose of this work is to test the hypothesis about the negative impact of tariff and non-tariff measures for protection domestic market on import/export on HS-6(8) data, fnd testing the hypotheses about the different influence of trade policy measures (tariff and non-tariff) for protection the domestic market on product diversity of final and intermediate goods, evaluation of ad valorem equivalents of non-tariff measures on certain commodity groups at the level of HS – 6(8), quantify the impact of tariff and non-tariff barriers on the structure of trade flows and, in particular, on the export structure.
ch_abstract: 理解外贸政策量化措施（关税与非关税）如何影响俄罗斯各行业发展的过程，是制定各类产业政策决策的基础。研究这些措施对进出口及产品多样性的影响，对于形成平衡的产业与外贸政策具有重要意义。本研究旨在验证以下假设：基于HS-6(8)位编码数据，国内市场的关税与非关税保护措施对进出口存在负面影响；针对最终品和中间品行业，不同贸易政策保护措施（关税与非关税）对产品多样性的影响存在差异；评估特定商品组在HS-6(8)位分类下的非关税措施从价等值；量化关税与非关税壁垒对贸易流结构（特别是出口结构）的影响。

title: Energy Utility Fuel Allocation Model forNon-Linear Revenue and RegulatoryTariffImplications
abstract: The primary motivation for this paper is based on the challenge faced by a utility firm that generates its electricity through multiple coal fired thermal power plants. The utility firm operates in a regulated market and faces severe shortages of low priced coals that are critical to its profitability. The regulatory authority prices the electricity generated on the basis of capacity utilization and energy costs. The capacity component of tariff encourages operation of plants at high utilization levels. Hence, the surplus maximization of the firm turns out to be a non-linear problem. Based on the characteristics of the problem, we suggest a heuristic approach to arrive at the solution. The fallout of the tariff pricing is that it is more profitable to shut-down a power plant rather than operate it at low utilization levels. The secondary motivation for this paper is to address this regulatory tariff issue. An alternate tariff model is proposed that encourages consumption of costlier coals also so that the firm operates at a high utilization level while offering electricity to the grid at a reasonable tariff. Determination of the optimal solution is simple is this model which makes it simple to administer.
ch_abstract: 本文的主要动机源于一家通过多座燃煤热电厂发电的公用事业公司所面临的挑战。该公司在受监管的市场中运营，面临对其盈利能力至关重要的低价煤炭严重短缺问题。监管机构根据产能利用率和能源成本对发电进行定价，电价中的容量部分鼓励电厂保持高利用率运行。因此，该公司的盈余最大化问题转化为一个非线性问题。针对该问题特性，我们提出了一种启发式求解方法。现行电价政策的衍生效应在于：关停电厂反而比低利用率运行更有利可图。本文的次要动机正是解决这一监管电价问题，我们提出了一种替代性电价模型——该方案既能激励企业使用高价煤炭，又可维持高利用率运行，同时以合理电价向电网供电。新模型的最优解确定过程简便，更易于实施管理。
tags: Non-linear Programming, Non-smooth Optimization, Utility Tariff, Fuel Allocation

title: European Industrial Policy as aNon-TariffBarrier
abstract: This article explores the contradictions between the EU and EU national states industrial policies and the Single Market program of elimination of NTBs (non-tariff barriers). The scope of NTBs connected to European industrial policy is divided into two spheres: the first are barriers on the level of Member States and the second are barriers on the EU level. On the national level, after the 1992 programme, the EU Member States continued to adopt many technical national regulations. On the EU level measures such as new standards, environment and anti-dumping rules, as well as Community expenditures in the different funds constitute new NTBs. Moreover, external competitors have to face other NTBs, such as VERs (Voluntary export restrictions), biased rules on public procurement, ecolabeling, and limitations on ownership, among other barriers. In this essay I demonstrate that the EU and the European national states run an active, unofficial industrial policy that distort the internal and external competition. The paper concludes that the EU industrial policy is not harmonized with the Single Market.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了欧盟与成员国产业政策同消除非关税壁垒（NTBs）的单一市场计划之间的矛盾。与欧洲产业政策相关的非关税壁垒范围分为两个层面：一是成员国层面的壁垒，二是欧盟层面的壁垒。在成员国层面，1992年计划实施后，欧盟成员国仍持续出台大量本国技术法规。在欧盟层面，新标准、环境与反倾销规则等举措，以及共同体各类基金支出均构成了新型非关税壁垒。此外，外部竞争者还需面对自愿出口限制、带有倾向性的公共采购规则、生态标签制度、所有权限制等其他壁垒。本文论证了欧盟及其成员国正在实施一种扭曲内外竞争的非公开产业政策，最终得出结论：欧盟产业政策与单一市场并不协调。
tags: European integration, industrial policy, non-tariff barriers, Single Market, protectionism, trade policy, economic integration, economics

title: Jue Insight: Brexit,Non-TariffBarriers and Consumer Prices
abstract: After decades of supporting free trade and European integration, the UK formally left the European Union in 2020, causing an increase in non-tariff barriers (NTBs) to trade. In this paper, we analyse the causal impact of this reversal of deep economic integration on consumer prices using novel matched consumer price and trade data for food products. We show that products more reliant on imports from the EU experienced an 12% higher price growth after Brexit. This price growth has exclusively been driven by products that face high NTBs, while products that are not subject to NTBs did not experience any price increases. Based on a standard welfare framework, we show households lost £9.09bn, domestic producers gained £7.34bn, and £1.75bn was lost through deadweight loss in food items alone. Due todifferences in food expenditure shares, households in the lowest decile experience a 52% higher increase in the cost of living than households in the top decile. Our results highlight the costs of un-doing deep international economic integration and the important role of NTBs.
ch_abstract: 在支持自由贸易和欧洲一体化数十年后，英国于2020年正式退出欧盟，导致非关税贸易壁垒（NTBs）增加。本文通过匹配新颖的消费品价格与食品贸易数据，分析了这种深度经济一体化逆转对消费者价格的因果影响。研究表明，对欧盟进口依赖度较高的产品在英国脱欧后价格涨幅高出12%。这种价格上涨完全由面临高非关税壁垒的产品驱动，而未受非关税壁垒影响的产品价格未出现任何上涨。基于标准福利框架测算，仅食品领域英国家庭就损失了90.9亿英镑，国内生产商获得73.4亿英镑收益，同时产生17.5亿英镑无谓损失。由于食品支出占比差异，最低收入十分位家庭的生活成本增幅比最高收入十分位家庭高出52%。研究结果揭示了逆转深度国际经济一体化的代价，以及非关税壁垒的重要影响。
tags: Brexit, prices, non-tariff barriers, food products

title: How Rules on Tariffs andNon-tariffBarriers Play a Significant Role in Restricting Market Access for Many Developing Countries Under the WTO With Reference to Trade in Goods
abstract: This article will discuss how the rules on tariffs and non-tariff barriers have restricted market access for many developing countries by considering the law on trade in goods. In general, it will highlight the main principles upon which World Trade Organisation Law (WTO) is hinged and the rules on tariffs and non-trade barriers. The article will also show how the rules on tariffs and non-tariff barriers restrict market access for many developing countries.
ch_abstract: 本文将探讨关税与非关税壁垒规则如何通过货物贸易法律限制了许多发展中国家的市场准入。总体而言，文章将重点阐述世界贸易组织法（WTO）所依据的主要原则，以及关税与非贸易壁垒的相关规则。同时，本文还将揭示这些关税与非关税壁垒规则如何对众多发展中国家的市场准入形成制约。
tags: Tarriff, Non-Tariff barriers, World Trade Organization

title: Measuring Protection: Mission Impossible?
abstract: In the international trade literature there seems to be some confusion between "openness" and "protection" measures. The aim of this paper is to bring together the "state of the art" in quantifying trade policy measures, so we focus on the extent of the protection granted by policies rather than on the degree of openness of the economy. Given the huge size of literature dealing with these issues, we limit our review as follows. On the one hand, we focus on trade policies implemented at the border: accordingly, we do not consider all the other possible public interventions influencing trade flows. On the other hand, we take into account only indexes explicitly adopting a metric expressed in a "scalar aggregate" (tariff- and quota-equivalent measures, or an index in a closed interval). We distinguish between indexes that aggregate across products (same barrier for more products) and indexes that aggregate across instruments (more barriers for the same product). Finally, in order to classify the large number of indexes covered in our review, we propose a typology based on three categories: incidence, outcome and equivalence.
ch_abstract: 国际贸易文献中似乎对“开放度”与“保护”指标的界定存在混淆。本文旨在整合量化贸易政策指标的前沿方法，因此我们聚焦于政策提供的保护程度，而非经济体的开放水平。鉴于相关文献浩如烟海，我们作出如下限定：一方面，我们仅关注边境实施的贸易政策，不讨论其他可能影响贸易流的公共干预措施；另一方面，我们只纳入明确采用"标量综合"度量标准的指标（如关税等值、配额等值或闭区间指数）。我们区分了跨产品聚合指标（多种产品适用相同壁垒）与跨工具聚合指标（同一产品面临多重壁垒）。最后，为系统归类文献中的大量指标，我们提出基于三类标准的分类体系：影响维度、结果维度和等值维度。
tags: Protection, Tariff and Non-Tariff barriers, Tariff and Non-Tariff measures

title: The Effects ofNon-TariffMeasureson Agri-Food Trade: A Review and Meta-Analysis of Empirical Evidence
abstract: The increasing policy interests and the vivid academic debate on non-tariff measures (NTMs) has stimulated a growing literature on how NTMs affect agri-food trade. The empirical literature provides contrasting and heterogeneous evidence, with some studies supporting the ‘standards as catalysts’ view, and others favouring the ‘standards as barriers’ explanation. To the extent that NTMs can influence trade, understanding the prevailing effect, and the motivations behind one effect or the other, is a pressing issue. We review a large body of empirical evidence on the effect of NTMs on agri-food trade and conduct a meta-analysis to disentangle potential determinants of heterogeneity in estimates. Our findings show the role played by the publication process and by study-specific assumptions. Some characteristics of the studies are correlated with positive significant estimates, others covary with negative significant estimates. Overall, we found that the effects of NTMs vary across types of NTMs, proxy for NTMs, and levels of details of studies. Not negligible is the influence of methodological issues and publication process.
ch_abstract: 对非关税措施（NTMs）日益增长的政策关注与活跃的学术争论，催生了大量关于NTMs如何影响农产品贸易的研究文献。实证研究呈现出相互矛盾且多样化的证据——部分研究支持"标准作为催化剂"的观点，另一些则倾向于"标准作为壁垒"的解释。鉴于NTMs确实能影响贸易，厘清主导效应及其背后的作用机制成为紧迫议题。本文系统回顾了关于NTMs对农产品贸易影响的大量实证证据，并通过元分析揭示估计结果异质性的潜在决定因素。研究发现：出版流程和研究特定假设对结果具有显著影响——某些研究特征与显著正向估计值相关，另一些则与显著负向估计值共变。总体而言，NTMs的影响因措施类型、代理变量选择和研究详略程度而异，方法论问题和出版流程的影响亦不容忽视。
tags: non-tariff measures, Trade barriers, Trade standards, Meta-analysis

title: The Economic Effects of Common Custom Tariffs on Producer Prices in the EU and in Turkey as aNon-Member Country
abstract: The objective of this paper is to estimate the economic impact of tariff measures on the prices and quantities of goods produced and traded, as well as on the economic welfare of the EU in the light of producers in Turkey. In fact, currently applied Common Custom Tariffs (CCT), which are considered in the price support system (PSS) applied to producers in the EU's Common Agricultural Policy (CAP), prevents producers from competing fairly in the EU market. The removal of tariff measures is not expected in the near future, but at least a decrease in their negative impacts on the producer gain and consumer surplus is possible if suitable amounts of tariff measures are applied in order to protect producers, as well as Turkish producers.
ch_abstract: 本文旨在评估关税措施对生产和贸易商品价格及数量的经济影响，以及从土耳其生产者的视角看对欧盟经济福利的影响。事实上，当前实施共同关税（CCT）作为欧盟共同农业政策（CAP）中价格支持体系（PSS）的一部分，阻碍了生产者在欧盟市场的公平竞争。虽然近期不太可能取消关税措施，但若能采用适当额度的关税措施以保护生产者（包括土耳其生产者），至少有可能减少其对生产者收益和消费者剩余的负面影响。
tags: EU, Turkey, CCT, Producer Gain, Tariff measures

title: Trade Policy and Exporters’ Resilience: Evidence from Indonesia
abstract: How does trade policy affect exporters' ability to source intermediate inputs and adjust exports in response to foreign shocks? The analysis exploits new disaggregated, time-varying data on non-tariff measures (NTMs) faced by Indonesian firms. In response to a depreciation of the Yuan which makes Chinese exports more competitive in third markets, Indonesian firms facing NTMs on their inputs see a much larger drop in their export values compared to firms that do not face any NTM, with the magnitude of this effect varying depending on the type of non-tariff measure. We show that this difference can be explained by the inability of firms facing NTMs to take advantage of cheaper intermediate inputs from China in the face of depreciations of the Yuan, consistent with a model where NTMs impose fixed costs of import. These findings suggest that reforming some types of import non-tariff measures can positively affect exporters’ resilience.
ch_abstract: 贸易政策如何影响出口商获取中间品投入及应对外部冲击调整出口的能力？本研究利用印尼企业面临的非关税措施（NTM）最新细分时变数据进行实证分析。当人民币贬值使中国出口产品在第三方市场更具竞争力时，与未遭遇非关税措施的企业相比，其投入品面临非关税措施的印尼企业出口额降幅显著更大，且影响程度因非关税措施类型而异。研究表明，这种差异源于面临非关税措施的企业难以在人民币贬值时利用中国更廉价的中间品投入，这与非关税措施产生进口固定成本的理论模型一致。这些发现表明，改革某些类型的进口非关税措施可有效提升出口商的抗风险能力。
tags: Trade policy, non-tariff measures, exchange rate shocks, global value chains, resilience

title: BeyondTariffReductions: What Extra Boost from Trade Agreement Provisions?
abstract: There is a growing recognition that for developed economies, like the UK, tariff-free market access is just one of a number of measures that ease cross-border trade flows. Modern trade agreements go beyond tariff reductions by setting rules, such as market access and regulation of foreign service providers. We examine the contribution of deep non-tariff provisions on international trade in goods and services. Using a gravity model, we find that provisions related to services, investment, and competition make up half of the overall impact of economic integration agreements on trade flows. These deep provisions have larger effects for trade in services  than for trade in goods, and their relative contribution is highest in sectors that facilitate supply chain activity, such as transportation and storage. We apply our sectoral estimates of deep provisions to examine two counterfactuals of the UK signing bilateral deals with the US and with China and India. We find that negotiating services, investment, and competition provisions in these future deals would boost trade relatively more in professional, scientific, and technical activities in the UK.
ch_abstract: 人们日益认识到，对于英国等发达经济体而言，免关税市场准入只是促进跨境贸易流动的众多措施之一。现代贸易协定不仅降低关税，还通过制定市场准入和外国服务提供商监管等规则来深化合作。我们研究了深度非关税条款对国际货物与服务贸易的贡献。借助引力模型分析发现，与服务、投资和竞争相关的条款占经济一体化协定对贸易流量总体影响的50%。这些深度条款对服务贸易的促进作用大于货物贸易，且在运输仓储等支撑供应链活动的行业中贡献最为显著。我们运用分行业深度条款评估数据，模拟了英国与美国及中印签署双边协议的两种情景。研究表明，在这些未来协定中纳入服务、投资和竞争条款，将相对更大程度促进英国专业、科学与技术活动领域的贸易增长。
tags: deep provisions, EIAs, integration agreements, non-tariff barriers, Trade agreements, trade policy

title: Technical Change,Non-TariffBarriers, and the Development of the Italian Locomotive Industry,1850-1913
abstract: The locomotive industry was one of the relatively sophisticated “high-tech” sectors in which Italy, a latecomer country, was successful before 1913. Using technical data on the performance of different vintages of locomotives, we construct a new industry-level index of technical change. We also study the impact of different policy instruments (import duties, non-tariff trade barriers and other discretionary interventions) in shaping the development of the industry. Our reassessment reveals the sound technological performance of Italian locomotives; the successful growth of this industry; and the critical role played by non-tariff barriers in its development.
ch_abstract: 机车工业是意大利这一后发国家在1913年前取得成功的相对精密的“高科技”领域之一。通过分析不同年代机车的性能技术数据，我们构建了一个新的行业级技术变革指数。同时研究了各类政策工具（进口关税、非关税贸易壁垒及其他选择性干预措施）对该行业发展的影响。我们的重新评估表明：意大利机车具备良好的技术表现；该产业实现了成功增长；非关税壁垒在其发展过程中发挥了关键作用。
tags: technical progress, locomotive industry, non-tariff barriers, Italy, 19th century

title: DoNon-TariffMeasuresMake Domestic Firms More Profitable? Evidence from the Commercial Banking Sector
abstract: Using firm level data for a sample of 78 country markets in 2012, this paper analyzes the relationship between the severity of non-tariff measures related to the entry and operation of foreign firms and firm profitability in the commercial banking sector, and differentiates the impact of these non-tariff measures on foreign-owned and domestic firms. Overall, there is a non-linear relationship between the level of restrictions and the profitability of firms. Banks in countries with low levels of restriction are significantly more profitable than banks in countries with no restrictions, while banks in countries with moderate levels of restriction are less profitable than banks in countries with no restrictions. Additionally, foreign owned firms are significantly more profitable than domestic firms when there are no restrictions on the entry and operation of foreign firms, but less profitable than domestically owned firms at both low and moderate levels of restriction.
ch_abstract: 本文利用2012年78个国家市场的企业层面数据，分析了与外资企业准入和运营相关的非关税措施严格程度对商业银行企业盈利能力的影响，并区分了这些非关税措施对外资企业和本土企业的不同影响。总体而言，限制水平与企业盈利能力之间存在非线性关系：在低限制水平的国家，银行盈利能力显著高于无限制国家；而在中等限制水平的国家，银行盈利能力则低于无限制国家。此外，当外资企业准入运营不受限时，外资企业盈利能力显著高于本土企业；但在低限制和中等限制水平下，外资企业盈利能力均低于本土企业。
tags: services trade barriers, firm performance, firm-level data

title: Least-Cost Distribution NetworkTariffDesign in Theory and Practice
abstract: In this paper a game-theoretical model with self-interest pursuing consumers is introduced in order to assess how to design a least-cost distribution tariff under two constraints that regulators typically face. The first constraint is related to difficulties regarding the implementation of cost-reflective tariffs. In practice, so-called cost-reflective tariffs are only a proxy for the actual cost driver(s) in distribution grids. The second constraint has to do with fairness. There is a fear that active consumers investing in distributed energy resources (DER) might benefit at the expense of passive consumers. We find that both constraints have a significant impact on the least-cost network tariff design, and the results depend on the state of the grid. If most of the grid investments still have to be made, passive and active consumers can both benefit from cost-reflective tariffs, while this is not the case for passive consumers if the costs are mostly sunk.
ch_abstract: 本文引入了一个以自利消费者为对象的博弈理论模型，旨在评估监管机构面临双重约束时如何设计最低成本配电电价。第一重约束涉及成本反映电价实施中的困难——实践中所谓的成本反映电价仅是配电网真实成本驱动因素的近似值。第二重约束关乎公平性，存在对投资分布式能源（DER）的主动消费者可能以被动消费者利益为代价获益的担忧。研究发现这两重约束对最低成本网络电价设计具有显著影响，其结果取决于电网状态：若电网大部分投资尚未完成，被动与主动消费者均可从成本反映电价中获益；而当成本主要为沉没成本时，被动消费者则无法获得同等收益。
tags: Batteries, distributed energy adoption, distribution network tariff design, gametheory, non-cooperative behaviour

title: NonTariffBarriers in Computable General Equilibrium Modelling
abstract: With diminishing tariffs, the focus of trade policy makers and analysts is logically turning towards non-tariff barriers (NTBs), but there much remains to be done. It is well-known that tackling NTBs poses many challenges for the analyst because of their diverse and complex nature, and the lack of available evidence. NTBs pose also particular difficulties to computable/applied general equilibrium (CGE) modelling, traditionally more comfortable with policies whose impact can be interpreted into direct effects on prices. This research provides a quantification of the impact of NTBs at the global level. The model we use is significantly larger than in previous studies, and to our knowledge, the first truly global one. The main focus of this research, however, is to discuss and question the various treatments of NTBs in CGE models with a specific application of the Global Trade Analysis Project (GTAP) standard model, the workhorse of trade policy CGE analysis. We find that serious estimation and modelling efforts remain to be undertaken in order to make CGE modelling a useful policy tool to analyze NTBs. Casual policy inferences from loose specifications may indeed lead to serious analytical mistakes. We show that while using the same robust estimates of NTB incidence we obtain vastly different results under different model specifications.
ch_abstract: 随着关税的逐步降低，贸易政策制定者和分析人士的关注点自然转向非关税壁垒（NTBs），但仍有大量工作亟待完成。众所周知，由于非关税壁垒的多样性和复杂性，以及缺乏可用证据，分析人员应对这些壁垒面临诸多挑战。非关税壁垒也给可计算/应用一般均衡（CGE）模型带来了特殊困难，而传统上这类模型更擅长处理那些影响可转化为价格直接效应的政策。本研究对全球范围内非关税壁垒的影响进行了量化分析。我们所使用的模型规模远超以往研究，据我们所知，这是首个真正意义上的全球性模型。然而，本研究的主要重点是通过全球贸易分析项目（GTAP）标准模型（贸易政策CGE分析的主要工具）的具体应用，探讨和质疑CGE模型中非关税壁垒的各种处理方法。我们发现，要使CGE模型成为分析非关税壁垒的有效政策工具，仍需进行认真的估算和建模工作。基于松散设定的随意政策推断确实可能导致严重的分析错误。我们证明，即使使用同样可靠的非关税壁垒发生率估计值，在不同模型设定下也会得到截然不同的结果。
tags: Non Tariff Barriers, Computable General Equilibrium

title: Horizontal Mechanism Proposal for the Resolution ofNon-TariffBarrier Disputes at the WTO: An Analysis
abstract: On 3 February 2010, a group of countries representing 88 distinct World Trade Organization (WTO) Members presented a proposal for procedures for the facilitation of solutions to non-tariff barrier disputes. This proposal is in line with Paragraph 16 of the Doha Ministerial Declaration which provides for the reduction or appropriate elimination of non-tariff barriers, since they constitute barriers that affect market access opportunities for other WTO Members. This article analyzes whether the new procedures are properly designed to effectively meet their own stated goals, but also if they are compatible with the general objectives of the Dispute Settlement Body.
ch_abstract: 2010年2月3日，代表世界贸易组织（WTO）88个成员的一组国家提出了一项关于非关税壁垒争端解决便利化程序的提案。该提案符合《多哈部长宣言》第16条的规定，该条款要求减少或适当消除非关税壁垒，因为这些壁垒影响了其他WTO成员的市场准入机会。本文分析了新程序的设计是否能够有效实现其既定目标，以及它们是否符合争端解决机构的总体目标。
tags: horizontal mechanism, World Trade Organization, WTO, non-tariff barrier, disputes, facilitation, conciliation, mediation, good offices, alternative dispute resolution

title: Divergent Integration
abstract: Trade liberalisation is often characterised as either preferential or non-discriminatory but not all preferential trade agreements are the same. We focus on non-tariff measures that can constitute barriers to trade and that differ between free-trade agreements (FTAs) and customs unions (CUs). In particular, we investigate the role of rules of origin (RoO) in restricting market access for nations excluded from a CU. We develop a simple general equilibrium model characterised by trade in intermediate and final products and use this to examine the implications of binding RoO in an FTA on market outcomes and the welfare of agents in the economy. We highlight the phenomenon of “induced trade diversion” where RoO can result in countries losing from preferential market access.
ch_abstract: 贸易自由化常被区分为优惠性和非歧视性两种形式，但并非所有优惠贸易协定都相同。我们重点关注可能构成贸易壁垒的非关税措施，这些措施在自由贸易协定（FTA）和关税同盟（CU）之间存在差异。具体而言，我们研究了原产地规则（RoO）在限制非关税同盟成员国市场准入方面的作用。我们构建了一个以中间产品和最终产品贸易为特征的简单一般均衡模型，并借此分析自由贸易协定中具有约束力的原产地规则对市场结果和经济主体福利的影响。我们揭示了"诱导性贸易转移"现象——原产地规则可能导致参与优惠市场准入的国家遭受福利损失。
tags: Preferential trading; non-tariff measures; rules of origin

title: Trade Restrictiveness Indices in Presence of Externalities: An Application toNon-TariffMeasures
abstract: We extend the trade restrictiveness index approach to the case of market imperfections and domestic regulations addressing them. We focus on standard-like non-tariff measures (NTMs) affecting cost of production and potentially enhancing demand by reducing negative externalities. We apply the framework to the database of Kee et al. (2009) and derive ad valorem equivalents (AVEs) for NTMs. About 39% of the product lines affected by NTMs exhibit negative AVEs, indicating a  trade-facilitating effect of these measures. Accounting for the trade-facilitating effect of NTMs significantly reduces previous measures of countries' trade policy restrictiveness obtained while constraining these NTMs to be trade reducing.
ch_abstract: 我们将贸易限制指数方法扩展到市场失灵及旨在解决这些问题的国内监管情形中。重点关注类似标准的非关税措施（NTMs），这些措施既影响生产成本，又可能通过减少负外部性来提升需求。我们运用该框架分析了Kee等人（2009年）的数据库，并推导出非关税措施的从价等价税（AVEs）。约39%受非关税措施影响的产品线显示出负的从价等价税，表明这些措施具有贸易促进效应。在考虑非关税措施的贸易促进作用后，先前将非关税措施限定为贸易限制性政策时所得出的各国贸易政策限制程度显著降低。

title: Cooperation in WTO'sTariffWaters
abstract: A rationale for cooperation in trade negotiations is the internalization of terms-of-trade externalities. With the help of a simple theoretical framework we show that the textbook prediction that non-cooperative tariffs are positively correlated to the importer's market power is reversed when tariffs are set cooperatively. We use this prediction to identify the extent of cooperation reflected in WTO members' tariffs. Because many members of the WTO apply tariffs well below the negotiated tariff bounds, creating what is known as tariff water, there is also room for WTO members to set non-cooperative tariffs. As expected, we found that in the absence of tariff water, WTO tariffs are set cooperatively. Interestingly, non-cooperative tariff setting is only observed in the presence of sufficiently large amounts of tariff water, suggesting that cooperation in the WTO goes well beyond negotiated tariff bounds. We also found evidence that cooperation within WTO tariff waters can be explained by the fear of retaliation from trading partners with market power and tariff water in their schedules.
ch_abstract: 贸易合作谈判的一个理论基础在于内化贸易条件的外部性。通过一个简单的理论框架，我们证明当关税以合作方式设定时，教科书关于非合作关税与进口国市场势力呈正相关的预测会发生逆转。我们利用这一预测来识别WTO成员关税中体现的合作程度。由于许多WTO成员实施的实际关税远低于谈判达成的约束税率，形成所谓的"关税水分"，这也为成员设定非合作关税提供了空间。如预期所示，我们发现当不存在关税水分时，WTO成员的关税设定呈现合作性。有趣的是，非合作关税设定仅出现在存在足够大量关税水分的情况下，这表明WTO内的合作范围远超谈判达成的约束税率。我们还发现证据表明，WTO约束税率范围内的合作行为，可以用成员对具有市场势力且自身关税表中存在关税水分的贸易伙伴可能实施报复的担忧来解释。
tags: Export supply elasticities, Tariff water, WTO cooperation

title: New Concerns in International Business: The Application of Sanitary and Phytosanitary Policies
abstract: In recent years, the debate over the application of non-tariff measures for environmental protection as a new form of disguised restriction on international trade by developed countries has become increasingly important. While tariffs have decreased over the decades, the increasing application of environmental-related requirements are a new factor that affects international business. These new requirements not only modify companies’ decision-making processes at national and international levels, but also within the firm. Hence, this paper proposes to examine the application of such measures by the European Union in the tea, coffee and yerba mate market, and their impact on exporting Latin-American firms for the 1995-2015 period and analyze whether there has been an improvement in their productive quality. For this aim, through a qualitative methodology, we carried out interviews with specialists of the field and surveys to Latin-American exporting companies. In this way, this analysis discusses with theorists if the application of measures related to environmental sustainability leads to ameliorate firms’ productive quality. Among the results, it is highlighted the fact that non-tariff measures — in particular sanitary and phytosanitary ones — have been used as trade barriers. However, complying with them allows exporting companies to develop environmental performance strategies and ultimately, it leads to a positive growth in their productive quality in the medium-long term.
ch_abstract: 近年来，发达国家以环境保护为名实施非关税措施作为国际贸易新型隐性限制手段的争议日益突出。尽管过去几十年间关税水平持续下降，但日益增多的环保相关要求正成为影响国际商业的新因素。这些新要求不仅改变了企业在国内和国际层面的决策流程，也深刻影响了企业内部运作。本文以1995-2015年间欧盟在茶叶、咖啡和马黛茶市场实施的非关税措施为例，研究其对拉美出口企业的影响，并分析其生产质量是否得到提升。通过定性研究方法，我们对领域专家进行访谈并对拉美出口企业开展问卷调查，据此与理论界探讨环境可持续性措施的应用是否促进了企业生产质量的改善。研究发现，非关税措施——尤其是卫生与植物检疫措施——确实被用作贸易壁垒，但达标过程促使出口企业制定环境绩效战略，最终在中长期实现生产质量的积极提升。
tags: non-tariff measures, trade barriers, sanitary and phytosanitary policies, productive quality

title: A Cost-Benefit Framework for the Assessment ofNon-TariffMeasuresin Agro-Food Trade
abstract: This report develops a conceptual framework for the assessment of costs and benefits associated with non-tariff measures (NTMs) that allows an evidence-based comparative assessment of alternative regulatory approaches. It was prepared by Frank van Tongeren (OECD Secretariat), John Beghin (Iowa State University), and Stéphan Marette (INRA), and benefited from contributions by Joanna Komorowska (OECD Secretariat).
ch_abstract: 本报告构建了一个评估非关税措施（NTMs）相关成本与效益的概念框架，支持基于证据的替代监管方案比较评估。报告由经合组织秘书处弗兰克·范通厄伦、爱荷华州立大学约翰·贝金及法国农科院斯特凡·马雷特共同编写，并得到经合组织秘书处乔安娜·科莫罗夫斯卡的贡献支持。
tags: Information and product quality, standardization and compatibility, economics of regulation, agriculture in international trade, trade policy, international trade organisations, NTMs, TBTs

title: Heterogeneous Effects ofTariffandNon-TariffTrade-Policy Barriers in Quantitative General Equilibrium
abstract: Structural quantitative work in international economics typically treats trade policy as log-linearly related to trade costs and as exogenous. This paper proposes a structural approach that allows for a non-parametric relationship and treats tariff and non-tariff trade-policy variables as potentially endogenous in log-linear estimation. We document that the data reject the assumption of log-linearity of trade costs in both the tariff- and the non-tariff-policy domains. Specifically, the partial impact of a change in tariffs is strongest for low policy barriers and medium levels of tariffs but generally decreases in the level of both non-tariff barriers and tariff barriers. To give a relevant illustration, we assess the effects of a unilateral increase of US tariffs on Chinese imports by 10 percentage points and document that the estimated effects on real bilateral trade-flow changes would be largely underestimated by standard approaches.
ch_abstract: 国际经济学中的结构性定量研究通常将贸易政策视为与贸易成本呈对数线性关系且外生。本文提出一种结构性方法，允许非参数关系，并在对数线性估计中将关税和非关税贸易政策变量视为潜在内生。我们记录的数据显示，在关税和非关税政策领域，贸易成本的对数线性假设均被拒绝。具体而言，关税变动的边际影响在低政策壁垒和中等关税水平时最强，但通常随非关税壁垒和关税壁垒水平的上升而减弱。为提供相关例证，我们评估了美国对中国进口商品单边加征10个百分点关税的影响，并证明标准方法对实际双边贸易流量变化的估计效果会出现显著低估。
tags: Generalized propensity scores, Gravity models, Non-parametric methods, Semi-parametric methods, trade policy

title: Non-TariffBarriers and Bargaining in Generic and Off-Patent Pharmaceuticals
abstract: Pharmaceutical prices are widely dispersed across countries with comparable quality standards. We study two elements of this dispersion; non-tariff barriers and buyer bargaining power. Under monopoly, generic drug prices are 3-4 times higher in the United States. With 6 or more competitors, generic drug prices are similar across countries. Motivated by this, we use a bargaining model to examine two policy solutions to reduce drug prices. First, we remove non-tariff barriers to increase the number of competitors through a reciprocal approval arrangement and market entry. Second, we explore the US government's unexploited purchasing power to negotiate drug prices. Regarding Medicaid, the first measure can reduce total expenditures by 8% and the second by 18%. There are very little additional savings from doing both procedures in tandem.
ch_abstract: 药品价格在质量标准相近的国家之间存在广泛差异。我们研究了导致这种差异的两大因素：非关税壁垒和买方议价能力。在垄断情况下，美国仿制药价格高出3-4倍；但当竞争者达到6家或以上时，各国仿制药价格趋于一致。基于此发现，我们运用议价模型检验两种降低药价的政策方案：首先通过互认审批和市场准入消除非关税壁垒以增加竞争者数量；其次挖掘美国政府未充分利用的采购权来协商药价。针对医疗补助计划，第一项措施可减少8%总支出，第二项可减少18%。两项措施同时实施带来的额外节省微乎其微。
tags: Law of One Price, Competition, Bargaining, Pharmaceuticals, Non-Tariff Barriers, Healthcare Economics, International Trade

title: Beyond the Initial Export Boost: The Erosion of Trade Agreement Benefits
abstract: Preferential trade agreements (PTAs) are widely acclaimed for their potential to mitigate market imperfections and expand export opportunities. However, in changing economic circumstances, these beneficial effects may only endure for a while and often gradually fade, affecting industries unevenly. This study delves into this overlooked phenomenon by exploring Poland‘s export performance in the Western Balkan (WB) region, where the implementation of Stabilization and Association Agreements (SAAs) has evidently generated export growth, primarily driven by tariff reductions, though these gains were manifested disproportionally across sectors. Employing survival analysis, the study validates the positive influence of SAAs on Polish export competitiveness within the WBs while uncovering its temporal erosion and sectoral discrepancies. On average, a 51% and 84% decline in Polish export competitiveness to WBs is observed after 5 and 10 years, respectively. Moreover, a unique dataset on non-tariff measures (NTMs) is employed to identify specific sectors encountering significant NTMs contributing to the reported diverse export patterns. These insights highlight the need for policies that acknowledge the diminishing benefits of trade agreements and mitigate the trade imbalances caused by NTMs.
ch_abstract: 优惠贸易协定（PTAs）因其具有缓解市场缺陷和扩大出口机会的潜力而广受赞誉。然而，在不断变化的经济环境下，这些积极效应可能仅能维持一段时间，并往往逐渐减弱，对各行业的影响并不均衡。本研究通过探讨波兰在西巴尔干（WB）地区的出口表现，深入剖析了这一被忽视的现象。在该地区，《稳定与联系协定》（SAAs）的实施明显推动了出口增长（主要得益于关税削减），但不同行业获得的收益存在显著差异。通过生存分析，研究验证了SAAs对波兰在西巴尔干地区出口竞争力的积极影响，同时也揭示了这种影响会随时间减弱且存在行业差异。平均而言，波兰对西巴尔干地区的出口竞争力在5年和10年后分别下降51%和84%。此外，研究采用独特的非关税措施（NTMs）数据集，识别出遭遇重大非关税壁垒的特定行业，这些壁垒正是造成出口模式差异的关键因素。这些发现强调，政策制定需认识到贸易协定效益的递减性，并采取措施缓解非关税措施造成的贸易失衡。
tags: Export competitiveness, Non-Tariff Measures, Survival analysis, Trade agreements

title: Single MarketNon-Compliance: How Relevant is the Institutional Setting?
abstract: This paper investigates the role of the national institutional setting of EU member states in explaining Single Market non-compliance regarding non-tariff barriers in intra-EU trade. This study uses data on infringements to Single Market law on the free movement of goods. After controlling for country and industry-specific factors, we show that domestic institutional characteristics are relevant to explain non- compliance ensuing from trade protection measures implemented by EU countries. While government independence from political pressures and higher levels of representativeness and accountability reduce the propensity of member states to infringe upon Single Market laws on the free movement of goods, better regulatory quality increases the probability of non-compliance at industry level, suggesting that increases in competition generate protectionist measures that violate Single Market law.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了欧盟成员国国家制度环境在解释单一市场内部贸易中非关税壁垒违规行为中的作用。本研究采用关于商品自由流动领域违反单一市场法规的数据进行分析。在控制国家和行业特定因素后，我们发现国内制度特征对解释欧盟国家实施贸易保护措施导致的违规行为具有解释力。研究显示：政府免受政治干预的独立性以及更高水平的代表性与问责制会降低成员国违反商品自由流动法规的倾向；而更优质的监管质量反而会提高行业层面的违规概率，这表明竞争加剧会引发违反单一市场法规的保护主义措施。
tags: Single Market, institutional setting, non-compliance, trade protection, non-tariff barriers, count data models

title: The Role ofNon-TariffMeasures(NTMs) on Aquatic Trade: Evidence from China’s Aquatic Exports
abstract: This study focuses on China, the largest exporter of aquatic products globally, as a case study. It utilizes the Anderson & Van Wincoop (2003) gravity framework and employs Poisson PseudoMaximum Likelihood (PPML) estimators to assess the impact of Non-Tariff Measures (NTMs), specifically Sanitary and Phytosanitary (SPS) measures and Technical Barriers to Trade (TBT), on aquatic exports. The results reveal that SPS measures have a significantly negative impact on China's aquatic product exports, whereas the effects of TBT measures are not found to be significant. Additionally, the study enhances the robustness of its conclusions through a series of robustness tests. Furthermore, by conducting heterogeneity analyses, the study investigates the specific impacts of SPS and TBT measures on different groups of countries and products.
ch_abstract: 本研究以全球最大水产品出口国中国为案例，采用Anderson & Van Wincoop（2003）引力模型框架，运用泊松伪最大似然（PPML）估计方法，评估卫生与植物检疫措施（SPS）和技术性贸易壁垒（TBT）两类非关税措施对水产品出口的影响。结果表明，SPS措施对中国水产品出口存在显著负面效应，而TBT措施的影响未呈现显著性。研究通过一系列稳健性检验增强了结论的可靠性，并进一步通过异质性分析，探究了SPS与TBT措施对不同国家群体和产品类别的具体影响。
tags: NTMs, SPS, TBT, Aquatic Export

title: NonTariffBarriers to Trade in Mercosur: How Do Brazilian Exporting Firms Perceive Them?
abstract: The main aim of this paper is to identify and to analyze the presence of Non Tariff Barriers (NTBs) imposed on Brazilian exports by the other three Mercosur's member countries. The NTBs were identified through interviews with selected Brazilian companies from three sectors - Footwear, Frozen Chicken and Steel Products - and through 412 questionaries answered by Brazilian exporting firms. During the interviews, the main NTBs identified for each sector were: a) Footwear: labeling regulations, industrial standards and regulations, licensing and customs clearance procedures; b) Frozen Chicken: sanitary regulations, antidumping files and customs clearance procedures; c) Steel Products: safety and industrial standards and regulations, antidumping duties, discriminatory bilateral agreements and customs clearance procedures. Concerning the questionaries, a list with 16 non tariff barriers to trade divided into visible and non visible barriers were presented to the exporting firms. They were asked to identify which NTBs they faced by them when trading with the other Mercosur's member countries and what was their importance. The level of importance ranged from one (little important) to six (very important). According to the companies the NTBs that affect them most in their intra Mercosur trade are: a) Visible barriers: freight and insurance costs and expenses due to customs procedures; b) Non visible barriers: labeling regulations, customs procedures, previous inspection of products and safety and industrial standards and regulations. Once identified the main NTBs that affect Brazilian companies sales to the other three Mercosur's member countries, one can propose actions to eliminate them and increase trade among the countries. Such actions are: a) harmonization of health and sanitary regulations and quality standards and acceptance of certificates issued by government agencies or previously selected certifying companies of any member country; b) prohibition of antidumping duties in intra Mercosur trade. The dumping cases should be investigated and judged by domestic agencies dealing with antitrust and competition policies; c) adoption of uniform customs procedures for intra Mercosur trade by the four member countries.
ch_abstract: 本文的主要目的是识别并分析南方共同市场其他三个成员国对巴西出口设置的非关税壁垒（NTBs）。通过采访三个行业（鞋类、冷冻鸡肉和钢铁产品）的精选巴西企业，以及412家巴西出口企业填写的问卷，我们识别出了这些非关税壁垒。在访谈中，各行业面临的主要非关税壁垒包括：a) 鞋类：标签规定、工业标准与法规、许可及清关程序；b) 冷冻鸡肉：卫生法规、反倾销案件和清关程序；c) 钢铁产品：安全与工业标准及法规、反倾销税、歧视性双边协议和清关程序。在问卷调查中，出口企业需从一份包含16项非关税壁垒的清单（分为显性与隐性壁垒）中标注其在与南方共同市场其他成员国贸易时遭遇的壁垒及其重要性，重要性等级从1（不重要）到6（非常重要）。企业反馈显示，对其区域内贸易影响最大的非关税壁垒为：a) 显性壁垒：因海关程序产生的运费与保险费用；b) 隐性壁垒：标签规定、海关程序、产品预检以及安全与工业标准及法规。基于这些发现，可提出以下消除壁垒、促进成员国间贸易的行动建议：a) 统一卫生法规与质量标准，承认成员国政府机构或指定认证公司颁发的证书；b) 禁止南方共同市场内部实施反倾销税，反倾销案件应由各国反垄断与竞争政策机构调查裁决；c) 四成员国采用统一的区域内贸易海关程序。
tags: Non tariff barriers, Regional trade agreements, Mercosur

title: WTO Agricultural Tariffication with Lessons forTariffAdoption
abstract: According to the Uruguay Round Agreement on Agriculture (URAA), all agricultural non-tariff trade barriers should be converted into equivalent tariffs and further, reduced over time. However each member country has the authority to choose the tariff types when it converts NTBs to tariffs such as ad valorem tariff and specific tariff. The paper tries to find the reason for the choice of a certain type of tariff in the process of tariffication after the UR negotiation on agriculture. To achieve this goal, the paper analyses the effects of tariffication of a fixed quota into tariffs on price, trade and welfare in a number of scenarios related to the sources of uncertainty. In this paper, we examine the nonequivalence of specific tariff and ad valorem tariff, which are general type of tariffs used in the most of countries. The paper has shown that the two types of tariffs selected by tariffication of import quota are not generally equivalent in both their effects on price and trade stability and welfare with the trade model under uncertainty. The main conclusion of this study is that there is no general presumption that one tariff regime is superior to the other tariff regime under conditions of uncertainty. The precise source of uncertainty and the properties of the relevant demand and supply functions might affect the determination of tariff type selected after tariffication of non-tariff barriers.
ch_abstract: 根据乌拉圭回合《农业协定》（URAA），所有农业非关税贸易壁垒都应转化为等效关税，并逐步降低。但各成员国在将非关税壁垒转为关税时有权选择从价税、从量税等税种。本文试图探究农业谈判后关税化过程中特定关税类型选择的成因。为此，我们通过贸易模型分析了固定配额关税化在不同不确定性来源情境下对价格、贸易及福利的影响，重点研究了各国普遍采用的从量税与从价税的非等效性。研究表明：在不确定性条件下，进口配额关税化形成的两种关税对价格稳定性、贸易稳定性及福利的影响均存在差异。本项研究的主要结论是：在不确定性条件下，无法笼统判定某种关税制度优于另一种关税制度。不确定性的具体来源及相关供需函数的特性，可能影响非关税壁垒关税化后关税类型的确定。
tags: WTO Agricultural Negotiation, Import Quota, Ad Valorem Tariff, Specific Tariff

title: Rules of Origin asNon-TariffMeasures: Towards Greater Regulatory Convergence
abstract: This paper examines some of the features of rules of origin (RoO) that makes these policy instruments nontariff measures, reflects on the causes of the longstanding deadlock in the WTO on multilateral harmonization of non-preferential RoO, and reviews recent trends in RoO included in recent preferential trade agreements (PTAs) involving the EU and/or the US. These reveal a steady and substantial movement towards adoption of similar approaches and illustrate that cooperation to reduce the trade-impeding effects of differences in RoO across jurisdictions is feasible. We argue that from a trade facilitation perspective such cooperation can and should pursue greater convergence between preferential and nonpreferential RoO, building on the developments observed in PTAs.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了原产地规则（RoO）作为非关税措施的一些特征，反思了世贸组织在多边协调非优惠原产地规则上长期陷入僵局的原因，并分析了近期欧盟和美国参与的特惠贸易协定（PTA）中原产地规则的最新趋势。这些趋势表明，各方正稳步且显著地朝着采用相似方法的方向发展，同时也证明通过合作来减少不同司法管辖区间原产地规则差异对贸易的阻碍是可行的。我们认为，从贸易便利化的角度来看，此类合作能够且应当基于特惠贸易协定中的发展成果，推动优惠与非优惠原产地规则之间实现更大程度的趋同。
tags: Rules of Origin, WTO, Nontariff Measures, Trade Agreements, Convergence

title: Steepest AscentTariffReforms
abstract: This paper introduces the concept of a steepest ascent tariff reform for a small open economy. By construction, it is locally optimal in that it yields the highest gain in utility of any feasible tariff reform vector of the same length. Accordingly, it provides a convenient benchmark for the evaluation of the welfare effectiveness of other well known tariff reform rules, as e.g. the proportional and the concertina rules. We develop the properties of this tariff reform, characterize the sources of the potential welfare gains from tariff reform, use it to establish conditions under which some existing reforms are locally optimal, provide geometric illustrations and compare welfare effectiveness of reforms using numerical examples. Moreover, being a general concept, we apply it to the issue of market access and examine its implications. Overall, the paper's contribution lies in presenting a theoretical concept where the focus is upon the size of welfare gains accruing from tariff reforms rather than simply with the direction of welfare effects that has been the concern of the literature.
ch_abstract: 本文介绍了一种针对小型开放经济体的最速上升关税改革概念。从构建方法来看，该改革在局部范围内具有最优性——在相同长度的可行关税改革向量中，它能产生最高的效用增益。因此，它为评估其他知名关税改革规则（如比例规则和琴键规则）的福利效益提供了便捷基准。我们深入分析了这种关税改革的特性，阐明了关税改革带来潜在福利增益的根源，并运用该理论建立了现有改革方案在局部最优条件下的适用标准，通过几何图示进行阐释，并采用数值算例比较不同改革的福利效益。此外，作为一个普适性概念，我们将其应用于市场准入问题并探讨其政策含义。总体而言，本文的学术价值在于提出了一个聚焦关税改革福利增益规模（而非文献中普遍关注的福利效应方向）的理论框架。
tags: steepest ascent tariff reforms, piecemeal tariff policy, welfare, market access, small open economy

title: Extensions to theNon-Linear Armington Model
abstract: This paper documents various extensions that have been made to the non-linear Armington partial equilibrium model used for modeling the impact of changes in border measures, particularly safeguard remedies and other changes in duties, quotas, and tariff-rate quotas. The extensions generally fall into two categories: (1) those that estimate the impact of changing border measures other than ad valorem duties, such as specific duties, quotas, and tariff rate quotas, (2) those that extend the single product and single market nature of the model to simultaneously account for impacts to additional products and/or additional markets.
ch_abstract: 本文记录了针对非线性阿明顿局部均衡模型所做的多项扩展，该模型用于模拟边境措施变动（特别是保障措施及其他关税、配额和关税配额变化）的影响。这些扩展主要分为两类：（1）估算从价税以外边境措施（如从量税、配额和关税配额）变动影响的扩展；（2）突破模型单一产品和单一市场的局限，能够同时评估对更多产品和/或更多市场影响的扩展。
tags: Partial equilibrium model, Tariff-rate quota

title: Regulatory Harmonization, Profits, and Productivity: Firm-Level Evidence from Morocco
abstract: This paper combines a new database on non-tariff measures (NTMs) with Morocco's firm census to explore the effect of regulatory harmonization with the E.U. on firm-level outcomes. Exploiting cross-sectoral variation in the timing and extent of regulatory harmonization, we find that harmonization waves correlate with rises in labor productivity and with higher markups, allowing self-financing of the adaptation process at the firm level. We identify an induced market-structure change that made the observed rise in markups possible. Namely, harmonization temporarily sheltered the Moroccan market from competition from low-end producers in other developing countries, who took time to adapt. We identified this effect through changes in both trade patterns and firm-level outcomes. Thus, harmonization apparently generated a self-financing adaptation process by affecting both firm-level incentives and market structure.
ch_abstract: 本文结合了关于非关税措施（NTMs）的新数据库与摩洛哥企业普查数据，探讨了与欧盟监管协调对企业层面结果的影响。通过利用监管协调在时间和程度上存在的跨行业差异，我们发现协调浪潮与劳动生产率的提升及更高利润率相关，使得企业能够自我融资适应过程。我们识别出一种诱导性的市场结构变化，这种变化使得观察到的利润率上升成为可能。具体而言，协调暂时保护了摩洛哥市场免受其他发展中国家低端生产商的竞争，这些生产商需要时间适应。我们通过贸易模式和企业层面结果的变化确认了这一效应。因此，监管协调显然通过影响企业层面的激励和市场结构，产生了一个自我融资的适应过程。
tags: firms, Harmonization, Morocco, Non-Tariff Measures, productivity, Profit, Trade

title: Assessing the Impact ofNon-TariffBarriers in the EEU: Results of Enterprise Surveys
abstract: After the establishment of the Customs Union (CU) and the Single Economic Space (SES), Belarus, Kazakhstan and Russia have repeatedly stated the need to eliminate exemptions, limitations, and barriers to mutual trade in goods and services. This report represents the first stage of a study on the economic impact of reduction within the SES and the emerging Eurasian Economic Union (EEU) of non-tariff barriers (NTBs) to trade among Member States. It gives an overview of works on the definition and classification of NTBs, and the quantitative assessment and calculation of the economic effects of NTBs reduction. The report also presents the results of surveys and interviews with enterprises and companies of Belarus, Kazakhstan, and Russia that export goods and services to the markets of the CU and EEU. These surveys and interviews revealed respondents’ views on the NTBs they face when exporting to each of the partner states. They also obtained quantitative estimates of NTBs as a percentage of the value of exported goods, which made it possible to estimate the costs of each of the NTBs to the enterprises.
ch_abstract: 在关税同盟（CU）和统一经济空间（SES）成立后，白俄罗斯、哈萨克斯坦和俄罗斯多次申明需要消除货物与服务相互贸易中的豁免、限制和壁垒。本报告是关于SES及新兴欧亚经济联盟（EEU）内部减少成员国间非关税壁垒（NTBs）经济影响研究的第一阶段成果。报告概述了NTBs定义与分类的相关工作，以及NTBs削减经济效应的量化评估与测算。同时，报告呈现了对白俄罗斯、哈萨克斯坦和俄罗斯向CU及EEU市场出口商品与服务的企业开展的问卷调查及访谈结果。这些调查揭示了受访企业对出口至各伙伴国时面临NTBs的看法，并获得了NTBs占出口商品价值百分比的量化数据，从而能够估算每项NTBs对企业造成的成本。
tags: Non-Tariff Barriers, Enterprises, Eurasian Economic Union, Trade, Single Economic Space

title: Agreements and Disputes OverNon-TariffMeasures
abstract: In trade agreements, governments can design remedies to ensure compliance (property rule) or to compensate victims (liability rule). This paper describes an economic framework to explain the pattern of remedies over non-tariff restrictions — particularly domestic subsidies and nonviolation complaints subject to liability rules. The key determinants of the contract form for any individual measure are the expected joint surplus from an agreement and the expected loss to the constrained government. The loss is higher for domestic subsidies and nonviolations because these are the policies most likely to correct domestic distortions. Governments choose property rules when expected gains from compliance are sufficiently high and expected losses to the constrained country are sufficiently low. Liability rules are preferable when dispute costs are relatively high, because inefficiencies in the compensation process reduce the number of socially inefficient disputes filed.
ch_abstract: 在贸易协定中，政府可设计补救措施以确保合规（财产规则）或补偿受害方（责任规则）。本文提出一个经济框架来解释针对非关税限制（尤其是受责任规则约束的国内补贴与非违规申诉）的补救模式选择规律。任何个体措施契约形式的核心决定因素在于：协定带来的预期联合盈余，以及受约束政府可能承受的预期损失。国内补贴与非违规情形造成的损失更大，因其最可能用于修正国内政策扭曲。当合规预期收益足够高且受约束国预期损失足够低时，政府会选择财产规则；而当争端解决成本较高时，责任规则更具优势——因为补偿过程中的效率损耗能减少社会效益低下的争端提起数量。

title: Non-TariffBarriers in Services
abstract: The services market is constantly showing gains over gain. The expansion of services for many countries can be seen in the proportion of its GDP.
