When a norm is emerging, legalization garners greater public support. When the norm is internalized, legalization does not always generate greater public support. In a sense, state commitment and norm internalization have substitutable effects on eliciting public support for compliance. This study also uses text analysis to explore the causal mechanisms through which international law causes greater public support for compliance. Laws of high obligation elicit public support by generating concerns over the state’s reputation, regardless of the norm’s life cycle. These findings suggest that policymakers and human rights advocates hoping to elicit greater public support for compliance with human rights norms should invest their political capital and financial resources on legalizing emerging norms.
ch_abstract: 以往研究认为，国家遵守国际人权法是因为人权条约的批准会引发公众对履约的要求。然而，人权条约在多大程度上影响公众对履约的支持尚不明确。有时，规范的法制化似乎能获得公众对履约的大力支持，但另一些时候，法制化似乎收效甚微。本研究引入规范的生命周期理论，以深入理解国际人权法律承诺在何种条件下能激发公众对人权规范的履约支持。通过一系列调查实验，本研究发现法制化对公众支持的影响取决于规范本身的内化程度。当规范处于萌芽阶段时，法制化能获得更多公众支持；当规范已被内化时，法制化并不总能带来更强的公众支持。从某种意义上说，国家承诺与规范内化在激发公众履约支持方面具有替代效应。本研究还通过文本分析探讨了国际法促使公众更支持履约的因果机制：高义务性法律通过引发对国家声誉的关切来获得公众支持，这与规范的生命周期无关。这些发现表明，政策制定者和人权倡导者若希望获得公众对人权规范履约的更大支持，应将政治资本和财政资源投入到新兴规范的法制化进程中。
tags: norm internalization, human rights, international law, compliance

title: CreatingCompliance: Exploring a Maturing Industry
abstract: Compliance is a legal field that is finally reaching maturity.  The rise of the administrative state and the growth of regulation associated with it have created a myriad of obstacles that business entities must navigate. On October 7, 2016, The University of Toledo Law Review hosted "Creating Compliance: Exploring a Maturing Industry".  This symposium brought together legal academics, practicing attorneys, compliance officers, and other individuals to reflect on the current state of the compliance field.  This introduction summarizes various essays authored and co-authored by participants of that event.
ch_abstract: 合规是一个终于走向成熟的法律领域。行政国家的兴起及其伴随的监管扩张为企业实体设置了无数必须应对的障碍。2016年10月7日，《托莱多大学法律评论》主办了"创建合规：探索一个成熟的行业"研讨会。此次研讨会汇聚了法学学者、执业律师、合规专员及其他相关人士，共同探讨合规领域的现状。本引言概述了与会者在活动中撰写及合著的多篇论文。
tags: Compliance

title: ComplianceAudits
abstract: All companies, regardless of their size, business model and scope of activities, must understand and comply with a plethora of laws and regulations in diverse areas such as employment, health and safety, intellectual property, real property, tax, antitrust, finance, securities law and consumer protection.  Compliance issues are even more difficult given that the legal and regulatory environment is continuously changing as technology evolves and the public and legislators turn to new areas of concern.  Given the complex legal environment that applies to every business organization, it is essential for companies to develop processes and procedures to conduct voluntary and self-analytical legal and compliance audits on a regular basis.  Establishing adequate procedures for such audits has become an essential part of the company’s overall compliance program, which should include appropriate monitoring and auditing systems (e.g., periodic reviews of company business practices, procedures and policies), internal controls for compliance with standards of conduct and special legal requirements imposed on the business, and internal or external compliance audits.
ch_abstract: 所有公司，无论规模大小、商业模式和业务范围如何，都必须理解并遵守就业、健康与安全、知识产权、不动产、税收、反垄断、金融、证券法和消费者保护等多个领域的众多法律法规。由于技术和公众及立法者关注的新领域不断发展，法律和监管环境持续变化，合规问题变得更加复杂。鉴于适用于每个商业组织的复杂法律环境，企业必须建立流程和程序，定期进行自愿和自我分析的法律与合规审计。为此类审计制定充分的程序已成为公司整体合规计划的重要组成部分，该计划应包括适当的监控和审计系统（例如定期审查公司业务实践、程序和政策）、确保遵守行为标准和企业特殊法律要求的内部控制，以及内部或外部合规审计。
tags: audits, compliance, internal controls

title: TeachingCompliance
abstract: Compliance is a growing field of practice across multiple areas of law. Increasingly companies put compliance risk among the most important corporate governance issues facing them. Moreover, as “JD plus” jobs proliferate, the demand for hiring both at the entry level and for former students currently in practice who are experienced in the compliance field will continue to grow. The growth in compliance jobs comes at a time in shifting demand for legal jobs for law school graduates. Traditional law firm entry level jobs at large law firms, which were the staple of on campus recruiting before 2007, have not returned to pre-2007 levels even with the end of the recession. Technological changes, greater in-house hiring, and better creation of efficiencies have reduced demand for large law firms, which were the traditional training ground for in-depth legal skills and soft skills. Law schools have responded to the demand shift in entry level hiring with a supply side response – classes in compliance. In some cases, law schools have set up compliance certificates or degrees in areas such as health care and business law. There is now even a casebook devoted to compliance. Yet, with all of these efforts at creating opportunities for careers in compliance, many programs and classes in compliance are nothing other than dressed up versions of classes in white collar crime or regulation or lectures on latest case developments that one might find in a continuing legal education program. These courses do not focus on the substantive areas needs practice with the highest demand for compliance (in-house legal and JD plus jobs) and do not teach the analytical skills necessary to succeed in such jobs. Nor do they focus on the special context within which compliance operates – ideally independent of the “business” but always a part of it. Essentially, law schools have misdiagnosed the demand side – it is not merely the particular type of class (compliance) but also the substance of such classes with the type of quality offering necessary to maximize student short term (entry level hiring) and long term (preparation for ever-shifting analytically complex practice challenges). This Essay suggests an alternative approach to teaching compliance – one that focuses on the design and implementation of compliance programs. The Essay explores the determinants of why teaching compliance is important, the pitfalls of current approaches and the types of teaching innovations that sophisticated compliance practice requires. First, it explains what compliance is. Then, it explains the basis for the current economic drivers of the increased focus on compliance by firms. Next, it identifies the drivers of illegality before explaining how law school and in-house compliance training might be better structured in both analytical approach and substance. Finally, the Essay concludes with some thoughts about issues in compliance in which courses might place greater emphasis.
ch_abstract: 合规是一个在法律多个领域日益发展的实践方向。越来越多的企业将合规风险列为面临的最重要公司治理问题之一。与此同时，随着"JD附加型"职位的激增，对具备合规领域经验的应届生和在职人士的招聘需求将持续增长。合规职位的增长正逢法学院毕业生法律职位需求格局转变之际——即便经济衰退结束，大型律所作为2007年前校园招聘主力的传统初级职位数量仍未恢复至衰退前水平。技术变革、企业内部法务团队扩编以及效率提升措施的完善，共同削弱了作为深度法律技能与软技能传统培养基地的大型律所的需求。. . 法学院通过供给侧改革回应初级职位市场需求变化——开设合规课程。部分院校甚至在医疗健康与商法等领域设立合规证书或学位项目，如今更出现了专门的合规案例教材。然而在这些打造合规职业通道的努力中，许多合规项目与课程不过是翻新的白领犯罪/监管课程，或是延续法学教育项目中常见的案例进展讲座。这些课程既未聚焦合规需求最旺盛的实务领域（企业法务与JD附加型职位），也未传授此类职位所需的分析技能，更忽视了合规运作的特殊情境——理论上独立于"业务"却又始终与之共生。. . 本质上，法学院误判了需求端——关键不仅在于课程类型（合规类），更在于课程内容能否提供满足学生短期（求职）与长期（应对持续演变的分析性复杂实践挑战）发展所需的高质量培养。本文提出一种替代性合规教学路径——聚焦合规项目的设计与实施，通过剖析合规教育的重要性成因、现行模式的缺陷及成熟合规实践所需的教学创新，首先阐释合规概念内涵，继而解析企业强化合规关注的经济动因，在揭示违法行为的驱动因素后，从分析框架与实质内容双重维度重构法学院与企业合规培训体系，最终就课程应强化的合规议题提出方向性思考。
tags: compliance, corporate, legal education, governance, enforcement

title: Introducción alComplianceen el Derecho Comparado. Segunda parte - I: Sistema contiental europeo. Alemania (Introduction toCompliancein Comparative Law. Second Part - I: European Continental System -Civil Law- Germany)
abstract: Spanish Abstract:La propuesta de este trabajo consiste en presentar una serie de argumentos que sustenten la siguiente afirmación: para que el funcionamiento real del compliance sea efectivo en la República Argentina hay que tomar referencia de su evolución material en los sistemas que impulsaron su recepción, para lo cual la Alonomologia es la disciplina adecuada.Desde esa perspectiva efectuaremos un análisis del sistema continental europeo, comenzando por Alemania y su evolución conjetural y real a través del tiempo (dimensión temporoespacial), desde sus primeros antecedentes hasta la Convención contra el Soborno Transnacional de la Organización para la Cooperación y el Desarrollo Económico (OCDE) que motivó su recepción en la normativa nacional.Analizaremos si el reparto proyectado del compliance alcanza a ser un reparto realizado -de la adjudicación debida- (dimensión sociológica) y efectivizado por las normas que lo captan (dimensión normológica) y finalmente, si su deber ser ideal pasó por el deber ser aplicado y se convirtió en deber ser concretado (dimensión dikelógica).English Abstract:The proposal of this paper consists in presenting a series of arguments that support the following statement: for the real functionality of Compliance to be effective in the Argentine Republic, we must take reference to its material evolution in the systems that promoted their reception, for which Alonomology is the appropriate discipline.From this perspective, we will carry out an analysis of the European continental system, starting with Germany and its conjectural and real evolution through time (temporospatial dimension), from its first antecedents to the Convention on combating bribery of foreign public officials in international business transactions of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) that motivated its reception in national regulations.We will analyze if the projected “partition” (“reparto”) of compliance becomes a “partition” (“reparto”) made -from the due adjudication- (sociological dimension) and made effective by the norms that cap-ture it (normative dimension) and finally, if its "ought to be" ideal went through the "ought to be" applied and became a "ought to be" concretized (dikelogical dimension).
ch_abstract: 西班牙文摘要：本文旨在提出一系列论据以支持以下观点：要使合规机制在阿根廷共和国真正有效运作，必须参考推动其采纳的体系中合规实质演变的历程，而阿洛诺莫学（Alonomologia）正是实现这一目标的恰当学科。基于此视角，我们将分析欧洲大陆体系，从德国入手探讨其随时间推移在猜想与现实层面的演变（时空维度），追溯其最早渊源直至经济合作与发展组织（OECD）《跨国反贿赂公约》如何促使其被纳入本国立法。我们将审视合规的预设“分配”是否实现了应然的“分配”（社会学维度），以及吸纳该机制的法律规范是否使其切实生效（规范学维度），最终探讨其“应然”理想是否历经“适用应然”而转化为“具体应然”（正义逻辑维度）。. . 英文摘要：本文旨在提出一系列论据以支持以下观点：要使合规机制在阿根廷共和国真正有效运作，必须参考推动其采纳的体系中合规实质演变的历程，而阿洛诺莫学（Alonomologia）正是实现这一目标的恰当学科。基于此视角，我们将分析欧洲大陆体系，从德国入手探讨其随时间推移在猜想与现实层面的演变（时空维度），追溯其最早渊源直至经济合作与发展组织（OECD）《跨国反贿赂公约》如何促使其被纳入本国立法。我们将审视合规的预设“分配”是否实现了应然的“分配”（社会学维度），以及吸纳该机制的法律规范是否使其切实生效（规范学维度），最终探讨其“应然”理想是否历经“适用应然”而转化为“具体应然”（正义逻辑维度）。
tags: Compliance, Criminal Liability of Legal Persons, Comparative Law, Alonomology

title: ComplianceOfficers: Personal Liability, Protections, and Posture
abstract: This Symposium Article will explore the evolving nature of the regulatory and enforcement landscape as it pertains to compliance officers, specifically regarding their susceptibility to personal liability. It will examine the posture of compliance officers in three contexts: i) as a possible target for enforcement activity by regulators; ii) as a quasi-professional subject to a current regime of “non-regulation”; and iii) as an employee in need of ample whistleblower protections, each of which create implications for a compliance officer’s risk of personal liability and protections as a constituent of the organization monitored. After considering the current guidance surrounding enforcement activity against chief compliance officers by regulatory agencies like the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN), this Article will examine the lack of professional regulation of compliance officers and the various ways in which this poses liability risks, especially in instances where a compliance officer’s work overlaps with that of other regulated professions. Finally, this Article will analyze whistleblowing law developments interpreting the Dodd-Frank Act, particularly through the lens of how such developments affect compliance officers as potential employee-whistleblowers navigating issues of workplace culture and pressures from management.
ch_abstract: 本研讨会文章将探讨监管与执法环境的演变特性，尤其针对合规官个人责任风险问题。文章将从三个维度审视合规官的处境：其一，作为监管机构执法行动的潜在对象；其二，作为现行"非监管"制度下的准专业人士；其三，作为亟需充分举报人保护的雇员——每种情境都会对合规官作为被监督组织成员所面临的责任风险及保护机制产生影响。在梳理美国证券交易委员会（SEC）和金融犯罪执法网络（FinCEN）等监管机构针对首席合规官的现行执法指引后，本文将进一步分析合规官行业缺乏专业监管的现状，以及由此产生的多重责任风险，尤其当合规官工作与其他受监管职业产生交叉时。最后，文章将通过《多德-弗兰克法案》司法解释下的举报人法律发展，重点考察这些进展如何影响作为潜在雇员举报人的合规官，包括其应对职场文化和管理层压力的特殊处境。
tags: compliance, compliance officers, regulation, ethics

title: Hear No Evil, See No Evil: Why AntitrustComplianceProgrammes May Be Ineffective at Preventing Cartels
abstract: Cartel practices attract enormous corporate fines, even where they only involve a handful of employees. Internal compliance programmes are thought to protect firms by training employees and auditing their activities. However, this paper argues that such programmes are ineffective because cartelists typically know what they are doing is illegal, go to great lengths to avoid detection and are usually senior managers. Moreover, compliance programmes do not mitigate cartel fines, despite their being imposed on the whole corporation years after an infringement has occurred. It is argued that the threat of criminal sanctions against individuals is essential to effective internal compliance.
ch_abstract: 卡特尔行为会招致巨额企业罚款，即便仅涉及少数员工。内部合规计划被认为能通过培训员工和审计其活动来保护企业。然而，本文认为此类计划效果有限，因为卡特尔操纵者通常明知行为违法，会极力规避侦查，且多为高层管理人员。此外，尽管违规行为发生数年后才对整个公司实施处罚，合规计划也未能减轻卡特尔罚款。研究指出，对个人实施刑事制裁的威胁才是确保内部合规有效的关键。
tags: Competition Law, Antitrust Compliance, Cartels, Article 81

title: Is it Possible to MeasureCompliance?
abstract: One of the main challenges in much empirical study of regulation is to measure the level of compliance with the law. Measuring an individual's or an organization's compliance with the law, however, is always difficult. The two main sets of uncertainty in interpreting and relying on measures of compliance are: Firstly, there is a problem with collecting accurate information about the level of violations of the law committed by a person or an organization. This is a problem because the relevant information has not, and/or cannot, be collected. Secondly, given that 'actual compliance' may be impossible to measure directly (because of the first set of problems), the problem is to establish what link, if any there is between 'actual compliance' and other measures that we hypothesize are related to actual compliance and that we might be able to use as proxies for actual compliance. This paper critically analyses the strengths and weaknesses of different ways of measuring compliance by reference to the different conceptualizations of compliance in the literature and two sets of data collected by the authors.
ch_abstract: 在众多关于监管的实证研究中，一个主要挑战是衡量对法律的遵守程度。然而，衡量个人或组织对法律的遵守情况总是困难的。在解释和依赖合规性衡量标准时，存在两大不确定性：首先，收集有关个人或组织违法程度的准确信息存在问题。之所以存在这一问题，是因为相关信息尚未或无法被收集。其次，鉴于“实际合规性”可能无法直接衡量（由于第一类问题），关键在于确定“实际合规性”与我们假设与实际合规性相关、并可能用作实际合规性替代指标的其他衡量标准之间是否存在联系（若有）。本文通过参考文献中对合规性的不同概念化方式以及作者收集的两组数据，批判性分析了衡量合规性不同方法的优缺点。
tags: regulation, compliance, enforcement, regulatory compliance, social science methodology

title: Tax Cuts andComplianceShifting Across Taxes
abstract: Tax compliance behavior of taxpayers in response to tax cuts has been a longstanding policy concern and research question. Previous literature has primarily examined the impact of tax cuts on compliance with individual taxes, with limited attention given to compliance behaviors across multiple taxes within the same context. This paper aims to address this gap by constructing a simple theoretical model to analyze how a reduction in the corporate income tax rate influences firms’ compliance behavior regarding both the corporate income tax and the social security payroll tax. By utilizing a unique dataset of Chinese firms from 2005 to 2012 and employing a quasi-experimental design based on a distinctive feature of the 2008 corporate income tax reform in China, our empirical results indicate that a decrease in the corporate income tax rate leads to an increase in firms’ compliance with the corporate income tax while simultaneously promoting social security payroll tax evasion. These results provide evidence of compliance shifting between the corporate income tax and social security payroll tax in response to tax cuts.
ch_abstract: 纳税人对减税的遵从行为一直是政策制定和学术研究长期关注的焦点。现有文献主要考察了减税对单一税种遵从度的影响，而对同一情境下多税种间遵从行为的关联研究较为有限。本文通过构建理论模型，分析企业所得税率下调如何同时影响企业对所得税和社保费的遵从行为。基于2005-2012年中国企业独特数据集，并利用2008年企业所得税改革中"外资企业税率上调而内资企业税率下调"这一准自然实验特征，实证研究发现：企业所得税率降低会提升企业所得税遵从度，但同时会诱发企业逃避缴纳社保费。这些结果为减税背景下企业所得税与社保费之间存在的遵从转移现象提供了证据。
tags: Tax Cuts, Compliance Shifting, CIT Compliance, Social Security Compliance

title: The Cybersecurity Threat:Complianceand the Role of Whistleblowers
abstract: In today’s technologically dependent world, concerns about cybersecurity, data breaches, and compromised personal information infiltrate the news almost daily. The Securities and Exchange Commission (“SEC”) has recently emerged as a regulator that is keenly focused on cybersecurity, specifically with respect to encouraging disclosures in this arena from regulated entities. Although the SEC has issued non-binding “guidance” to help companies navigate their reporting obligations in this sector, the agency lacks binding cybersecurity disclosure regulations as they pertain generally to public companies. Given that the SEC has already relied on such guidance in threatening enforcement actions, reporting companies are increasingly pressured for compliance in this arena. This Article will address the importance of establishing effective internal reporting channels and other internal compliance mechanisms in meeting the SEC’s expectations and will highlight the role of “cybersecurity whistleblowers,” specifically those reporting internally, in building the type of improved corporate culture necessary to discover and remediate cybersecurity risks. Cybersecurity whistleblowers, like all whistleblowers, commonly experience retaliation for their efforts. Despite the SEC’s commitment to providing whistleblowers retaliation protections through statutes like the Sarbanes-Oxley and Dodd-Frank Acts, the absence of binding cybersecurity regulations translates into a direct problem for cybersecurity whistleblowers because their reports are likely to fall outside the scope of “protected activity” enumerated under these statutes. This Article will discuss this gap in protections in light of the SEC’s heightened cybersecurity focus, the feasibility of SEC adoption of binding cybersecurity disclosure regulations, and the broad contributions of whistleblowers to compliance systems generally.
ch_abstract: 在当今这个高度依赖技术的世界里，网络安全问题、数据泄露事件和个人信息遭窃的新闻几乎每日见诸报端。美国证券交易委员会（SEC）近期作为监管机构，对网络安全领域展现出强烈关注，尤其注重推动受监管实体进行相关信息披露。尽管SEC已发布非强制性的"指导文件"以协助企业履行该领域的报告义务，但针对上市公司的强制性网络安全披露法规仍属空白。鉴于SEC已依据此类指导文件威胁采取执法行动，上市公司正承受着日益增长的合规压力。本文将探讨建立有效的内部报告渠道及其他合规机制对于满足SEC预期的重要性，并着重分析"网络安全举报人"（特别是内部举报者）在构建能够及时发现和修复网络安全风险的企业文化中所起的关键作用。与其他举报人类似，网络安全举报人常因举报行为遭受报复。虽然SEC承诺通过《萨班斯-奥克斯利法案》和《多德-弗兰克法案》为举报人提供反报复保护，但由于缺乏强制性网络安全法规，网络安全举报人面临直接困境——其举报内容很可能不被纳入上述法律规定的"受保护行为"范畴。本文将结合SEC对网络安全的高度关注，探讨现行保护机制的缺陷、SEC出台强制性网络安全披露法规的可行性，以及举报人对合规体系建设的广泛贡献。
tags: cybersecurity, technology, data, compliance, whistleblowing, SEC

title: Multidimensional TaxComplianceAttitude
abstract: Citizentax compliancesignificantly dictates governmental fiscal capacities. Therefore, understanding the differences in individuals’ tax compliance attitudes remains paramount. Utilizing three online surveys, we develop a taxpayer typology based on a factor and a cluster analysis. Our findings underscore that taxpayers can be classified into two categories: (a) moralists and (b) rationalists. Notably, rationalists consistently exhibit lower tax compliance levels than theirmoralistcounterparts. We introduce a questionnaire labeled the Tax Compliance Attitude Inventory (TCAI) alongside a classification algorithm. These tools enable users to categorize individuals in any dataset applying the TCAI as moralists and rationalists. The heterogeneity in taxpayer attitudes can primarily be attributed to disparities in four key factors: (i) morale, (ii) monetary benefit, (iii) deterrence, and (iv) authority. Lastly, to demonstrate the practical application of our findings, we present an online experiment that tests our results against an incentivized and out-of-sample backdrop. Overall, this work provides an instrument for predicting individuals’ tax compliance intentions and assessing taxpayer attitudes.
ch_abstract: 公民纳税遵从度显著影响政府的财政能力。因此，理解个人纳税态度差异始终至关重要。通过三项在线调查，我们基于因子分析和聚类分析建立了纳税人分类模型。研究发现明确显示纳税人可分为两类：(a)道德主义者与(b)理性主义者。值得注意的是，理性主义者的纳税遵从水平始终低于道德主义者。我们开发了名为《纳税遵从态度量表》(TCAI)的问卷及配套分类算法。这些工具可帮助用户在任何采用TCAI的数据集中将个体归类为道德主义者或理性主义者。纳税人态度的异质性主要源于四个关键因素的差异：(i)道德观念、(ii)经济利益、(iii)威慑效应、(iv)权威认知。最后，为验证研究结论的实际应用价值，我们设计了一项在线实验，在激励性及样本外环境下测试研究结果。总体而言，本研究为预测个人纳税遵从意愿和评估纳税人态度提供了有效工具。
tags: tax compliance, taxpayer attitudes, taxpayer typology, compliance behavior, heterogeneous individuals

title: Is aComplianceTraining Program Effective? A Comparison Analysis ofComplianceOfficers' Perceptions and Recommended Practices in Multinational Corporations RegardingComplianceeTraining Program Effectiveness
abstract: In recent years, several regulatory guidelines and models have been published, offering recommended practices for designing and managing effective corporate compliance programs. However, previous studies have debated the effectiveness of these programs. This study examines the practices adopted by multinational organizations (MNCs) and compares them to compliance officers' perceptions of the effectiveness of compliance eTraining programs (Computer-Based Training). Data were collected from 93 compliance officers and classified into four training phases: Needs Assessment, Design & Development, Implementation, and Evaluation. An effectiveness score was measured based on a proposed model. The study revealed significant positive correlations between the recommended practices (as reflected in the model score) and the compliance officers' perceptions. The findings provide a normative method for both corporations and regulators to assess the effectiveness of compliance training programs and the extent to which recommended practices are adopted, including practices that go beyond regulatory guidelines.
ch_abstract: 近年来，多项监管指南和模型相继发布，为设计和管理有效的企业合规计划提供了推荐实践。然而，先前的研究对这些计划的有效性存在争议。本研究调查了跨国组织（MNCs）采用的实践，并将其与合规官员对合规电子培训计划（基于计算机的培训）有效性的认知进行了比较。数据收集自93名合规官员，并分为四个培训阶段：需求评估、设计与开发、实施和评估。基于提出的模型测量了有效性得分。研究发现，推荐实践（反映在模型得分中）与合规官员的认知之间存在显著正相关。研究结果为企业及监管机构提供了一种规范性方法，用于评估合规培训计划的有效性以及推荐实践的采纳程度，包括超越监管指南的实践。
tags: Compliance Program, Compliance Training, Multinational Corporations, Training Effectiveness

title: Programy zgodności z prawem konkurencji – efektywny mechanizm w tworzeniu europejskiej kulturycompliance? (Competition LawComplianceProgrammes - An Effective Mechanism in Creating EuropeanComplianceCulture?)
abstract: Polish Abstract:Celem artykułu jest analiza wpływu programów zgodności z prawem konkurencji na efektywność europejskiego prawa konkurencji. Artykuł zmierza do odpowiedzi na zasadnicze pytanie: czy, a jeśli tak to pod jakimi warunkami, programy zgodności z prawem konkurencji mogą przyczynić się do budowy kultury compliance w europejskim prawie konkurencji? Artykuł dokonuje analizy porównawczej propozycji Komisji Europejskiej, zawartej w dokumencie zatytułowanym "Compliance Matters. What companies can do better to respect EU competition rules", oraz szczegółowych rozwiązań w zakresie programów zgodności zaproponowanych przez francuskie i brytyjskie organy ochrony konkurencji. Artykuł dokonuje oceny skuteczności poszczególnych modeli polityki zgodności i zmierza do zaproponowania praktycznych rozwiązań w przedmiocie badanego zagadnienia. Dodatkowo, artykuł zmierza do odpowiedzi na pytanie dotyczące możliwości budowy kultury compliance na gruncie polskiego prawa konkurencji. English Abstract:The goal of this article is to analyse the impact of compliance programmes on the effectiveness of the European competition law. The article seeks to answer the fundamental question: whether, and if so, under what conditions compliance programmes can contribute to the creation of compliance culture in the European competition law. The article makes a comparative analysis of the European Commission’s proposal, contained in the document titled Compliance Matters. What companies can do better to respect EU competition rules, and solutions concerning compliance programmes introduced by French and British competition authorities. The article tries to assess the effectiveness of different models of compliance policies and aims to offer practical solutions on the examined issue. In addition, the article tries to determine if the introduction of compliance policy would be possible under the Polish system of competition law.
ch_abstract: 波兰文摘要：本文旨在分析合规计划对欧洲竞争法效力的影响。文章试图回答一个基本问题：竞争法合规计划是否以及在何种条件下能够促进欧洲竞争法合规文化的构建？文章对欧盟委员会在《合规至关重要：企业如何更好地遵守欧盟竞争规则》文件中提出的建议，以及法国和英国竞争主管部门提出的具体合规计划方案进行了比较分析。文章评估了不同合规政策模式的有效性，并致力于为研究问题提出实际解决方案。此外，文章还探讨了在波兰竞争法体系下构建合规文化的可能性。  . . 英文摘要：本文旨在分析合规计划对欧洲竞争法效力的影响。文章试图回答一个基本问题：合规计划是否以及在何种条件下能够促进欧洲竞争法合规文化的构建？文章对欧盟委员会在《合规至关重要：企业如何更好地遵守欧盟竞争规则》文件中提出的建议，以及法国和英国竞争主管部门实施的合规计划方案进行了比较分析。文章评估了不同合规政策模式的有效性，并旨在为研究问题提供实际解决方案。此外，文章还探讨了在波兰竞争法体系下引入合规政策的可能性。
tags: compliance culture, compliance programmes, efficiency, mitigation of fines

title: MeasuringCompliance: The Challenges in Assessing and Understanding the Interaction between Law and Organizational Misconduct
abstract: A major question in corporate compliance research and practice is how to establish the effectiveness of compliance programs and policies on promoting desirable outcomes. To assess such effectiveness requires proper measurement. This chapter, which is the introduction to an edited volume on corporate compliance measurement, discusses the trade-offs involved in using different quantitative and qualitative approaches to measure corporate compliance and its predictors. It assesses the strengths and weaknesses of different research strategies in terms of their validity in capturing behavioral responses, their ability to establish causality, their precision in showing complexity, their generalizability, and their feasibility and cost-effectiveness. The chapter concludes that a mixed-methods approach is the best way to reduce the trade-offs in measurement; using such an approach best accommodates the five quality standards of proper measurement.
ch_abstract: 企业合规研究和实践中的一个主要问题是如何确立合规计划与政策在促进理想结果方面的有效性。评估这种有效性需要恰当的衡量标准。本章作为一部关于企业合规测量论文集的导论，探讨了运用不同定量与定性方法衡量企业合规及其预测因素时涉及的权衡取舍。文章从行为反应捕捉效度、因果关联确立能力、复杂性呈现精度、普适性以及实施可行性与成本效益五个维度，评估了不同研究策略的优劣。最终得出结论：混合研究方法最能减少测量中的权衡问题，这种路径最符合恰当测量标准的五项质量要求。
tags: corporate compliance, qualitative methods, quantitative methods, regulatory enforcement, mixed methods

title: Nigerian Banks and Global Ranking: The IFRSComplianceImpact
abstract: The study focused on the assessment of Nigerian banks’ compliance level with the guidelines of IFRS towards determining the extent to which such compliance has contributed to improving the acceptability of the organisations’ financial reports globally. Using the content analysis research design approach, the primary and secondary data sources were employed for the successful execution of this research work. A total of 77 disclosure items obtained from the IFRS disclosures checklist were deployed for selected financial statements assessment, and the data extracted from the 2012-2014 financial reports of Zenith Bank, First City Monument Bank, Guaranty Trust Bank, Diamond Bank, Access Bank, United Bank for Africa, ECO Bank, First Bank, and Fidelity Bank — all Nigeria Banks that made the world list of top 1000 banks in 2015, were subjected to multiple regression analysis using SPSS version 22 package. The outcome of the analysis showed that the level of compliance of Nigerian banks to IFRS disclosure guidelines has indeed improved the acceptability of her financial reporting practices globally. It was also discovered that significant contributions were made by the independent variables in explaining the compliance quality level of IFRS disclosure practices upheld by the Nigerian banks. It was however recommended that further research effort be intensified into this research area towards ascertaining the ‘data quality’ level (how reliable the disclosed financial data are) of the financial statements of these nine (9) Nigerian banks, in order to maximally complement the emphasis focus of this research work — the ‘compliance quality’ of studied banks’ financial statements to IFRS disclosure requirements.
ch_abstract: 该研究重点评估尼日利亚银行对国际财务报告准则（IFRS）指南的遵循程度，以确定这种遵循在多大程度上提高了这些机构财务报告在全球范围内的可接受性。采用内容分析研究设计方法，结合一手和二手数据源成功完成了本项研究工作。研究选取了国际财务报告准则披露清单中的77个披露项目用于特定财务报表评估，并对Zenith银行、第一城市纪念银行、担保信托银行、钻石银行、Access银行、非洲联合银行、Ecobank、第一银行及Fidelity银行（均为2015年全球千强银行榜单上的尼日利亚银行）2012-2014年财务报告提取的数据，使用SPSS 22版软件包进行多元回归分析。分析结果表明，尼日利亚银行对国际财务报告准则披露指南的遵循水平确实提升了其财务报告实践在全球范围内的可接受性。研究还发现自变量对解释尼日利亚银行遵循国际财务报告准则披露实践的质量水平具有显著贡献。但建议未来应加强该领域研究，以确定这九家尼日利亚银行财务报表的"数据质量"水平（所披露财务数据的可靠性），从而最大限度补充本研究的核心关注点——被研究银行财务报表对国际财务报告准则披露要求的"遵循质量"。
tags: Compliance, Financial Reporting Practices, Financial Statements, IFRS, IFRS Disclosure requirements.

title: Governing Global Climate Change: St. PetersburgComplianceReport for the 'G8 Plus Five' Countries
abstract: The subject of climate change has become increasingly prominent in both domestic and international headlines in the course of the past year, most notably since the publication of a series of authoritative reports, including the Stern Review on the economics of climate change (October 2006) and the Fourth Assessment Report (AR4) of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) on Climate Change 2007: The Physical Science Basis and Impacts, Adaptation and Vulnerability, released in the early 2007. In its December 2005 report, A more secure world: our shared responsibility, the UN High-Level Panel on Threats, Challenges and Change had identified climate change as one of the 21st century threats that has not been “effectively addressed” by governments.The G8 engagement with this issue-area (and the related question of energy security) long predates the tremendous growth in public concern about global warming. Most recently, at the first G8 Summit hosted by the Russian Federation in St. Petersburg on 15-17 July 2006, the leaders of the G8 nations, the European Commission, and the Plus Five developing countries reaffirmed their commitment to fighting this global problem.This Compliance Report of the G8 Research Group Oxford, Governing Global Climate Change, provides detailed analysis of fourteen governments’ activities in the area of climate change to assess to what degree, and how effectively, the world’s leading economies have lived up to their 2006 Summit promises.
ch_abstract: 气候变化议题在过去一年中日益成为国内外头条新闻的焦点，尤其自2006年10月《斯特恩气候变化经济学报告》及2007年初政府间气候变化专门委员会（IPCC）第四次评估报告《气候变化2007：自然科学基础与影响、适应和脆弱性》等权威报告发布以来更显突出。联合国高级别威胁、挑战和改革问题小组早在2005年12月《更安全的世界：我们共同的责任》报告中，就将气候变化列为各国政府尚未"有效应对"的21世纪威胁之一。八国集团介入该议题领域（及相关的能源安全问题）的历史，远早于公众对全球变暖问题关注度激增的时期。最近在2006年7月15-17日俄罗斯圣彼得堡举办的首次八国峰会上，八国集团领导人、欧盟委员会及"加五"发展中国家重申了应对这一全球性问题的承诺。牛津大学八国集团研究小组发布的《治理全球气候变化合规报告》，通过详细分析十四国政府在气候变化领域的行动，评估这些世界主要经济体在何种程度上有效履行了2006年峰会承诺。
tags: climate change, G7, G8, emerging economies, BRICS, compliance, climate mitigation, global governance, summitry, transport, energy, UNFCCC

title: Lexisnexis® Guide to FATCACompliance: Chapter 1
abstract: The LexisNexis® Guide to FATCA Compliance provides a framework for meaningful interactions among enterprise stakeholders, and between the FATCA Compliance Officer and the FATCA advisors/vendors. Analysis of the complicated regulations, recognition of overlapping complex regime and intergovernmental agreement requirements (e.g. FATCA, Qualified Intermediary, source withholding, national and international information exchange, European Union tax information exchange, information confidentiality laws, money laundering prevention, risk management, and the application of an IGA) is balanced with substantive analysis and descriptive examples. The contributors hail from several countries and an offshore financial center and include attorneys, accountants, information technology engineers, and risk managers from large, medium and small firms and from large financial institutions. Thus, the challenges of the FATCA Compliance Officer are approached from several perspectives and contextual backgrounds. Several new contributing authors joined the FATCA Expert Contributor team this fourth edition. This fourth edition has been expanded by 19 new chapters and from a total of 54 to 73 chapters, with over 500 new pages of regulatory and compliance analysis based upon industry feedback of internal challenges with systems implementation. The previous 54 chapters have been substantially updated and expanded, including many more practical examples to assist a compliance officer contextualize the regulations, IGA provisions, and national rules enacted pursuant to an IGA. The new chapters include by example an in-depth analysis of designing a FATCA internal policy that is compliant with the initial two year soft enforcement initiative, designing an equivalent form to the W-8, reporting accounts, reporting payments, operational specificity of the mechanisms of information capture, management and exchange by firms and between countries, insights as to the application of FATCA and the IGAs within new BRIC and European country chapters, and a project management schedule for the compliance officer. This fourth edition will provide the financial enterprise's FATCA compliance officer the tools for developing and maintaining a best practices compliance strategy, starting with determining what information is needed for planning the meetings with outside FATCA experts. This Guide may be leveraged in combination with the tools for identification of U.S. indicia of LexisNexis Risk Solutions.
ch_abstract: 《LexisNexis® FATCA合规指南》为企业利益相关方之间、FATCA合规官与顾问/服务商之间的有效协作提供框架。本书既剖析复杂法规（涵盖FATCA、合格中介、源头预扣税、国内外信息交换、欧盟税务信息交换、信息保密法、反洗钱、风险管理及政府间协议应用等交叉监管体系），又辅以实质性分析与案例说明。撰稿团队来自多国及离岸金融中心，涵盖大中小型机构及大型金融机构的律师、会计师、IT工程师和风控专家，从多元视角解读FATCA合规官面临的挑战。第四版新增多位专家作者，扩充19个章节至73章，基于业界系统实施难题的反馈新增500多页合规分析。前54章内容全面更新，增加实务案例以帮助理解法规、政府间协议条款及国内实施细则。新增章节包含：符合两年柔性执法期的内部政策设计、W-8等效表格制作、账户与支付报告、企业及国家间信息采集管理交换机制的操作细节、金砖国家与欧洲章节的FATCA应用解读，以及合规项目管理时间表。本版为金融机构FATCA合规官提供从规划外部专家会议到制定最佳合规策略的全套工具，可与LexisNexis风险解决方案的美国身份识别工具配合使用。
tags: FATCA, offshore, international tax, tax haven, intergovernmental agreement, IGA, tax compliance, GATCA, Common Reporting System, OECD

title: The Case for On Chain Privacy andCompliance
abstract: Recent trends in financial-regulation compliance of blockchain-based assets (“crypto”), including by the European Union and the U.S. Treasury, reflect regulators’ belief that policy frameworks and regulatory regimes designed for financial intermediaries can be effectively implemented to police the decentralized, software-mediated cryptocurrency markets. Furthermore, a principal tool relied upon to manage the risk of illicit financial transactions in these markets is blockchain analytics, which depend on blockchains’ transaction ledgers being transparent.This paper argues that while these two core premises—intermediary regulation and blockchain transparency—play an essential role in mitigating illicit financial risk in the current environment, exclusive reliance on them raises critical questions that must be addressed as cryptocurrency markets enter mainstream adoption.In traditional financial services, the tension between privacy and compliance is addressed by trusted intermediaries, who maintain private information silos that (when operating as intended) protect customers’ privacy by default. In addition, financial privacy rights enjoy statutory and regulatory protections within these financial intermediaries, giving rise to operational controls restricting access to personal financial information (albeit imperfectly, as reflected in persistent cybersecurity incidents). In light of this default-privacy, compelled disclosures to regulatory agencies and law enforcement support efforts to combat sanctions evasion, terrorist financing, money laundering, and other illicit financial activity.However, in decentralized finance, such trusted intermediaries do not always exist. The vision of decentralized finance is based on peer-to-peer mechanisms that allows users to transact without the involvement of banks or other financial institutions. Intermediary regulation thus does not address the need to regulate blockchain-based finance: it leans on assumptions rooted in the traditional financial world.Moreover, in contrast to this default privacy and compelled transparency of traditional financial services, cryptocurrency markets operating on most public blockchains are transparent by default. Historically, this transparency stems from a technical consideration: it allows the blockchain consensus rules (e.g., preservation of monetary invariants) to be easily verified. Subsequently, this public transaction data has been utilized for additional purposes, including detection of illicit activity via blockchain analytics. However, this default-transparency raises heightened risks to consumers. Transparency and immutability allows anyone with an internet connection to see the full transaction history and net holdings of any wallet holder. Absent the type of privacy protections—both practical and legal—that exist in the traditional financial system, it is not surprising that even legitimate users would employ privacy-preserving technologies like mixers to obfuscate their identity and hide their transaction history from prying eyes, without any intent or desire to engage in illegal activity. Indeed, just as law-abiding citizens and corporations strive to protect their privacy in other contexts, the use of privacy-preserving tools in cryptocurrency context may be considered a cybersecurity best practice. Moreover, imposing the same customer identification requirements (designed to overcome the default-privacy of traditional financial services) in cryptocurrency context raises heightened risks in this environment, because of its diversified nature and the ability to correlate this data with on-chain data.Financial confidentiality and protection of personal information is necessary for widespread adoption of blockchain-based payments for personal and commercial uses. Thus, the reliance on blockchain analytics as a tool for compliance reflects a fundamental tension at the heart of cryptocurrency markets as they currently function: between the needs of consumer privacy and cybersecurity, on the one hand, and the public interest in preventing illicit financial activity, on the other.The key question raised by this dynamic is whether it is possible to create privacy-enhancing technologies that protect legitimate customer privacy while simultaneously providing regulators and law enforcement a way of combating illicit financial risks. We believe that the answer is yes. The paper argues that advances in cryptography and blockchain technology have the potential to overcome the false binary choice between privacy and compliance, through blockchain-native solutions that permit on-chain compliance that is programmable and tailored to jurisdictional needs and enforced by consensus rules. We discuss the contours of this blockchain-native, on-chain compliance and its potential to strike a healthy balance between privacy and compliance in the crypto ecosystem.
ch_abstract: 欧盟和美国财政部近期对基于区块链的资产（即“加密货币”）金融监管合规的趋势表明，监管机构认为：为金融中介设计的政策框架和监管体系可有效适用于去中心化的软件驱动型加密货币市场。而管控这些市场非法金融风险的核心工具——区块链分析技术，其有效性完全依赖于区块链交易账本的透明性。本文指出，尽管中介机构监管与区块链透明性这两大核心前提在当前环境下对降低非法金融风险至关重要，但随着加密货币进入主流应用，单纯依赖这两点将引发必须正视的关键问题。. . 传统金融服务通过可信中介机构调和隐私与合规的矛盾——这些机构建立的私有信息库在正常运作时默认保护客户隐私。此外，金融隐私权在这些中介机构内享有法律与监管保护，形成限制个人财务信息访问的操作规范（尽管网络安全事件频发显示其并不完善）。基于这种默认隐私性，监管机构与执法部门通过强制披露机制来打击逃避制裁、恐怖融资、洗钱等非法金融活动。. . 但去中心化金融往往不存在此类可信中介。其愿景建立在点对点机制之上，使用户无需银行等金融机构即可交易。因此中介监管模式无法满足链上金融的监管需求，这本质上是传统金融思维的路径依赖。. . 更关键的是，与传统金融"默认隐私+强制透明"的特性相反，多数公链上的加密货币市场具有天然透明性。这种透明性最初源于技术考量：便于验证区块链共识规则（如货币恒定性）。随后公开交易数据被赋予新用途，包括通过区块链分析识别非法活动。但这种默认透明性给用户带来了更高风险——任何联网者都能查看钱包持有者的完整交易记录与净资产。缺乏传统金融体系那种实操与法律双重维度的隐私保护，即便合法用户也会采用混币器等隐私技术来隐藏身份与交易历史，这与其是否从事非法活动无关。事实上，正如守法公民与企业注重日常隐私保护，在加密货币领域使用隐私工具可被视为网络安全最佳实践。此外，直接套用传统金融为突破默认隐私设计的客户识别要求，在链上环境反而会放大风险，因其多元化特性使得这些数据极易与链上数据产生关联。. . 要实现区块链支付在个人与商业场景的普及，财务保密与个人信息保护不可或缺。因此依赖区块链分析作为合规工具，暴露出当前加密货币市场的根本矛盾：消费者隐私与网络安全需求，同打击非法金融活动的公共利益之间的张力。. . 这引发了一个关键问题：能否开发既保护合法用户隐私，又为监管机构提供打击非法金融风险手段的隐私增强技术？本文给出肯定答案。密码学与区块链技术的进步有望打破"隐私OR合规"的伪命题，通过原生链上合规方案实现可编程、适配司法需求且由共识规则强制执行的新型平衡。我们将探讨这种原生链上合规的框架设计，及其在加密生态中建立隐私与合规健康平衡的潜力。
tags: blockchain, crypto, onchain, cryptocurrency, privacy, compliance, aml, anti money laundering, baking, regulation, innovation, sanctions, decentralization

title: Introducing a Practice-basedComplianceFramework for Addressing New Regulatory Challenges in the AI Field
abstract: Over the past years, regulatory pressure on tech companies to identify and mitigate the adverse impact of AI systems has been steadily growing. In 2022, we can expect this pressure to grow even further with transnational, national, federal, and local AI regulation kicking in. Many of these regulatory frameworks target both the design and the use of AI systems, often with a sector focus. AI practitioners  and regulators alike are in need of new approaches that allow them to effectively respond to these regulations, and to enforce them competently. In this contribution, we will map out a Practice-Based Compliance Framework (PCF) for identifying existing principles and practices that are already aligned with regulatory goals, that therefore can serve as anchor points for compliance and enforcement initiatives.
ch_abstract: 过去几年，科技公司在识别和减轻人工智能系统负面影响方面面临的监管压力持续增加。2022年，随着跨国、国家、联邦和地方各级人工智能法规陆续生效，这种压力预计将进一步加剧。多数监管框架同时针对人工智能系统的设计和使用环节，且往往聚焦特定行业领域。无论是人工智能从业者还是监管机构，都需要新方法来有效应对这些法规并确保其有力执行。本文将构建一个"实践导向合规框架"(PCF)，用于识别那些本就符合监管目标的既有原则与实践，使其成为合规举措和执法行动的有效支点。
tags: Social Practice Theory, AI, Compliance, Regulation

title: Understanding the Role of Power Distributions inCompliance
abstract: Corporate compliance in most companies is carried out under the assumption that unethical and illegal employee conduct occurs in a more or less predictable fashion.  Although compliance officers may not know exactly when or how compliance failures will occur, they act under the assumption that wrongdoing will be independently sprinkled throughout the company.  This assumption underlies many of the common tools of compliance.  But compliance failures do not necessarily conform to this baseline assumption.  Instead, unethical and illegal acts in business often follow a skewed distribution that makes extreme outcomes more likely.  This volatility, exhibited both in the frequency of compliance lapses and the intensity of their harm, is a function of how individual decision making interacts with the complex networks within corporations.  By failing to recognize this phenomenon, the compliance community has mistargeted its efforts, failing to pay enough attention to the “power few”—those influential individuals within companies that may foster outsized, interconnected compliance risk.  Implications for how compliance should be reconceptualized, measured, and managed follow.
ch_abstract: 大多数企业的合规工作建立在一种假设之上，即员工的不道德和非法行为会以某种可预测的方式发生。尽管合规官员可能无法确切知道违规行为何时或以何种方式出现，但他们默认不当行为会零散地独立分布于公司各处。这一假设构成了许多常见合规工具的基础。但违规行为未必符合这一基本假设。相反，商业中的不道德和非法行为往往呈现偏态分布，使得极端后果更易发生。这种体现在违规频率与危害程度上的波动性，源于个人决策与企业复杂网络间的相互作用。由于未能认识到这一现象，合规领域的工作方向出现了偏差，未能充分关注"关键少数"—那些在企业内部可能引发超常关联性合规风险的影响力人物。这要求我们对合规理念、评估方式和管理手段进行系统性重构。
tags: Business Ethics, Behavioral Ethics, Corporate Compliance, Corporate Governance, Network Effects, Network Theory, Power Law, Normal Distribution, Fat Tail Distribution, Behavioral Risk, White Collar Crime, Corporate Crime, Organizational Behavior, Organizational Sentencing Guidelines

title: Compliancewith the Law and Policing by Consent: Notes on Police and Legal Legitimacy
abstract: This article summarises ‘procedural justice’ approaches to policing, contrasting these to the more politically dominant discourse about policing as crime control. It argues that public trust in policing is needed partly because this may result in public cooperation with justice, but more importantly because public trust in justice builds institutional legitimacy and thus public compliance with the law, and commitment to, the rule of law. We define police legitimacy as obligation to obey and moral alignment. We link police legitimacy to legal legitimacy/cynicism, and both to compliance with the law. Some recent survey findings are presented in support of this perspective.
ch_abstract: 本文概述了警务工作中的“程序正义”方法，并将其与政治主导的、将警务视为犯罪控制的论述进行了对比。文章指出，公众对警务的信任之所以必要，部分原因在于这种信任可能促进公众对司法工作的配合，但更重要的是，公众对司法的信任能够建立制度合法性，从而促使公众遵守法律并拥护法治。我们将警察合法性定义为服从义务与道德认同的结合，并将其与法律合法性/犬儒主义相联系，同时探讨二者对法律遵守的影响。文中还列举了近期的一些调查结果来支持这一观点。
tags: Compliance, Procedural Justice, Trust in the Police, Police Legitimacy, Legal Legitimacy and Cynicism

title: Theory of RegulatoryCompliance, RegulatoryComplianceScale, and Differential Monitoring
abstract: The theory of regulatory compliance has been proven in multiple studies over the past four decades and has been utilized extensively in the creation of differential monitoring and its spin off methodologies of risk assessment and key indicators. In fact, differential monitoring would not have been possible without the theory of regulatory compliance because the paradigm which it replaced, one of one-size-fits-all monitoring or uniform monitoring would have predominated. However, with the theory of regulatory compliance which introduced the importance of substantial regulatory compliance and the search for the right rules/regulations that made a difference in client's lives, rather than emphasizing more or less regulations or rules.
ch_abstract: 监管合规理论在过去四十年的多项研究中得到了验证，并广泛应用于差异监控及其衍生方法——风险评估和关键指标的创建中。事实上，如果没有监管合规理论，差异监控就不可能实现，因为它所取代的"一刀切"或统一监控范式将会占据主导地位。然而，监管合规理论提出了实质性合规的重要性，并致力于寻找对客户生活产生影响的正确规则/法规，而非单纯强调法规数量的多寡。
tags: regulatory compliance, differential monitoring

title: 'CadillacCompliance' Breakdown
abstract: This Essay argues that the best corporate compliance programs, what are known as “Cadillac compliance” programs, are becoming increasingly criminalized. In at attempt to avoid application of the criminal law, companies have adopted compliance protocols that are motivated by and mimic that law, using the precepts of criminal legislation, enforcement, and adjudication to advance their compliance goals. This approach to compliance is inherently flawed, however—it can never be fully effective in abating corporate wrongdoing. Criminalized compliance regimes are inherently ineffective because they impose unintended behavioral consequences on corporate employees by fostering rationalizations that allow offenders to square their self-perception as “good people” with the unethical or illegal behavior they are contemplating, thereby allowing wrongdoing to go forward. By importing into the corporation many of the criminal law’s delegitimizing features, criminalized compliance regimes create space for rationalizations, facilitating the necessary precursors to the commission of white collar and corporate crime. This insight, which offers a new way of conceptualizing corporate compliance, explains the ineffectiveness of many compliance programs and also suggests how companies might go about fixing them. The Essay addresses, through real-world examples, how companies might use behavioral compliance strategies to combat rationalizations and help repair their “Cadillac compliance” programs.
ch_abstract: 本文认为，最完善的企业合规计划（即所谓"凯迪拉克式合规"）正日益被刑事化。为避免刑法制裁，企业采用的合规方案往往以刑法为蓝本，通过借鉴刑事立法、执法和司法原则来推进合规目标。然而这种合规模式存在根本缺陷——它永远无法有效遏制企业违法行为。刑事化合规制度之所以失效，在于其会引发非预期的员工行为反应：通过为不当行为提供合理化借口，使违规者能够维持"好人"的自我认知，从而纵容不道德或非法行为的发生。当企业照搬刑法中诸多去正当化的特征时，刑事化合规制度就为行为合理化创造了空间，为白领犯罪和企业犯罪提供了必要温床。这一洞见为理解企业合规提供了新视角，既解释了众多合规计划失效的原因，也为企业改进方案指明了方向。本文通过现实案例，阐述企业如何运用行为合规策略来消除合理化借口，修复其"凯迪拉克式合规"计划。
tags: corporate compliance, corporate crime, white collar crime, behavioral compliance, behavioral ethics, business ethics, rationalizations, legitamacy

title: An Insight into Consequences of Non-Complianceor ColorableComplianceof Corporate Governance
abstract: Non-Compliance of Corporate Governance means not adhering to the code of Corporate Governance. The non-compliance is not very serious because in case of non-compliance it is simple to identify the offender and penalize him, the serious matter is colorable compliance. The colorable compliance means, on paper it is inferred that code of corporate governance is adhered but actually it is not so hence it become very difficult to whom to rectify and what to rectify. Colorable compliance of Corporate Governance also leads to ineffectiveness of the corporate governance code. The non-compliance or colorable compliance of corporate governance standards is one of the primary factors resulting in corporate frauds or scandals. The corporate frauds in India occurred in recent times have resulted from a flagrant disregard of and non-compliance with the Indian Corporate Governance regime. Properly constituted audit committees and other committees play an important role in the sustained growth of a corporation and eliminate the corporate frauds. The colorable compliance with corporate governance norms often perceived in the entities dominated by the family members. Therefore, this paper is an attempt to highlight the state of non-compliance of corporate norms and factors responsible for colorable compliance.
ch_abstract: 公司治理不合规是指不遵守公司治理准则。不合规的情况并不十分严重，因为一旦发生不合规行为，很容易识别违规者并予以处罚；真正严重的问题是表面合规。表面合规意味着在形式上看似遵守了公司治理准则，但实际上并未做到，这使得难以确定需要纠正的对象和内容。公司治理的表面合规还会导致治理准则失效。公司治理标准的不合规或表面合规是导致企业欺诈或丑闻的主要因素之一。近期印度发生的企业欺诈案件，正是由于公然无视和违反印度公司治理制度所致。设立完善的审计委员会及其他委员会对企业持续成长和杜绝欺诈行为具有重要作用。表面合规公司治理规范的现象常见于家族成员主导的实体中。因此，本文旨在揭示公司规范不合规的现状及导致表面合规的成因。
tags: Corporate Governance, Colorable Compliance

title: BeyondCompliance: Helping Nations Cooperate
abstract: This article – a chapter in a collective volume on compliance and the role of non-binding norms in the international legal system – raises questions regarding the usefulness of the concepts of compliance and “soft law”,  each of which underlies a number of the contributions appearing elsewhere in the collective volume.  In particular, the author suggests that:  (1) approaching issues of the international normative order from the perspective of “compliance” risks obscuring or distorting an understanding of how international norms actually help to structure international order and cooperation; (2) the idea of “compliance with international soft law” may blur and impair the very useful distinction that states traditionally have drawn between legally binding and non-legally binding normative techniques in constructing their normative arrangements; (3) in studies of the international normative order, our primary emphasis and objective should be helping nations cooperate rather than simply “making them behave.” Drawing upon his experience as an attorney in the Office of the Legal Adviser of the U.S. Department of State, the author proposes, in some detail, a possible alternative model of how foreign office and other officials involved in foreign policy decisions take account of arguably relevant international norms and think about issues of compliance.  This alternative model suggests, inter alia, that such officials’ attitudes and behavior regarding situations raising international normative issues may often be conditioned by considerations such as:  (1) their recognition of the legitimacy of tentative and incomplete obligations; (2) their perception that different obligations may reflect varying “densities” of commitment; (3) their efforts to balance their desire to retain their own flexibility and freedom of maneuver with their desire for certainty and predictability on the part of other states or international actors; (4) their awareness of the parties’ tacit acceptance that there may be ranges of permissible flexibility around the “core” obligations of a norm; and (5) their recognition of the legitimate expectation – varying impact of events and pressures arising subsequent to the emergence of a norm.  This alternative model also suggests that the whole bias of the international normative system, and particularly of that involving non-binding norms, is in practice more towards accommodation than “legalistic” contention. Finally, the author: (1) joins others in questioning the coherence of the concept of  “soft international law”, at least as applied to legally non-binding norms and instruments; (2) expresses his concern that an emphasis on compliance may point towards a backward-looking and overly-legalistic focus on state “misbehavior”, rather than a more productive enquiry into devising and deploying better techniques and arrangements to facilitate international cooperation; and (3) suggests types of studies, going beyond a study of compliance alone, to explore more deeply the relation between international norms and state behavior.
ch_abstract: 本文作为探讨国际法律体系中合规性与非约束性规范作用的合著章节，对"合规性"与"软法"这两个贯穿全书其他论文的核心概念提出了质疑。作者特别指出：(1)从"合规性"视角审视国际规范秩序问题，可能模糊或扭曲对国际规范如何实际构建国际秩序与合作的理解；(2)"国际软法合规"概念可能弱化国家在构建规范安排时对法律约束性与非约束性技术手段的传统重要区分；(3)研究国际规范秩序时，核心重点与目标应是促进国家间合作而非单纯"约束行为"。作者基于其在美国国务院法律顾问办公室的执业经验，详细提出了外交决策者考量国际规范与合规问题的新分析框架。该模型揭示，官员处理涉及国际规范议题时的态度与行为往往受制于：(1)对临时性、不完整义务合法性的认知；(2)对不同义务反映差异化的承诺"密度"的判断；(3)在保持自身行动灵活性与要求他国行为可预测性之间的权衡；(4)对规范"核心义务"周边弹性空间的默许认知；(5)对规范形成后新事态冲击力差异的评估。该模型同时表明，国际规范体系（尤指非约束性规范）在实践中更倾向于协调而非"法条主义"对抗。作者最后：(1)质疑"国际软法"概念（至少针对无法律约束力的规范与文书）的内在一致性；(2)担忧过度强调合规性可能导致对国家"不当行为"的事后追责倾向，而非着力设计更有效的国际合作机制；(3)建议开展超越单纯合规性研究的探索，更深入揭示国际规范与国家行为的互动关系。
tags: Compliance, International Legal System, International Law, International Norms, "Soft International Law", Non-Binding International Law, International Cooperation, Compliance With International Law, International Behavior, Foreign Office Decision-Making

title: Too Complex to Cooperate? -Tax Complexity and CooperativeCompliance
abstract: This study investigates whether, how, and under what conditions the expected positive association between cooperative compliance programs and tax compliance is attenuated by tax complexity. Many countries have implemented cooperative compliance programs to improve compliance, however, the effectiveness of these programs varies across countries. I expect and find that the complexity of a country's tax system might impair the compliance-enhancing impact of cooperative compliance programs. Using cross-country data of 57 countries, I find that cooperative compliance programs generally promote compliance, except in countries with highly complex tax codes. Moreover, these programs are positively associated with tax compliance even if tax procedures, such as tax filing and payment or tax audits, are highly complex. My findings suggest that cooperative compliance programs can compensate for mistrust caused by complex tax procedures and enhance compliance. However, they may not be effective tools to enhance compliance in complex tax codes.
ch_abstract: 本研究探讨了税收复杂性是否、如何以及在何种条件下会减弱合作合规计划与税收合规之间预期的正向关联。许多国家已实施合作合规计划以提升合规水平，但这些计划的效果因国家而异。研究预期并证实，一国税制的复杂性可能削弱合作合规计划对税收合规的促进作用。基于57个国家的跨国数据，研究发现除税法高度复杂的国家外，合作合规计划普遍能促进税收合规。即便在纳税申报与缴纳、税务审计等程序高度复杂的情况下，这些计划仍与税收合规呈正相关。研究结果表明，合作合规计划能够弥补复杂税收程序引发的不信任并提升合规水平，但对于税法高度复杂的情况，这类计划可能并非提升合规的有效工具。
tags: tax complexity, cooperative compliance, tax compliance

title: Complianceand Risk Management Committee
abstract: Compliance with laws and regulations applicable to the company’s business activities and identifying and managing the risks associated with those activities are two of the fundamental duties and obligations of the board of directors.  The emergence of sustainability as a new factor for consideration in boardrooms has expanded the compliance duties to include adherence to voluntary standards that the board has committed to with respect to governance and environmental and social responsibility and broadened the definition of risks to include environmental and social issues and challenges.  While creating a separate board committee to focus on compliance and risk management is not a new phenomenon, such committees have grown in importance and this chapter covers the role of the board and such committees in developing and overseeing compliance programs, elements of effective compliance programs, risk assessments and enterprise risk management systems and sustainability-related risks.
ch_abstract: 遵守适用于公司业务活动的法律法规，并识别和管理与这些活动相关的风险，是董事会的基本职责和义务之一。随着可持续发展成为董事会考量的新因素，合规职责已扩展到遵守董事会在治理及环境和社会责任方面承诺的自愿标准，并将风险定义拓宽至涵盖环境和社会问题及挑战。虽然设立专门委员会负责合规和风险管理并非新现象，但此类委员会的重要性日益提升。本章将探讨董事会及此类委员会在制定和监督合规计划、有效合规计划的要素、风险评估及企业风险管理系统以及可持续发展相关风险方面的作用。
tags: compliance, risk management

title: Islam-compliance, beyond Shariah-compliance: Toward a broader socioeconomic transformation
abstract: With the emergence and growth of the Islamic Finance industry Muslims now have at their disposal comprehensive Shariah-compliant financial services. However, the notion of Shariah-compliance has rarely been deconstructed; essentially, it constitutes a prohibition-driven enterprise. While the avoidance of the forbidden (Haram) is fundamentally important, Islam encompasses a great deal more than the impermissible. Approaching the relevant issues from the perspective of Shariah-compliance, where legal aspects are overemphasized, leads to legalism where the principles, norms and values based on the Qur’an and Sunnah are largely ignored or compromised.Limiting itself to merely avoid the Haram has significantly handicapped the industry from identifying and endeavoring to synergistically address the broader socio-economic challenges. In this paper, a modified conceptualization based on a more nuanced framework of “Islam-compliance” is proposed and explored, especially from the perspective of value-orientation in Islam. The notion and framework of Islam-compliance has broader implications beyond Islamic finance.
ch_abstract: 随着伊斯兰金融业的出现和发展，穆斯林现在可以获得全面的符合伊斯兰教法的金融服务。然而，"符合伊斯兰教法"这一概念很少被解构；本质上，它是一个以禁令为导向的体系。虽然避免禁忌（哈拉姆）从根本上很重要，但伊斯兰教的内涵远不止于禁止事项。从过度强调法律层面的"符合伊斯兰教法"角度来处理相关问题，会导致形式主义盛行，而基于《古兰经》和圣训的原则、规范和价值大多被忽视或妥协。仅仅局限于避免哈拉姆，严重限制了该行业识别并协同应对更广泛社会经济挑战的能力。本文基于更细致的"符合伊斯兰"框架，特别是从伊斯兰价值导向的角度，提出并探讨了一种修正的概念化方案。"符合伊斯兰"的概念和框架对伊斯兰金融以外的领域具有更广泛的意义。
tags: Islamic, Islamic finance, Shari‘ah-compliance, Islam-compliance, prohibition-driven, value-orientation.

title: Disaster Awareness and Level ofComplianceto Disaster Programs in a Highly Urbanized City
abstract: Disaster is an event that shapes our future. During a disaster, it affects lives, infrastructures, livestock and produce, and we can only adapt to it. The aim of this study is to analyze disaster awareness and level of compliance to disaster programs of selected individuals in a highly urbanized city in Central Luzon, Philippines. The study made use of a descriptive-correlational design. One hundred five (105) individuals took part in the survey using a convenience-sampling technique. This study used an adapted and modified instrument for the survey. For the statistical treatment, the researcher used SPSS 20 in computing the data gathered. Results show that the respondents are aware of disaster but in terms of level of compliance, they answered moderately complied. In addition, there are significant differences in disaster awareness and level of compliance with disaster programs when grouped according to location and the number of family members. Last, there is a relationship between the locations, disaster awareness and compliance level on disaster programs in the study. Based on the results of the study, the researcher recommended pertinent ideas and concepts for improved compliance with disaster programs.
ch_abstract: 灾难是塑造我们未来的事件。在灾难期间，它会影响到生命、基础设施、牲畜和农产品，而我们只能去适应它。本研究的目的是分析菲律宾中吕宋高度城市化城市中选定个体的灾难意识及对灾难计划的遵守程度。研究采用了描述性-相关性设计。105名个体通过便利抽样技术参与了调查。本研究使用了经过改编和修改的调查工具。在统计处理方面，研究者使用SPSS 20对收集的数据进行计算。结果显示，受访者对灾难有所认知，但在遵守程度方面，他们的回答是中等遵守。此外，当按地点和家庭成员数量分组时，灾难意识和对灾难计划的遵守程度存在显著差异。最后，研究中地点、灾难意识与对灾难计划的遵守程度之间存在关联。基于研究结果，研究者提出了相关观点和概念，以提高对灾难计划的遵守程度。
tags: disaster awareness, level of compliance, disaster programs, highly urbanized city

title: StateCompliancewith Intra-EU Investment Awards or the EU ‘Elephant’ in the Investment ‘Porcelain Shop’
abstract: The EU’s entry into the field of international investment law (IIL) and investment treaty arbitration (ITA) is more akin to the unwanted presence of an elephant in a porcelain shop, than the smooth entry of a new actor into a system of international law with established rules and practices, which all actors of the system ought to obey. This chapter explains why – in the author’s view – Achmea, and more recently PL Holdings, Komstroy, and Commission v Micula, not only create unnecessary complexity for investors, states, and the Commission alike, but they also cause unforeseen consequences for judicial certainty, comity, the enforcement of Member States’ existing international obligations, the issue of compliance, and they have the potential of undermining the enforcement of EU law obligations as well. It is a case of how the actions of overzealous EU institutions such as the Commission and the Court of Justice, in a field which they do not fully understand, have created several unforeseen results.
ch_abstract: 欧盟涉足国际投资法（IIL）与投资条约仲裁（ITA）领域，更像是瓷器店里闯入一头不受欢迎的大象，而非一个新参与者平稳融入具有既定规则与实践、且所有参与者都应遵守的国际法体系。本章将阐明为何作者认为——从Achmea案到近期的PL Holdings案、Komstroy案及欧盟委员会诉Micula案——不仅给投资者、成员国及欧盟委员会带来了不必要的复杂性，更对司法确定性、国际礼让、成员国现有国际义务的履行、合规性问题产生了难以预见的后果，甚至可能削弱欧盟法律义务的执行力。这正体现了欧盟委员会与法院等过度热忱的机构，在尚未充分理解的领域采取行动时，如何引发一系列始料未及的后果。
tags: Micula, ISDS, Compliance, Achmea

title: Chipping Away atCompliance: HowCompliancePrograms Lose Legitimacy and Its Impact on Unethical Behavior
abstract: Employee perceptions of an organization’s compliance program are critical. A program that has lost legitimacy with its employees is not just ineffective, but creates more harm than good by leading to more unethical behavior. This paper first presents two different, but often working in tandem, ways that corporate actors can inadvertently diminish the legitimacy of the compliance program. The next part discusses how an illegitimate compliance program can lead to an increase in unethical and illegal behavior. The final part suggests reforms to help protect against this process of a compliance program slowly losing its legitimacy within the organization. These reforms are a board level standing committee on compliance, an independent CECO, and a mandatory evaluation of the corporation’s ethical culture, as necessary reforms.
ch_abstract: 员工对企业合规计划的看法至关重要。一个在员工眼中失去合法性的合规计划不仅无效，还会因引发更多不道德行为而弊大于利。本文首先阐述了企业行为者可能无意中削弱合规计划合法性的两种不同（但往往协同作用的）方式。接着讨论了不合法的合规计划如何导致不道德和非法行为的增加。最后提出了防止合规计划在组织内逐渐丧失合法性这一过程的改革建议：设立董事会层面的合规常设委员会、设立独立的首席道德与合规官（CECO），以及对企业的道德文化进行强制性评估，这些都是必要的改革措施。
tags: Compliance and Ethics Programs, Corporate Culture, Sentencing Guidelines, Compliance Officers

title: Managing CyberRiskinSupplyChains: A Review and Research Agenda
abstract: Purpose: Despite growing research interest in cyber security, inter-firm based cyber risk studies are rare. Therefore, this study investigates cyber risk management in supply chain contexts.Methodology: Adapting a systematic literature review process, papers from interdisciplinary areas published between 1990 and 2017 were selected. Different typologies, developed for conducting descriptive and thematic analysis were established using data mining techniques to conduct a comprehensive, replicable and transparent review.Findings: The review identifies multiple future research directions for cyber security/resilience in supply chains. A conceptual model is developed, which indicates a strong link between IT, organisational and supply chain security systems. The human/behavioural elements within cyber security risk are found to be critical; however, behavioural risks have attracted less attention due to a perceived bias towards technical (data, application and network) risks. There is a need for raising risk awareness, standardised policies, collaborative strategies and empirical models for creating supply chain cyber-resilience.Research implications: Different type of cyber risks and their points of penetration, propagation levels, consequences and mitigation measures are identified. The conceptual model developed in this study drives an agenda for future research on supply chain cyber security/resilience.Practical implications: A multi-perspective, systematic study provides a holistic guide for practitioners in understanding cyber-physical systems. The cyber risk challenges and the mitigation strategies identified support supply chain managers in making informed decisions.Originality: This is the first systematic literature review on managing cyber risks in supply chains. The review defines supply chain cyber risk and develops a conceptual model for supply chain cyber security systems and an agenda for future studies.
ch_abstract: 目的：尽管网络安全研究兴趣日益增长，但基于企业间的网络风险研究仍属罕见。为此，本研究探讨供应链情境下的网络风险管理。  . 方法：采用系统性文献综述方法，筛选1990至2017年间跨学科领域的论文。通过数据挖掘技术建立不同分类框架，进行描述性与主题性分析，确保综述全面、可复现且透明。  . 发现：综述提出了供应链网络安全/韧性的多个未来研究方向，并构建概念模型，揭示信息技术、组织与供应链安全系统间的紧密联系。研究指出网络安全风险中的人为/行为因素至关重要，但行为风险因对技术性（数据、应用及网络）风险的偏好而受关注不足。需提升风险意识、制定标准化政策、协作策略及实证模型以增强供应链网络韧性。  . 研究意义：识别了不同类型网络风险的渗透点、扩散层级、后果及缓解措施，所构建的概念模型为未来供应链网络安全/韧性研究指明方向。  . 实践意义：多视角系统研究为从业者理解网络物理系统提供整体指导，所识别的网络风险挑战与缓解策略助力供应链管理者科学决策。  . 创新性：此为首次针对供应链网络风险管理的系统性文献综述，界定了供应链网络风险定义，构建了供应链网络安全系统概念模型及未来研究框架。
tags: Cyber risks, Cybersecurity, Cyber-attacks, Cyber resilience, Supply chain risk management, Supply chain resilience, Systematic literature review, Text mining

title: Establishing Trust and Trustworthiness forSupplyChainInformation Sharing
abstract: In this chapter, we discuss when, how, and why trust and trustworthiness arise to support credible information sharing and cooperation in a supply chain. Synthesizing our learning, we identify the four building blocks of trust and trustworthiness as personal values and norms, market environment, business infrastructure, and business process design. We elaborate on these building blocks and offer tangible insights into how to establish more trusting and cooperative supply chain relationships.
ch_abstract: 在本章中，我们探讨了信任与可信度何时、如何及为何出现，以支持供应链中的可信信息共享与合作。综合我们的研究发现，我们将信任与可信度的四大基础要素归纳为个人价值观与规范、市场环境、商业基础设施以及业务流程设计。我们将详细阐述这些基础要素，并就如何建立更具信任与合作性的供应链关系提供具体见解。
tags: trust, trustworthiness, supply chain, information sharing, cooperation

title: Bayesian Network Modelling forSupplyChainRiskPropagation
abstract: Supply chain risk propagation is a cascading effect of risks on global supply chain networks. The paper attempts to measure the behaviour of risks following the assessment of supply chain risk propagation. Bayesian network theory is used to analyse the multi-echelon network faced with simultaneous disruptions. The ripple effect of node disruption is evaluated using metrics like fragility, service level, inventory cost and lost sales. Developed risk exposure and resilience indices support in assessing the vulnerability and adaptability of each node in the supply chain network. The research provides a holistic measurement approach for predicting the complex behaviour of risk propagation for improved supply chain risk management.
ch_abstract: 供应链风险传播是风险在全球供应链网络中产生的连锁效应。本文试图在评估供应链风险传播的基础上衡量风险行为，运用贝叶斯网络理论分析面临同步中断的多级网络。通过脆弱性、服务水平、库存成本与销售损失等指标评估节点中断的涟漪效应。所开发的风险暴露与弹性指数有助于评估供应链网络中每个节点的脆弱性与适应性。该研究提供了一种预测风险传播复杂行为的整体测量方法，以改进供应链风险管理。
tags: Supply chain risk management, Risk propagation, Ripple effect, Risk modelling, Bayesian network, Supply chain disruptions, Uncertainty modelling

title: A Quantitative Analysis of DisruptionRiskin a Multi-EchelonSupplyChain
abstract: We demonstrate how system resilience can be improved by focusing on a supply chain network as a whole. We analyze inventory placement and back-up methodologies in a multi-echelon network and view their effect on reducing supply chain risk. We focus on risk from both supply disruptions and demand uncertainty and compare their impacts and mitigating strategies. A simulation model developed to capture an actual network for a consumer packaged goods company is used for the analysis. We present analysis and insights for multi-echelon networks and show how network utilization and proactive planning enable reductions in supply chain disruption impact.
ch_abstract: 我们展示了如何通过将供应链网络视为一个整体来提高系统韧性。我们分析了多级网络中的库存布局与备用方法，并考察它们对降低供应链风险的作用。我们重点关注供应中断和需求不确定性带来的风险，比较其影响及缓解策略。研究采用了一个模拟模型，该模型基于某消费品公司的实际网络构建而成。我们提出了针对多级网络的分析与见解，并展示了网络利用率与主动规划如何有效减轻供应链中断的影响。
tags: supply chain disruptions, multi-echelon inventory, simulation, supply chain risk management, resilience

title: Push, Pull, andSupplyChainRiskAverse Attitude
abstract: The literature has shown that supply chain performance is affected by the allocation of inventory risk. Conventionally, a pull supply chain generates a higher optimal order quantity and hence higher supply chain profit than a push supply chain when firms are risk neutral. Extended from the classic push and pull newsvendor models, this paper investigates the impact of firms’ risk averse attitudes on supply chain performance. Based on firms’ Conditional Value-at-Risk (CVaR), our analysis indicates that the conventional wisdom no longer holds, in that push can lead to a higher optimal order quantity than pull when the supplier is sufficiently more risk averse than the retailer. Meanwhile, pull contracts cannot always survive push challenge like in risk-neutral supply chains. We demonstrate that three-part tariff revenue sharing or buy-back contracts can coordinate both the push and the pull supply chains to achieve the Pareto optimality maximizing combined supply chain CVaR; however, because risk attitude distorts the supply chain optimal ordering, risk correction is needed as long as the supply chain risk attitude is not neutral.
ch_abstract: 文献表明，供应链绩效受库存风险分配的影响。传统观点认为，当企业风险中性时，拉动式供应链比推动式供应链能产生更高的最优订单量，从而实现更高的供应链利润。本文基于经典的推动与拉动式报童模型，探讨了企业风险规避态度对供应链绩效的影响。通过企业条件风险价值（CVaR）分析发现，传统结论在供应商风险规避程度显著高于零售商时发生逆转——推动式可能产生比拉动式更高的最优订单量。同时，与风险中性供应链不同，拉动式契约并非总能抵御推动式挑战。研究表明，三部收费制收益共享或回购契约能协调推动与拉动式供应链，实现帕累托最优的最大化联合供应链CVaR；但由于风险态度会扭曲供应链最优订购决策，只要供应链存在风险偏好，就需要进行风险修正。
tags: Push and Pull Supply Chains; Risk Averse Attitude; Supply Chain Coordination; Newsvendor

title: View of Management Information System and DigitalSupplyChainInfluence onSupplyChainResilience throughSupplyChainRiskManagement
abstract: Arabia.Based on the results of the study, it is recommended that SaudiArabiantextilecompanies should manage their management information system capabilities and invest indigital supply chains to improve supply chain risk management. Additionally, companiesshould focus on strengthening supply chain risk management practices as a mediator to bolstersupply chain resilience.
ch_abstract: 阿拉伯。根据研究结果，建议沙特阿拉伯纺织企业应管理其管理信息系统能力，并投资数字化供应链以改善供应链风险管理。此外，企业应注重加强供应链风险管理实践，作为增强供应链韧性的中介因素。
tags: Management information system, Digital supply chain, Supply chain resilience, Supply Chain Risk Management

title: SupplyChainManagement and InvestmentRisk
abstract: We use a behaviorally motivated risk-return optimization framework to shed light on the important link between global supply chain management and investors’ risk-return choice.  By improving the transparency and sustainability of the global supply chain, firms can reduce the probability of extreme losses, thus increasing investors’ expected utility and asset valuations.  In order to effectively address the growing risks firms face in their global supply chains, systemic change is required.  Managers can facilitate this change by increasing transparency and sustainability of their supply chains, especially in the area of carbon emissions reduction. We outline existing programs and tools that are leading the way in this regard.
ch_abstract: 我们采用行为动机的风险回报优化框架，来揭示全球供应链管理与投资者风险回报选择之间的重要联系。通过提高全球供应链的透明度和可持续性，企业可以降低极端损失的概率，从而提升投资者的预期效用和资产估值。为有效应对企业在全球供应链中日益增长的风险，需要进行系统性变革。管理者可通过增强供应链的透明度和可持续性来推动这一变革，尤其是在减少碳排放领域。我们概述了在这方面处于领先地位的现有计划和工具。
tags: Supply chain, ESG factors, risk, return

title: A Systems Approach for ModellingSupplyChainRisks
abstract: Purpose - With increasing exposure to disruptions, it is vital for supply chains to manage the risks proactively. Prediction of potential failure points and overall impact of these risks is challenging. In this paper, systems thinking concepts are applied for modelling supply chain risks. The aim of this research is to develop a holistic, systematic and quantitative risk assessment process for measuring the overall risk behaviour. Design/Methodology/Approach - A framework for Supply Chain Risk Management (SCRM) is developed and tested using an industrial case study. A systematically developed research design is employed to capture the dynamic behaviour of risks. Additionally, a system based supply chain risk model is conceptualized for risk modelling. Sensitivity modelling results are combined for validating the supply chain risk model.    Findings - The systems approach for modelling supply chain risks predicts the failure points along with their overall risk impact in the supply chain network. System based risk modelling provides a holistic picture of risk behavioural performance which is difficult to realise through other research methodologies commonly preferred in the SCRM research. Practical Implications - The developed framework for SCRM is tested in an industry setting for its viability. The framework for SCRM along with the supply chain risk model is expected to benefit practitioners in understanding the intricacies of supply chain risks. The system model for risk assessment is a working tool which could provide a perspective of future disruptive events. Originality - A holistic, systematic and quantitative risk modelling mechanism for capturing overall behaviour of risks is a valuable contribution of this research. The paper presents a new perspective towards using systems thinking for modelling supply chain risks.
ch_abstract: 目的——随着面临的中断风险日益增加，供应链必须主动管理风险。预测潜在故障点及这些风险的总体影响具有挑战性。本文运用系统思维概念建立供应链风险模型，旨在开发一个全面、系统、量化的风险评估流程以衡量整体风险行为。. . 设计/方法论/方法——通过工业案例研究开发并测试了供应链风险管理（SCRM）框架。采用系统化的研究设计捕捉风险动态行为，同时构建基于系统的供应链风险概念模型。结合敏感性建模结果验证该风险模型。. . 研究发现——基于系统方法的供应链风险模型可预测供应链网络中的故障点及其总体风险影响。这种建模方式能呈现风险行为表现的全貌，这是SCRM研究中常用方法难以实现的。. . 实践意义——所开发的SCRM框架已在工业环境中验证其可行性。该框架与风险模型将帮助从业者理解供应链风险的复杂性，其系统化风险评估模型可作为预判未来中断事件的工作工具。. . 原创性——本研究的重要贡献在于提出了一种全面、系统、量化的风险建模机制。论文为运用系统思维进行供应链风险建模提供了新视角。
tags: Supply Chain Risk Management, Systems Thinking, Risk Modelling

title: The Impact of Knowledge Transfer and Complexity onSupplyChainFlexibility:  A Knowledge-Based View
abstract: Supply chain flexibility has become an important ingredient to remain competitive in today’s increasingly complex business environment. Within this context, drawing from the knowledge-based view of the firm, we investigate the influence of internal and external knowledge transfer activities on supply chain flexibility. In addition, taking a contingency perspective, we hypothesize about the moderating effects of product and supply complexity on the relationships between knowledge transfer and supply chain flexibility. We test our hypotheses with data collected from procurement and supply chain professionals in Germany. Pursuant to our expectations, we find a positive and significant influence of internal and external knowledge transfer on supply chain flexibility. We further confirm a negative moderating effect of supply complexity on the relationship between internal knowledge transfer and supply chain flexibility, and a negative moderating effect of product complexity on the relationship between external knowledge transfer and supply chain flexibility. However, contrary to our expectations, we also find significant positive effects for the remaining two moderations, being indicative of the unique dynamics emanating from complexity, able to yield both positive and negative moderation effects contingent on the situation. Overall, these findings provide important insight into the value of knowledge transfer activities for supply chain flexibility, and especially into when knowledge transfer is most effective, drawing attention to influential complexity contingencies. Theoretical and practical contributions are discussed.
ch_abstract: 供应链灵活性已成为在当今日益复杂的商业环境中保持竞争力的重要因素。基于企业知识基础观，本研究探讨了内外部知识转移活动对供应链灵活性的影响。此外，从权变视角出发，我们假设产品和供应复杂性对知识转移与供应链灵活性之间的关系具有调节作用。通过收集德国采购与供应链专业人士的数据，我们对假设进行了验证。与预期一致，研究发现内外部知识转移对供应链灵活性存在显著正向影响。同时证实供应复杂性会负向调节内部知识转移与供应链灵活性的关系，产品复杂性会负向调节外部知识转移与供应链灵活性的关系。但出乎意料的是，其余两项调节作用呈现显著正向效应，表明复杂性引发的独特动态机制能根据情境产生或正或负的调节效果。总体而言，这些发现不仅揭示了知识转移活动对供应链灵活性的价值，更通过关注关键复杂性权变因素，指明了知识转移最有效的适用情境。最后讨论了研究的理论与实践贡献。
tags: knowledge transfer, supply chain flexibility, product complexity, supply complexity

title: Modeling ofSupplyChainRiskunder Disruptions with Performance Measurement and Robustness Analysis
abstract: In this paper, we develop a new supply chain network model with multiple decision-makers associated at different tiers and with multiple transportation modes for shipment of the good between tiers. The model formulation captures supply side risk as well as demand-side risk, along with uncertainty in transportation and other costs. The model also incorporates the individual attitudes towards disruption risks among the manufacturers and the retailers, with the demands for the product associated with the retailers being random. We present the behavior of the various decision-makers, derive the governing equilibrium conditions, and establish the finite dimensional variational inequality formulation. We also propose a weighted supply chain performance and robustness measure based on our recently derived network performance/efficiency measure and provide supply chain examples for which the equilibrium solutions are determined along with the robustness analyzes. This paper extends previous supply chain research by capturing supply-side disruption risks, transportation and other cost risks, and demand-side uncertainty within an integrated modeling and robustness analysis framework.
ch_abstract: 本文构建了一种新型供应链网络模型，该模型包含不同层级的多个决策者，并采用多种运输方式实现层级间货物运输。模型构建同时考虑了供应端与需求端风险，以及运输与其他成本的不确定性。该模型还纳入了制造商和零售商对中断风险的不同态度，且零售商面临的产品需求具有随机性。我们阐述了各决策者的行为特征，推导出主导均衡条件，建立了有限维变分不等式公式。基于最新提出的网络性能/效率衡量指标，我们设计了一种加权供应链性能与鲁棒性测度方法，并通过供应链案例演示了均衡解的求解过程及鲁棒性分析。本研究通过建立综合建模与鲁棒性分析框架，将供应端中断风险、运输及其他成本风险、需求端不确定性纳入统一体系，拓展了现有供应链研究领域。
tags: Multimodal Supply Chain Network, Disruptions, Performance Measure, Robustness Measure

title: Modelling the Impact of Climate ChangeRiskonSupplyChainPerformance
abstract: Climate change is among the top global risks due to its growing adverse impact on businesses. However, few empirical studies address this imminent risk from a supply chain perspective. Due to a lack of established approaches for capturing complex interaction between climate change risk and supply chain performance, a three-phase mixed methodology approach was attempted. A cognitive map first captured the inter-relationships based on a mental model established by a group of experts. Later, a survey gathered from industry practitioners assessing causal relationships identified key climate change factors and most influenced supply chain performance dimensions. Finally, a system dynamics model supported by multiple case scenarios assessed the implications of climate change on supply chain performance. The results indicated a significant reduction in the availability of natural resources/raw material and capacity, leading to increase in stock-outs, inventory costs and bottlenecks disrupting procurement, manufacturing and logistics functions.
