Supply chain performance captured through efficiency and effectiveness shows a negative trend with increasing climate change consequences. The systems approach followed in this paper contributes by providing a quantitative model for assessing the impact of climate change risk on supply chain performance.
ch_abstract: 气候变化因其对企业日益加剧的负面影响而成为全球首要风险之一。然而，从供应链视角探讨这一紧迫风险的实证研究却寥寥无几。由于缺乏成熟方法来捕捉气候变化风险与供应链绩效间的复杂交互作用，本研究尝试采用三阶段混合方法。首先通过认知图基于专家小组建立的心理模型捕捉关联关系；随后通过行业从业者评估因果关系的问卷调查，识别出关键气候变化因素及受影响最显著的供应链绩效维度；最后通过多案例情景支持的系统动力学模型，评估气候变化对供应链绩效的影响。研究结果表明，自然资源/原材料与产能可用性显著下降，导致缺货率上升、库存成本增加及采购、制造与物流环节出现瓶颈。以效率和有效性衡量的供应链绩效随气候变化影响加剧呈现恶化趋势。本文采用的系统方法通过构建量化评估模型，为研究气候变化风险对供应链绩效的影响提供了方法论贡献。
tags: Supply Chain Performance, Climate Change, Performance Measurement, Climate Risk, Uncertainty, Systems Theory

title: The Decision of theSupplyChainExecutive to Support or ImpedeSupplyChainIntegration: A Multidisciplinary Behavioral Agency Perspective
abstract: Applying the behavioral agency model developed by Wiseman and Gomez-Mejia (1998), this paper analyzes human resource factors that induce supply chain executives (SCEs) to make decisions that foster or hinder supply chain integration. We examine two internal sources - compensation and employment risk - and one external source - environmental volatility - of risk bearing that can make SCEs more reluctant to make the decision of promoting supply chain integration. We argue and empirically confirm the notion that an employment and compensation system that increases SCE risk bearing reduces the SCE´s willingness to make risky decisions and thus discourages supply chain integration. We also reveal that this negative relationship becomes stronger under conditions of high environmental volatility. In addressing the “so what?” question, we find empirical support for the hypothesis that supply chain integration positively influences operational performance. Even though this decision has positive value for the firm, we found that SCEs discourage supply chain integration when they face higher risk bearing. Hypotheses are tested using a combination of primary survey data and archival measures in a sample of 133 Spanish firms.
ch_abstract: 本文运用Wiseman与Gomez-Mejia（1998）提出的行为代理模型，分析了促使供应链高管（SCEs）做出促进或阻碍供应链整合决策的人力资源因素。我们考察了两种内部风险承担来源——薪酬与雇佣风险，以及一种外部来源——环境波动性，这些因素会增强SCEs对推动供应链整合决策的抵触情绪。我们论证并实证检验了以下观点：增加SCEs风险承担的雇佣与薪酬体系会降低其风险决策意愿，从而抑制供应链整合。研究还揭示，在高环境波动性条件下，这种负向关系更为显著。针对"研究意义"问题，我们实证支持了"供应链整合对运营绩效产生正向影响"的假设。尽管该决策对企业具有积极价值，但发现当SCEs面临较高风险承担时，会阻碍供应链整合。研究通过结合原始调查数据与档案测量方法，对133家西班牙企业样本进行了假设检验。
tags: Behavioral agency model, decision making, executive risk taking, risk bearing, supply chain executive, supply chain integration, performance, multidisciplinary research

title: Deceptive counterfeitriskin globalsupplychains
abstract: The study investigates deceptive counterfeits in the global supply chains. It explores perceived sources of counterfeits, their impact and identifies risk mitigation strategies in Business-to-Business procurement. An online survey was used to collect data from 140 procurement professionals targeted at a national purchasing body and affiliated UK purchasing groups. The study findings show that counterfeit breaches are increasing, especially in low-cost spare parts, sourced from tier-two suppliers based in developing countries. Counterfeits lead to high costs, delays, lost sales, product recalls and even legal action. Network transparency, cost of quality and pre-supply evaluation approaches and supplier relationship management are the most effective mitigation strategies to overcome deceptive counterfeit risk in global supply chains. The study contributes to supply chain academics and practitioners’ growing research interest in counterfeit risk.
ch_abstract: 该研究调查了全球供应链中的欺诈性假冒产品问题，探讨了假冒产品的感知来源、其影响，并确定了企业间采购中的风险缓解策略。研究采用在线调查方式，收集了来自一个国家采购机构及其附属英国采购团体的140名采购专业人员的数据。研究结果显示，假冒违规行为正在增加，尤其是来自发展中国家二级供应商的低成本备件。假冒产品导致高成本、延误、销售损失、产品召回甚至法律诉讼。网络透明度、质量成本、供应前评估方法以及供应商关系管理是克服全球供应链中欺诈性假冒风险最有效的缓解策略。该研究为供应链学术界和从业者对假冒风险日益增长的研究兴趣做出了贡献。
tags: Counterfeit risk, global supply chains, supply chain risk management, procurement

title: SupplyChainRiskMitigation Strategies in Automotive Industry: A Review
abstract: This paper studies supply chain management (SCM) of automotive industry and investigates about the types of risks that threaten automotive supply chain. These risks are identified in a way which all causes and mitigation strategies classified dependently. This study has adapted from 29 ISI and reputable journals which are indexed in Scopus (2008-2018). Based on previous researches, 10 risks, causes and mitigation strategies are identified in this industry which the most important ones include: supply risk, demand uncertainty and shortage of materials. Finally, the relevant causes and mitigation strategies for all 10 risks are identified. Later the methodologies such as Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM), Multi-Objective Decision Making (MODM) and standards like ISO 31000 for handling the risks are extensively presented in this paper. For further study the authors recommended that the critical risks should be ranked and new methods and strategies and methodologies should be developed specially for the mitigation of uncertainty and fluctuation.
ch_abstract: 本文研究了汽车行业的供应链管理（SCM），探讨了威胁汽车供应链的各类风险。这些风险的识别方式涵盖了所有相关成因及对应的缓解策略分类。本研究基于2008至2018年间Scopus收录的29份ISI权威期刊文献展开。根据既有研究，该行业共识别出10类风险及其成因与缓解策略，其中最关键的风险包括：供应风险、需求不确定性和材料短缺。最终研究明确了所有10类风险的对应成因与缓解方案。随后，本文详细阐述了多准则决策（MCDM）、多目标决策（MODM）等方法论以及ISO 31000等风险管理标准。作者建议后续研究应对关键风险进行分级排序，并特别针对不确定性与波动性问题开发新的缓解方法、策略及方法论体系。
tags: Supply Chain Management, Supply Chain Risk Mitigation Strategies, Automotive Industry, MCDM, MODM

title: UsingRiskSharing Contracts forSupplyChainRiskMitigation: A Buyer-Supplier Power and Dependence Perspective
abstract: The paper aims to understand buyer-supplier power and dependence scenarios following a risk sharing contract. The study develops a supply chain risk sharing contract to mitigate demand uncertainty and price volatility related risks in a globalised business environment. An integer programming model is developed and analysed following an automotive case study to generate insights into buyer-supplier relationships. Multiple buyer-supplier power and dependence scenarios are considered to reflect the possible leverages involved in the decision-making. The situational strength evaluated through buyer-supplier power and dependence illuminates the inherent complexity in contract negotiation. Thus there is an evident need to develop risk sharing contracts for mitigating global risks. The developed relationship framework and risk sharing contract model are expected to help SC managers in better understanding behavioural aspects during contract negotiations. The risk sharing contract model proposed here also contributes to a potentially novel perspective on existing theory in buyer-supplier power and dependence by providing a relational perspective on the dynamics of supply chain design and collaboration.
ch_abstract: 本文旨在理解风险分担合同下的买方-供应商权力与依赖关系情景。研究设计了一种供应链风险分担合同，以缓解全球化商业环境中需求不确定性与价格波动相关的风险。通过一个汽车行业案例研究，开发并分析了整数规划模型，以深入理解买方-供应商关系。研究考虑了多种买方-供应商权力与依赖情景，以反映决策中可能涉及的杠杆效应。通过评估买方-供应商权力与依赖所体现的情境强度，揭示了合同谈判中固有的复杂性。因此，制定风险分担合同以应对全球风险的需求显而易见。所建立的关系框架和风险分担合同模型有望帮助供应链管理者更好地理解合同谈判中的行为因素。本文提出的风险分担合同模型还为买方-供应商权力与依赖的现有理论提供了潜在的新视角，通过关系视角阐释了供应链设计与协作的动态性。
tags: Supply chain

title: SupplyChainIntegration and Information Technology
abstract: The paper reports on a study which analyzes relationships between information technology and performance of Supply Chains. The two main barriers faced in Supply Chain are Management of Inventory and the timely delivery of goods to meet the demand of customers. Hence, the performance of Supply chain is measured by the impact on the inventory turnover and lead time of goods. The transparency of demand across the Supply Chain i.e. the product visibility across the Supply Chain would lead to improvement of the performance was the expectation set by this study. Facts on the basis of responses from Industry propose that Product Visibility results in improvement of lead time of the Supply Chain. The study also shows that certain sectors, primarily FMCG goods Industry are in the forefront in using Information Technology to improve their Supply Chain. However, an important outcome of the study has been the resistance observed in the industry in implementation of technology infrastructure. Since the study is based on survey methods, the perceptions of the respondents reflect the lack of confidence in Information Technology in improving the demand visibility and hence the inventory position of Supply Chain partners.
ch_abstract: 该论文报告了一项研究，分析信息技术与供应链绩效之间的关系。供应链面临的两大主要障碍是库存管理和及时交付货物以满足客户需求。因此，供应链绩效通过其对库存周转率和货物交付周期的影响来衡量。本研究设定的预期是，供应链中需求透明度的提升，即产品在供应链中的可见性，将带来绩效的改善。基于行业反馈的数据表明，产品可见性确实能缩短供应链的交付周期。研究还显示，某些行业，主要是快消品行业，在利用信息技术优化供应链方面处于领先地位。然而，该研究的一个重要发现是行业在技术基础设施实施过程中表现出的抵触情绪。由于本研究采用调查方法，受访者的观点反映出对信息技术在提升需求可见性及改善供应链合作伙伴库存状况方面缺乏信心。
tags: Information technology, supply chain, product visibility

title: SupplyChainTsunamis: Research on Low Probability High Impact Disruptions
abstract: This paper introduces supply chain tsunamis as a major strategic supply chain phenomenon. Like their ecological counterparts, supply chain tsunamis occur at relatively long intervals and are therefore easily mistaken for unique events, rather than recurring phenomena. In contrast to ocean tsunamis, they can in principle be prevented through timely and adequate managerial action. However, their immediate impact is just as sudden and disruptive, and their ability to reshape supply chains of companies and even industries equally long-lasting. They are fundamentally different from phenomena like the “bullwhip effect” (Lee et al., 1997) and “black swan events” (Taleb, 2007). This paper further explores a preliminary typology of supply chain tsunamis suggested in an earlier publication (Akkermans and Van Wassenhove, 2013). Each type of tsunami focuses on a very different part of the supply chain periphery where the first signals of a developing tsunami can be observed. In this paper we use a detailed example from the high-tech electronics industry to describe how a supply chain tsunami unfolds over time. This is done both from an external and an internal perspective. The external perspective shows the sequence of events visible to the outside observer. The internal perspective focuses on the managerial decisionmaking processes that cause and (sometimes) resolve supply chain tsunamis. We link the notion of supply chain tsunamis to the broader need to revive strategic operations management research. Supply chain tsunamis affect corporate strategy and have a profound impact on business and management. They are living proof that operations remain, after almost half a century, the “missing link in corporate strategy” (Skinner, 1969). Therefore, we argue that business tsunamis deserve deeper research and suggest some avenues.
ch_abstract: 本文提出"供应链海啸"作为一种重要的战略性供应链现象。与自然界的海啸类似，供应链海啸发生间隔较长，因此容易被误认为是偶发事件而非周期性现象。但与海洋海啸不同，原则上可以通过及时有效的管理措施加以预防。然而其突发影响同样具有破坏性，且重塑企业乃至行业供应链格局的效力同样持久。这种现象与"牛鞭效应"(Lee等，1997)和"黑天鹅事件"(Taleb，2007)存在本质区别。本文基于早期研究(Akkermans和Van Wassenhove，2013)提出的初步分类框架，深入探讨供应链海啸的类型学特征——每类海啸都聚焦于供应链外围的不同环节，这些区域往往最先显现海啸形成的信号。我们以高科技电子行业为例，从外部观察者视角和内部决策者视角，详细阐述供应链海啸的动态演变过程：前者呈现可观测的事件序列，后者聚焦引发（有时化解）海啸的管理决策机制。通过将供应链海啸概念与战略运营管理研究的复兴需求相联系，我们指出这种现象直接影响企业战略，对商业管理产生深远影响。在运营管理研究发展近半个世纪后，供应链海啸现象再次印证了"运营仍是企业战略缺失的一环"(Skinner，1969)的论断。因此我们认为商业海啸现象值得深入研究，并提出了若干研究方向。
tags: Supply Chain Disruptions, Supply Chain Strategy, Risk Management, Supply Chain Resilience, Organizational Sensemaking

title: Impact ofSupplyChainFlexibility and Supplier Development onSupplyChainEffectiveness in Automotive Industry of Pakistan
abstract: The purpose of this research is to study the significance of supply chain strategies namely supplier development and supply chain flexibility towards supply chain effectiveness in automotive industry of Pakistan. A survey was conducted using self-administered questionnaires to collect data from 300 supply chain professionals working in automotive manufacturing companies of Pakistan. The finding indicates that supplier development and supply chain flexibility have positive and significant impact on supply chain effectiveness in automotive industry of Pakistan. The research will help policy makers and management to integrate strategies and practices related to supplier development and flexibility to improve supply chain effectiveness in order to be competitive in automotive industry of Pakistan.
ch_abstract: 本研究的目的是探讨供应链战略，即供应商开发和供应链灵活性对巴基斯坦汽车行业供应链有效性的重要性。通过自填问卷的方式对巴基斯坦汽车制造企业的300名供应链专业人员进行了调查以收集数据。研究结果表明，供应商开发和供应链灵活性对巴基斯坦汽车行业的供应链有效性具有积极且显著的影响。该研究将帮助政策制定者和管理层整合与供应商开发和灵活性相关的战略与实践，以提高供应链有效性，从而在巴基斯坦汽车行业保持竞争力。
tags: supplier development, supply chain flexibility, supply chain effectiveness

title: SupplyChainRiskManagement: Present and Future Scope
abstract: Purpose - This paper examines Supply Chain Risk Management (SCRM) from a holistic systems thinking perspective by considering the different typologies that have evolved as a result of earlier research. The aim of research reported in this paper is the identification of important strategic changes in the field and to outline future requirements and research opportunities in SCRM. Design/methodology/approach - The Systematic Literature Review (SLR) methodology employed by our research was used to evaluate and categorise a literature survey of quality articles published over a period of 10 years (2000-2010). Additionally, the findings from the SLR have been strengthened through cross validation against results obtained from an associated text mining activity. Findings - The SLR methodology has provided a rich, unbiased and holistic picture of the advances in the field of SCRM. Consequently, important new research areas have been identified based on a multi-perspective descriptive and thematic data analysis. In addition, our analysis based on evolved typologies indicates a growth of SCRM from a nascent to a fairly established activity over the past decade Practical implications - The systematic approach undertaken for the literature review will provide future researchers and managers with an insightful understanding of the scope of the SCRM field. Also, the literature review provides important clues on new research directions for SCRM through identification of gaps in current knowledge. Originality/value - The holistic approach to SCRM was found to be an important missing link in earlier literature surveys. The outcome of the Systematic Literature Review reported in this paper has provided critical insights into the present and future scope of the SCRM field. The identified research insights, gaps and future directions will encourage new research techniques with a view to managing the risks in the globalized supply chain environment.
ch_abstract: 目的——本文从系统思维的整体视角出发，结合早期研究形成的不同分类方法，对供应链风险管理（SCRM）进行探讨。研究旨在识别该领域的重要战略变革，并勾勒出SCRM的未来需求与研究机遇。  . 设计/方法论/方法——我们采用系统性文献综述（SLR）方法，对2000至2010十年间发表的优质文献进行评价与分类。此外，通过关联文本挖掘结果的交叉验证，强化了SLR的研究发现。  . 研究发现——SLR方法全面、客观地呈现了SCRM领域的进展，基于多视角描述性与主题数据分析识别出重要新研究方向。分类演变分析表明，过去十年间SCRM已从新兴活动发展为较成熟的领域。  . 实践意义——系统性文献综述为未来研究者与管理者提供了对SCRM领域的深刻理解，同时通过识别当前知识缺口，为SCRM新研究方向提供重要线索。  . 原创性/价值——本研究发现整体性视角是早期文献综述的重要缺失环节。此次系统性文献综述揭示了SCRM领域现状与未来范畴，所识别的研究洞见、缺口与方向将推动新研究方法的发展，以应对全球化供应链环境中的风险。
tags: Supply Chain Risk Management, Systematic Literature Review, Text Mining

title: The Role ofSupplyChainFinance onSupplyChainManagement and Firm's Performance: A Conceptual Framework
abstract: The literature on supply chain finance as a moderating element for enhancing business performance and the overall efficacy of supply chain management is reviewed in-depth in this study. It analyzes the critical factors, benefits, challenges, and opportunities associated with supply chain finance implementation and its impact on various performance indicators, including operational efficiency, cost reduction, and risk management. Additionally, it emphasizes the strategic implications of implementing supply chain finance practices for businesses seeking a competitive advantage in today's swiftly changing business environment. By consolidating the present body of research, this study improves the link between supply chain finance and supply chain management and its effect on company performance.
ch_abstract: 本研究深入探讨了供应链金融作为提升企业绩效及供应链管理整体效能的调节要素的相关文献。文章系统分析了供应链金融实施过程中的关键因素、优势、挑战与机遇，及其对运营效率、成本削减和风险管理等多维度绩效指标的影响。同时，研究着重阐述了在当今快速变化的商业环境中，企业实施供应链金融实践对获取竞争优势的战略意义。通过整合现有研究成果，本研究强化了供应链金融与供应链管理之间的关联性，并揭示了其对企业绩效的作用机制。
tags: Supply Chain Management, Supply Chain Finance, Moderating, Firm's Performance

title: SupplyChainRiskManagement Research: Avenues for Further Studies
abstract: Organisations that are affected by supply chain risks will – if no risk-adjusting measures are available – experience more supply malfunctions or other adverse consequences. The paper at hand paper delivers a systematic review of the existing literature, featuring in-depth analysis and cognition on the ever-expanding supply chain risk management (SCRM) topic. The findings reveal that there is a lack of empirical evidence for the relational linkage between SCRM and performance. However, ‘top’ 24 antecedents for effective SCRM and various SCRM risk sources classified into supply-side, demand-side, external, and internal risks have been identified. The results of these useful insights allow for an identification of gaps to foster further investigations that will offer an advanced understanding of SCRM and its effect on performance. Hence, we contribute to the SCRM research stream by synthesising the highly fragmented and inconsistent literature that currently exists.
ch_abstract: 受供应链风险影响的企业若缺乏风险调控措施，将面临更多供应中断或其他负面后果。本文对现有文献进行了系统性梳理，针对日益扩展的供应链风险管理（SCRM）研究领域提供了深度分析与认知。研究发现，目前缺乏关于SCRM与绩效关联性的实证证据，但已识别出24个有效实施SCRM的关键前置因素，并将各类SCRM风险源归类为供应端、需求端、外部及内部风险。这些重要发现有助于定位研究空白，推动后续研究以深化对SCRM及其绩效影响的理解。通过整合当前高度碎片化且不一致的文献，本研究为SCRM学术领域作出了贡献。
tags: supply chain risk management; SCRM; supply chain risks; supply chain disruptions; supply chain risk sources; supply chain performance; antecedents; CIMO; systematic review; literature review; literature survey

title: The Effects of Trust and Capability inSupplyChainon Firm Performance throughSupplyChainAgility and Collaborative Advantage
abstract: Purpose - In this research, an integrated model is proposed to explore the effects of trust, agility, collaborative advantage and capability dimensions on firm performance and how they interact with one another.  In some of the research in the literature, the effect of the dimensions that are trust in supply chain, supply chain agility, collaborative advantage in supply chain and supply chain capability on firm performance has been empirically proven. Yet, no research exists in the literature that explains the indirect effects of these dimensions through one another. Consequently, this study aims to close this gap in the extant literature.Design/methodology/approach – Structural equation modelling method was utilised to test the hypotheses of this study. Quantitative data was obtained by means of survey in a five-point Likert scale. Initially, confirmatory faction analyses and reliability analysis were performed respectively to determine the validity and reliability of the scale. The analyses were performed with SPSS and AMOS statistics programs.Findings – As a result of the data analyses and tests of hypotheses conducted in this study, it has been empirically proven that supply chain agility and collaborative advantage in supply chain are indirectly and directly influenced by trust in the supply chain. These results are in accordance with the extant literature.Discussion – Knowing the expectations of the customers is crucial for firms in today's business environment. The reason for this is that firms need to manage external business processes in order not to be affected by uncertainty in customers’ needs. Therefore, the effects of supply chain management on firm performance have begun to be studied more in recent years. In other words, transformation of the agility into the capability or transformation of the trust into the collaborative advantage can help to explain the effects of these dimensions on the firm performance.
ch_abstract: 目的——本研究提出一个整合模型，探讨信任、敏捷性、协作优势与能力维度对企业绩效的影响及其相互作用机制。现有文献中已有部分研究实证证明了供应链信任、供应链敏捷性、供应链协作优势及供应链能力等维度对企业绩效的直接影响，但尚未有研究能解释这些维度通过彼此产生的间接影响。因此，本研究旨在填补这一文献空白。. . 设计/方法/路径——采用结构方程模型检验研究假设，通过五级李克特量表问卷调查获取定量数据。研究首先分别进行验证性因子分析和信度分析以确定量表的效度与信度，所有分析均通过SPSS和AMOS统计软件完成。. . 研究发现——通过数据分析和假设检验，本研究实证表明：供应链敏捷性和供应链协作优势既直接受供应链信任影响，也存在间接影响路径。这一发现与现有文献结论一致。. . 讨论——在当今商业环境中，洞悉客户需求对企业至关重要。企业需要通过管理外部业务流程来规避客户需求不确定性的影响。正因如此，近年来供应链管理对企业绩效的影响机制日益受到学界关注。具体而言，敏捷性向能力的转化或信任向协作优势的转化，都有助于解释这些维度对企业绩效的作用路径。
tags: Trust in Supply Chain, Supply Chain Agility, Supply Chain Capability, Collaborative Advantage in Supply Chain

title: SupplyChainManagement & Logistic Strategy at S M Electronics for Reducing Cost & Improving Service
abstract: This study on supply chain strategy depicts how the enterprise manages supply chain operations, and evaluates the impact of its operations on customer perceptions. Supply chain organization model defines management structures ,roles, and increases the relationships with external business partner. This study shows how  in case of SMET’s supply chain strategy reflects its business goals and external opportunities .Study seeks to profitably service its customers. It  analyzes how supply chain management strategy reduces cost and improves Service of SMET Pvt .Ltd. Also utilization of  Just-in-time (JIT) as an inventory strategy that strives to reduce  inventory cost  and carrying cost is demonstrated. An attempt is made to  work on Demand Forecasting of the company resulting in Economic Order  Quantity (EOQ) and further to analyze the Adoption of Logistics strategy and its role in reducing cost and  improving service.
ch_abstract: 这项关于供应链战略的研究阐述了企业如何管理供应链运营，并评估其运营对客户认知的影响。供应链组织模式界定了管理架构与角色分工，同时增强了与外部商业伙伴的关联。本研究揭示了SMET公司的供应链战略如何体现其商业目标与外部机遇，旨在实现以盈利方式服务客户。研究分析了供应链管理策略如何降低SMET私营有限公司的成本并提升服务质量，同时论证了准时制生产（JIT）作为库存战略在减少库存成本与持有成本方面的应用。研究还尝试开展企业需求预测工作以确定经济订货批量（EOQ），进而分析物流战略的采用及其在降本增效中的作用。
tags: JIT, Supply chain, EOQ

title: SupplyChainInfluence: Are We There Yet?
abstract: Winning companies do great things with and through partners. A failure to work well together, by contrast, drives higher costs and diminishes market success. What do we need to know to increase supply chain influence and achieve desired outcomes through partners’ capabilities and effective collaboration? One step forward is to grasp, predict, and influence partners’ behavior. This paper introduces the Influence Matrix which helps us understand behavioral interactions. We anchor the matrix’s horizontal axis along a continuum of “concern for relationships” — specifically, from transactional to collaborative. The vertical axis is anchored on a continuum from passive to assertive. We label the four resulting quadrants as follows: Competitor, Circumventer, Colleague, and Champion.
ch_abstract: 成功的企业通过与合作伙伴携手合作，成就非凡事业。反之，协作不畅则会导致成本攀升、市场表现下滑。我们该如何提升供应链影响力，借助合作伙伴的能力与高效协作实现预期成果？关键一步在于理解、预测并引导合作伙伴的行为。本文提出的"影响力矩阵"能帮助我们解析行为互动模式——横轴代表"对合作关系的重视程度"，从纯粹交易型到深度协作型；纵轴则体现行为主动性，从消极被动到积极进取。该矩阵划分出四个象限：竞争者、规避者、协作者、共赢者。
tags: Supply Chain Influence

title: AI-drivenSupplyChainTransformation at JD.com
abstract: With the advances in artificial intelligence (AI) over the past decade, the global supply chain landscape has undergone a radical evolution. This study examines the transformative role of AI and operation research (OR) in supply chain management through the classic Triple-A framework. By analyzing three real-world implementations at JD.com, China's largest online retailer, we illustrate how AI-driven models enhance supply chain capabilities beyond traditional approaches: (1) interpretable time-series forecasting using hybrid AI-OR models to balance accuracy and transparency; (2) logistics optimization for inventory allocation and fulfillment efficiency; and (3) a customer-to-manufacturer (C2M) system leveraging natural language processing to align product development with consumer demand. This work further concludes the prerequisites for successful AI implications in the industry, including cross-functional teams, adaptive management systems, enriched data ecosystems, and scenario-rich operational environments. By bridging AI and OR, organizations can escalate intelligent supply chain capabilities to even higher levels.
ch_abstract: 随着人工智能（AI）在过去十年的进步，全球供应链格局经历了根本性变革。本研究通过经典"三重A"框架，探讨了AI与运筹学（OR）对供应链管理的变革性作用。通过分析中国最大在线零售商京东的三个实际应用案例，我们阐释了AI驱动模型如何超越传统方法提升供应链能力：（1）采用混合AI-OR模型实现兼顾准确性与可解释性的时间序列预测；（2）通过物流优化提升库存配置与履约效率；（3）利用自然语言处理的客对厂（C2M）系统实现产品开发与消费者需求精准对接。研究进一步总结了AI在供应链领域成功应用的前提条件，包括跨职能团队、适应性管理系统、丰富的数据生态以及多场景运营环境。通过融合AI与OR技术，企业能将智能供应链能力提升至更高水平。
tags: supply chain management, operation research, Triple-A framework, artificial intelligence, demand forecasting, Customer-to-Manufacturer, JD.com

title: Information Technology inSupplyChainManagement
abstract: The exponential growth of Information Technology (IT) with communication technology in Supply Chain Management (SCM) is playing critical role in optimising decisions of the supply chain network flow for achieving organisational competitiveness, improving higher service level, lowering inventory, supply chain costs and reducing electronic risks (e-risks). To achieve integration and effective information sharing across and beyond the organisations, IT in SCM is also required. The organisations are moving towards the virtual supply chain with help of rapid changes in technology and IT applications viz; Electronic Data Exchange (EDI), Radio Frequency Identification (RFID), Bar Code, Electronic Commerce, Decision Support system, Enterprises Resource Planning (ERP) package, etc. It is also easily applicable in curbing the e-risks. Understanding the role and application of IT in managing and curbing e-risks of Supply Chain is the basic theme of this paper.
ch_abstract: 信息技术（IT）与通信技术在供应链管理（SCM）中的指数级增长，对于优化供应链网络流动决策以实现组织竞争力、提升更高服务水平、降低库存、减少供应链成本及规避电子风险（e-risks）具有关键作用。为实现组织内外部的整合与有效信息共享，供应链管理中的信息技术同样不可或缺。借助技术和IT应用的快速变革——如电子数据交换（EDI）、射频识别（RFID）、条形码、电子商务、决策支持系统、企业资源规划（ERP）软件包等，各组织正朝着虚拟供应链方向迈进。该技术也易于应用于遏制电子风险。理解信息技术在管理和遏制供应链电子风险中的作用及应用，是本文的核心主题。
tags: Information Technology, Supply Chain Management

title: Keep Your Friends Close?SupplyChainDesign and DisruptionRisk
abstract: In this article, we evaluate the relationship between supply chain design decisions and supply chain disruption risk. We explore two supply chain design strategies: (i) the dispersion of supply chain partners to reduce supply chain disruption risk versus (ii) the co-location of supply chain partners to reduce supply chain disruption risk. In addition, we assess supply chain disruption risk from three perspectives: the inbound material flow from the supplier (supply side), the internal production processes (internal), and the outbound material flow to the customer (customer side) as a disruption can occur at any of these locations. We measure disruption risk in terms of stoppages in flows, reductions in flow, close calls (disruptions that were prevented at the last minute), disruption duration (time until normal operation flow was restored), and the spread of disruptions all the way through the supply chain.We use seemingly unrelated regression (SUR) to analyze our data, finding that lead times, especially supply side lead times, are significantly associated with higher levels of supply chain disruption risk. We find colocation with suppliers appears to have beneficial effects to the reduction of disruption duration, and, overall supply side factors have a higher impact when it comes to supply chain disruption risk than comparable customer side factors.
ch_abstract: 本文评估了供应链设计决策与供应链中断风险之间的关系。我们探讨了两种供应链设计策略：(i)分散供应链合作伙伴以降低中断风险；(ii)集中布局供应链合作伙伴以降低中断风险。同时，我们从三个维度评估中断风险：供应商的物料流入（供应端）、内部生产流程（内部环节）以及流向客户的物料输出（客户端），因为中断可能发生在任一环节。我们通过流量停滞、流量缩减、临界事故（最后一刻被避免的中断）、中断持续时间（恢复正常运营所需时间）以及中断在整个供应链中的蔓延程度来衡量风险。. . 采用似不相关回归(SUR)分析数据发现：交货周期（尤其是供应端交货周期）与更高水平的供应链中断风险显著相关。研究显示，与供应商集中布局有利于缩短中断持续时间，且总体而言，供应端因素对中断风险的影响程度超过同类客户端因素。
tags: supply chain design, supply chain disruption, survey research, supply chain risk

title: Beyond the Contract: ManagingRiskinSupplyChainRelations
abstract: As a consequence of the development of intensified relations with suppliers, for many firms the supply chain has become a significant source of risk exposure. In this paper we examine firms’ use of control practices to manage risks associated with intensified collaboration with supply chain partners. Specifically, we examine how buyers manage risks associated with interfirm transactions through their choice of supply partner, in terms of perceived goodwill and competence trust, and their use of multiple interrelated supply chain management (SCM) control practices. These control practices include contractual contingency planning, performance target setting, operational reviews, information sharing, supplier support and joint problem solving. We collect survey data from Japanese manufacturing firms about their relations with part suppliers to test hypotheses about the associations between transaction risks, selection of trusted suppliers and use of SCM practices. Our results support that transaction characteristics that are at the basis of transaction risks significantly affect the selection of trusted partners to collaborate with as well as their use of various control practices to manage relationships. We also find that in particular competence trust facilitates the use of control practices to support effective SCM.
ch_abstract: 随着与供应商关系的深化，供应链已成为许多企业风险敞口的重要来源。本文研究了企业如何运用管控措施来管理与供应链合作伙伴深化协作所带来的风险。具体而言，我们探讨了买方如何通过选择供应链伙伴（基于感知的善意信任与能力信任）以及运用多重相互关联的供应链管理控制措施，来管理企业间交易相关的风险。这些控制措施包括合同应急规划、绩效目标设定、运营审查、信息共享、供应商支持及联合问题解决。我们通过收集日本制造企业与其零部件供应商关系的调查数据，检验了关于交易风险、可信供应商选择与供应链管理实践应用之间关联的假设。研究结果表明，构成交易风险基础的交易特征会显著影响可信合作伙伴的选择，以及用于管理关系的各类控制措施的运用。我们还发现，能力信任尤其能促进控制措施的运用，从而支持有效的供应链管理。
tags: supply chain management, risk, management control

title: Green-Field Architecture for SustainableSupplyChainStrategy Formulation
abstract: The focus of this paper is on supply chain strategy formulation. A conceptual theory approach is used for investigating and identifying the relationship between multiple elements, dimensions, forces and factors that influence and affect the supply chain strategy formulation in Greenfield context, specific to the slate mining industry. The research study involved secondary data review and series of 20 qualitative interviews, followed by 2 group discussions, one with mining and transportation experts external to the supply chain and one group discussion with supply chain internal experts. Through critical analysis, a number of problems emerge and the process of addressing these problems, results in a new framework for evaluating the relationship between business and supply chain strategy, specific to Greenfield project and integration design context.
ch_abstract: 本文重点研究供应链战略制定。采用概念性理论方法，探讨并识别在板岩开采行业绿地项目中影响供应链战略制定的多重要素、维度、作用力和因素之间的关系。研究过程包括二手资料分析、20次定性访谈，以及两组专题讨论——一组是与供应链外部的采矿及运输专家进行，另一组与供应链内部专家展开。通过批判性分析，研究揭示了若干问题，并在解决这些问题的过程中，最终构建出一个专门针对绿地项目与集成设计情境下评估业务战略与供应链战略关系的新框架。
tags: supply chain strategy, supply chain formulation, supply chain architecture, supply chain design

title: Architectures for Green-FieldSupplyChainIntegration:SupplyChainIntegration Design
abstract: This paper applied case study research to design architectures for green-field supply chain integration. The integration design is based on a case study of a supply chain integration of 5 companies, operating in different, but supply chain complimenting industry sectors. The case study research is applied to design and validate the architectures in a real world scenario. The supply chain integration architectures enable the conversion of individual into integrated strategies. The architectures are categorised and the process develops into a conceptual system for identifying the correlations between individual participants’ strategic areas of interest and the integrated supply chain areas of interest. The novelty of this paper is a conceptual system for green-field supply chain integration architectures, which can be applied in real world by supply chain practitioners.
ch_abstract: 本文采用案例研究方法来设计绿地供应链集成的架构。该集成设计基于对五家公司的供应链集成案例研究，这些公司运营于不同但供应链互补的行业领域。案例研究用于在实际场景中设计和验证这些架构。供应链集成架构能够将个体战略转化为集成战略。这些架构被分类，并发展为一个概念系统，用于识别个体参与者战略关注领域与集成供应链关注领域之间的关联。本文的创新之处在于提出了一套绿地供应链集成架构的概念系统，供应链从业者可在实际中应用。
tags: Architectures for Green-Field Supply Chains, Supply Chain Integration Design

title: SystematicRiskin GlobalSupplyChainNetworks - a Country-Level ESG Analysis
abstract: Using datasets from both the U.S. and China, we find some empirical results on the systematic risk in the global supply chain network. Specifically, we document that Environmental (E-risk) risk is positively associated with both stock volatility and bond volatility, while Governance (G-risk) and Social (S-risk) risk are only negatively associated with stock volatility in the U.S. In China’s market, we report that both E-risk and G-risk factors are negatively (positively) while the S-risk factor is positively (positively) associated with stock volatility (bond volatility). Regarding the relationship between ESG risk factors and supply chain centrality, we find that G-risk and S-risk factors are positively (negatively) associated with supply chain centrality in the U.S. (China). Lastly, the U.S. and China present opposite directions on the relationship between supply chain centrality and stock volatility/bond volatility, where the U.S. shows a negative relationship and China shows a positive one. Our findings imply different systematic risk management implications regarding the supply chain centrality and the ESG risk for the U.S. and China.
ch_abstract: 基于中美两国的数据集，我们发现了全球供应链网络系统性风险的一些实证结果。具体而言，研究表明环境风险（E-risk）与股票波动率和债券波动率均呈正相关，而治理风险（G-risk）和社会风险（S-risk）仅与美国股市波动率呈负相关。在中国市场，环境风险和治理风险因子与股票波动率呈负相关（与债券波动率呈正相关），而社会风险因子与股票波动率（债券波动率）均呈正相关。关于ESG风险因子与供应链中心度的关系，我们发现治理风险和社会风险因子在美国与供应链中心度呈正相关，在中国则呈负相关。最后，美国和中国的供应链中心度与股票波动率/债券波动率关系呈现相反方向——美国为负相关，中国为正相关。这些发现意味着两国在供应链中心度和ESG风险方面的系统性风险管理需采取差异化策略。
tags: ESG Risk, Global Trade Networks, Systematic Risk, Sovereign Bond, Refinitiv MarketPsych Analytics

title: Continuance Intention in Blockchain-EnabledSupplyChainApplications: Modelling the Moderating Effect ofSupplyChainStakeholders Trust
abstract: If blockchain technologies are emerging as important game changers in the supply chain, this is largely attributed to their high operational and strategic business value. While this high potential is acknowledged by the practitioner’s literature, very few empirical studies have been conducted on the factors explaining the adoption, use and continuance of blockchain-enabled supply chain applications. To fill this knowledge gap, this study extended the expectation-confirmation model (ECM) by integrating the supply chain stake-holders trust to analyze to the continuance intention in blockchain-enabled supply chain applications. The proposed model was tested and supported by the data collected among 344 supply chain professionals in India. The paper ends up with the formulation of important implications for practice and research.
ch_abstract: 如果区块链技术正逐渐成为供应链领域的重要变革者，这主要归功于其高度的运营和战略商业价值。尽管实践文献认可了这一巨大潜力，但关于解释区块链赋能供应链应用采纳、使用和持续因素的经验研究却寥寥无几。为填补这一知识空白，本研究通过整合供应链利益相关者信任来扩展期望确认模型（ECM），以分析区块链赋能供应链应用的持续使用意向。所提出的模型通过对印度344名供应链专业人士收集的数据进行了验证并得到支持。论文最后提出了对实践和研究的重要启示。
tags: Blockchain, Continuance Intention, Supply Chain, India, Supply Chain Trust

title: Designing EUSupplyChainRegulation
abstract: The EU Directive on Corporate Sustainable Due Diligence has sparked fierce debate about the regulation of supply chains. The directive's objectives are aligned with European values. However, it raises concerns that the compliance costs of social and environmental regulations may be privatised in complex supply networks, particularly in third countries with weak enforcement mechanisms. This paper suggests options to make the directive more effective and efficient. It suggests excluding countries with sufficient regulatory systems and focusing only on supplier-buyer relationships instead of the entire network. Public agencies should set harmonised regulatory standards, interpret the regulations and organise a private certification scheme in which certification companies assume liabilities. The proposed system resembles the market for financial auditors.
ch_abstract: 欧盟《企业可持续尽职调查指令》引发了关于供应链监管的激烈争论。该指令的目标与欧洲价值观一致。然而，它引发了人们对社会和环境法规合规成本可能在复杂供应网络中被私有化的担忧，特别是在执法机制薄弱的第三国。本文提出了使该指令更有效率的可选方案，建议排除已具备完善监管体系的国家，并仅关注供应商与采购商之间的关系而非整个网络。公共机构应制定统一的监管标准、解释法规并组织私营认证计划，由认证公司承担相应责任。该提案体系类似于金融审计师市场。
tags: value chain, supply chain, EU, corporate social sustainability, directive, labour standards, environment

title: SupplyChainDisruption Propagation: A SystemicRiskand Normal Accident Theory Perspective
abstract: When a disruption occurs in a firm, its effects are often felt throughout the supply chain. As supply chains expand globally and companies pursue velocity and efficiency, the probability of disruptions propagating throughout a chain grows. In this paper, we employ a qualitative, grounded theory case study approach to help understand what drives supply chain disruption propagation and to provide theoretical insights into this emerging area. For a more complete perspective, we study three interconnected tiers in seven unique supply chains. Each supply chain triad consists of (1) a focal firm (a manufacturer), (2) a supplier to the focal firm and (3) a customer of the focal firm allowing us to gain perspective from three levels in multiple supply chains. Three aggregate dimensions are defined which help explain the propagation of supply chain disruptions: the nature of the disruption, structure and dependence, and managerial decision-making. Within these dimensions, six themes are identified giving an increased level of granularity into disruption propagation: correlation of risk, compounding effects, cyclical linkages, counterparty risk, herding and misaligned incentives. Organisations should consider these themes and their interactions to effectively deal with supply chain disruptions.
ch_abstract: 当企业发生中断时，其影响通常会波及整个供应链。随着供应链的全球扩张和企业对速度与效率的追求，中断在整个链条中传播的可能性也随之增加。本文采用定性、扎根理论的案例研究方法，旨在理解驱动供应链中断传播的因素，并为这一新兴领域提供理论洞见。为了获得更全面的视角，我们研究了七个独特供应链中三个相互关联的层级。每个供应链三元组包括：（1）核心企业（制造商），（2）核心企业的供应商，以及（3）核心企业的客户，这使我们能够从多个供应链的三个层级获取视角。我们定义了三个聚合维度来解释供应链中断的传播：中断的性质、结构与依赖性，以及管理决策。在这些维度中，我们识别出六个主题，从而更细致地理解中断传播：风险相关性、复合效应、循环关联、对手风险、羊群效应和激励错位。组织应考虑这些主题及其相互作用，以有效应对供应链中断。
tags: Supply Chain Risk Management, Disruption Management, Supply Chain Disruption Propagation, Systemic Risk, Case Study

title: Engineering Design Methodology for Green-FieldSupplyChainArchitectures Taxonomic Scheme
abstract: Supply chain engineering requires a design that possesses the flexibility of a complex adaptive system, consisting of interlinking architecture, with external dimensions and system germane internal elements. The aim of this paper is to critically analyse the key supply chain concepts and approaches, to assess the fit between the research literature and the practical issues of supply chain architecture, design and engineering. The objective is to develop a methodology for strategy engineering, which could be used by practitioners when integrating supply chain architecture and design. Taxonomic scheme is applied to consider criteria for strategy architecture, hierarchical strategy integration design, strategy engineering, and integration of supply chain as a conceptual system. The results from this paper derived with the findings that the relationship between supply chain architecture, design and engineering is weak, and challenges remain in the process of adapting and aligning operations. This paper derived with a novel approach for addressing these obstacles, through a conceptual framework diagram and a new methodology, based on the taxonomic scheme. The novelty that derives from this paper is an engineering design methodology for integrating supply chain architecture and design, with criteria that enable decomposing and building a green-field (new and non-existent) supply chain as a system. The taxonomic scheme revealed a number of tools and mechanism, which enabled the development of a new methodology for engineering integrated architecture and design. The review derived with improvements to current and existing theories for analysing interdependencies within and between their individual contexts. This issue is addressed with a hierarchical method for network design, applied for building and combining the integration criteria. The resulting methodology is field tested through a case study with the slate mining industry in North Wales.
ch_abstract: 供应链工程需要一种具备复杂适应系统灵活性的设计，包含相互关联的架构、外部维度及与系统密切相关的内部要素。本文旨在批判性分析关键供应链概念与方法，评估研究文献与供应链架构、设计及工程实践问题之间的契合度。目标是开发一套战略工程方法论，供从业者在整合供应链架构与设计时使用。通过分类法框架，本研究考量了战略架构标准、分层战略集成设计、战略工程以及将供应链作为概念系统进行整合的准则。研究结果表明：供应链架构、设计与工程之间的关联性较弱，在运营适配与协调过程中仍存在挑战。本文基于分类法框架，通过概念框架图和新方法论，提出了一种应对这些障碍的创新方法。本研究的新颖之处在于提出了一种整合供应链架构与设计的工程设计方法论，其标准能够将绿地（全新且未建立的）供应链作为系统进行解构与构建。分类法框架揭示了一系列工具与机制，为开发集成架构与设计的工程新方法奠定了基础。研究通过改进现有理论，提出了分析各领域内部及跨领域相互依存关系的方法。该问题通过应用于网络设计的层级化方法得到解决，该方法用于构建与整合集成标准。最终形成的方法论通过北威尔士板岩采矿业的案例研究进行了实地验证。
tags: Supply Chain Architecture, Supply Chain Design, Green-Field Supply Chain Conceptual Engineering

title: Motorola's Global FinancialSupplyChainStrategy
abstract: Purpose – The purpose of this paper is to define and explore the concept of financial supply chain strategy in a global business environment. The paper aims to illustrate the concepts with a detailed case study of Motorola’s global financial supply chain. Design/methodology/approach – This is a detailed, longitudinal case study analysis of a focal organisation and its economic partners in a financial supply chain. The case study combines qualitative analysis of the strategy evolution with extensive time-series data and quantitative analyses of the performance of the financial supply chain. Findings – The financial supply chain is an integral component of Motorola’s overall supply chain management strategy. Physical product, information systems and financial flows are closely aligned with each other throughout the supply chain incorporating Motorola, its customers, suppliers and banks. The overall trend is towards the development of an integrated global financial supply chain in which cash flows mirror product flows. Motorola shares financial data with its suppliers as part of a cooperative strategy that generates cost savings for Motorola and its suppliers in areas such as foreign exchange and cash balances. The cooperative strategy also improves the quality of the payments process measured by six sigma techniques and produces strategic benefits such as risk reduction for the supply chain as a whole in areas such as foreign exchange and payments. A strategy of this type is only possible by taking a global perspective of the financial supply chain. Research limitations/implications – The development of financial supply chains has not been fully addressed in the supply chain management literature. This paper defines this relatively new topic area and explains its significance in its own right, and also in terms of the inter-relationships between finance and manufacturing supply chains. A research agenda for financial supply chains is proposed that describes a range of new research opportunities in this area. Practical implications – The development of integrated financial supply chains will lead to significant savings in terms of funding, banking and administrative costs associated with treasury and payment activities. The implementation and nature of the strategic change also highlight important strategic planning and implementation issues associated with financial supply chains. Originality/value – The strategic importance of financial supply chains for business and academic researchers is demonstrated through the definition of this topic and the application of a research framework to a detailed study of Motorola’s global financial supply chain using time-series data of strategy evolution and financial supply chain performance. The research findings and comparison with theory support the assertion that this is a relatively new and unexplored problem area that is of direct relevance and interest to researchers in supply chain management.
ch_abstract: 目的——本文旨在定义并探讨全球商业环境中的金融供应链战略概念，通过摩托罗拉全球金融供应链的详细案例研究来阐释相关理论。设计/方法论/途径——本研究采用纵向案例分析法，聚焦核心企业及其金融供应链中的经济合作伙伴，结合战略演变的定性分析与时间序列数据及金融供应链绩效的定量评估。研究发现——金融供应链是摩托罗拉整体供应链管理战略的核心组成部分。实物产品、信息系统与资金流在涵盖摩托罗拉、客户、供应商及银行的整条供应链中保持高度协同，最终趋势是建立产品流与资金流同步的全球化集成金融供应链。摩托罗拉通过共享财务数据与供应商实施合作战略，在外汇管理、现金头寸等领域实现协同降本。该战略还通过六西格玛方法提升支付流程质量，并为整条供应链带来外汇风险管控等战略性收益。此类战略唯有基于金融供应链的全球化视野方能实现。研究局限性/启示——现有供应链管理文献尚未充分探讨金融供应链的发展。本文界定了这一新兴领域，阐释其独立价值及与制造供应链的关联性，并提出包含多维度研究机会的金融供应链学术议程。实践意义——集成化金融供应链的发展将为资金运作、银行业务及财资支付相关的管理成本带来显著节约。战略变革的实施过程亦揭示了金融供应链战略规划与执行的关键议题。原创性/价值——通过理论框架构建与摩托罗拉案例的实证研究（含战略演进时间序列数据及供应链绩效分析），论证了金融供应链对学界与业界的战略重要性。研究发现与理论对比证实，这是供应链管理领域具有直接研究价值且尚未充分探索的新兴课题。
tags: Financial supply chain, global finance strategy, Six sigma financial process, globalised finance operations, Banking, global payments, Foreign exchange

title: The Influence of Antecedents ofSupplyChainIntegration on Company Performance
abstract: This research extends the developing literature on enterprise supply chain integration which is a series of collaborations between internal and external levels of an enterprise that collaborates strategically between suppliers, customers, and the company’s internal management. Enterprise supply chain integration is needed to ensure an enterprise achieves a certain level of service performance, have a discernible information flow, generates profit, and creates an effective and efficient decision in order to provide maximum value-added benefits to customers and suppliers. The results of previous studies are not consistent, namely the relationship between supply chain integration and the company's internal performance. This research focuses on the antecedent of supply chain integration which consists of Internal Company Integration, Customer Integration and Supplier Integration that are linked to a firm's performances. The study collected responses from 262 employees in a travel agency registered in North Jakarta and analyzed statistically using SPSS. The research used three dimensions of Supply Chain Integration (Internal Integration, Supplier Integration and Customer Integration) and interactions with Company Performance. The results of the study showed that Supply Chain Integration affects Company Performance; whereas Internal Integration and Customer Integration have a higher influence on improving Company Performance rather than Supplier Integration. The implications of the study help to increase the literature of the Supply Chain Integration and help corporate management to improve business’ performance.
ch_abstract: 本研究拓展了关于企业供应链整合的发展中文献，供应链整合是企业内部与外部层面的一系列协作，涉及供应商、客户与公司内部管理之间的战略合作。企业需要通过供应链整合来确保达到一定的服务绩效水平，形成清晰的信息流，创造利润并制定高效决策，从而为客户和供应商提供最大化的增值效益。先前研究结果存在不一致之处，特别是关于供应链整合与公司内部绩效之间的关系。本研究聚焦于供应链整合的前因要素——包括内部公司整合、客户整合和供应商整合——及其与企业绩效的关联。研究收集了北雅加达地区注册旅行社262名员工的反馈数据，并运用SPSS进行统计分析。研究采用供应链整合的三个维度（内部整合、供应商整合和客户整合）及其与公司绩效的交互作用进行分析。结果表明：供应链整合对公司绩效具有显著影响；其中内部整合与客户整合对提升公司绩效的作用强于供应商整合。本研究的价值在于丰富了供应链整合理论体系，并为企业管理层提升业务绩效提供了实践指导。
tags: Supply Chain Integration Internal Integration Customer Integration Supplier Integration Firm’s Performance

title: RiskAversion andSupplyChainContract Negotiation
abstract: We employ the Nash bargaining solution to determine the value of an opportunity to negotiate a contract in an archetypal supply chain game.  This unifies the allocation of payoffs and the selection of the type of contract in a bilateral supply chain; a supplier delivers goods to a news vendor retailer who stocks in anticipation of stochastic seasonal demand. Both firms have concave, ordinal utility functions which allows us to model both risk-neutrality and risk-aversion. We characterize the Nash-optimal contracts, and contrast the cases where both firms are risk-neutral and where at least one of the firms is risk-averse. Risk aversion, it turns out, has a significant impact on the contract terms and one firm's risk aversion may be advantageous to the other. This suggests that each firm should strive to find a supply chain partner based on its own and its prospective partner's sensitivities to risk. For example, risk-neutral firms have an incentive to avoid other risk-neutral firms as their supply chain partners.
ch_abstract: 我们采用纳什议价解来确定在一个典型供应链博弈中协商合同机会的价值。这种方法将双边供应链中的收益分配与合同类型选择统一起来；供应商向一个面临随机季节性需求的报童零售商供货。两家企业均具有凹的序数效用函数，这使得我们能够同时建模风险中性和风险规避行为。我们刻画了纳什最优合同的特征，并对比了双方均为风险中性以及至少一方具有风险规避的情形。结果表明，风险规避对合同条款具有显著影响，且一方的风险规避可能对另一方有利。这意味着每家企业都应根据自身及潜在合作伙伴对风险的敏感度来选择供应链伙伴。例如，风险中性企业有动机避免与其他风险中性企业结成供应链伙伴关系。
tags: Supply chain coordination, risk-aversion, supply contracts, bargaining

title: Explaining the Key Elements of Information Systems-BasedSupply-ChainStrategy that are Necessary for Business-to-Business Electronic Marketplace Survival
abstract: Business-to-business electronic marketplaces (EMs) were hyped as the future of efficient supply chains and as essential to the growth of e-commerce, but in spite of this promise, many EMs failed in the first few years after 2000. Although numerous studies have involved EMs, little research has focused on the degree to which an EM’s automated supply-chain strategy contributed to its survival or failure. Accordingly, this study examines 400 EMs through an extensive survey of the strategic supply-chain capabilities in conjunction with McKinsey & Company and CAPS Research. These results are interpreted using existing strategy literature. The following factors were found to be positively related to EM survival: capturing detailed spend data, providing sourcing and process change recommendations, allowing international contracts, offering the ability to track supplier product availability, and having more than 100 employees. In contrast, the following factors led to EM failure: providing warranties, employing low to medium transaction functionality, integrating with a buyer’s accounting system, allowing buyers to “punch through” to supplier Web sites, permitting the online creation of requisition and purchase orders, transacting a daily volume less than $1,000, and having 25–75 employees. These results highlight the need for EMs to create network effects of economies of scale and scope for buyers, focus on core competencies, and create buyer lock-in through high switching costs. Existing EMs should focus their strategy on developing the factors found to lead to EM survival and eliminating the factors leading to failure.
ch_abstract: 企业对企业的电子市场（EMs）曾被吹捧为高效供应链的未来，对电子商务的增长至关重要。然而，尽管前景看好，许多电子市场在2000年后的最初几年便宣告失败。尽管已有大量研究涉及电子市场，但很少有研究关注电子市场的自动化供应链策略对其生存或失败的影响程度。为此，本研究通过与麦肯锡公司和CAPS Research合作，对400家电子市场进行了广泛调查，重点考察其战略供应链能力。研究结果结合现有战略文献进行解读。以下因素被发现与电子市场的生存呈正相关：获取详细的支出数据、提供采购和流程变更建议、支持国际合同、具备跟踪供应商产品可用性的能力，以及员工数量超过100人。相反，以下因素导致电子市场失败：提供担保、采用中低交易功能、与买方的会计系统集成、允许买方“直通”供应商网站、支持在线创建请购单和采购订单、日交易量低于1000美元，以及员工数量在25至75人之间。这些结果突显了电子市场需要为买方创造规模经济和范围经济的网络效应，专注于核心竞争力，并通过高转换成本锁定买方。现有的电子市场应将其战略重点放在发展有助于生存的因素上，并消除导致失败的因素。
tags: electronic markets, business-to-business marketplaces, supply-chain strategy, strategy

title: Why Research in SustainableSupplyChainManagement Should Have No Future
abstract: In the last two decades the topic of sustainability has moved from the fringes of supply chain management research to the mainstream and is now an area of significant research activity.  In this paper we argue that while this increase in acceptance and activity is welcome and has lead to a greater understanding of sustainability, our present knowledge is not sufficient to create truly sustainable supply chains. We build on this insight to identify five main issues that future research needs to address. We argue that when it comes to the theory of sustainable supply chain management, previous research has focused on the synergistic and familiar while overlooking trade-offs and radical innovation. These theoretical issues are compounded by measures that do not truly capture a supply chain’s impacts and methods that are better at looking backwards than forwards. The paper concludes by proposing a series of recommendations that address these issues to help in the development of truly sustainable supply chains.
ch_abstract: 过去二十年里，可持续性议题已从供应链管理研究的边缘走向主流，成为重要研究领域。本文认为，尽管这种认可度和研究活动的提升值得欢迎，并增进了对可持续性的理解，但现有知识仍不足以构建真正可持续的供应链。基于此，我们提出未来研究需解决的五个关键问题：当前可持续供应链管理理论过度关注协同效应和熟悉领域，却忽视了权衡取舍和根本性创新；现有测量方法无法真实反映供应链影响，且评估手段更擅长回顾而非前瞻。论文最后提出系列建议以应对这些问题，助力真正可持续供应链的发展。
tags: sustainability, supply chain management, sustainable supply chain management

title: All You Need is Trust? An Examination of InterorganizationalSupplyChainProjects
abstract: This paper examines the antecedents of supply chain project success. We first propose and test a model that describes the role of relationship-level factors (trust and asymmetric dependence) and project-level factors (between-firm communication and within-firm commitment) in determining supply chain project success. We find that project-level factors completely mediate the effect of trust on project success. We conclude that trust, despite being a stronger predictor compared to asymmetric dependence, is necessary but not sufficient for supply chain project success. We then proceed to further explore the role of these factors by introducing a categorical scheme that differentiates supply chain projects based on the decision rights configuration of each project. This categorization enables us to explore how relationship-level and project-level factors can have different impact on performance based on the characteristics of a supply chain project. The findings offer insights into how to effectively manage supply chain projects and inter-firm alliances.
ch_abstract: 本文研究了供应链项目成功的前因。我们首先提出并检验了一个模型，该模型描述了关系层面因素（信任与不对称依赖）和项目层面因素（企业间沟通与企业内承诺）在决定供应链项目成功中的作用。研究发现，项目层面因素完全中介了信任对项目成功的影响。我们得出结论：尽管信任比不对称依赖具有更强的预测力，但它对供应链项目成功仅是必要而非充分条件。随后，我们通过引入基于项目决策权配置的供应链项目分类方案，进一步探究这些因素的作用。这种分类使我们能够根据供应链项目的特性，探索关系层面和项目层面因素如何对绩效产生差异化影响。研究结果为有效管理供应链项目与企业间联盟提供了实践启示。
tags: trust, supply chain management, performance, alliance

title: Understanding the Downstream HealthcareSupplyChain: Unpacking Regulatory and Industry Characteristics
abstract: Hospital leaders face unprecedented pressure to improve traditional supply chain performance measures such as cost, quality, and customer experience. As such, healthcare executives are increasingly turning to the operations and SCM field to provide thought leadership and establish best practices around coordinating information, material and financial flows in healthcare delivery. Unfortunately, our learnings from traditional manufacturing, and to some extent other service supply chains, do not always easily port to the downstream healthcare delivery supply chain due to regulatory issues and distinctive characteristics present in this network. Grounded in Institutional Theory, this study conceptualizes the downstream healthcare delivery supply chain, highlights important regulatory pressures that influence this supply chain, and examines the effects of government regulation and the unique characteristics of this network on coordination. In doing so, this conceptual study brings to bear important contextual considerations, and motivates novel research areas where the SCM field can make substantial contributions.
ch_abstract: 医院领导在提升传统供应链绩效指标（如成本、质量和患者体验）方面面临着前所未有的压力。因此，医疗行业高管日益依赖运营与供应链管理领域，以提供思想领导力，并围绕协调医疗服务中的信息流、物料流和资金流建立最佳实践。遗憾的是，由于监管问题及该网络特有的属性，我们从传统制造业乃至部分其他服务型供应链中获得的经验，往往难以直接移植至下游医疗服务供应链。本研究以制度理论为基础，对下游医疗服务供应链进行概念化界定，强调影响该供应链的重要监管压力，并探讨政府监管及该网络独特属性对协调机制的影响。通过这一理论探索，本研究提出了关键的情境考量因素，并推动了供应链管理领域可作出重大贡献的新研究方向。
tags: healthcare, regulation, public policy, supply chain management, operations

title: Overview onSupplyChainResilience
abstract: In the last few years, supply chains are integrating a more and more tightly connected global economy where traditional management practices are challenged by external disturbances and turbulent changes. Indeed, along any supply chain, a multitude of more or less critical incidents may prevent a company from obtaining the expected level of logistical performance. According to Supply Chain Risk Management specialists, one way to deal with supply chain risk is to confer to the supply chain the ability to be resilient.
ch_abstract: 过去几年，供应链正融入一个联系日益紧密的全球经济体，传统管理实践不断受到外部干扰与剧烈变革的挑战。事实上，在供应链的任何环节都可能出现或大或小的突发事件，导致企业无法实现预期的物流绩效水平。供应链风险管理专家指出，应对供应链风险的一种方法是赋予供应链弹性能力。
tags: Supply chain, Resilience, Risk, Supply chain perofrmance

title: Realities ofSupplyChainCollaboration
abstract: Successful supply chain collaboration (SCC) practices are rather exceptional, yet collaboration is believed to be the single most pressing need in supply chain management. In this paper we discuss the realities of SCC, present prerequisites for the collaboration process, indicate where the process starts and where it may terminate. During the discussion we make use of the concepts of Theory of Constraints (TOC) and approach SCC as an ongoing effort dealing with the supply chain constraints. The roles of the entities in this ongoing effort are not always clear. Often SCC is proclaimed to be a joint decision-making process. However, keeping in mind the powerhouses in the chain, we believe that other structures are possible as well. We emphasize the need for: 1) having an adequate supply chain strategy and well-articulated goals, which form the basis for: 2) leading supply chain change, and: 3) governing the continual process of strategy alignment and supply chain change, which is itself a dynamic process. These three tasks are featured by many interactions and characterize the continuous improvement of a SCC process. A step-by-step approach like this enables the involved chain entities to climb the ladder of collaboration and take the supply chain performance to a higher level.
ch_abstract: 成功的供应链协作（SCC）实践相当罕见，但协作被认为在供应链管理中是最紧迫的需求。本文讨论了SCC的现实情况，提出了协作过程的先决条件，指出了该过程的起点和可能的终点。在讨论中，我们运用了约束理论（TOC）的概念，并将SCC视为一个持续应对供应链约束的过程。在这一持续努力中，各实体的角色并不总是清晰的。通常SCC被宣称是一个联合决策过程。然而，考虑到链中的强势方，我们认为其他结构也是可能的。我们强调需要：1）制定适当的供应链战略和明确的目标，这些构成了以下基础：2）引领供应链变革，以及：3）管理战略调整和供应链变革的持续过程，这本身就是一个动态过程。这三项任务涉及许多互动，并体现了SCC过程的持续改进。这样的逐步方法使涉及的链实体能够逐步提升协作水平，并将供应链绩效推向更高层次。
tags: supply chain collaboration, theory of constraints, dynamic alignment, business roles, change strategies

title: Curtailing Bank Loan and Loan Insurance UnderRiskRegulations inSupplyChainFinance
abstract: Due to many firms' lack of collateral, banks have imposed loan limits as a form of risk-control regulations of bank financing. In response, loan insurance has emerged as a useful instrument to lift loan limits. To study the joint value of bank loans and loan insurance, this article investigates a supply chain composed of one supplier and one capital-constrained buyer who takes out a bank loan and potentially purchases loan insurance. The analysis reveals that both the supplier and the buyer can benefit from the bank financing with loan insurance in an insurance-cooperation region, wherein the supplier is willing to reduce the wholesale price to entice the buyer to purchase insurance. Further still, in the insurance-cooperation region, worse contract terms of the bank loan benefit the supplier, whereas worse policy terms of loan insurance help the buyer. Such benefits can lead to a higher order quantity than the capital-abundant one and partially coordinate the entire supply chain. However, when production cost is low, the supplier and the buyer can encounter a Stackelberg prisoner's dilemma, in which both firms no longer cooperate with each other and both are worse off. Nevertheless, a government subsidy for the insurance premium can not only reduce the Stackelberg prisoner's dilemma but also improve the social welfare, although it is not always optimal for the government to provide that subsidy. The main qualitative results are robust in a variety of extensions.
ch_abstract: 由于许多企业缺乏抵押物，银行实施了贷款限额作为银行融资的风险控制手段。为此，贷款保险应运而生，成为突破贷款限额的有效工具。为研究银行贷款与贷款保险的协同价值，本文构建了一个由单一供应商与单一资金受限买方组成的供应链模型——买方通过银行贷款融资，并可能购买贷款保险。研究表明：在保险合作区域内，供应商与买方均可通过"银行贷款+保险"模式实现双赢，此时供应商愿意降低批发价以激励买方投保；更值得注意的是，在该区域内，银行贷款条件恶化反而有利于供应商，而保险条款恶化则对买方更有利。这种机制可使订单量超过资金充足时的水平，并实现供应链的部分协调。但当生产成本较低时，双方可能陷入"斯塔克尔伯格囚徒困境"，导致合作破裂与双输局面。政府提供保费补贴不仅能缓解这种困境、提升社会福利，但研究也表明此类补贴并非总是政府最优选择。主要研究结论在多种扩展模型中均保持稳健。
tags: supply chain finance; risk regulation; bank loan; loan insurance; Stackelberg prisoner's dilemma

title: SystematicRiskinSupplyChainNetworks
abstract: Industrial production output is generally correlated with the state of the economy. Nonetheless, during the times of economic downturn some industries take the biggest hit, while at the times of economic boom they reap most benefits. To provide insight into this phenomenon we map supply networks of industries and firms and investigate how the supply network structure mediates the effect of economy on industry or firm sales. Previous research has shown that retail sales are correlated with the state of the economy. Since retailers source their products from other industries, the sales of their suppliers can also be correlated with the state of the economy. This correlation represents the source of systematic risk for an industry that propagates through a supply chain network. Specifically, we identify the following mechanisms that can affect the correlation between sales and the state of the economy in a supply chain network: propagation of systematic risk into production decisions, aggregation of orders from multiple customers in a supply chain network, and aggregation of orders over time. We find that the first effect does not amplify the correlation, however, the latter two intensify correlation and result in the amplification of correlation upstream in supply networks. We demonstrate three managerial implications of this phenomenon: implications for the cost of capital, for the risk-adjusted valuation of supply chain improvement projects, and for supplier selection and risk.
ch_abstract: 工业生产产出通常与经济状况相关。然而，在经济下行时期，某些行业遭受的冲击最大，而在经济繁荣时期，它们获得的收益也最多。为了深入理解这一现象，我们绘制了行业和企业的供应网络图，并研究供应网络结构如何调节经济对行业或企业销售的影响。先前的研究表明，零售销售与经济状况相关。由于零售商从其他行业采购产品，其供应商的销售也可能与经济状况相关。这种相关性代表了通过供应链网络传播的系统性风险来源。具体而言，我们确定了以下可能影响供应链网络中销售与经济状况相关性的机制：系统性风险向生产决策的传导、供应链网络中来自多个客户订单的聚合，以及订单随时间推移的累积。我们发现第一个效应不会放大相关性，而后两者会强化相关性，并导致供应网络上游的相关性放大。我们展示了这一现象的三个管理启示：对资本成本的影响、对供应链改进项目风险调整估值的影响，以及对供应商选择与风险的影响。
tags: Supply chain network, Risk management, Empirical study

title: SupplyChainStrategy Selection: A Multi-Criteria Decision-Making Approach
abstract: Supply chain performance improvement initiatives strive to match supply and demand, thereby driving down costs simultaneously with improving customer satisfaction. However such initiatives require uncertainty within the supply chain to be reduced as much as feasible so as to facilitate a more predictable upstream demand. At times it is not possible to remove uncertainty from the supply chain due to the nature of product involved. Hence, specific supply chains are faced with the situation where they have to accept uncertainty but need to develop a strategy that enables them still to match supply and demand. Hence, this research works in this direction and identifies various supply chain strategies to match demand and supply efficiently and effectively. Research further explores lean, agile and leagile supply chain strategies, develops a conceptual framework for selection of a specific supply chain strategy and identifies determinants in selection of most suitable supply chain strategy.
ch_abstract: 供应链绩效改进措施致力于匹配供需，从而在提升客户满意度的同时降低成本。然而此类措施要求尽可能减少供应链中的不确定性，以促进更可预测的上游需求。由于涉及产品的特性，有时无法完全消除供应链中的不确定性。因此，特定供应链面临不得不接受不确定性，但仍需制定策略以实现供需匹配的局面。为此，本研究针对该方向展开工作，识别出多种高效匹配供需的供应链策略。研究进一步探讨精益、敏捷及精敏供应链策略，构建了特定供应链策略选择的概念框架，并确定了选择最适宜供应链策略的决定因素。
tags: Supply Chain Strategy, Lean, Agile, Leagile, Demand, Supply

title: Improving Hotel Performance Through ActiveSupplyChainRiskManagement: A Preliminary Model
abstract: Purpose -- The purpose of this paper is to identify internal and external risk factors and establish the role of supply chain risk management in supporting hotel performance. Design/methodology/approach -- Articles related to supply chain risk management and service supply chain performance are identified and analysed. This paper outlines theories and concepts which are used to develop a supply chain risk management. Future research may test this model with a survey and structural equation modelling to validate the relationships between the constructs. Findings -- Internal and external risk must be properly managed by the hotel industry and supply chain risk management can sustain hotel performance. Most of the research in supply chain risk management is focused on manufacturing sector and there has been little investigation in the service sector. Practical implications -- This study can be used by academicians and professionals who wish to address management of internal and external risks in service supply chains to sustain organizational performance. Investigating the role of supply chain risk management in service sector will enable managers to prevent risks to their business, and thereby soften shocks for the engulfing economy. Originality/value -- This paper recognizes that supply chain risk management requires further study in different sectors to enrich our understanding of key constructs. Additionally, this paper identifies that there are few studies that analyse the relationship between supply chain risk management and different dimensions of performance, including service supply chain operations, customer service, and corporate performance.
ch_abstract: 目的——本文旨在识别内外部风险因素，并确立供应链风险管理对酒店业绩的支持作用。  . 设计/方法论/途径——对供应链风险管理与服务供应链绩效相关的文献进行识别与分析。本文概述了用于构建供应链风险管理体系的理论与概念，未来研究可通过问卷调查与结构方程模型验证各构念间的关系。  . 研究结果——酒店业必须妥善管理内外部风险，而供应链风险管理能支撑酒店业绩表现。现有研究多集中于制造业领域，针对服务业的研究较为匮乏。  . 实践意义——本研究可为学术界与业界人士提供参考，帮助其通过管理服务供应链的内外部风险来维持组织绩效。探究供应链风险管理在服务业的作用，有助于管理者预防业务风险，从而缓冲对整体经济的冲击。  . 原创性/价值——本文指出需在不同行业深化供应链风险管理研究以拓展关键构念的认知，同时发现现有研究很少分析供应链风险管理与服务供应链运营、客户服务和企业绩效等多维度表现的关系。
tags: Internal Risk, External Risk, Supply Chain Risk Management, Service Supply Chain Operations, Customer Service, Corporate Performance

title: SupplyChainContracts that Prevent Information Leakage
abstract: This paper determines categories of contracts that facilitate vertical information sharing in a supply chain while precluding horizontal information leakage among competing newsvendors. We consider a supply chain in which retailers replenish inventory from a common supplier to satisfy uncertain demand and are engaged in newsvendor competition. Each retailer has imperfect demand information. Yet, one of the retailers (the incumbent) has a more accurate demand forecast than the other (the entrant). Information leakage among such competing retailers precludes vertical information sharing and is often the reason for many retailers to abandon collaborative forecast-sharing initiatives, leading to sub-optimized supply chains. We show that whether a contract can prevent information leakage depends on how the inventory risk (i.e., cost of supply-demand mismatch) is distributed among the supplier and retailers in conjunction with the allocation of financial flows (i.e., sharing of profits). We categorize contracts based on how they allocate inventory risk among rms when compared with a wholesale price contract. This comparison yields four mutually exclusive and collectively exhaustive categories of contracts. A downside-protection contract is one that effectively reduces retailers' cost of excess inventory by shifting some of their overage cost to the supplier. Examples of such contracts include buy-back and revenue-sharing contracts. An upside-protection contract is one that effectively increases retailers' cost of inventory shortage by shifting some of the supplier's underage cost to retailers. Examples of such contracts include penalty and rebate contracts. A two-sided protection contract combines the properties of the previous two categories. A no-protection contract is one that fails to shift firms' cost of inventory shortage or excess from one to the other. Examples of such contracts include wholesale-price and two-part tariff contracts. We show that no-protection contracts, which are extensively used in practice, cannot prevent information leakage whereas others may do so. We also show that preventing information leakage could be costly for the supply chain (i.e., low channel efficiency). We conclude by illustrating how our unied framework to study variety of contracts can enable a rm to determine the best performing contract (among many) that precludes information leakage while almost coordinating the channel. For example, we show why buyback contracts perform significantly better than revenue sharing or rebate contracts.
ch_abstract: 本文确定了在供应链中促进纵向信息共享、同时防止竞争性报童模型零售商之间横向信息泄露的合同类别。我们研究的供应链中，零售商从共同供应商处补货以满足不确定需求，并处于报童竞争状态。每家零售商都拥有不完善的需求信息，但其中一家（在位者）比另一家（进入者）拥有更准确的需求预测。此类竞争零售商间的信息泄露会阻碍纵向信息共享，并常导致许多零售商放弃协作预测共享计划，从而造成供应链次优状态。研究表明，合同能否防止信息泄露取决于库存风险（即供需失衡成本）如何在供应商与零售商之间分配，以及资金流（即利润分配）的安排。我们根据合同相较于批发价合同对库存风险的分配方式，将合同划分为四个互斥且完备的类别：下行保护合同通过将部分过剩成本转移给供应商，有效降低零售商库存积压成本（如回购合同和收益共享合同）；上行保护合同通过将供应商的部分缺货成本转移给零售商，有效增加零售商库存短缺成本（如罚金合同和返利合同）；双向保护合同兼具前两类特性；无保护合同则无法实现企业间库存短缺或过剩成本的转移（如批发价合同和两部定价合同）。研究表明，实践中广泛采用的无保护合同无法防止信息泄露，而其他类别可能实现该功能，但防止信息泄露可能降低供应链渠道效率。最后，我们通过统一分析框架说明企业如何从多种合同中选择最优方案——既能阻止信息泄露又能近乎协调渠道。例如，研究揭示了为何回购合同的表现显著优于收益共享或返利合同。
tags: supply chain management; information leakage; newsvendor competition; contract categorization; buy-back; revenue-sharing; rebates; two-part tariff; wholesale price

title: SupplyChainManagement: It's About the Journey, Not the Destination
abstract: With over three decades of the use of the term “supply chain management,” five  academic and practitioner perspectives of supply chain management are described. Much ink has been devoted to defining and developing the concept and analyzing its use or non‐use. The focus of this article is on academic effort, with suggestions of how to proceed in the future.
ch_abstract: “供应链管理”这一术语已使用三十余载，本文阐述了学术与实践领域对其的五种观点。大量文献致力于界定与发展这一概念，并分析其应用与否。本文聚焦于学术研究，并对未来发展方向提出建议。
tags: supply chain management; systematic literature review

title: Toward the Theory of theSupplyChain
abstract: As our discipline has matured, we have begun to develop theories of supply chain management.  However, we submit that a major omission of theory development in the supply chain management discipline is that we have failed to develop a theory of what we are managing – a theory of the supply chain.  Using a conceptual theory building approach we introduce foundational premises about the structure and boundary of the supply chain, which can serve as the basis for much needed, additional development of the theory of the supply chain.
ch_abstract: 随着本学科的成熟，我们已开始发展供应链管理的理论。然而，我们认为供应链管理学科理论构建中存在一个重大疏漏——未能就管理对象本身发展出理论，即供应链理论。通过概念化理论构建方法，我们提出了关于供应链结构与边界的基础性前提，这些前提可作为亟需的供应链理论进一步发展的基础。
tags: theory of the supply chain, conceptual theory building, networks, complex adaptive systems, boundaries

title: SupplyChainRiskandRiskMitigation: Which Strategies Tackle Identified Risks Most Efficiently?
abstract: Firms face risks in their upstream and downstream supply chains. Although some operational strategies can fully or partially insulate a firm from the adverse effects of possible supply chain disruptions, implementing these strategies is costly. At the same time, firms face intense pressure on margins, forcing them to keep operating costs low. These conflicting goals require further investigation on whether and to what extent different operational strategies can mitigate several types of risk. This paper delineates and tests how operational strategies mitigate the exposure to supply chain risks with minimum negative influence on performance. To measure a firm’s exposure to supply chain risk, we analyzed corporate qualitative risk disclosures in annual reports (form 10-K) using an adapted latent Dirichlet allocation approach from computational linguistics. The results suggest that operational strategies mitigate the negative association between supply-related risk and performance, but not the negative association between demand-related risk and performance.
ch_abstract: 企业在上下游供应链中面临风险。尽管某些运营策略能够完全或部分隔离企业免受潜在供应链中断的负面影响，但实施这些策略成本高昂。与此同时，企业面临巨大的利润压力，迫使它们保持较低的运营成本。这些相互冲突的目标需要进一步研究不同运营策略是否以及能在多大程度上缓解多种类型的风险。本文阐述并测试了运营策略如何以对绩效最小负面影响的方式降低供应链风险暴露。为衡量企业对供应链风险的暴露程度，我们采用计算语言学中的改进潜在狄利克雷分配方法，分析了企业年报（10-K表格）中的定性风险披露内容。研究结果表明，运营策略能缓解供应相关风险与绩效之间的负相关关系，但对需求相关风险与绩效之间的负相关关系无显著改善作用。
tags: supply chain risk, 10-K reports, supply chain risk mitigation, operational slack

title: Air Cargo andSupplyChainManagement
abstract: Air cargo is a byproduct of combination carriers and has been the forgotten child in the aviation supply chain until COVID-19 and the subsequent boom in e-commerce. Record high yields and profit margins have not just resulted in air cargo being taken more seriously but have also created an opportunity for the sector to set itself up for the future, including new business models as well as horizontal and vertical supply chain integration. Questions around fleet renewal or reinvestment of the unprecedented cash flows into digitization and transformation of air cargo firms are shaping a future of fascinating career opportunities albeit one where interpersonal skills, data literacy and agility will matter even more than today. Sustainability concerns, physical and online disruptions to global supply chains and the drone revolution all add to the changing environment where only one thing is certain, an increase of uncertainty.
ch_abstract: 航空货运是综合航空公司的副产品，在新冠疫情及随之而来的电子商务繁荣之前，它一直是航空供应链中被遗忘的角落。创纪录的高收益率和利润率不仅使航空货运受到更多重视，还为该行业提供了面向未来布局的机会，包括探索新商业模式以及横向与纵向供应链整合。关于机队更新或将空前现金流再投资于航空货运企业数字化与转型的讨论，正在塑造一个充满迷人职业机遇的未来——尽管在这个未来中，人际交往能力、数据素养和敏捷性将比今天更为重要。可持续性担忧、全球供应链面临的实体与线上中断，以及无人机革命，都在加剧这个变化的环境，唯一可以确定的是：不确定性正在增加。
tags: Air Cargo, Global Freight, Logistics and Supply Chain Management

title: Text-Based Measure ofSupplyChainRiskExposure
abstract: Using textual analysis techniques including seeded word embedding and bag-of-words-based content analysis, I develop a firm-level measure of supply chain risk exposure from a novel source of unstructured data---the discussion between managers and equity analysts on supply chain--related topics during firms' quarterly earnings conference calls. I validate the measure by showing that (1) the measure exhibits intuitive variations over time and across firms, successfully capturing both routine and systematic supply chain risk events; and (2) the measure is about risk exposure, as it significantly correlates with realized and options-implied stock return volatility, even after controlling for well-known aggregate risk measures. I then demonstrate that the measure is specifically indicative of the supply chain component of risk exposure. (3) Consistent with theoretical predictions, firms facing higher supply chain risks have higher inventory buffers, particularly in raw materials and intermediate inputs, increased cash holdings in lieu of investments, and significantly lower trade credit received from suppliers. Moreover, (4) during unexpected risk episodes such as the Tohoku earthquake, firms with higher ex-ante risk exposure have worse operating and financial performance. These results indicate that the text-based measure provides a credible quantification of firm-level exposure to supply chain risks, and can thus be reliably utilized as outcome or explanatory variables in empirical supply chain research.
ch_abstract: 通过运用包括种子词嵌入和基于词袋模型的内容分析在内的文本分析技术，我从一个新颖的非结构化数据源——企业季度收益电话会议中管理层与股票分析师关于供应链主题的讨论——构建了企业层面供应链风险暴露的测度指标。我通过以下发现验证了该指标的有效性：（1）该指标随时间推移和不同企业间呈现符合直觉的变化，能成功捕捉常规性和系统性供应链风险事件；（2）该指标确实反映风险暴露程度，即使在控制已知的总体风险指标后，仍与已实现股票收益波动率和期权隐含波动率显著相关。随后我证明该指标能特异性识别风险暴露中的供应链成分。（3）与理论预测一致，面临较高供应链风险的企业会持有更多库存缓冲（尤其是原材料和中间品）、增加现金持有而非投资、并显著减少从供应商获得的贸易信贷。此外，（4）在东北大地震等突发风险事件中，事前风险暴露较高的企业经营和财务表现更差。这些结果表明基于文本的测度方法能可靠量化企业层面供应链风险暴露，可有效应用于实证供应链研究作为结果变量或解释变量。
tags: textual analysis, supply chain risk, empirical operations management

title: SupplyChainSystems Architecture and Engineering Design: Green-FieldSupplyChainIntegration
abstract: This paper developed a new theory for supply chain architecture, and engineering design that enables integration of the business and supply chain strategies. The architecture starts with individual supply chain participants and derives insights into the complex and abstract concept of green-field integration design. The paper presented a conceptual system for depicting the interactions between business and supply chain strategy engineering. The system examines the decisions made when engineering the business strategy, with regards to the supply chain design. The system derived with a new understanding of how strategies are integrated, and what are the implications for engineering successful strategies. The study revealed that supply chain design is not considered in great detail before architecting the business strategies. Thus, companies consequentially experience supply chain problems that are likely to be detrimental to the growth potentials. The paper also derived with the findings that proactive and pre-emptive involvement of supply chain participants in the strategy engineering process, would lead to a more robust strategic design.
ch_abstract: 本文提出了一种新的供应链架构与工程设计理论，旨在实现企业战略与供应链战略的整合。该架构从单个供应链参与者出发，对绿地整合设计这一复杂抽象概念进行了深入解析。研究构建了一个概念性系统，用以描述企业战略与供应链战略工程之间的交互关系。该系统分析了制定企业战略时涉及供应链设计的决策过程，并由此获得关于战略整合方式及其对成功战略工程设计影响的新认知。研究发现，企业在构建商业战略前往往未充分考虑供应链设计的细节，这导致其后续可能遭遇制约发展潜力的供应链问题。研究还表明，若供应链参与者能主动预先参与战略工程设计过程，将有助于形成更具鲁棒性的战略设计方案。
tags: Green-Field Strategic Engineering, Supply Chain Architecture

title: ManagingSupplyChainRisk- Role of It/Is
abstract: Increased off-shoring and outsourcing of manufacturing and product development activities, contract manufacturing, global sourcing, lean operations with reduced inventories, centralised distribution and warehousing, reduction of supplier base and tightly integrated supply chains, though have made the supply chains more efficient and responsive, they have also made them more vulnerable and fragile ever to disruptions. In addition to this increased sensitivity of supply chains, a significant increase in the frequency and number of events leading to major disruptions, and their magnitude are forcing organizations to take supply chain risk more seriously. This paper discusses the concept of supply chain risk, supply chain risk management, its dimensions and the role of information technologies in general and enterprise systems in particular. It will discuss the challenges faced by business organizations in leveraging the existing and future information technologies and systems and their double-edged role. While industry reference models have the potential to internalise the supply chain risk management processes, their ability in identification and mitigation of the supply chain risk is limited and depends upon other IT-dependent factors such as information visibility, trust, security of intellectual property information, ability to collect snapshots of demand, inventory and capacity at key nodes in the supply chain, and the sense and respond capability of the organization to deal with material flow disruptions.
ch_abstract: 制造业和产品开发活动的离岸外包增加、合同制造、全球采购、减少库存的精益运营、集中化分销与仓储、供应商基础缩减以及供应链紧密整合，虽然使供应链效率更高、响应更快，但也使其比以往更容易受到干扰而变得脆弱。除了供应链敏感度上升外，导致重大中断的事件频率和数量显著增加，其影响程度也迫使企业更严肃地对待供应链风险。本文探讨了供应链风险的概念、供应链风险管理及其维度，以及信息技术尤其是企业系统在其中扮演的角色。文章将讨论企业在利用现有及未来信息技术和系统时面临的挑战，以及这些技术的双刃剑作用。虽然行业参考模型有望将供应链风险管理流程内化，但其识别和缓解供应链风险的能力有限，并依赖于其他与信息技术相关的因素，如信息可见性、信任、知识产权信息安全、在供应链关键节点收集需求/库存/产能快照的能力，以及组织应对物料流中断的感知与响应能力。
