tags: Supply chain risk, Information technologies, Enterprise systems, SCOR

title: Firm-LevelSupplyChainRiskExposure and Stock Price CrashRisk: Evidence from Textual Analysis
abstract: This study examines the nexus between firm-specific exposure to supply chain risk and stock price crash risk across publicly listed U.S. firms from 2008 to 2022. Leveraging a novel metric to gauge firm-level exposure to supply chain risk, the research offers initial evidence on a positive association between supply chain risk and stock price crash likelihood. The analysis extends to uncover behavioural mechanisms that exacerbate this relationship, focusing on managerial tendencies of bad news hoarding and overconfidence. Furthermore, this nexus is moderated by industry characteristics, financial constraints, and corporate internal governance. The impact of global trade disruptions is analysed, highlighting their role in exacerbating stock price crashes. Through rigorous empirical methods and robustness checks, the research confirms the reliability of its findings, providing valuable contributions to the literature on risk management and offering practical insights for policymakers and practitioners.
ch_abstract: 本研究探讨了2008至2022年间美国上市公司面临的供应链风险与企业特定股价崩盘风险之间的关联。通过采用创新指标衡量企业层面的供应链风险暴露程度，研究首次证实供应链风险与股价崩盘概率存在正向关系。分析进一步揭示了加剧这种关联的行为机制，重点关注管理层囤积负面消息和过度自信的倾向。此外，行业特征、财务约束及公司内部治理等因素会调节这种关联。研究还解析了全球贸易中断的影响，强调其加剧股价崩盘的作用。通过严谨的实证方法和稳健性检验，研究结论的可靠性得到验证，为风险管理领域的学术研究作出重要贡献，并为政策制定者和从业者提供了实践启示。
tags: supply chain risk, supply chain disruptions, crash risk, bad news hoarding

title: ManagingSupplyChainRisk: Reputational – Ethical – Environmental - Legal
abstract: In this short report we explore some key aspects of supply chain risk. Drawing on interviews with seven major UK-based companies in the construction, property, utilities and rail sectors, we review companies’ approaches to ‘REEL’ supply chain risks: reputational, ethical, environmental and legal. These risks arise where the actions of a supplier may damage its customer – even if the customer is separated from the supplier by several links in the chain. Examples of this kind of risk include the reputational damage inflicted on a firm when one of its suppliers is found to be illegally or unduly damaging the environment, or hiring illegal labour, or engaging in some other breach of acceptable business practice. Fairly or unfairly, large companies may be held to account as if they were the culpable party, and are seen as sharing at least some of the responsibility for the supplier’s behaviour. What firms should actually do in the face of these challenges remains unclear. By exploring these issues we suggest a series of insights that may help organizations navigate this complex terrain.
ch_abstract: 在这份简短报告中，我们探讨了供应链风险的一些关键方面。基于对英国建筑、房地产、公用事业和铁路领域七家主要企业的访谈，我们审视了企业对"REEL"供应链风险（声誉、道德、环境及法律风险）的应对策略。这类风险产生于供应商行为可能损害其客户的情况——即使客户与供应商之间隔着多个供应链环节。此类风险的典型案例包括：当企业供应商被发现非法或过度破坏环境、雇用非法劳工或存在其他违反商业道德行为时，该企业遭受的声誉损害。无论公平与否，大型企业可能像责任方一样被追责，并被视作至少需部分承担供应商行为的责任。面对这些挑战，企业究竟该如何应对仍不明确。通过探讨这些问题，我们提出了一系列见解，或可帮助组织应对这一复杂局面。
tags: Supply chain risk, managing supply chain risk, supplier management, corporate responsibility

title: Managing Information Processing Needs in GlobalSupplyChains: A Prerequisite to SustainableSupplyChainManagement
abstract: Sustainability is an important topic in supply chain management research and practice. For buying firms, one of the most pressing challenges associated with sustainable supply chain management is that they frequently do not possess sufficient information on what is occurring in their complex supply chains, as demonstrated by numerous incidents lacking sustainability. Using eight in-depth case studies across four industries and elaborating on information processing theory, we identify three forms of sustainability-related uncertainty that each firm is facing in its supply chain. We refer to them as task uncertainty, source uncertainty, and supply chain uncertainty. The study shows that the extent to which these uncertainties translate into information processing needs depends on a newly identified boundary condition labelled uncertainty intolerance. With respect to the management of such information processing needs, prior research has pointed primarily at matching information processing needs with fitting information processing capacity and secondly at mitigating information processing needs with corrective measures. This study illuminates how some innovative firms occasionally employ a more radical sustainability-driven supply chain modification mechanism. In doing so, this research exemplifies how sustainable supply chain management may eventually turn from an amendment to a firm’s daily business to a decisive factor for shaping future supply chains. In addition, the study constitutes a nascent step to elevate information processing theory to the supply chain level.
ch_abstract: 可持续性是供应链管理研究和实践中的一个重要议题。对于采购企业而言，可持续供应链管理面临的最紧迫挑战之一，是它们往往无法充分掌握复杂供应链中的实际情况，这一点已通过众多缺乏可持续性的事件得到印证。我们通过对四个行业的八个深度案例研究，并基于信息处理理论，识别出每个企业在供应链中面临的三种可持续性相关不确定性：任务不确定性、来源不确定性和供应链不确定性。研究表明，这些不确定性转化为信息处理需求的程度，取决于一个新发现的边界条件——不确定性容忍度。关于此类信息需求的管理，先前研究主要提出两点：一是通过匹配信息处理能力来满足需求，二是采取纠正措施降低信息需求。本研究揭示了一些创新企业如何运用更激进的可持续性驱动型供应链改造机制。由此，这项研究展现了可持续供应链管理可能从企业日常业务的补充要素，最终转变为塑造未来供应链的决定性因素。此外，本研究为将信息处理理论提升至供应链层面迈出了探索性的一步。
tags: sustainable supply chain management, information processing theory, uncertainty, true sustainability, radical innovation

title: Perspectives inSupplyChainRiskManagement: A Review
abstract: To gain cost advantage and market share, many firms implemented various initiatives such as outsourced manufacturing and product variety. These  initiatives are effective in a stable environment, but they could make a supply chain more vulnerable to various types of disruptions caused by uncertain economic cycles, consumer demands, and natural and man-made disasters. In this paper, we review various quantitative models for  managing supply chain risks. We also relate various supply chain risk management strategies examined in the research literature with actual practices. The intent of this paper is three-fold. First, we develop a unified framework for classifying supply chain risk management articles. Second, we hope this review can serve as a practical guide for some researchers to navigate through the sea of research articles in this important area. Third, by highlighting the gap between theory and practice, we hope to motivate researchers to develop new models for mitigating supply chain disruptions.
ch_abstract: 为了获取成本优势和市场份额，许多企业实施了外包生产和产品多样化等多种举措。这些措施在稳定环境下行之有效，却可能使供应链更易受到经济周期波动、消费者需求变化以及自然和人为灾害等不确定因素造成的各类中断影响。本文系统梳理了供应链风险管理的各类定量模型，并将学术文献中探讨的风险管理策略与实际案例进行关联。本文目标有三：首先建立供应链风险管理研究的统一分类框架；其次为研究者提供这一重要领域的文献导航指南；最后通过揭示理论与实践之间的差距，激励学者开发缓解供应链中断的新模型。
tags: Supply Chain Risk Management, Quantitative Models, Review

title: RiskImpact on Agri-FoodSupplyChainPerformance in Malaysia
abstract: Purpose – The purpose of this paper is to examine the key risk components (probability and consequence) and their respective thresholds affecting agri-food supply chain operations in Malaysia. In addition, it seeks to understand the relationship between the major risk sources and to fathom the risk/disruption impact on agri-food supply chain performance in Malaysia. Design/methodology/approach – Cross-sectional survey data were collected using a structured questionnaire. The risks threshold associated with agri-food supply chain were categorized using the risk matrix scale and classification described in the Project Management Body of Knowledge (Project Management Institute, 2013). Next, the Pearson correlation was used to understand the relationship between the various risks and agri-food chain performance. Lastly, to investigate how firms’ supply chain operations have been affected by risks/disruptions, an ordinary least square regression model was employed to quantify the impact of some major risk sources on agri-food chain performance in Malaysia. Findings – The results in this paper show variations in risks’ probability, impact and threshold in agri-food supply chain. While risk sources such as periodic change in interest/exchange rate policies and volatility in customer demand are high-rated risks, uncertain land policies/tenure and poor quality control are low rated risks in the operations of the chain. The performance of the agri-food chain significantly but negatively correlates with all the major risks studied. Whereas demand, supply, weather, logistics/infrastructure and financial risk sources significantly undermined the chain’s performance, risks emerging from biological/ environmental, management/operational, policy/regulations and political-related issues insignificantly affect the performance of agri-food supply chain in Malaysia. Research limitations/implications – This research is an area biased. However, some insightful managerial implications can be drawn from this paper to manage agri-food chain operations in a similar unstable environment. The result implies that risks are inevitable in agri-food chain but they differ in terms of menace to the chain’s operation. Therefore, tomanage agri-food supply chain risks effectively, managers should periodically identify, quantify and categorize risk sources before making risk response decisions. In addition, the results show that risks account for about half of the overall agri-food chain performance in Malaysia. This infers that managers/ practitioners could improve the performance of the agri-food chain if limited resources are allocated to plan and effectively respond to major risks sources (such as demand, supply, finance, weather and logistical/ infrastructural services-related risks) undermining the performance of the chain. Originality/value – This research contributes to the agri-food chain risk literature and provides managers/ practitioners with empirical evidence of risk thresholds and their corresponding major impact on agri-food chain’s performance. Since risks explained about half of agri-food chain performance in Malaysia, this research would prompt decision makers to improve on their risk assessment and responds (e.g. by employing efficient demand, supply and weather forecasting systems, logistic/infrastructure services, hedge to finance, etc.) to improve the chain’s performance.
ch_abstract: 目的——本文旨在探讨影响马来西亚农产品供应链运营的关键风险要素（概率与后果）及其相应阈值，并试图理解主要风险源之间的关系，进而揭示风险/中断对马来西亚农产品供应链绩效的影响。设计/方法/路径——研究采用结构化问卷收集横截面调查数据，依据《项目管理知识体系指南》（美国项目管理协会，2013年）描述的风险矩阵尺度和分类方法对农产品供应链相关风险阈值进行归类。随后运用皮尔逊相关系数分析各类风险与农产品供应链绩效的关系。最后，为探究企业供应链运营受风险/中断影响的程度，研究采用普通最小二乘回归模型量化主要风险源对马来西亚农产品供应链绩效的冲击。研究发现——结果表明农产品供应链中各类风险的发生概率、影响程度及阈值存在显著差异。其中利率/汇率政策周期性变动和客户需求波动属于高风险等级，而土地政策/权属不确定性与质量控制薄弱则是低风险等级。研究显示所有主要风险均与供应链绩效呈显著负相关：需求、供应、天气、物流/基础设施及财务风险源显著削弱供应链绩效，而生物/环境、管理/运营、政策/法规及政治相关风险对马来西亚农产品供应链绩效的影响不显著。研究局限/启示——本研究存在地域局限性，但仍可为不稳定环境下的农产品供应链管理提供重要启示。结果表明风险在农产品供应链中不可避免，但对运营的威胁程度各异。管理者应定期识别、量化并分类风险源，再制定应对策略。研究发现风险因素解释了马来西亚农产品供应链绩效约50%的变异，这意味着若将有限资源配置于规划并有效应对主要风险源（如需求、供应、财务、天气及物流/基础设施服务相关风险），管理者可显著提升供应链绩效。原创性/价值——本研究丰富了农产品供应链风险领域的文献，为管理者提供了风险阈值及其对供应链绩效影响的实证依据。鉴于风险因素对马来西亚农产品供应链绩效的高解释度，本研究将促使决策者完善风险评估与响应机制（例如采用高效的需求、供应及天气预测系统，优化物流/基础设施服务，运用金融对冲工具等），从而提升供应链绩效。
tags: Performance, Supply chain, Malaysia, Risk, Agri-food

title: Looking Back and Moving Forward: 50 Years of the Journal ofSupplyChainManagement
abstract: This editorial 1) provides a retrospective of the Journal of Supply Chain Management (JSCM), 2) compares the first 35 years of JSCM to the 2008-2013 time period since the Journal's repositioning, 3) reports on the current status of JSCM, 4) introduces the papers that comprise the 50th anniversary issue of JSCM, and 5) provides the editors' prospective concerning future research and JSCM as the supply chain management discipline moves forward.
ch_abstract: 这篇社论：1）回顾了《供应链管理期刊》（JSCM）的发展历程；2）将该刊最初35年与2008-2013年重新定位后的阶段进行对比；3）报告了JSCM的现状；4）介绍了构成JSCM五十周年特刊的系列论文；5）在供应链管理学科向前发展的背景下，阐述了编辑团队对未来研究及期刊发展的展望。
tags: supply chain management, editorial

title: A Study on EffectiveSupplyChainRiskManagement: Conceptual Framework
abstract: The objective of this study is to explore supply chain risk management (SCRM) and introduce an effective risk management conceptual framework for firms exposed to the global business environment. In order to survive in severe global competition, more firms have followed suit in their supply chain management by maintaining lean inventory (JIT), global partnership, and outsourcing. These practices have led firms to more disruptions in different nodes of the supply chain. Optimal balance between the cost of disruption and the cost of countermeasures has remained an unresolved issue for firms. This paper attempts to provide a conceptual framework to categorize firms according to their current maturity of SCRM into low, mid, and high levels. Any effective SCRM should be adopted according to the current risk management maturity level, in order to derive a higher economic effect in the context of a cost-benefit tradeoff. This framework is designed to resolve why some empirical studies on the performance of SCRM have mixed results inconsistent with their predictions.
ch_abstract: 本研究的目的是探讨供应链风险管理（SCRM），并为面临全球商业环境的企业引入一个有效的风险管理概念框架。为了在激烈的全球竞争中生存，越来越多的企业在供应链管理中效仿精益库存（JIT）、全球合作伙伴关系和外包等做法。这些实践导致企业在供应链的不同节点上面临更多中断。在中断成本与应对措施成本之间寻求最优平衡，仍是企业尚未解决的难题。本文试图提供一个概念框架，根据企业当前的SCRM成熟度将其分为低、中、高三个等级。任何有效的SCRM都应基于当前的风险管理成熟度水平来实施，以在成本效益权衡的背景下获得更高的经济效益。该框架旨在解释为何部分关于SCRM绩效的实证研究会出现与预测不一致的混合结果。
tags: Risk Index, Supply Chain Risk Management

title: A Model for EvaluatingSupplyChainRisk
abstract: Companies are being forced to adopt practices and structures that will produce high quality, reliable, reasonably priced products with continuously shorter lead times.  In order to meet the above goals, companies are utilizing flatter organizational structures and narrower supply chains. Breadth and depth reductions in a firm's supply base yields fewer alternatives in response to failures.  The vulnerability of different supply chain structures is assessed and a model for designing robust solutions under risk is presented.
ch_abstract: 企业被迫采取能够生产高质量、可靠且价格合理产品的实践和结构，同时不断缩短交付周期。为实现上述目标，企业正在采用更扁平的组织结构和更精简的供应链。企业供应基础的广度和深度缩减导致应对故障的替代方案减少。研究评估了不同供应链结构的脆弱性，并提出了一种在风险下设计稳健解决方案的模型。
tags: Supply Chain, Risk, Network Design

title: Demonstration of the Importance of the Relationship of Logistics to Marketing: IncorporatingSupplyChainCapabilities into Marketing Efforts
abstract: Marketing and Supply Chain each have their own functional responsibilities within a company.  Fundamentally, they also should have a relationship with each other, as the supply chain connects to marketing's "place."  Supply chain provides the goods to meet the marketing demand. If this relationship is enhanced beyond the basic, however, this can contribute to revenue opportunities. If the supply chain provides enhanced services that customers can utilize, and if this is inserted into the marketing message to customers, then this can lead to increased customer acquisition and likely retention. Many companies neglect to highlight this enhanced service aspect in their promotion activities, and thus are missing an opportunity for customer preference and potentially revenue growth. This paper portrays an example of how the marketing message (at a major retailer) was redesigned to incorporate the promotion of a customer-oriented supply chain service, and provides evidence of the subsequent growth that occurred.
ch_abstract: 市场营销与供应链在公司内部各自承担着职能责任。从根本上说，二者也应存在关联，因为供应链连接着营销的"渠道"环节。供应链通过提供商品来满足营销需求。但若能强化这种基础关系，就能创造营收增长机会。当供应链提供客户可享的增值服务，并将此纳入面向客户的营销信息时，就能促进客户获取并提升留存率。许多企业在推广活动中忽视了对这类增值服务的宣传，因而错失了赢得客户青睐及潜在营收增长的机会。本文通过某大型零售商的案例，展示了如何重构营销信息以融入以客户为中心的供应链服务推广，并提供了由此带来业务增长的实际证据。
tags: promotion, revenue, supply chain services, retail, customer preference, customer acquisition

title: Customer Categorization, Relational Justice and SME Performance in SupermarketSupplyChains
abstract: The purpose of this research is to examine the impact of perceived relational justice on the relationship between key customer categorization and performance of small food and drink producers in supermarket supply chains. Survey data is derived from a sample of (small-scale) suppliers of local and regional food to a large British supermarket. Partial least squares regression analysis was used to test a conceptual framework, which positions relational justice as a mediator in the relationship between key customer categorization and supplier performance, moderated by the length of the relationship. Findings reveal that small suppliers who perceive their treatment by their key customers as fair tend to achieve higher business performance, which supports the hypothesized mediating role of relational justice on supplier performance. However, this research found no evidence to support the hypothesis that this role is moderated by the length of the relationship between the supplier and the buyer. This paper makes a novel empirical contribution, focusing on performance outcomes for small-scale suppliers in a highly competitive environment (fast-moving consumer goods) with customers (supermarkets) who have significant market power. Accordingly, the paper shows that the way supermarket buyers treat their suppliers matters more for the performance of their suppliers than the very fact that they are key customers.
ch_abstract: 本研究的目的是探讨感知关系公正对超市供应链中小型食品饮料生产商的关键客户分类与绩效之间关系的影响。调查数据来源于一家英国大型超市的本地及区域食品（小规模）供应商样本。研究采用偏最小二乘回归分析检验概念框架，该框架将关系公正定位为关键客户分类与供应商绩效之间的中介变量，并受到关系长度的调节。研究发现，认为关键客户对待自己公平的小型供应商往往能取得更高的业务绩效，这支持了关系公正对供应商绩效的中介作用假设。但研究未发现证据支持供应商与采购方关系长度会调节这一作用的假设。本文做出了新颖的实证贡献，重点关注具有显著市场权力的客户（超市）所在高度竞争环境（快速消费品）中小型供应商的绩效表现。研究表明，超市采购方对待供应商的方式比"其是关键客户"这一事实本身对供应商绩效的影响更为重要。
tags: Supply-Chain Management, Customer Relationship Management, Supermarkets, UK, Company Performance, Food Industry

title: GlobalSupplyChainDisruptions and Product Market Competition
abstract: We study how production networks and product market competition interact in propagating supply chain shocks in the recent 2018 U.S.-China trade war and during the COVID-19 pandemic. U.S. firms with Chinese suppliers experienced sizable sales declines in the period following both of these shocks, as trade tensions between the U.S. and China escalated and the pandemic impacted production in China. Notably, these sales losses occurred for firms in less competitive industries and with less diversified supply chains. The main policy implication is that competition can mitigate the effect of supply chain shocks.
ch_abstract: 我们研究了在2018年美中贸易战和新冠疫情期间，生产网络与产品市场竞争如何相互作用以传导供应链冲击。在这两次冲击后，随着美中贸易紧张局势升级和疫情影响中国生产，拥有中国供应商的美国企业经历了显著的销售额下滑。值得注意的是，这些销售损失主要发生在竞争较弱行业和供应链多元化程度较低的企业中。主要政策启示是：市场竞争能够缓解供应链冲击的影响。
tags: Supply chain disruptions, Competition, Entry threats, Supply chain diversification, Sales losses

title: Toward aSupplyChainPractice View
abstract: A growing body of supply chain management (SCM) literature has relied on the premises of the resource-based view (RBV) and its extensions like the relational view (RV) to investigate resources and their relationship to performance. Recently, the practice-based view (PBV) has been proposed as a complementary theoretical foundation for strategic management research. While the PBV primarily focuses on the firm, we note that SCM practices often span firm boundaries and extend to supply chain partners. In addition, there is an opportunity to explicitly consider firm performance as both individual performance and relational performance. We do this by proposing the supply chain practice view (SCPV), in which we extend the PBV to the interorganizational level of analysis — both in terms of practices and performance. We also build upon and extend the PBV's discussion of the interaction of practices and resources by advocating that there are no discrete boundaries between practices and resources and between firm and relational performance; we conceptualize these dimensions as continua as opposed to sets of dichotomies. The SCPV complements the PBV, as well as the RBV and RV, and provides an alternative theoretical lens for the SCM discipline.
ch_abstract: 越来越多的供应链管理(SCM)文献基于资源基础观(RBV)及其延伸理论如关系观(RV)的前提，研究资源及其与绩效的关系。近年来，实践基础观(PBV)被提出作为战略管理研究的补充理论基础。虽然PBV主要关注企业层面，但我们注意到SCM实践往往跨越企业边界延伸至供应链合作伙伴。此外，我们有机会将企业绩效明确区分为个体绩效和关系绩效。为此我们提出供应链实践观(SCPV)，将PBV的分析层次扩展到组织间层面——包括实践和绩效两个维度。我们还通过主张实践与资源之间、企业绩效与关系绩效之间不存在明确界限，对PBV关于实践与资源交互作用的讨论进行了拓展；我们将这些维度概念化为连续统而非二分集合。SCPV作为PBV、RBV和RV的补充理论，为SCM学科提供了新的理论视角。
tags: supply chain practice view (SCPV), resource-based view, relational view, practice-based view, supply chain performance, conceptual theory building

title: CyberSupplyChainRiskManagement: Toward an Understanding of the Antecedents to the Demand for Assurance
abstract: Recognizing the need for effective cyber risk management processes across the supply chain, the AICPA issued a new SOC in March 2020 for assuring cyber supply chain risk management (C-SCRM) processes. This study examines supply chain relationship factors and cyber risk issues to better understand the demand for C-SCRM assurance. Resource Advantage Theory of Competition provides the conceptual foundation for assessing the dual drivers of relationship building and cyber risk management on demand for assurance. We use a field survey to collect data from 205 professionals enabling evaluation of the complex relationships in the theoretical model. Results support all hypotheses, provide satisfactory model fit, and support the underlying theory. Trust, power imbalances and cyber supply chain risk all positively influence the demand for assurance over C-SCRM processes, suggesting assurance is a desirable process for addressing the three greatest inhibitors of collaborative supply chain relationships. Two new constructs are also introduced in the research — a complex 49 item measure for assessing cyber supply chain risk across the technical, operational and strategic levels, along with a more traditional multi-item construct for assessing the a priori demand for assurance. This study expands the literature on cyber assurance by auditors and elaborates on overall supply chain processes that help drive value from auditors providing such assurance.
ch_abstract: 认识到供应链中需要有效的网络风险管理流程，美国注册会计师协会（AICPA）于2020年3月发布了一项新的SOC（系统与组织控制）标准，旨在为网络供应链风险管理（C-SCRM）流程提供鉴证。本研究探讨了供应链关系因素和网络风险问题，以更好地理解对C-SCRM鉴证的需求。竞争的资源优势理论为评估关系建立和网络风险管理对鉴证需求的双重驱动提供了概念基础。我们通过实地调查收集了205名专业人士的数据，以评估理论模型中的复杂关系。结果支持所有假设，模型拟合度良好，并验证了基础理论。信任、权力失衡和网络供应链风险均正向影响对C-SCRM流程鉴证的需求，表明鉴证是解决协作供应链关系三大障碍的理想流程。研究还引入了两个新构念：一个包含49项指标的复杂测量工具，用于评估技术、运营和战略层面的网络供应链风险；以及一个更传统的多项目构念，用于评估对鉴证的先验需求。本研究拓展了关于审计师网络鉴证的文献，并详细阐述了有助于从审计师提供的此类鉴证中获取价值的整体供应链流程。
tags: Cyber Risk Management, Supply Chain Risk Management, Cyber Supply Chain Risk Management, Cyber Assurance, Voluntary Assurance, SOC Reports

title: SupplyChainResilience andRiskManagement Five-Year Strategy Review of Coca-Cola Company
abstract: This paper examines Coca-Cola's supply chain resilience and risk management strategies over the past five years (2017-2021). Through a detailed analysis of the company's strategic initiatives, performance metrics, and industry positioning, we assess the effectiveness of its approaches to mitigating supply chain risks and enhancing operational resilience. Key findings indicate Coca-Cola's adaptive strategies in response to global supply chain disruptions have fortified its market leadership. Recommendations for further strengthening its supply chain framework are provided, offering insights into best practices for resilience in the beverage industry.
ch_abstract: 本文研究了可口可乐公司过去五年（2017-2021年）的供应链韧性与风险管理策略。通过对该公司战略举措、绩效指标及行业定位的详细分析，我们评估了其在缓解供应链风险与提升运营韧性方面的措施成效。核心研究结果表明，可口可乐针对全球供应链中断采取的适应性策略巩固了其市场领导地位。文中还提出了进一步强化其供应链框架的建议，为饮料行业韧性建设的最佳实践提供了参考。
tags: Supply Chain Resilience, Supply Chain Optimization, Sustainability in Supply Chain, Risk Management, Global Supply Chain, Strategic Partnerships

title: Impact of a Country's Logistical Capabilities onSupplyChainRisk
abstract: Purpose: This paper aims to examine the relationship between environmental factors, risk perception and decision-making in risk management. Specifically, using attribution theory, the authors study the influence of macro-level logistical capabilities of a host country on a firm’s actual and perceived supply chain risk, and examine if this country-level factor and the firm level perception of risk affect a firm’s decision-making in risk management. Design/methodology/approach: This study uses a combination of primary data from 932 manufacturing firms from 22 countries and secondary data from the logistics performance index (LPI), and empirically tests the conceptual framework using partial least squares structural equation modeling. Findings: Key results reveal that a country’s logistical capabilities, measured using LPI, have a significant impact on managers’ risk perception. Firms located in countries with high LPI perceive lower risk in their supply chain both in the upstream and downstream, and therefore do not invest much in external integration, compared to firms in low LPI countries, and hence are exposed to high risk. Originality/value: This is one of the first empirical studies linking a country’s logistical capabilities with supply chain risk perceptions, objective supply chain risk and supply chain risk management efforts of a firm using the International Manufacturing Strategy Survey database. © 2021, Emerald Publishing Limited.
ch_abstract: 目的：本文旨在探讨环境因素、风险感知与风险管理决策之间的关系。具体而言，作者运用归因理论，研究了东道国宏观物流能力对企业实际及感知供应链风险的影响，并检验这一国家层面因素与企业层面的风险感知是否会影响企业的风险管理决策。  . 设计/方法/路径：本研究结合了来自22个国家932家制造企业的一手数据与世界银行物流绩效指数（LPI）的二手数据，采用偏最小二乘结构方程模型对概念框架进行实证检验。  . 发现：关键结果表明，以LPI衡量的国家物流能力对管理者的风险感知具有显著影响。与低LPI国家的企业相比，高LPI国家的企业对其供应链上下游风险感知较低，因此较少投资于外部整合，从而面临更高的实际风险。  . 原创性/价值：这是首批利用国际制造战略调查数据库，将国家物流能力与供应链风险感知、客观供应链风险及企业风险管理投入相联系的实证研究之一。© 2021，Emerald Publishing Limited。
tags: Global supply chain, Logistics capabilities, Risk management, Supply risk

title: Industry Classification Based onSupplyChainNetwork Information Using Graph Neural Networks
abstract: The number and trade volume of Chinese firms are increasing year by year. The resulting variety of complex transactions have made risk control and government supervision difficult. China's listed companies have specific classifications, but most non-listed companies do not have comparable classifications, making it difficult to analyze all companies on the same basis. Supply chain networks have proved to contain rich information, which can more completely reflect transaction relationships. This study mines hidden information obtained from the supply chain network to classify participating companies. We construct the supply chain network data set of listed companies using a graph neural network (GNN) algorithm to classify these companies. Experiments show that this method is effective and can produce better results than the commonly used machine learning methods. In addition, we use some economic variables to try to explain the effectiveness and economic significance of GNN, and find that GNN can also be used to classify companies into multiple industries. Our findings provide new insights for the study of smart industry classification and mining implicit information from the perspective of supply chain networks.
ch_abstract: 中国企业数量及交易规模逐年攀升，由此衍生的复杂交易类型使得风险管控与政府监管面临挑战。中国上市公司存在特定行业分类，但多数非上市企业缺乏可比分类体系，导致难以在统一基准下进行企业分析。实践证明供应链网络蕴含丰富信息，能更完整地反映企业间交易关系。本研究通过挖掘供应链网络中的隐含信息，对参与企业进行智能分类。我们采用图神经网络（GNN）算法构建上市公司供应链网络数据集，实现企业分类。实验表明该方法效果显著，其分类效果优于常用机器学习方法。此外，我们结合经济变量阐释GNN的有效性及经济意义，发现该技术还可实现跨行业企业分类。本研究为智能行业分类及供应链网络视角下的隐含信息挖掘提供了新思路。
tags: supply chain management, supply chain networks, Industry classification, graph neural network

title: Critical Factors and Enablers of Food Quality and Safety ComplianceRiskManagement in the Vietnamese SeafoodSupplyChain
abstract: Recently, along with the emergence of food scandals, food supply chains have to face with ever-increasing pressure from compliance with food quality and safety regulations and standards. This paper aims to explore critical factors of compliance risk in food supply chain with an illustrated case in Vietnamese seafood industry. To this end, this study takes advantage of both primary and secondary data sources through a comprehensive literature research of industrial and scientific papers, combined with expert interview. Findings showed that there are three main critical factor groups influencing on compliance risk including challenges originating from Vietnamese food supply chain itself, characteristics of regulation and standards, and business environment. Furthermore, author proposed enablers to eliminate compliance risks to food supply chain managers as well as recommendations to government and other influencers and supporters.
ch_abstract: 近年来，随着食品安全事件的频发，食品供应链面临来自质量与安全法规标准合规性方面日益增长的压力。本文以越南水产业为例，旨在探究食品供应链合规风险的关键因素。为此，本研究通过系统梳理行业与学术文献，结合专家访谈，综合运用一手与二手数据。研究发现影响合规风险的关键因素主要分为三类：越南食品供应链自身存在的挑战、法规标准特性以及商业环境。此外，作者为食品供应链管理者提出了降低合规风险的可行措施，并向政府及其他影响者与支持方提供了建议。
tags: Compliance Risk, Food Supply Chain, Food Safety, Food Quality, Critical Factor, Risk Management Enablers

title: SupplyChainLeakage of Greenhouse Gas Emissions
abstract: Climate change has been a major global risk and a key driver for greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions reduction. Yet, internal emissions reduction of firms may create a leakage that leads to higher emissions in the supply chain. The related literature suggests that such emissions leakage is explained by the pollution haven hypothesis. We propose and find evidence for an alternative reason for supply chain leakage, one that is driven by innovation and optimization of supply chain activities. Using panel data from Bloomberg Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) and Bloomberg Supply Chain (SPLC), we estimate our models at a firm and supplier dyadic level using two-way cluster robust standard error and dyadic robust error estimations, treating different sources of endogeneity. We find empirical evidence of a supply chain leakage effect – a higher level of supplier emissions is associated with a lower level of firm internal emissions. More importantly, supplier innovation can be a major driver behind the leakage – the supply chain leakage effect is heightened when a supplier is more innovative. Further, the role of innovation is strengthened when a supplier has similar technological capabilities to the focal firm. We also find that climate risk exposure impacts supply chain leakage in an asymmetrical pattern—focal firm climate risks heighten leakage while supplier climate risks mitigate leakage. Our findings suggest that supply chain leakage may not be completely driven by pollution haven motives, but by supply chain innovation and optimization that may be beneficial in the long term.
ch_abstract: 气候变化一直是全球面临的重大风险，也是推动温室气体减排的关键因素。然而，企业内部的减排行为可能导致供应链环节的排放泄漏。现有文献认为这种排放泄漏现象可以用污染避难所假说来解释。我们提出并验证了另一种驱动供应链泄漏的原因——由供应链活动创新与优化所引发的泄漏效应。基于彭博环境、社会与治理（ESG）数据库和彭博供应链（SPLC）数据库的面板数据，我们采用双向聚类稳健标准误和配对稳健误差估计方法，在企业-供应商配对层面构建模型，并处理了多种内生性问题。实证结果表明存在供应链泄漏效应：供应商排放水平越高，企业自身排放水平越低。更重要的是，供应商创新是泄漏效应的主要驱动力——当供应商创新水平较高时，供应链泄漏效应更为显著。若供应商与焦点企业具备相似的技术能力，创新对泄漏效应的驱动作用会进一步增强。我们还发现气候风险暴露对供应链泄漏存在非对称影响：焦点企业面临气候风险会加剧泄漏，而供应商面临气候风险则抑制泄漏。研究结果表明，供应链泄漏可能并非完全源于污染避难所动机，而是源于可能带来长期效益的供应链创新与优化。
tags: Climate risk, supply chain leakage, supply chain innovation, technology proximity, dyadic data analysis

title: Process Mining inSupplyChainManagement
abstract: For a detailed discussion of process mining, the objective of this paper is the analysis of the successful implementation of process mining in the practical fields of supply chain management. The research comprises the investigation of use cases in companies that are already actively using process mining. Purpose: This research aims to highlight the applicability of process mining in the supply chain management business field. Research Methodology: In order to examine the applicability of process mining in supply chain management a research study was conducted among experts in this business field. Further, theoretical findings were compared to the results and evaluated. Results: Process Mining can be applied very well in the SCM area. The advantages that arise primarily reflect significant potential benefits and improved process throughput times. The information that can be gained from the operational areas supported by process mining is suitable for reliable decisions, both in the tactical and strategic areas. Limitations: The results on the application of process mining show a certain generalization and have to be adapted and adjusted to the respective application case. Contribution: This study is useful, especially for the purchasing and logistics business area.
ch_abstract: 关于流程挖掘的详细讨论，本文旨在分析流程挖掘在供应链管理实践领域中的成功实施。研究包括调查已积极应用流程挖掘技术的企业案例。目的：本研究旨在突显流程挖掘在供应链管理业务领域的适用性。研究方法：为评估流程挖掘在供应链管理中的适用性，我们对这一业务领域的专家进行了调研，并将理论发现与实证结果进行对比和评估。研究结果：流程挖掘能很好地适用于供应链管理领域，其优势主要体现在显著潜在效益和缩短流程周期方面。通过流程挖掘支持的运营领域所获信息，可为战术和战略层面的可靠决策提供依据。局限性：流程挖掘的应用结果存在一定普适性，需根据具体应用场景进行调整与适配。贡献：本研究对采购与物流业务领域具有重要参考价值。
tags: Process mining, supply chain management (SCM), supply chain processes, purchasing, logistics

title: A Data-Driven ComponentRiskMatrix to AssessSupplyChainDisruptionRisk
abstract: We present a data-driven approach to assess supply chain disruption risk at the component level. Our 'Component Risk Matrix' categorizes components based on their predicted stock break frequency and severity. Our predictive models employ an XGBoost model with historical disruption data and each component's unique characteristics. Our approach enables prioritizing components for resilience measures by quantifying their criticality and identifying the key drivers behind this criticality. We validate our methodology on 1,867 components from an original equipment manufacturer, demonstrating its practical applicability and providing insights toward risk mitigation. This data-driven approach empowers companies to strategically build supply chain resilience in designing their products and supply chains.
ch_abstract: 我们提出了一种数据驱动的方法来评估零部件层面的供应链中断风险。我们的"零部件风险矩阵"根据预测的库存中断频率和严重程度对零部件进行分类。预测模型采用XGBoost算法，结合历史中断数据和每个零部件的独特特征。该方法通过量化零部件关键性并识别其背后的关键驱动因素，能够优先考虑需要采取弹性措施的零部件。我们在某原始设备制造商的1,867个零部件上验证了该方法的实用性，证明了其实际应用价值，并为风险缓解提供了见解。这种数据驱动的方法使企业能够在产品设计和供应链构建中战略性增强供应链弹性。
tags: Supply Chain Resilience, Disruption Risk, Component Criticality, Risk Matrix

title: SupplyChainRiskManagement: Identifying and Mitigating Vulnerabilities
abstract: Supply chain risk management (SCRM) is a critical process that helps organizations identify, assess, and mitigate risks within their supply chains to ensure continuity, minimize disruptions, and enhance resilience. In today's interconnected global economy, vulnerabilities in supply chains are becoming increasingly complex due to factors such as geopolitical instability, natural disasters, technological failures, and supplier dependencies. This paper explores various strategies and methodologies used in identifying supply chain vulnerabilities, with a particular focus on the integration of risk assessment frameworks, technology, and collaboration among stakeholders. We analyze the key risk categories-strategic, operational, financial, and compliance risks-and examine how organizations can effectively employ risk mitigation tactics, such as diversification, redundancy, and the use of advanced technologies like artificial intelligence and blockchain, to strengthen supply chain resilience. The paper also emphasizes the importance of continuous monitoring and dynamic risk management processes in adapting to evolving risks. Ultimately, a well-rounded approach to SCRM not only safeguards against potential disruptions but also enables businesses to thrive in an increasingly volatile environment.
ch_abstract: 供应链风险管理（SCRM）是一项关键流程，旨在帮助组织识别、评估和缓解供应链中的风险，以确保业务连续性、减少中断并增强韧性。在当今互联互通的全球经济中，由于地缘政治不稳定、自然灾害、技术故障和供应商依赖等因素，供应链的脆弱性正变得日益复杂。本文探讨了识别供应链脆弱性的多种策略和方法，重点关注风险评估框架、技术应用以及利益相关者协作的整合。我们分析了关键风险类别——战略风险、运营风险、财务风险和合规风险，并研究了组织如何有效运用风险缓解策略，如多元化、冗余设计以及人工智能和区块链等先进技术，以增强供应链韧性。本文还强调了持续监测和动态风险管理流程在应对不断演变风险中的重要性。最终，全面的SCRM方法不仅能防范潜在中断，还能使企业在日益波动的环境中蓬勃发展。
tags: Supply chain risk management, vulnerabilities, risk mitigation, resilience, risk assessment, technology, artificial intelligence, blockchain, diversification, disruption, global supply chains

title: Impact of Generative AI onSupplyChain| Insights and Trends
abstract: The incorporation of Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming the supply chain landscape, marking a significant evolution in how industries manage logistics, procurement, and operational challenges. This paper explores the multifaceted impact of generative AI across various sectors, particularly focusing on its applications in aviation and maritime logistics, which underscore the technology's potential to enhance efficiency, safety, and sustainability. Generative AI's capabilities are showcased through predictive maintenance, where AI algorithms process real-time data to foresee and mitigate potential failures, significantly reducing downtime and maintenance costs. In the realm of procurement, AI's data-driven insights enable more informed supplier selection and strategic negotiations, thus optimising cost and supply chain resilience. Additionally, AI's role in cargo logistics demonstrates its ability to refine routing and load management, which contributes to reducing operational costs and carbon footprint. Despite these advancements, the deployment of generative AI faces challenges such as cybersecurity risks and the necessity for high-quality data, which are critical for maintaining the integrity and effectiveness of AI systems. The paper also discusses the strategic incorporation of AI into supply chain processes, emphasising the need for a balanced approach that enhances capabilities without displacing the human workforce. Ultimately, this paper highlights generative AI as a cornerstone for building more resilient and adaptive supply chains, poised to meet the demands of a dynamically evolving global market. The continued evolution of AI technologies promises to further revolutionise the industry, making it imperative for businesses to adopt these innovations to remain competitive.
ch_abstract: 生成式人工智能（AI）的融合正在重塑供应链格局，标志着行业管理物流、采购与运营挑战方式的重大变革。本文探讨了生成式AI在各领域的多维影响，尤其聚焦其在航空与海运物流中的应用，这些案例凸显了该技术在提升效率、安全性与可持续性方面的潜力。通过预测性维护，生成式AI的能力得到充分展现——算法实时处理数据以预判并规避潜在故障，显著降低停机时间与维护成本。在采购领域，AI驱动的数据洞察助力更明智的供应商选择与战略谈判，从而优化成本并增强供应链韧性。此外，AI在货运物流中的路由优化与载重管理能力，有效降低了运营成本与碳足迹。尽管成果显著，生成式AI的部署仍面临网络安全风险与高质量数据需求等挑战，这些因素对维持AI系统完整性与效能至关重要。本文还讨论了AI与供应链流程的战略融合，强调需采取平衡策略——在提升效能的同时保留人力价值。研究最终指出，生成式AI将成为构建更具韧性与适应性的供应链基石，以应对全球市场的动态演进。AI技术的持续发展势必将引发更深远的产业革命，企业必须积极拥抱创新以保持竞争力。
tags: AI in Supply Chain Management, AI Maritime Logistics, AI Integration in Supply Chain, AI Collaboration, Generative AI in Supply Chain, Gen AI in SCM, AI driven Supply Chain innovation

title: Business for Society Is Society’s Business: Tension Management in a Migrant IntegrationSupplyChain
abstract: Social enterprises are acquiring an increasingly relevant role as focal organizations for managing supply chains to address social problems. We argue that the presence of misaligned institutional logics between these focal organizations and their supply chain stakeholders generates tensions. Building on institutional theory and paradox theory, we analyzed seven dyadic relationships between a single focal social enterprise with a goal of migrant integration and its supply chain stakeholders. We propose relationship management mechanisms related to relationship governance, power and trust to manage such tensions. We observe the application of different relationship management mechanisms relative to different types of tensions. Finally, we relate different relationship management mechanisms to specific tension management approaches  referred to as complementarity, acceptance and accommodation, and offer propositions based on our findings.
ch_abstract: 社会企业作为管理供应链以解决社会问题的核心组织，正发挥着日益重要的作用。我们认为，当这些核心组织与其供应链利益相关者之间存在制度逻辑错位时，就会产生矛盾。基于制度理论与悖论理论，我们分析了一家以移民融合为目标的社会企业与供应链利益相关者之间的七组二元关系。针对这些矛盾，我们提出了涉及关系治理、权力与信任的关系管理机制。研究发现，针对不同类型的矛盾会应用不同的关系管理机制。最后，我们将不同关系管理机制与特定的矛盾处理方法（互补性、接纳与适应）相关联，并基于研究发现提出了若干命题。
tags: Social impact supply chain management, migrant integration, relationship management, power, trust, institutional logics, tensions, paradox

title: The Determinant of theSupplyChainPractices that InfluenceSupplyChainPerformance in Malaysia
abstract: Purpose – The purpose of this study is to examine the supply chain practices – Supplier strategic partnership, customer relationship, information sharing, information quality, postponement, agreed vision and goals as well as risk and reward sharing towards the supply chain performance. Design/ Methodology/ Approach – The study utilizes survey data. The results are based on regression analysis and equation modelling by using SPSS software. Findings – The study finds that all supply chain practices namely supplier strategic partnership, customer relationship, information sharing, information quality, postponement, agreed vision and goals and risk and reward sharing have a positive relationship towards the supply chain performance. Practical Implications – For supply chain practitioners, the results indicate that the practices of supply chain practices that will improve the supply chain performance. Originality/Value – The paper theoretically develops determinants shows that all off the supply chain practices will influences the supply chain performance. Considered at a higher level of abstraction, these relationships indicate a contribution to theory that explains how supply chain practices can result in supply chain performance. Paper type- Research Paper
ch_abstract: 目的——本研究的目的是考察供应链实践（供应商战略伙伴关系、客户关系、信息共享、信息质量、延迟策略、共同愿景与目标以及风险与收益共享）对供应链绩效的影响。设计/方法/途径——本研究采用调查数据，通过SPSS软件进行回归分析和方程建模得出结果。研究发现——研究表明，所有供应链实践（包括供应商战略伙伴关系、客户关系、信息共享、信息质量、延迟策略、共同愿景与目标以及风险与收益共享）都与供应链绩效呈正相关关系。实践意义——对于供应链从业者而言，研究结果表明这些供应链实践能够提升供应链绩效。原创性/价值——本文从理论上构建了决定因素模型，证明所有供应链实践都会影响供应链绩效。在更高抽象层面上考量，这些关系为解释供应链实践如何影响供应链绩效的理论做出了贡献。论文类型——研究论文
tags: Malaysia, Operational performance, Supply chain management, Supply chain management practices, Supply Chain Performance

title: Uncertainty andSupplyChainRisk: The Moderating Role ofSupplyChainFlexibility inRiskMitigation
abstract: In order to remain competitive in the market, firms are forced to expand their product offerings and offer high levels of customization, bringing about high uncertainty in their supply chain. Firms that face high environmental uncertainty are increasingly facing higher risks in terms of supply disruptions, production and delivery delays that ultimately result in poor operational performance. This study aims at understanding the antecedents of supply chain operational risk faced by firms and the conditions under which such risks can be mitigated. Using Indian data from the sixth edition of International Manufacturing Strategy Survey (IMSS) and structural equation modeling, we investigate the relationships between environmental uncertainty and supply chain risk and the moderating effect of supply chain flexibility. We identify appropriate types of flexibility to mitigate the three major aspects of supply chain risk: supply risk, manufacturing process risk and delivery risk. Our empirical investigation reveals that uncertainty in the supply chain leads to high supply chain risk; and in uncertain environments, supply and manufacturing flexibility help in reducing the supply and manufacturing process risks respectively. However, our results also indicate that, in emerging markets such as India where logistic infrastructure is less developed, internal capabilities alone may not be sufficient in reducing supply chain delivery risk. Our findings not only contribute towards filling certain gaps in the supply chain risk management literature, but also provide practicing managers and researchers a better understanding of the types of flexibility that can mitigate supply chain risk in different business environments. © 2017 Elsevier B.V.
ch_abstract: 为保持市场竞争力，企业被迫扩大产品种类并提供高度定制化服务，这导致供应链面临高度不确定性。面对高环境不确定性的企业，正日益遭遇供应中断、生产与交付延迟等更高风险，最终造成运营绩效下滑。本研究旨在探究企业供应链运营风险的成因及其缓解条件。基于第六版国际制造战略调查（IMSS）的印度数据及结构方程模型，我们检验了环境不确定性与供应链风险的关系，以及供应链柔性的调节作用。我们识别出能缓解供应链三大风险（供应风险、制造过程风险与交付风险）的柔性类型。实证研究表明：供应链不确定性会推高供应链风险；在不确定环境下，供应柔性和制造柔性分别有助于降低供应风险与制造过程风险。但研究同时发现，在印度等物流基础设施欠发达的新兴市场，仅靠内部能力可能不足以降低供应链交付风险。本研究成果不仅填补了供应链风险管理文献的某些空白，还为从业管理者和研究者提供了对不同商业环境下缓解供应链风险的柔性类型的深入认知。© 2017 Elsevier B.V.
tags: Environmental uncertainty, Supply chain flexibility, Supply chain risk

title: Transferring and Sharing Exchange-RateRiskin aRisk-AverseSupplyChainof a. Multinational Firm
abstract: This paper analyzes risk management contracts used to handle currency risk in a decentralized supply chain that consists of risk-averse divisions in a multinational firm. Particular contracts of interest involve transferring risk to a third party by using risk-transfer contracts such as currency options and re-arranging risk between supply chain members using risk-sharing contracts. Due to decentralization, operational and risk management decisions are made locally; however, a headquarter who is interested in total supply chain profit has some controllability over those activities. We question if each kind of risk management contract can improve the utility of all supply chain members compared to the utility without any of those, and how the conditions to achieve such improvements are different. Further structural differences are investigated via sensitivity analysis with respect to the transfer price, the variability of exchange rates, and the location of the headquarter. We also find that using the two kinds of contracts jointly does not necessarily result in better outcomes.
ch_abstract: 本文分析了用于处理由跨国企业中风险规避部门组成的分散式供应链中货币风险的风险管理合同。特别关注的合同包括通过使用风险转移合同（如货币期权）将风险转移给第三方，以及通过风险分担合同在供应链成员之间重新分配风险。由于分散化，运营和风险管理决策由各分部自主制定；然而，关注供应链整体利润的总部对这些活动具有一定控制权。我们探讨了相比不采用任何风险管理合同的情况，每种风险管理合同是否都能提升所有供应链成员的效用，以及实现这种提升的条件有何差异。通过针对转移定价、汇率波动性和总部所在地的敏感性分析，进一步研究了结构差异。我们还发现，同时使用两种合同并不必然带来更好的结果。
tags: supply chain management; currency risk management; risk-transfer; risk-sharing; multinational

title: Preparing forSupplyChainResilience:SupplyShortages During Covid-19
abstract: Mitigation of supply chain shortages is an operational capability, which reflects the resilience of a supply chain as well as a good preparedness when shortage risks arise. This research builds on dynamic capabilities and forecasting techniques, to identify capabilities mitigating supply chain shortages and enhancing resilience and preparedness. A survey of 65 French supply chain managers is used to investigate the relationship between supply chain resilience, preparedness and supply shortages during the COVID-19 pandemic. To overcome the limitation of our small dataset, we supplement OLS results with machine-learning approaches, applied in as multi-stage empirical risk-analysis inspired by data science. Results reveal three typical sets of capabilities, reflecting three different levels of resilience and preparedness to deal with supply risks. The three involve a mix of capabilities including reliance on local sourcing, exposure to multiple sourcing and usage of digital tools to manage supply chain risks. In this paper, we characterize the three groups, and we provide managerial implications to strengthen risk-preparedness of supply chains.
ch_abstract: 缓解供应链短缺是一种运营能力，它反映了供应链的韧性以及在短缺风险出现时的良好准备。本研究基于动态能力和预测技术，识别能够缓解供应链短缺并增强韧性和准备能力的关键要素。通过对65名法国供应链经理的问卷调查，我们探究了COVID-19疫情期间供应链韧性、准备程度与供应短缺之间的关系。为克服小样本数据的局限性，我们在传统最小二乘法分析基础上引入机器学习方法，采用受数据科学启发的多阶段实证风险分析框架。研究结果揭示了三种典型的能力组合，对应处理供应风险的三种不同韧性水平和准备程度。这三种组合均包含多元化能力要素：本地化采购依赖、多渠道供应布局以及运用数字工具管理供应链风险。本文详细描述了这三类能力组合的特征，并为提升供应链风险准备能力提供了管理实践启示。
tags: Supply chain, risk management, supply chain resilience, cluster analysis, decision tree, machine-learning

title: A Toe-Dcv Approach to GreenSupplyChainAdoption for Sustainable Operations in the Semiconductor Industry
abstract: Semiconductor industry plays a critical role for the global economy. Semiconductor industry provides various necessary technologies such as IoT, AI, modern fabrication technologies and so on to various industries including automotive industry, electronic and communication industry, healthcare industry, construction and building industry, space industry, and so on. However, semiconductor supply chain experiences various supply chain related risks and challenges because of its procedural complexities, global supply chain integrations, government policy and regulations, competitiveness, technological complexities, and so on. Not many studies available which investigated the risk, resilience, and complexities regarding green supply chain adoption in semiconductor industry. In this context, the objective of this study is to examine the risks, resilience, and complexities for managing the green supply chain adoption for higher sustainability in the semiconductor industry. Utilizing the TOE framework (Technology-Organization-Environment) and DCV (Dynamic Capability View), we developed a research model to achieve this purpose. Subsequently, this model was validated through structural equation modelling, involving 356 respondents affiliated with the semiconductor industry. The research reveals a substantial influence of organizational dynamic capabilities, coupled with government policies and regulations, on the adoption of GSCM (green supply chain management) within the semiconductor industry. This integration not only addresses inherent risks but also offers robust solutions, thereby enhancing the resilience and sustainability of the semiconductor sector.
ch_abstract: 半导体产业对全球经济起着至关重要的作用。该行业为汽车、电子通信、医疗健康、建筑、航天等多个领域提供了物联网、人工智能、现代制造技术等各类关键技术。然而，由于流程复杂性、全球供应链整合、政府政策法规、竞争态势及技术复杂度等因素，半导体供应链正面临诸多风险与挑战。目前针对半导体行业绿色供应链转型中的风险、韧性及复杂性的研究仍较为有限。为此，本研究旨在探讨半导体行业为实现更高可持续性而推行绿色供应链管理时面临的风险、韧性及复杂性挑战。基于TOE（技术-组织-环境）框架和动态能力观理论，我们构建了研究模型，并通过结构方程模型对356名半导体行业从业者的调研数据进行了验证。研究表明，组织动态能力与政府政策法规共同对半导体行业绿色供应链管理实施产生显著影响，这种协同作用不仅能化解固有风险，更能提供有效解决方案，从而提升半导体产业的韧性与可持续性。
tags: Green Supply Chain Management, Semiconductor industry, Sustainability, Dynamic Capability, Risk, Resilience

title: QualityRiskin Outsourcing: Noncontractible Product Quality and Private Quality Cost Information
abstract: This paper addresses the concept of quality risk in outsourcing. Recent trends in outsourcing extend a contract manufacturer's (CM's) responsibility to several functional areas such as research and development and design in addition to manufacturing. This trend enables an original equipment manufacturer (OEM) to focus on sales and pricing of its product. However, increasing CM responsibilities also suggest that the OEM's product quality is mainly determined by its CM. We identify two factors that cause quality risk in this outsourcing relationship. First, the CM and the OEM may not be able to contract on quality; second, the OEM may not know the cost of quality to the CM. We characterize the effects of these two quality risk factors on the firms' profits and on the resulting product quality. We determine how the OEM's pricing strategy affects quality risk. We show, for example, that the effect of noncontractible quality is higher than the effect of private quality cost information when the OEM sets the sales price after observing the product's quality. We also show that committing to a sales price mitigates the adverse effect of quality risk. To obtain these results, we develop and analyze a three-stage decision model. This model is also used to understand the impact of recent information technologies on profits and product quality. For example, we provide a decision tree that an OEM can use in deciding whether to invest in an enterprise-wide quality management system that enables accounting of quality related activities across the supply chain.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了外包中的质量风险概念。近年来，外包趋势将合同制造商（CM）的责任从生产扩展到研发、设计等多个职能领域。这一趋势使原始设备制造商（OEM）能够专注于产品销售和定价。然而，CM责任的增加也意味着OEM的产品质量主要由其CM决定。我们识别出导致这种外包关系中质量风险的两个因素：一是CM与OEM可能无法就质量签订合同；二是OEM可能不了解CM的质量成本。我们分析了这两个质量风险因素对企业利润和最终产品质量的影响，并确定了OEM定价策略如何影响质量风险。例如，研究表明当OEM在观察到产品质量后设定销售价格时，不可签约质量的影响大于私有质量成本信息的影响。我们还证明，预先承诺销售价格能减轻质量风险的负面影响。为获得这些结论，我们开发并分析了一个三阶段决策模型。该模型也可用于理解最新信息技术对利润和产品质量的影响。例如，我们提供了一个决策树，帮助OEM决定是否投资于全企业范围的质量管理系统——该系统能实现供应链中质量相关活动的核算。
tags: quality risk, quality effort, outsourcing, contracting, quality management, supply chain management

title: Integration of Visibility andRiskin Sustainable HealthcareSupplyChainwith Cost
abstract: The Healthcare Supply Chains (HSC) are large type of network systems, processes and components collectively work to procure and supply the medicines and other healthcare products to patients. Sustainable HSCs are more important to make a good relationship with suppliers and customers and to deliver more customer satisfaction cost-effectively. The sustainable HSCs improve, maintain, and restore the health and well-being of current and future generation. The methods adopted for improving the sustainability in supply chains have influence on the supply chain visibility and risk. Today’s businesses in high-velocity, complex and distributed logistics environment, uses real-time visibility and flexibility as strategic drivers. The literatures shows that HSCs integrating sustainability, visibility and risk are limited and needs attention. The major objective of the projects work is to study the behavioral pattern and elements connected to sustainability, visibility, and risk in a selected HSC. Assess the sustainability, visibility, risk based on the proposed sustainability, visibility, risk indices. A mathematical model is developed using Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) for optimizing the same.
ch_abstract: 医疗供应链（HSC）是一种大型网络系统，其流程与组成部分共同运作，旨在为患者采购并提供药品与其他医疗产品。可持续的医疗供应链对于与供应商及客户建立良好关系、以更具成本效益的方式提升客户满意度至关重要。这类供应链能改善、维护并恢复当代与后代人群的健康福祉。提升供应链可持续性的方法会影响其透明度与风险。在当今高速、复杂且分布式的物流环境中，企业将实时透明度与灵活性作为战略驱动力。现有文献表明，整合了可持续性、透明度与风险的医疗供应链研究仍有限，亟待关注。本项目的主要目标是研究选定医疗供应链中与可持续性、透明度及风险相关的行为模式与要素，并基于提出的可持续性指数、透明度指数与风险指数进行评估。研究采用混合整数线性规划（MILP）建立数学模型以实现优化目标。
tags: Sustainability, Supply chain visibility, Supply chain risk, MILP, GAMS

title: Sustainable Supplier Selection Factors andSupplyChainPerformance in the Nigerian Healthcare Industry
abstract: Background: There has been considerable effort amongst commercially-oriented services firms towards achieving sustainable supplier selection. However, little is known about the specific sustainability factors employed by healthcare supply chain managers when selecting medical materials vendors in developing economies, and the impact that such selection approaches has on the buying firm’s performance.Objective: This study examines the sustainability factors mostly considered by Nigerian healthcare supply chain managers in their supplier selection processes. It further assesses the. supply chain performance impact of the identified sustainable supplier selection factors.Methodology: The study adopted a quantitative survey approach to randomly collect and analyse primary data from a large sample of 116 logistics and supply chain executives in 58 healthcare organisations in Nigeria. The descriptive scores (mean and standard deviation) were summarised and used to estimate the relationship among variables.Results: Overall, the results suggest that economic sustainability towers above other sustainability factors for the selection of healthcare suppliers in the context of this study. In addition, economically sustainable supplier selection correlates strongly and positively with supply chain performance, while social sustainability supplier selection had moderate correlation with performance.Conclusion: Based on these findings, it is our conclusion that most healthcare supply chain managers in Nigeria attaches importance to economic sustainability factors in their supplier selection process than environmental and social sustainability factors.
ch_abstract: 背景：商业导向的服务企业在实现可持续供应商选择方面付出了大量努力。然而，对于发展中经济体医疗供应链管理者在选择医疗材料供应商时所采用的具体可持续性因素，以及这种选择方法对采购企业绩效的影响，目前知之甚少。目的：本研究探讨了尼日利亚医疗供应链管理者在供应商选择过程中主要考虑的可持续性因素，并进一步评估了这些已识别的可持续供应商选择因素对供应链绩效的影响。方法：本研究采用定量调查方法，随机收集并分析了来自尼日利亚58家医疗机构的116名物流和供应链高管的原始数据。通过汇总描述性评分（平均值和标准差）来估计变量间的关系。结果：总体而言，研究结果表明，在本研究背景下，经济可持续性在医疗供应商选择中占据主导地位。此外，经济可持续的供应商选择与供应链绩效呈显著正相关，而社会可持续的供应商选择与绩效呈中等相关。结论：基于这些发现，我们得出结论，尼日利亚大多数医疗供应链管理者在供应商选择过程中更重视经济可持续性因素，而非环境和社会可持续性因素。
tags: Sustainability; supplier selection; procurement; triple-bottom-line; sustainable supply chain management

title: Analysing the Impact ofSupplyChainPractice and Preceding Cooperative Behaviour onSupplyChainPerformance Efficiency: A Study on Pakistan Food Industry
abstract: The study investigated the impact of Supply Chain practices and preceding cooperative behaviour on the supply chain efficiency of the food sector. The data has been gathered by means of the questionnaire with a five Likert scale from which a total of 350 responses have been collected from the food sector of Pakistan, and were assessed through structural equation modelling. The results showed that there is a significant relation between the SC practices, antecedent cooperative behaviour and supply chain performance. The statistical findings have clearly revealed that SC practices such as the leans thinking approach can essentially help to enhance the revenues and cut the cost of the supply chain of the food retail sector. The findings have the implication that it gives a deeper knowledge about the significant dimensions of retail industry to improve supply chain performance of the food retail firms. Moreover, the study will help the food retail sector to know the important role of CRM and lean thinking in raising cost in the SME’s in the food retail supply chain sector.
ch_abstract: 该研究探讨了供应链实践及先前的合作行为对食品行业供应链效率的影响。数据通过采用五级李克特量表的问卷调查收集，共获得巴基斯坦食品行业350份回复，并采用结构方程模型进行分析。结果表明，供应链实践、前置合作行为与供应链绩效之间存在显著关联。统计结果明确指出，诸如精益思维方法等供应链实践能有效提升食品零售行业的收入并降低供应链成本。研究发现揭示了零售行业关键维度对改善食品零售企业供应链绩效的深层认知。此外，本研究将帮助食品零售行业理解客户关系管理和精益思维在中小型食品零售供应链企业成本控制中的重要作用。
tags: strategic alliance, customer relationship management, lean thinking, trust, commitment, efficiency, Supply Chain Management

title: Review of InternationalSupplyChainRiskWithin Banking Regulations in Asia, US and EU Including Proposals to Improve Cost Efficiency by Meeting Regulatory Compliance
abstract: Major financial institutions operate in different regions of the world facing different regulatory landscapes for Supply Chain risks. In this environment, the optimization issue arises how to best comply with the different regulations and reaching cost efficiency at the same time. In this research, the international regulatory landscape for Supply Chain risks of Financial Institutions is introduced and compared internationally. It is understood as an integral part of Supply Chain Risk Management of Financial Institutions, yet the latter is analysed as the research background. Additionally, expert interviews are conducted in order to link the regulation analysis to the current challenges that Financial Institutions face. Finally, recommendations are developed on how banks can be cost efficient, while remaining regulatory compliant, facing increased international regulation in the area of Supply Chain Risk Management. The outcome of the underlying research shows that banking regulation in the area of Supply Chain risks is an important lever in the banking sector to secure customers and financial markets. However, the regulatory landscape is heterogeneous and not consistent on an international scale. Regulation in Asia is highly diverse across different countries due to different states of economic development. The US applies a rather pragmatical approach towards supply chain risk regulation applying different standards of standard setting institutions. Lastly, the EU is very restrictive and strives to unify regulation across member states. Banks should follow a consistent management approach keeping in mind international locations and the strictest regulatory environment they are operating in, to improve cost efficiency yet being regulatory compliant. Also, collaboration with and amongst regulators and other banks internationally is recommended for improved cost efficiency.
ch_abstract: 全球主要金融机构在不同地区运营，面临着供应链风险各异的法律监管环境。在此背景下，如何以最优方式同时满足不同法规要求并实现成本效益成为核心优化议题。本研究系统梳理并横向对比了金融机构供应链风险的国际监管框架，将其视为金融机构供应链风险管理体系的有机组成部分，但后者仅作为研究背景进行分析。研究还通过专家访谈将监管分析与金融机构当前实际挑战相衔接，最终提出银行业在供应链风险管理领域面临日益严格的国际监管时，如何兼顾成本效益与合规性的可行性建议。研究表明：供应链风险监管是银行业保护客户与金融市场安全的重要抓手，但全球监管体系存在显著差异。亚洲各国因经济发展阶段不同导致监管模式高度分化；美国采用实用主义策略，援引多家标准制定机构的不同规范；欧盟则实施严格限制，致力于推动成员国监管统一。建议银行采取统一管理策略，综合考虑国际分支机构所在地及最严苛的运营环境法规要求，在提升成本效益的同时确保合规。此外，跨国监管机构间及同业间的协作也将有效提升成本效率。
tags: International Banking Regulation, Supply Chain Risk Management, Outsourcing

title: Examining Factors InfluencingSupplyChainRobustness andSupplyChainVelocity During Uncertainty with the Moderating Effect of Supportive Hr Practices
abstract: The prevalence of Black Swan events have impelled logistics firm to restructure their supply chain strategies. Therefore, current study has developed research framework with factors including supply chain innovation, supply chain empowerment, risk management capability, supply chain collaboration and supply chain disruption and investigates supply chain robustness. Moreover, this study has conceptualized supportive HR practices as moderator factor between supply chain robustness and supply chain velocity. Overall, 253 valid responses were retrieved from respondents. Structural assessment have indicated that supply chain innovation, risk management capability, supply chain disruption, supply chain empowerment and supply chain collaboration explained 77.7% variance in supply chain robustness. Practically, this study has recommended that supply chain innovation, risk management capability, supply chain disruption and supply chain empowerment are key factors that boost supply chain robustness and hence need managerial attention. Similarly, this study has suggested that managers could achieve supply chain velocity through supportive HR practices and must be in consideration set while developing new supply chain strategies. This research is unique as it develops an integrated research model to investigate factors impact supply chain robustness and supply chain velocity.
ch_abstract: 黑天鹅事件的频发促使物流企业重构其供应链战略。为此，本研究构建了包含供应链创新、供应链赋能、风险管理能力、供应链协作与供应链中断等要素的研究框架，对供应链稳健性展开探讨。研究还将支持性人力资源实践作为供应链稳健性与供应链速度之间的调节因素进行理论化建模。研究共收集253份有效样本，结构模型分析表明：供应链创新、风险管理能力、供应链中断、供应链赋能和供应链协作共同解释了供应链稳健性77.7%的变异量。实践层面，本研究指出供应链创新、风险管理能力、供应链中断和供应链赋能是提升供应链稳健性的关键要素，应引起管理层重视。同时建议管理者通过支持性人力资源实践实现供应链速度提升，在制定新供应链战略时须纳入考量。本研究的创新性在于构建了综合研究模型，系统考察各要素对供应链稳健性与速度的影响机制。
tags: Supply chain empowerment, Disruption, Innovation, Supply chain velocity, Supply chain robustness, Supportive HR practices

title: The Product View and its Impact onSupplyChainExcellence
abstract: The process of delivering goods and services better, faster and cheaper sounds simple but can sometimes be unpredictable and lead to shortages or surpluses. Over the past two decades, the supply chain journey has evolved through a number of distinct phases along with a shift in power from suppliers to customers. Over the course of this evolution, supply chain professionals have expanded their perspective and philosophy from an inventory-centric view in the 1980s to an order-centric view in the ’90s to a product-centric view today. As product lifecycles shrink, innovation has risen to the top of the CEO agenda. But product innovation cannot meet the business objectives of lifecycle profitability without supply chain process considerations.
ch_abstract: 以更好、更快、更廉价的方式交付商品和服务的过程听起来简单，但有时可能难以预测，并导致短缺或过剩。过去二十年间，供应链的发展经历了几个不同的阶段，同时权力也从供应商转移到了客户手中。在这一演变过程中，供应链专业人士的视角和理念已经从20世纪80年代以库存为中心，到90年代以订单为中心，再到如今以产品为中心。随着产品生命周期的缩短，创新已跃居CEO议程的首位。但如果不考虑供应链流程，产品创新就无法实现生命周期盈利的商业目标。
tags: Operations Management, Dynamic Analysis, Supply Chain Management, Production Management, Business Economics, Supply Chain Trends, Product Evolution, Product View, Product-Centric View Operations Management, Dynamic Analysis, Supply Chain Management, Production Management, Business Economics, Supply

title: SupplyChainCoordination for E-Commerce:RiskPenalty vs. Flat Rate
abstract: 1. Problem Definition: We study the coordination of an E-commerce supply chain between online sellers and 3rd party shippers to meet random demand surges, induced by, for instance, online shopping holidays.2. Academic/Practical Relevance: Motivated by the challenge of meeting the highly unpredictable demand surges in E-commerce, we study shipping contracts and supply chain coordination between online sellers and 3rd party shippers in a novel model taking the unique features of the shipping industry into account.3. Methodology: We compare two shipping contracts: the risk penalty (recently proposed by UPS) and the flat rate (used by FedEx), and analyze their impact on the seller, the shipper, and the supply chain.4. Results: We discover that against the common belief, the sophisticated risk penalty is not much better than the simple flat rate for the shipper. Although both the risk penalty and the flat rate can coordinate the supply chain, the risk penalty does so only if the shipper makes zero profit, but the flat rate can provide a positive profit for both. These results represent a new form of double marginalization and risk-sharing, in sharp contrast to the well-known literature on the classic supplier-retailer supply chain, where risk-sharing contracts (similar to the risk penalty) can bring benefits to all parties, but the single wholesale price contract (similar to the flat rate) can achieve supply chain coordination only when the supplier makes zero profit. We also find that only the online seller, but not the shipper, has the motivation to vertically integrate the seller-shipper supply chain.5. Managerial Implications: Coordinating the seller-shipper supply chain is an important way to meet the unpredictable demand surges in E-commerce. Our results imply that the risk penalty is unnecessarily complex because the simple flat rate is just as good as the risk penalty for the shipper and is better for the seller-shipper supply chain as a whole. Our study also explains and supports the recent practice of online sellers (e.g., Amazon.com and JD.com), but not shippers, to vertically integrate the supply chain by consistently expanding their shipping capabilities.
ch_abstract: 1. 问题定义：我们研究在线卖家与第三方承运商之间电商供应链的协调机制，以应对由网络购物节等活动引发的随机需求激增。  . 2. 学术/实践意义：基于电商领域高度不可预测的需求激增挑战，我们在考虑航运业独特特征的新模型中，研究在线卖家与第三方承运商之间的运输合同及供应链协调机制。  . 3. 研究方法：我们比较两种运输合同——风险惩罚（近期由UPS提出）与统一费率（FedEx采用），并分析其对卖家、承运商及供应链的影响。  . 4. 研究结果：与普遍认知相反，我们发现对承运商而言，复杂的风险惩罚合同并不比简单的统一费率优越。虽然两种合同均可协调供应链，但风险惩罚仅在承运商零利润时有效，而统一费率能使双方均获得正利润。这些结果呈现了一种新型的双重边际化与风险分担形式，与经典供应商-零售商供应链文献形成鲜明对比——在传统模型中，风险分担合同（类似风险惩罚）能使各方获益，而单一批发价合同（类似统一费率）仅在供应商零利润时实现供应链协调。我们还发现，只有在线卖家（而非承运商）有动机对卖家-承运商供应链进行垂直整合。  . 5. 管理启示：协调卖家-承运商供应链是应对电商不可预测需求激增的重要途径。结果表明风险惩罚合同过于复杂，因为对承运商而言统一费率同样有效，且对整个卖家-承运商供应链更有利。本研究也解释并支持了近期在线卖家（如亚马逊、京东）持续扩展物流能力以垂直整合供应链的实践，而承运商则无此动机。
tags: online retailing, shipping contracts, supply chain coordination, risk-sharing, flat rate

title: RiskPropagation through Payment Distortion inSupplyChains
abstract: The supply chain literature has devoted much attention to studying how the variability of orders propagates upstream. We explore how this insight extends to the variability of payments to suppliers and its impact on how risk is generated and propagates upstream. To do so, we model the financial features of a supply chain based on industry reports and empirical findings from the finance literature. Capturing policies and constraints of the agents in the supply chain in a formal model, we are able to generate and explain the behavior observed in real supply chains. We show that payment variability occurs and propagates, even if orders are constant, in a cash-constrained supply chain. Furthermore, our model reveals that payment variability may even become amplified under severe cash restrictions. We identify the factors that drive the propagation of variability-the industry risk, the firm's operational leverage, the existence of a financial leverage target, and the cost of debt. The model also makes it possible to explore states of nature not often observed in practice, but that may have an effect in managers' behavior, for example, bankruptcies. We numerically illustrate the impact of these drivers on the risk of upper echelons (suppliers and suppliers' suppliers) as well as the interactions between order and payment variability. We close by summarizing our findings and discussing future research opportunities.
ch_abstract: 供应链文献对订单波动如何向上游传递进行了大量研究。我们探讨了这一观点如何延伸至供应商付款的波动性及其对风险产生与向上游传递的影响。为此，我们基于行业报告和金融文献的实证研究，构建了供应链财务特征模型。通过将供应链中各主体的政策与约束纳入正式模型，我们能够重现并解释真实供应链中观察到的行为。研究表明，在资金受限的供应链中，即使订单量保持恒定，付款波动仍会发生并向上游传递。此外，模型揭示在严重资金约束下，付款波动甚至可能出现放大效应。我们识别出驱动波动传递的四大因素：行业风险、企业运营杠杆、财务杠杆目标的存在以及债务成本。该模型还能探究实践中罕见但可能影响管理者行为的自然状态，例如破产情况。我们通过数值模拟展示了这些驱动因素对上游层级（供应商及供应商的供应商）风险的影响，以及订单波动与付款波动之间的相互作用。最后我们总结研究发现并讨论未来研究方向。
tags: risk, bullwhip effect, credit contagion, supply chain management, empirical modeling, operations management-finance link

title: EU and USExportControlRegimes for Dual Use Goods: An Overview of Existing Frameworks
abstract: The systems of EU and US export controls of dual-use items have periods of shared history, where the regulatory efforts were directed at a common adversary and with regard to a common array of critical goods and technologies. Despite certain similarities, the current export control regimes warrant awareness of the mutual policies and procedures for EU and US companies engaged in export and re-export of sensitive items. The differing approaches EU Member States take in implementing export controls and the overall complexity of the US system, now bearing the results of the Export Control Reform, make it difficult to navigate one’s way and not lose one’s sight of the forest for the trees. The article seeks to draw the changing export control frameworks in both jurisdictions and evaluate their interactions from a business perspective.
ch_abstract: 欧盟和美国的军民两用物项出口管制体系曾有过共同的历史时期，当时监管措施针对共同对手及一系列关键商品与技术。尽管存在某些相似之处，当前出口管制制度要求从事敏感物项出口和转口的欧美企业必须了解彼此政策与程序。欧盟成员国执行出口管制的差异化做法，加上美国体系经出口管制改革后的整体复杂性，使得企业难以厘清头绪、避免见树不见林。本文旨在勾勒两大司法管辖区不断演变的出口管制框架，并从商业视角评估其互动关系。
tags: EU export controls, US export controls, dual-use goods, EU Regulation 428/2009, US Export Control Reform (ECR), Commerce Control List, Export Administration Regulations

title: MappingExportControlExtraterritoriality in the U.S.-China Technology Decoupling
abstract: Historically, the United States assertion of extraterritoriality under its export control laws has elicited considerable scholarly discourse. In recent years and with the perceived national security threat posed by a burgeoning China, the U.S. has dramatically expanded a set of extraterritorial rules in its existing export control restrictions. This Article evaluates such expansion of export control extraterritoriality in the context of waning trade multilateralism. It first provides a doctrinal examination of the development of extraterritoriality in U.S. export control, focusing on the recent intensification of U.S.-China technology decoupling, exemplified through the expansion of end-use control and extraterritorial jurisdiction over U.S. persons. Then, by drawing upon recent literature on geoeconomic trade law, the Article argues that a revitalized priority on security-oriented trade policy making will justify this expansion of export control extraterritoriality together with ally-based enforcement exception rules. Nonetheless, expansion of export control extraterritoriality will easily be a slippery slope, potentially initiating retaliatory cycles. Without a multilateral solution, it risks a dramatic realignment of international trade into blocks of allies and/or regions, thereby undermining decades of achievements in neo-liberal trade and hurting its leadership in a rules-based order. The Article concludes by reflecting on remaining multilateralist avenues to rule on export extraterritoriality when new trade dispute arises, in light of a few recent WTO DSB reform proposals.
ch_abstract: 历史上，美国依据其出口管制法主张域外管辖权引发了大量学术讨论。近年来，随着中国崛起带来的国家安全威胁加剧，美国大幅扩展了现有出口管制中的域外适用规则。本文在贸易多边主义式微的背景下评估这种出口管制域外管辖权的扩张。首先从学理层面梳理美国出口管制域外管辖权的发展脉络，聚焦近期美中技术脱钩加剧的态势，通过扩大最终用途管制和对美国公民的域外管辖等典型案例展开分析。随后借助地缘经济贸易法领域的最新研究成果，本文论证以安全为导向的贸易政策制定重新成为优先事项，将为这种域外管辖权扩张及盟友豁免执行规则提供正当性依据。然而出口管制域外管辖权的扩张极易形成滑坡效应，可能引发报复性循环。若无多边解决方案，或将导致国际贸易格局按盟友阵营和/或地区区块剧烈重组，从而破坏数十年新自由主义贸易成果，并损害基于规则的国际秩序领导力。文章最后结合近期若干WTO争端解决机制改革提案，探讨在新贸易争端出现时规制出口域外管辖权的剩余多边主义路径。
tags: Export Control, U.S.-China Relations, Extraterritoriality, Geoeconomic Trade Order, Dispute Settlement

title: Balancing Innovation, Development, and Security: Dual-Use Concepts inExportControlLaws
abstract: Dual-use export control is a field of law that regulates the export of items that serve both civilian and military purposes. In fact, a variety of materials, products, facilities, technologies and information which are critical for sustaining our civilian lives could also be mobilised for strengthening the military capabilities of the governments as well as non-state armed groups and terrorists. This paper aims at unveiling multi-faceted duality in the regulation of the cross-border transfer of dual-use items. International, EU and national laws concerning the export control of dual-use items involve a critical choice and weighting of potentially contradictory normative perspectives. While the area of law is sometimes perceived as technical, the export control of dual-use items is normatively charged as well as deeply political.
ch_abstract: 两用物项出口管制是一个法律领域，旨在规范具有民用和军事双重用途物项的出口。事实上，维系我们民用生活的各种材料、产品、设施、技术和信息，也可能被调动用于增强政府以及非国家武装团体和恐怖分子的军事能力。本文旨在揭示两用物项跨境转移监管中的多重二元性。涉及两用物项出口管制的国际法、欧盟法和国内法，需要对可能相互矛盾的规范视角进行关键选择和权衡。尽管这一法律领域有时被视为技术性的，但两用物项的出口管制既具有规范性，又具有深刻的政治性。
tags: export control; dual-use; cyber technology; human rights

title: Dual-UseExportControl: Security and Human Rights Challenges to Multilateralism
abstract: International standard-setting in the field of export control has been shaped by the presence of non-binding multilateral regimes. Central to international regulatory harmonisation is the Wassenaar Arrangement concerning export controls for conventional arms as well as for dual-use goods and technologies. Institutionalised regulatory coordination through multilateral regimes is essential, in part because the multilateral trade regime accommodates apologetic security exceptions that flexibly allow each member’s own export control practices. Multilateralism in the context of dual-use export control has been subject to various political and normative challenges, however. Various attempts to circumvent the Wassenaar Arrangement have been based not only on national security narratives. The multilateral regime has also been fundamentally challenged by human rights narratives. This paper sheds light on these dual challenges through the analysis of export controls over digital and so-called emerging technologies.
ch_abstract: 出口管制领域的国际标准制定一直受到不具约束力的多边机制的影响。国际监管协调的核心是涉及常规武器及两用物项和技术出口管制的《瓦森纳协定》。通过多边机制实现制度化的监管协调至关重要，部分原因在于多边贸易体制包含了弹性允许各成员自主实施出口管制的"安全例外"条款。然而两用物项出口管制领域的多边主义正面临多重政治与规范挑战。围绕《瓦森纳协定》的各种规避尝试不仅基于国家安全论述，该多边机制更受到人权论述的根本性质疑。本文通过分析数字技术与所谓新兴技术的出口管制，揭示了这两重挑战。
tags: dual-use, export control, WTO, security exception, human rights, multilateralism

title: Short Communication: An Exercise in Modelling of Consumption, Import andExportof an Exhaustible Resource
abstract: In this paper, we analyse a control theoretic model of a country possessing a finite amount of a nonrenewable resource. The country can both consume the indigenous resource and export it. Moreover, a substitute for the indigenous resource is available at a given backstop price. We obtain the optimal consumption, export and import policy for the country.
ch_abstract: 本文分析了一个国家拥有有限非可再生资源的控制理论模型。该国既可消费本土资源也可将其出口。此外，存在一种给定后备价格的替代品可供进口。我们得出了该国最优的消费、出口及进口策略。
tags: Optimal control, non-renewable resource, import/export, consumption, Maximum principle

title: The EU,ExportControls, and Minding the National Security Gap
abstract: Recent changes in the EU's Export Control Regulation provide a hook for better US-EU collaboration on preventing the leakage of critical dual use technologies.
ch_abstract: 欧盟出口管制条例的最新修改为美欧加强合作防止关键两用技术泄露提供了契机。
tags: European Union, export controls, dual-use technology

title: NonoilExport– Growth Nexus in Nigeria: Macroeconomic Base for NonoilExport-Led Growth Policy
abstract: Public hue and cry about Nigeria’s overdependence on oil has now faded into an inaudible whisper and a mere rhetoric as diversification of the Nigerian economy still remains an unsettled  issue. However, the dwindling international oil price has rendered the country insolvent thereby creating a need to exploit non-oil sources. Therefore,  the study was aimed at devising a viable non-oil export-led growth policy. Study covered the period 1980 to 2014. Data were sourced from Central Bank of Nigeria,  National Bureau of Statistics and World  Development  Indicators.  This study revealed a preferred choice for a more robust factor analytic model to isolate potent factors influencing non-oil export–growth nexus in Nigeria.  Results indicate that there was positive significant relationship between non-oil export and growth in Nigeria which was solely attributable to the influence of foreign direct investment and trade liberalization.  Moreover, the study revealed that the active variables in the constellation of foreign direct investment and trade liberalization provided the theoretical constructs for a new non-oil export-led  growth policy.  It was concluded that a viable non-oil export-led growth policy should comprise of such policy instruments as budgetary policy, exchange rate policy, human resource development  policy, credit policy, and import substitution/export promotion policy. It was recommended, inter alia, that petroleum  exporting countries should channel foreign direct investment to non-oil sectors in order to render the sectors viable and so augment their productive bases.
ch_abstract: 关于尼日利亚过度依赖石油的公众抗议声浪，如今已消退为几不可闻的低语，沦为空洞说辞，因为该国经济多元化仍是一个悬而未决的议题。然而，国际油价持续下跌已使国家陷入财政困境，亟需开发非石油收入来源。为此，本研究旨在制定可行的非石油出口导向型增长政策，研究时段覆盖1980至2014年，数据来源于尼日利亚中央银行、国家统计局及世界发展指标。研究发现，采用更稳健的因子分析模型能有效分离影响尼日利亚非石油出口与增长关联的核心要素。结果表明，非石油出口与经济增长呈显著正相关，这种关联完全归因于外国直接投资和贸易自由化的影响。此外，研究揭示外国直接投资与贸易自由化体系中的活跃变量，为构建新型非石油出口导向增长政策提供了理论框架。结论指出，可行的非石油出口导向政策应包含预算政策、汇率政策、人力资源开发政策、信贷政策及进口替代/出口促进政策等工具。建议特别提出：石油出口国应将外国直接投资引导至非石油领域，以增强该领域活力并扩大生产基础。
tags: Non-oil export; economic growth; macroeconomic base; nonoil export-led-policy

title: The Executive Role in CulturingExportControlCompliance
abstract: The control of exports for national security purposes are governed by a complex web of treaties, laws, and regulations. Controls on the export of dual-use technologies (technologies for which there are legitimate civilian and military uses) are regulated by the Export Administration Regulations overseen by the Department of Commerce. When a suspected violation is found, Commerce can issue a letter of warning, refer the case for criminal prosecution, or pursue administrative penalties. This Note discusses the penalty guidance that Commerce uses to determine appropriate levels of administrative penalties. It argues that one factor, the corporate culture of the offending company, which is relegated by Commerce to an aggravating or mitigating circumstance is actually vitally important in achieving the goals of export enforcement - deserving far more than its treatment as an aggravating or mitigating circumstance. In fact, it is vital for determining primary liability and is the best way to tie together the role that individuals play in corporate behavior.
