ch_abstract: 出于国家安全目的对出口的控制由一系列复杂的条约、法律和法规共同约束。对军民两用技术（具有合法民用和军用用途的技术）的出口管制由商务部监管的《出口管理条例》进行规范。当发现涉嫌违规行为时，商务部可发出警告信、将案件移交刑事起诉或追究行政处罚。本文探讨了商务部用于确定适当行政处罚级别的处罚指引，指出其中一项因素——违规企业的企业文化——虽被商务部归为加重或减轻处罚的情节，实际上对实现出口执法的目标至关重要，其重要性远超作为加重或减轻情节的定位。事实上，该因素对判定主要责任具有决定性作用，也是将个人行为与企业行为联系起来的最佳纽带。
tags: Export controls, BIS, EAR, export compliance, corporate culture

title: ExportControland Measures Affecting Trade in Goods in Global COVID-19 Crisis: The Emergence of Sanitary Protectionism in the European Union
abstract: One of the side effects of the COVID-19 crisis is the resurgence of export restrictions. Many States worldwide adopted temporary restrictions on exports of certain medical goods and some foodstuffs to mitigate actual or potential shortages of critical supplies. 98 States out of 130 adopted temporary measures affecting trade since the outbreak of the pandemic in 2020. The measures range from export bans to licensing requirements and the right of first refusal for the exporting country's government.The high number of States adopting some form of export control concerning the so-called "COVID goods."  entails exploring the phenomenon to understand better the legitimacy of the measures in the multilateral framework of the WTO and their impact on the global trading system. The practice of the European Union in this matter is particularly interesting. The EU was one of the first regional areas heavily hit by the COVID-19 and its Member States among the first nations adopting export control measures. At the very beginning of the pandemic, some EU member States adopted export restrictions affecting intra-EU trade. The risk of a race to close the borders to essential goods in the internal market, a heavily integrated space, urged the Commission to take action to preserve the integrity of the single market and the free movement of goods, introducing a mechanism of control of exports of COVID goods to non-EU countries as a quid pro quo for the 'full and effective lifting of all forms of internal bans or restrictions within the internal market.The EU Member States briefly experienced the freedom to adopt export restrictions at the pandemic's beginning unilaterally. Then, thanks to a political agreement between them and the Commission, the limitations in adopting export control measures according to a uniform export authorisation scheme regulated and supervised by the Commission.This paper aims at studying the export control regime for COVID-19 vaccines adopted by the EU at the end of January 2021 and still in place at the time of writing. The case of restrictions in the trade of vaccines is particularly interesting considering the quite unanimous consensus in the international community that to bring this pandemic to an end, vaccines must be available to people in all countries and not just in producer ones. Restrictions on the trade of vaccines aim at protecting the population of the producer countries adopting them, but at the same time leaving alone the countries without vaccine production capacity means to delay the recovery for all. Furthermore, vaccine production is highly specialised and concentrated in few countries; keeping markets open is a condition to distribute vaccines broadly. The EU export control regime will be analysed and compared with the export control policies adopted by other major producers of the COVID-19 vaccines to assess its impact on the global distribution of such vaccines.
ch_abstract: 新冠疫情危机的一个副作用是出口限制措施的重新抬头。为缓解关键物资的实际或潜在短缺，全球许多国家都对某些医疗用品和部分食品实施了临时出口限制。自2020年疫情暴发以来，130个国家中有98个采取了影响贸易的临时措施，这些措施包括出口禁令、许可证制度以及出口国政府优先采购权等。如此多国家对所谓"抗疫物资"实施某种形式的出口管制，需要我们深入探究这一现象，以更好地理解这些措施在世贸组织多边框架内的合法性及其对全球贸易体系的影响。. . 欧盟在这方面的实践尤为引人关注。作为最早遭受疫情重创的地区之一，其成员国率先实施了出口管制措施。疫情初期，部分欧盟成员国出台的出口限制影响了欧盟内部贸易。在这个高度一体化的市场内，重要物资边境封锁竞赛的风险促使欧盟委员会采取行动维护单一市场完整性和货物自由流动，通过建立对非欧盟国家抗疫物资出口的管控机制，换取"全面有效取消内部市场所有形式的禁令或限制"。. . 欧盟成员国在疫情初期曾短暂享有单方面实施出口限制的自由，随后通过成员国与欧盟委员会的政治协商，转为依照欧盟委员会监管的统一出口授权机制实施管制。本文旨在研究欧盟于2021年1月底出台且截至撰稿时仍在实施的疫苗出口管制制度。考虑到国际社会普遍共识——要终结疫情就必须让所有国家（而不仅是生产国）民众获得疫苗，对疫苗贸易的限制尤其值得探讨。这类限制虽能保护实施国的民众，却使无疫苗生产能力的国家陷入困境，最终将延缓全球复苏进程。加之疫苗生产高度专业化且集中在少数国家，保持市场开放是实现疫苗广泛分配的前提。本文将分析欧盟出口管制制度，并与其他主要新冠疫苗生产国的出口政策进行比较，评估其对疫苗全球分配的影响。
tags: COVID-19 crisis, European Union response, Export control measures, External trade restrictions, Export authorization schemes

title: Research Guide toExportControland WMD Nonproliferation Law
abstract: This research guide is to guide would-be researchers to the primary sources (statutes, cases, regulations, and international treaties) and the websites of major governmental agencies in charge of export controls and the International organizations promoting non-proliferation.
ch_abstract: 本研究指南旨在引导潜在研究者查阅出口管制的主要法律渊源（法规、案例、条例及国际条约），并介绍负责出口管制的主要政府机构网站及推动防扩散的国际组织。
tags: legal research, pathfinder, export control, WMD non-proliferation, export control law, dual-use products/techologies

title: Cyber Weapons &ExportControl: Incorporating Dual Use with the PrEP Model
abstract: How do existing export control laws treat malware and cyber weapons and what complications arise with their use? This paper presents a technically grounded framework to examine under what conditions malicious software components might be covered by the Export Administration Regulations (EAR) and International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR). It presents the law in question and examines several key challenges in classifying and restricting the flow of cyber weapons.
ch_abstract: 现有出口管制法律如何对待恶意软件和网络武器，其使用会引发哪些复杂问题？本文提出一个基于技术的分析框架，用于研究恶意软件组件在何种条件下可能受到《出口管理条例》（EAR）和《国际武器贸易条例》（ITAR）的管辖。文中阐述了相关法律条文，并探讨了网络武器分类及流通限制中的若干关键挑战。
tags: export control, malware, cyber weapons, national security, law, national security law, cyber security

title: BEPZA’s Economic Impact: Fueling Bangladesh’s GDP Expansion ThroughExportProcessing Zones
abstract: The study delves into the economic ramifications of Bangladesh Export Processing Zones Authority (BEPZA) in driving GDP expansion through Export Processing Zones (EPZs). Its objective is to gauge the financial growth and impact of BEPZA by scrutinizing cumulative data on investments, employment, and exports from the eight operational EPZs, spanning from their inception to the fiscal year 2022-2023. The findings unveil a discernible upward trajectory in year-on-year investments, signifying heightened confidence from both foreign and domestic investors. This surge is intrinsically linked to BEPZA's comprehensive services and activities tailored to streamline operations and enhance the business environment, thereby attracting increased investment. Furthermore, the cumulative employment figures underscore substantial job creation, contributing to poverty mitigation and socioeconomic progress. The escalating export values underscore the pivotal role of EPZs in bolstering Bangladesh's global trade competitiveness and foreign exchange earnings. This study not only underscores BEPZA's indispensable contributions to the national economy but also aligns with the goals of fostering sustainable development and inclusive growth. By reinforcing the significance of targeted policies and infrastructure enhancements, the findings underscore the potential for BEPZA to persist as a pivotal force in steering Bangladesh's economic trajectory. In sum, this research furnishes crucial insights for policymakers and stakeholders dedicated to optimizing the economic advantages of BEPZA and EPZs within the context of Bangladesh's ongoing development.
ch_abstract: 该研究深入探讨了孟加拉国出口加工区管理局（BEPZA）通过出口加工区（EPZs）推动GDP增长的经济影响。其目标是通过分析八个运营中出口加工区从成立至2022-2023财政年度的累计投资、就业和出口数据，评估BEPZA的财务增长及其影响。研究结果揭示了逐年投资的明显上升趋势，表明国内外投资者的信心增强。这一增长与BEPZA为简化运营和改善商业环境而提供的全面服务和活动密切相关，从而吸引了更多投资。此外，累计就业数据突显了巨大的就业创造，有助于减轻贫困并促进社会经济进步。不断增长的出口额凸显了出口加工区在提升孟加拉国全球贸易竞争力和外汇收入方面的关键作用。本研究不仅强调了BEPZA对国家经济不可或缺的贡献，还与促进可持续发展和包容性增长的目标相一致。通过强化针对性政策和基础设施改善的重要性，研究结果凸显了BEPZA作为引领孟加拉国经济发展关键力量的持续潜力。总之，这项研究为致力于在孟加拉国持续发展背景下优化BEPZA和出口加工区经济优势的政策制定者和利益相关者提供了重要见解。
tags: Bangladesh, BEPZA, Development, Economy, Employment, Export, FDI

title: CanExportRestrictions Be Deterred?
abstract: The COVID-19 global health pandemic has led some 75 countries to restrict their exports of hundreds of products, ranging from antibiotics and face masks to medical ventilators. The cost of these measures, which lead to global shortages, will be counted in human lives. Yet the multilateral trade regime lacks effective legal disciplines on export restrictions. In response, scholars have pinned their hopes on the prospect of potential retaliation working as a deterrent. Are such hopes warranted? Early evidence suggests not: the threat of retaliation cannot effectively deter most export controls, because the most flagrant country users are also shielded by the very characteristics that render them prone to imposing export restraints in the first place. The empirical evidence indicates the prospect of retaliation has played no role in the decision to restrict exports by the world’s biggest exporters of essential medical goods. Yet autarky is unlikely to be a workable solution to assure domestic supply. I suggest that attempts at limiting market consolidation of essential goods may be one way of reducing the incentive to implement export controls in the first place.
ch_abstract: 新冠疫情全球大流行已导致约75个国家限制出口数百种产品，从抗生素、口罩到医用呼吸机不一而足。这些引发全球短缺的措施将以生命为代价。然而现行多边贸易体制对出口限制缺乏有效法律约束。对此，学者们寄望于潜在报复行为可能产生的威慑作用。这种期望能否成立？早期证据显示答案是否定的：报复威胁无法有效阻止多数出口管制，因为最肆无忌惮实施限制的国家，恰恰受到那些促使其采取限制措施的特质的保护。实证研究表明，在全球主要医疗物资出口国实施出口限制的决策中，报复前景并未产生任何影响。但自给自足并非保障国内供应的可行方案。我认为，限制关键物资市场集中度或许是减少出口限制初始动机的可行之策。
tags: COVID-19, export restrictions, PPE, retaliation, trade, WTO

title: From CoCom to Wassenaar Arrangement and UNSCR 1540: A Historical Review of Multilateral High-techExportControlPolicy Development
abstract: Arm and dual-use technology export controls were originally proposed by technology advanced countries as a defensive measure for national security purposes during the Cold War. However, those measures are gradually emerging as a source of contention of being more offensive in the recent international trade conflicts. Due to the national security significance, Arm and dual-use export controls are not governed by the World Trade Organisation but by several political-oriented international regimes. This paper provides a historical overview of the normative and functional development of the multilateral dual-use export control regime (CoCom and its successor Wassenaar Arrangement), whose functions, guidelines, processes and dual-use list structure have become the foundation of many national and regional export control policies. By tracking this multilateral regime’s seventy-year evolution history, this paper also reveals that the US has had a hegemonic influence on the decision-making of dual-use export control rules ever since the CoCom period, and points out that, the reformed institutional functions in WA has shown a trend of shifting from political cooperation framework to a more legalized regime respecting the rule of law. In addition, this chapter also introduces the UNSC Resolution 1540 as the legal the base of the export control policies in Wassenaar proscribed countries and the the main cause of asymmetric implementation in different countries.
ch_abstract: 军事和两用技术出口管制最初是由技术先进国家在冷战期间作为国家安全目的的防御性措施提出的。然而，近年来这些措施在国际贸易冲突中逐渐显现出更具攻击性的争议特性。由于涉及国家安全，军事和两用技术出口管制不受世界贸易组织管辖，而是由多个政治导向的国际机制管理。本文对多边两用物项出口管制机制（巴黎统筹委员会及其后继瓦森纳安排）的规范性与功能性发展进行了历史性梳理，该机制的职能、准则、流程及两用物项清单结构已成为诸多国家与地区出口管制政策的基础。通过追溯该多边机制七十年的演变历程，本文揭示了美国自巴统时期起就对两用物项出口管制规则决策具有霸权性影响，并指出瓦森纳安排改革后的制度功能呈现出从政治合作框架向更注重法治的法律化机制转变的趋势。此外，本章还介绍了联合国安理会第1540号决议作为瓦森纳管制对象国出口政策的法律依据，以及导致各国实施不对称性的主要原因。
tags: dual-use export control, Wassenaar Arrangement, Cocom, UNSC Resolution 1540, cooperation regime

title: ExportControls in the People's Republic of China
abstract: This report provides a comprehensive overview of China's system of nonproliferation export controls, including the system's legal basis, its licensing and enforcement programs, government-to-industry outreach and China's participation in the international nonproliferation export control regimes.  Throughout, the report highlights recent developments and remaining challenges in along each of these dimensions. The report concludes that Chinese export controls, after a period of fits and starts, are at last entering an era of maturity that promises dividends for the international nonproliferation regime.  Still, export control development in China must be viewed in perspective, and China remains a comparative newcomer to nonproliferation export controls. As recently as the mid-1990s, Chinese export controls were a pastiche of ad hoc nonproliferation policies and opaque administrative regulations, and Chinese entities - predominantly state-owned at that time - were engaged in a wide range of transfers of goods and technology that directly or indirectly contributed to a number of countries' WMD and missile programs. Since then, driven in part by self-interest and in part by coercion, China has developed more pragmatic nonproliferation policies and established a de jure export control system based on transparent and international-standard laws and regulations. Chinese proliferation challenges in the 1980s and 1990s - including state-sanctioned proliferation, insufficient and opaque export control procedures, weak political will to adhere to nonproliferation pledges and a combative and aloof attitude toward the multilateral export control regimes - have diminished or been eliminated to a great degree. Although problems remain, it would be inaccurate to say that these are new proliferation challenges.  Rather, it is the legacy of previous challenges that continues to affect the implementation of Chinese export controls today. While China’s recent export control progress has eroded the severity of a number of proliferation issues, it has placed into greater relief a number of issues that formerly went unnoticed.  Because of this, it may appear to some observers that the persistence of challenges, albeit different ones today than in the past, demonstrates that China has failed to make progress toward implementing nonproliferation export controls. Alternatively, other observers may perceive the unrelenting identification of export control problems as the product of implacable critics of Chinese nonproliferation policy who evaluate the PRC against an inconstant, unfair metric of success.  Neither of these views would be correct. Instead, the narrative of Chinese export control development is a mixed one. While the achievements of recent years have taken on considerable momentum, a bevy of remaining challenges could easily stunt future export control progress in the PRC.
ch_abstract: 本报告全面概述了中国防扩散出口管制体系，包括该体系的法律基础、许可与执法机制、政府与企业的互动以及中国参与国际防扩散出口管制机制的情况。报告始终聚焦上述各领域的最新进展与现存挑战。报告结论指出，经过一段曲折发展期后，中国出口管制正步入成熟阶段，将为国际防扩散机制带来积极效益。但必须客观看待中国出口管制的发展进程，中国在防扩散出口管制领域仍属后来者。直至1990年代中期，中国的出口管制仍是零散的临时防扩散政策与不透明行政规章的拼凑物，当时以国有企业为主的中国实体参与了大量直接或间接助长多国大规模杀伤性武器及导弹计划的物资技术转让。此后，在利益驱动与外部压力共同作用下，中国制定了更务实的防扩散政策，并建立起以透明化、国际标准的法律法规为基础的法定出口管制体系。1980至1990年代中国存在的扩散问题——包括国家支持的扩散行为、不完善不透明的出口管制程序、履行防扩散承诺的政治意愿薄弱以及对多边出口管制机制的抵触疏离态度——已大幅减少或消除。尽管问题依然存在，但将其称为新的扩散挑战并不准确。当前影响中国出口管制实施的实为历史遗留问题。中国近期的出口管制进展虽缓解了诸多扩散问题的严重性，却也凸显出许多曾被忽视的问题。这使得某些观察者可能认为持续存在的挑战（尽管性质已不同于往昔）表明中国在实施防扩散出口管制方面停滞不前；另一些观察者则可能将不断暴露的出口管制问题归咎于中国防扩散政策的苛刻批评者采用反复无常的不公标准评判中国。这两种观点均有失偏颇。中国出口管制的发展历程实为喜忧参半：近年取得的成就虽势头强劲，但诸多遗留挑战仍可能轻易阻碍中国出口管制的未来进展。
tags: export controls, nonproliferation, arms control, China, Chinese foreign policy, technology transfer

title: Экспортный контроль товаров двойного назначения (ExportControlof Dual-Use Goods)
abstract: Russian Abstract:В статье рассмотрены теоретические и функциональные аспекты экспорта товаров двойного назначения, выявлены их особенности производства и применения, представлены табличные данные об этом экспорте, а также проанализирован контроль экспорта данного вида товаров в Российской Федерации. Автором была рассмотрена структура российского экспорта товаров и технологий двойного назначения, проанализирована правовая основа осуществления экспортного контроля в отношении товаров и технологий двойного назначения, изучены виды выявленных правонарушений в отношении экспорта указанных товаров за последние годы.English Abstract:The article considers the theoretical and functional aspects of the export of dual-use goods, identifies their features of production and application, and analyzes the export control of this type of goods in the Russian Federation. The author considered the legal framework for the implementation of export control in respect of dual-use goods and technologies, analyzed the types of export violations identified in respect of the goods in question in recent years.
ch_abstract: 文章探讨了军民两用商品出口的理论与功能层面，揭示了其生产与应用特点，并分析了俄罗斯联邦对此类商品的出口管制。作者研究了俄罗斯军民两用商品及技术出口的结构，梳理了相关出口管制的法律基础，考察了近年来涉及此类商品出口的违规行为类型。
tags: Товар, товары двойного назначения, экспорт, экспортный контроль, оружие массового поражения, правонарушения, правовая основа, код ТНВЭД, Goods, dual-use goods, export, export control, weapons of mass destruction, violations, legal framework, HS code.

title: Correlations-AdjustedExportMarket Diversification
abstract: This paper introduces new export market diversification indices incorporated with correlations of business cycles among export partners to identify the actual effects of export market diversification on export instability. Three existing export market diversification indices reflect the dispersion level in terms of the number of export partners and their export shares, without a clear control for correlations among export earnings from export partners. In addition, they are underestimated or overestimated in illuminating the negative relationship with export instability. Correlations-Adjusted export market diversification indices help their normalization. Their superiority is also proven through the regression analysis in investigating the effects of export market diversification on export instability.
ch_abstract: 本文介绍了结合出口伙伴间商业周期相关性的新出口市场多元化指数，以识别出口市场多元化对出口不稳定性的实际影响。现有三种出口市场多元化指数仅反映出口伙伴数量及其出口份额的分散程度，未能明确控制来自不同出口伙伴的出口收入相关性。此外，这些指数在揭示与出口不稳定性的负相关关系时存在低估或高估现象。经相关性调整的出口市场多元化指数有助于实现标准化。通过回归分析研究出口市场多元化对出口不稳定性的影响，这些指数的优越性也得到了验证。
tags: Correlations-Adjusted export market diversification, Export instability

title: Trade Effects of a NegativeExportShock on Direct Exporters and Wholesalers
abstract: This paper examines the effects on the exports of Estonian firms of the Russian export shock of 2014, which was a multifaceted negative market-wide income shock. The dataset covers all the Estonian exporters that exported to Russia in 2013 and the empirical analysis uses a difference-in-difference method in combination with the coarsened exact matching method to account for heterogeneities between the treatment and control groups. I find that the wholesalers affected were able to show better export performance after the shock than direct exporters were. The trade performance after the shock was lower for both wholesalers and direct exporters that had lower initial productivity levels.
ch_abstract: 本文研究了2014年俄罗斯出口冲击对爱沙尼亚企业出口的影响，该冲击是一次多方面的、波及整个市场的负面收入冲击。数据集涵盖2013年所有向俄罗斯出口的爱沙尼亚出口商，实证分析采用双重差分法结合粗化精确匹配法，以处理处理组与对照组之间的异质性。研究发现，受冲击影响的批发商比直接出口商在冲击后表现出更好的出口业绩。对于初始生产率水平较低的批发商和直接出口商而言，冲击后的贸易表现均较差。
tags: export shock, firm-level trade effects, trade effects, trade policy

title: Tilting at Windmills? The Counterposing Policy Interests Driving the U.S. Commercial SatelliteExportControlReform Debate
abstract: United States strategic export controls — which treat commercial satellite technologies, related technical data, and defense services as munitions subject to the strictest export control criteria — have been under fire for decades. Critics argue that in attempting to bolster national security by limiting the transfer of space technologies to adversaries and potential adversaries, the U.S. has unintentionally and paradoxically harmed national security by undermining the space industrial base, the academic and research institutions that feed and grow that base, and the international partnerships that drive scientific and technological advancement. There are few, if any, unequivocal supporters of the U.S. export control regime as it stands. As a result, both regulatory and statutory reform initiatives are afoot. Yet this begs the question: if the problems are and have been so apparent, why have the regulations and concomitant organic legislation not been subject to reform before now? This thesis will deconstruct the current discourse (keeping in mind its historical underpinnings) and challenge the orthodoxies of the export control reform debate in order to determine, to the extent possible, the merits of individual arguments and claims.
ch_abstract: 美国战略出口管制——将商业卫星技术、相关技术数据和国防服务视为需遵循最严格出口标准的军需品——数十年来备受争议。批评者指出，美国试图通过限制向对手及潜在对手转移航天技术来加强国家安全，却因削弱航天工业基础、支撑该基础的学术研究机构以及推动科技进步的国际合作，反而矛盾地损害了国家安全。现行出口管制体系几乎不存在明确的支持者。因此，监管与立法改革已提上议程。但这引出一个核心问题：若弊端长期显而易见，为何相关法规及配套立法至今仍未改革？本文将通过解构当前讨论（结合历史背景），挑战出口管制改革辩论中的传统观点，力求厘清各方论点的合理性与依据。
tags: export controls, ITAR, commercial satellites, space

title: Компетенции Для Реализации Экспортного Потенциала Региона (Competencies Needed to Achieve the Region'sExportPotential)
abstract: Russian Abstract:Статья посвящена рассмотрению актуальной задачи по развитию профессиональных компетенций специалистов, ответственных за реализацию экспортного потенциала субъектов Российской Федерации, что является одним из ключевых условий для успешного выполнения стратегической задачи по развитию несырьевого неэнергетического экспорта Российской Федерации. В исследовании проведен анализ программ повышения квалификации по подготовке специалистов во внешнеторговой деятельности, на основе которого была разработана методика проведения исследования рынка и верификации целевых образовательных программ дополнительного профессионального образования (повышения квалификации) в исследуемой области. Авторы исследования предлагают пути для системного решения вопроса развития комплексных экспортных компетенций специалистов профильных региональных министерств и ведомств.English Abstract:The article deals with the urgent task of developing the professional competencies of specialists responsible for achieving the export potential of the federal subjects of Russia, which is one of the key conditions for the successful implementation of the strategic objective to develop non-resource non-energy exports of the Russian Federation. The study analyzes professional development programs for training specialists in international trade activities, on the basis of which a methodology for conducting market research and verifying targeted educational programs of additional professional education (advanced training) in the field under study was developed. The authors suggest ways to systematically address the issue of developing comprehensive export competencies of specialists of relevant regional ministries and departments.
ch_abstract: 文章探讨了负责实现俄罗斯联邦各主体出口潜力的专业人员职业能力发展这一紧迫任务，这是成功完成俄罗斯联邦非资源非能源出口发展战略目标的关键条件之一。研究分析了国际贸易活动专业人员培训的进修课程，并在此基础上开发了针对该领域市场调研及验证目标性继续教育（进修）课程的方法论。作者提出了系统化解决相关地区部委专业人员综合出口能力发展问题的路径。
tags: Экспорт, специалисты в сфере ВЭД, Региональный экспортный стандарт 2.0, программы дополнительного профессионального образования, export,  specialists in the field of international trade activity, Regional export standard 2.0, programs of additional professional education, export competencies.

title: Re-Export: Assessing the Impact of Re-ExportCompanies on Sectors and the Economy
abstract: Re-exports are an important part of international trade, as they account for about a quarter of total exports, and the growth rate of re-exports exceeds the growth rate of exports. Researchers find that re-exports have a positive impact on economic growth. Despite this, in existing studies, little attention has been paid to the impact of re-exports on sectors of the economy and the direct and indirect effects of re-exports on the national economy. Based on this, the purpose of the article is to consider the impact of re-export activities on sectors of the economy and on the economy as a whole using the example of one company. The study examines the distribution of the effects of re-export companies’ activities between the national economy and foreign economies and among sectors of the economy. In addition, the value of the primary and secondary effects of the influence of the re-export company on the national economy was determined and the local multiplier value was calculated. This study identifies the main factors that influence the distribution of re-export effects between the national economy and foreign economies and among sectors and industries, as well as factors that affect the magnitude of direct and indirect re-export effects on the national economy. The local multiplier value of re-exports was also determined at 1.73.
ch_abstract: 转口贸易是国际贸易的重要组成部分，约占出口总额的四分之一，且转口贸易的增速超过出口增速。研究发现，转口贸易对经济增长具有积极影响。尽管如此，现有研究中很少关注转口贸易对经济各部门的影响，以及转口贸易对国民经济的直接和间接影响。基于此，本文旨在通过一家公司的案例，探讨转口贸易活动对经济各部门及整体经济的影响。研究分析了转口贸易公司活动产生的效应在国民经济与外国经济之间以及经济各部门之间的分配情况。此外，还量化了转口贸易公司对国民经济产生的一级和二级影响值，并计算了本地乘数值。本研究明确了影响转口贸易效应在国民经济与外国经济之间以及各行业部门间分配的主要因素，同时也识别了影响转口贸易对国民经济直接和间接效应大小的关键因素。转口贸易的本地乘数值最终测定为1.73。
tags: re-export; international trade; direct and indirect economic effects; local multiplier; EU

title: A Proposed Interpretation of GATT Article XXI(b)(ii) in Light of Its Implications forExportControl
abstract: GATT Article XXI(b)(ii) has received little scholarly attention, but increasing measures taken under the name of national security require heightened attention to it, especially with regard to export control measures. We need a detailed interpretation of the clause that can be used to distinguish measures permissible under the clause from impermissible ones. This paper presents an interpretation of the article based on existing arguments, especially those of the DS512 Panel Report, that deny the self-judging nature of the clause. It analyses how a panel should apply the principle of good faith with regard to the chapeau of the article and then interprets each component of subparagraph (ii), which concerns the taking of actions considered necessary to protect essential security interests “relating to the traffic in arms, ammunition and implements of war and to such traffic in other goods and materials as is carried on directly or indirectly for the purpose of supplying a military establishment”. Relying on tools such as the drafting history, authoritative interpretations of other parts of WTO law, and the structure and context of the article, the paper proposes the following criteria for determining measures that do not satisfy the requirement of the latter half of the subparagraph: the likelihood that the restricted trade item could get to a military establishment, its military sensitivity and scope of use, and the existence of military tension involving the invoking country. This paper is a draft.
ch_abstract: 关贸总协定第二十一条(b)(ii)条款鲜少获得学界关注，但以国家安全名义采取的措施日益增多，亟需加强对该条款的审视，尤其针对出口管制措施。我们需要对该条款进行细致阐释，以区分哪些措施属于条款允许范围，哪些则超出许可。本文基于现有论点——尤其是DS512专家组报告中否认该条款自我判定性质的观点——对该条款作出解释，分析专家组应如何适用该条款序言部分的善意原则，继而逐项阐释涉及"保护基本安全利益所必需行动"的(ii)项构成要件，这些行动须与"武器、弹药和战争工具贸易相关，或与直接间接供应军事机关的其他货物材料贸易相关"。通过起草历史、世贸组织其他条款的权威解释、以及本条款结构与语境等分析工具，本文针对不符合该项后半段要求的措施提出以下判定标准：受限贸易品流入军事机关的可能性、其军事敏感性与使用范围、以及援引国是否处于军事紧张状态。本文为草案。
tags: WTO, national security, export control

title: Does Public Financing Support Increase Exports? Evidence from a Quasi-Experiment at the UsExport-Import Bank
abstract: This paper estimates the causal effect of public financing support on exports using a large and plausibly exogenous shock to the supply of export financing support due to the shutdown of the U.S. Export-Import (ExIm) Bank in 2015. I utilize this unique quasi-experiment together with the synthetic control method to estimate that the average affected industry experienced a reduction in exports by 2.2%, or 56 cents per dollar of lost support. While these results suggest that support by the ExIm bank can be an effective policy tool to relax financing constraints and promote exports, the observed allocation of financing support across industries is suboptimal if the goal is employment growth as better targeting could create an additional 66,000 export-related jobs per year.
ch_abstract: 本文利用2015年美国进出口银行关闭导致出口融资支持供应发生的一次大规模且具有外生性的冲击，评估了公共融资支持对出口的因果效应。通过这一独特的准自然实验与合成控制法相结合，研究发现受影响的行业平均出口额下降2.2%，相当于每减少1美元融资支持导致出口减少56美分。尽管这些结果表明进出口银行的融资支持可作为缓解融资约束、促进出口的有效政策工具，但若以就业增长为目标，当前行业间融资支持分配存在次优问题——更精准的定向支持每年可额外创造66,000个出口相关就业岗位。
tags: US Export-Import Bank, Synthetic Control Method, Export Promotion, Policy Evaluation

title: Power Transitions and Global Trade Governance: The Impact of a Rising China on theExportCredit Regime
abstract: The existing liberal international economic order was constructed during the era of American hegemony and heavily shaped by US power.  How is the rise of China affecting global economic governance?  This article analyzes the case of export credit, which has long been considered a highly effective international regulatory regime and an important component of global trade governance.  I show that the rise of China is profoundly altering the landscape of export credit and undermining its governance arrangements.  State-backed export credit is a key tool of China’s development strategy, yet I argue that an explosion in China’s use of export credit is eroding the efficacy of existing international rules intended to prevent a competitive spiral of state subsidization via export credit.  The case of export credit highlights a fundamental tension between liberal institutions of global governance and the development objectives of emerging powers.
ch_abstract: 现有的自由国际经济秩序是在美国霸权时代构建的，深受美国实力的影响。中国的崛起如何影响全球经济治理？本文以出口信贷为例进行分析，该领域长期被视为高效的国际监管机制和全球贸易治理的重要组成部分。研究表明，中国的崛起正在深刻改变出口信贷格局，并削弱其治理安排。国家支持的出口信贷是中国发展战略的关键工具，但笔者认为中国出口信贷规模的激增正在削弱现有国际规则的效力，这些规则旨在防止通过出口信贷进行国家补贴的竞争性螺旋上升。出口信贷案例凸显了全球治理的自由主义制度与新兴大国发展目标之间的根本性矛盾。
tags: trade, global economic governance, rising powers, China, WTO, OECD, export credit, trade policy, international trade, subsidies, export subsidies, export finance

title: Assessment of Challenges inExportMarketing: The Case of Ethiopian Vegetable and Fruit Commercial Growers
abstract: Globalization forces companies to internationalize their operation in the global market. Exporting plays a vital role in economic development of a nation as well as for the development of the particular exporting company. Although, the benefits derived from exporting in an increasingly globalized marketplace are enormous, but for many companies, exporting is constrained by numerous challenges. The purpose of the study was to assess export marketing challenges of Ethiopian vegetable and fruit commercial growers. The study investigated 20 Ethiopian vegetable and fruit commercial growers and 8 stakeholders with questionnaires and interviews. The research utilized a mixed research design and analysis techniques specifically concurrent embedded approach. It is found out that the Ethiopian vegetable and fruit commercial growers export volume and sales lacks consistency and constrained by different challenges. Of the major challenges which were classified as internal barriers and external barriers, macro environmental barriers highly affected the growers. Local investors were highly affected by both the internal and external problems whereas foreign and joint ventures are affected in some extent with those problems. Less experienced growers were highly affected by the export problems than those who are more experienced. Management commitment problem; technological advancement problem; financial; lack of accessible transport system; low awareness of stakeholders; seasonality of Ethiopian supply; shortage of cargo; shortage of infrastructure; government bureaucracy; lack of potential markets; and shortage of inputs were identified as problems for the vegetable and fruit export. Therefore, to minimize these problems creating enabling policy environment; fair and competitive air freight cost; the growers to incorporate challenges in their export marketing strategy; the government to explore new markets, provide technical supports and long-term loans to growers; to create new competitive input suppliers; integration of stakeholders of the sector; and to recruit skilled manpower are forwarded as recommendations.
ch_abstract: 全球化迫使企业在全球市场中拓展其业务。出口对国家的经济发展以及特定出口企业的发展起着至关重要的作用。尽管在日益全球化的市场环境中，出口带来的利益巨大，但对许多企业而言，出口仍受到诸多挑战的制约。本研究旨在评估埃塞俄比亚蔬菜和水果商业种植者面临的出口营销挑战。研究通过问卷调查和访谈调查了20家埃塞俄比亚蔬菜和水果商业种植者及8家相关利益方，采用混合研究设计和分析方法，特别是并行嵌入式方法。研究发现，埃塞俄比亚蔬菜和水果商业种植者的出口量和销售额缺乏稳定性，并受到不同挑战的制约。在主要挑战中，分为内部障碍和外部障碍，宏观环境障碍对种植者的影响尤为显著。本地投资者受到内部和外部问题的严重影响，而外资和合资企业则在一定程度上受这些问题影响。经验较少的种植者比经验丰富的种植者更易受到出口问题的困扰。管理承诺问题、技术进步问题、资金问题、缺乏便捷的运输系统、利益相关方意识不足、埃塞俄比亚供应的季节性、货运短缺、基础设施不足、政府官僚主义、缺乏潜在市场以及投入品短缺被确定为蔬菜和水果出口的主要问题。因此，为减少这些问题，建议创造有利的政策环境、公平且有竞争力的航空货运成本、种植者将挑战纳入出口营销战略、政府开拓新市场并为种植者提供技术支持和长期贷款、建立新的竞争性投入品供应商、整合行业利益相关方以及招募熟练劳动力。
tags: Marketing Challenges, Ethiopian Vegetable and Fruit Export, Export Challenges, Ethiopia, Export Marketing Challenges

title: ExportVariety, Productivity, and Country Size in a Multi-good Ricardian Model ofExportDiversification
abstract: This paper addresses the lack of connection between theory and empirics in most export diversification–economic development studies. We provide a Ricardian-based theoretical explanation of countries’ relative export variety as a function of the level of technology and country size assessed with respect to the rest of the world. Relative export diversification is an outcome of two forces: a relative productivity change (technological progress) and a relative country size change (labour force growth). The model predictions are confirmed in a sample of 132 countries (1988–2014), including 53 low-income countries, for which we measure export variety using product-level trade data. The influence of technology differences on export variety is: (i) stronger than is the effect of cross-country differences in size and (ii) non-linear, driving diversification at the beginning of the development process. The results are robust to the measurement of export variety, the inclusion of control variables, and estimation methods.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了大多数出口多样化与经济发展研究中理论与实证脱节的问题。我们基于李嘉图理论提出解释，将各国相对出口多样性作为技术水平和相对于世界其他地区的国家规模的函数。相对出口多样化是两种力量作用的结果：相对生产率变化（技术进步）和相对国家规模变化（劳动力增长）。通过对132个国家（1988-2014年，含53个低收入国家）使用产品级贸易数据测量出口多样性的样本分析，模型预测得到验证。技术差异对出口多样性的影响表现为：（1）比跨国规模差异的影响更强；（2）具有非线性特征，在发展进程初期推动多样化。研究结果对出口多样性的测量方式、控制变量的纳入及估计方法均保持稳健。
tags: export variety, export diversification, Ricardian model, economic development

title: DoExportCredit Agencies Benefit the Economy?
abstract: This study empirically evaluates the effectiveness of Export Credit Agencies (ECAs) on export and other key macroeconomic variables such as real GDP growth, employment, and domestic lending activities. Based on a panel data of 15 countries, which have established the official ECAs during 1972-2010, we use the differences-in-differences method for estimation by utilizing the staggering timing of ECA establishments in those countries. We find that: (1) having an ECA raises export, (2) this positive effect does not last in the long run, (3) this positive effect comes from direct export credit scheme, not from credit guarantee scheme, (4) ECA credit crowds out private lending in domestic financial markets, and (5) having an ECA is not associated with higher economic growth and employment.
ch_abstract: 本研究实证评估了出口信用机构（ECAs）对出口及其他关键宏观经济变量（如实际GDP增长、就业和国内信贷活动）的影响效果。基于15个在1972-2010年间设立官方ECAs国家的面板数据，我们利用这些国家ECA设立时间的差异性，采用双重差分法进行估计。研究发现：（1）设立ECA能促进出口增长；（2）这种积极效应无法长期持续；（3）该效应源自直接出口信贷计划而非信用担保计划；（4）ECA信贷会挤出国内金融市场的私人贷款；（5）设立ECA与经济增速提升及就业增长无显著关联。
tags: Export Credit Agency, ECA, direct loan, government guarantee, private sector, crowding-out, government intervention, economic growth

title: An Exercise in Modeling of Consumption, Import, andExportof an Exhaustible Resource
abstract: In this paper we analyse a control‐theoretic model of a country possessing a finite amount of a non‐renewable resource. The country can both consume the indigenous resource and export it. Moreover, a substitute for the indigenous resource is available at a given backstop price. We obtain the optimal consumption, export and import policy for the country.
ch_abstract: 本文分析了一个国家拥有有限非可再生资源的控制理论模型。该国既可消费本土资源也可将其出口。此外，存在给定后备价格的替代品可供进口。我们得出了该国最优的消费、出口及进口策略。
tags: Optimal Control, Non-Renewable Resource, Import/Export

title: ExportLed Growth Hypothesis Revisited: A Panel Cointegration Approach
abstract: Numerous studies in the literature have tried to test whether export causes economic growth or economic growth causes export growth. The statistical approach has been one of applying Granger or Sims causality test to data drawn from individual country. In order to increase the power of existing tests, in this paper we pool data from 61 developing countries over 1960-1999 period and employ panel unit root tests and panel cointegration technique to establish the long rrun relationship between exports and output. Cointegration receives support in a model in which export is the dependent variable.
ch_abstract: 文献中大量研究试图检验是出口导致经济增长，还是经济增长引发出口增长。统计方法主要采用格兰杰或西姆斯因果检验，分析单个国家的数据。为增强现有检验效力，本文汇集了61个发展中国家1960-1999年间的数据，运用面板单位根检验与面板协整技术，确立出口与产出间的长期关系。在以出口为因变量的模型中，协整关系得到了验证。
tags: Export growth; Granger Causality; Cointegration

title: A Panel Gravity Model Analysis of India'sExportto Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) Countries
abstract: Exports have played a very crucial role in an economy and in the last decade India’s trade with GCC countries have been in deficit. So, in this context, present paper has investigated determinants of India-GCC export fl ow with the help of augmented gravity model. Panel data has been used for the period 2001 to 2015. Further with the help of coefficient value of trade flow determinants, India’s trade potential with all six GCC countries has been calculated for the latest year i.e., 2015. In the last section, tariff simulation has also been done. Results show that India-GCC bilateral export is positively determined by size of economies, trade openness and two binary variables namely common colony and Diaspora, while it is negatively determined by distance between them and tariff imposed by importing country. Result of export potential shows that India has significant export potential with all six countries. Further, results of tariff simulation suggest that tariff reduction will improve India’s export potential with all GCC countries. At the end, paper concluded that proposed India-GCC free trade agreement (FTA) will be win-win situation for both side.
ch_abstract: 出口在经济中扮演着至关重要的角色。过去十年间，印度与海湾合作委员会（GCC）国家的贸易一直处于逆差状态。在此背景下，本文借助扩展引力模型研究了印度-GCC出口流量的决定因素。研究采用了2001至2015年的面板数据，并基于贸易流量决定因素的系数值，计算了印度与所有六个GCC国家在2015年这一最新年份的贸易潜力。最后部分还进行了关税模拟分析。结果表明：印度-GCC双边出口规模受到经济总量、贸易开放度以及共同殖民历史和侨民关系两个二元变量的正向影响，而双方地理距离和进口国关税水平则产生负向影响。出口潜力结果显示印度与六国均存在显著出口空间。关税模拟进一步表明，降低关税将提升印度对所有GCC国家的出口潜力。文章最终指出，拟议中的印度-GCC自由贸易协定（FTA）将为双方创造共赢局面。
tags: India-GCC Export, Gravity Model, Panel Data, Export Potential, Tariff Simulation

title: Controls on theExportof Cultural Objects and Human Rights
abstract: Specialist instruments for the protection of cultural heritage have made oblique and overt reference to respecting established human rights norms since the adoption of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. Explicit references to human rights and fundamental freedoms have become pronounced in instruments finalised in the last two decades. This chapter considers the relevance of human rights for the control on export of cultural objects. It is divided in two parts. The first part details how human rights norms have been referenced in multilateral instruments for the protection of cultural heritage. The second part examines the relationship between controls on the export of cultural material and specific human rights, namely, the right to property, the right to self-determination, the right to participate in cultural life, and minority protection.
ch_abstract: 自《世界人权宣言》通过以来，保护文化遗产的专门文书便以直接或间接方式提及尊重既有的人权规范。近二十年来达成的文书中，对人权和基本自由的明确援引尤为显著。本章探讨人权对文化财产出口管制的关联性，内容分为两部分：第一部分详述多边文化遗产保护文书中如何援引人权规范；第二部分考察文化材料出口管制与具体人权的关系，包括财产权、自决权、参与文化生活的权利及少数群体保护。
tags: Cultural Heritage, Human Rights, Export Controls, Trade Law

title: DidExportPromotion Help Firms Weather the Crisis?
abstract: In the global recession of 2009, exports declined precipitously in many countries.  We illustrate with firm-level data for Belgium and Peru that the decline was very sudden and almost entirely due to lower export sales by existing exporters.  After the recession, exports rebounded almost equally quickly and we evaluate whether export promotion programs were an effective tool aiding this recovery.  We show that firms taking advantage of this type of support did better during the crisis, controlling flexibly for systematic differences between supported and control firms.  The primary mechanism we identify is that supported firms are generally more likely to survive on the export market and, in particular, are more likely to continue exporting to countries hit by the financial crisis.
ch_abstract: 2009年全球衰退期间，多国出口额急剧下滑。我们通过比利时与秘鲁企业层面的数据表明，这种下降极为突然，几乎完全源于现有出口商的销售萎缩。经济衰退结束后，出口又以几乎同样迅猛的速度反弹，我们评估了出口促进计划是否助力复苏的有效工具。研究表明，在灵活控制受扶持企业与对照组企业系统性差异的前提下，利用此类支持的企业在危机期间表现更优。我们识别的主要机制在于：受扶持企业通常更易在出口市场存活，尤其更可能维持对受金融危机冲击国家的出口。
tags: crisis, export performance, export promotion

title: ExportMarket Relatedness, Geographical Diversification and RegionalExportGrowth in China
abstract: Existing literature found both positive and negative relationship between geographical diversification and economic performance. Our research helps reconcile such contradictory results, and stresses that such conflict is associated with relatedness between export markets. Using China’s custom data, we show that having diverse related export markets facilitates regional export growth due to knowledge spillovers among manufacturers and economies of scope for trade intermediaries. Having many unrelated export markets, however, has a negative impact on regional export growth, as it dilutes valuable resources. Furthermore, we highlight the role of trade intermediaries, which have been less studied than manufacturers in literature on export market diversification.
ch_abstract: 现有文献发现，地理多样化与经济绩效之间存在正向和负向双重关联。我们的研究有助于调和此类矛盾结论，并强调这种冲突与出口市场间的关联性有关。基于中国海关数据，我们证明：由于制造商间的知识溢出和贸易中介的范围经济效应，拥有多样化的相关出口市场能促进地区出口增长；而大量不相关出口市场则会因稀释宝贵资源而对地区出口增长产生负面影响。此外，我们重点揭示了贸易中介的作用——在出口市场多样化的文献中，该群体较制造商所受关注显著不足。
tags: related variety of export markets, unrelated variety of export markets, export market diversification, export growth

title: ExportGrowth,ExportPotential andExportResistance: A Case Study of Laos
abstract: This study applies a stochastic frontier gravity model to examine Laos' export potential as well as factors hindering its export growth. This article uses a panel data of thirty-four importing countries from 2001 to 2011. Three main export growth factors are analysed in the model: (i) core factors ( income per capita, population, and distance); (ii) implicit behind-the-border constraints; and (iii) implicit beyond-the -border constraints. The findings show that only half of the country's export potential has been realized to date and export losses can primarily be attributed to implicit behind-the-border constraints. At the same time, these constraints have been reduced during the last decade. This article identifies border trade, a common language, income per capita and the Generalized System of Preferences scheme as important factors for export growth. Conversely, it finds that an appreciating real exchange rate is a signal of a slowdown in export growth.
ch_abstract: 本研究采用随机前沿引力模型，评估老挝出口潜力并探究阻碍其出口增长的因素。文章基于2001至2011年间34个进口国的面板数据，重点分析三大出口增长影响因素：(一)核心要素（人均收入、人口及距离）；(二)隐性境内壁垒；(三)隐性跨境壁垒。研究显示该国目前仅实现约半数出口潜力，出口损失主要源于隐性境内壁垒，但此类壁垒在过去十年间已逐步减弱。本文证实边境贸易、共同语言、人均收入及普惠制政策是推动出口增长的关键因素，而实际汇率升值则是出口增速放缓的信号。
tags: Laos, Export Resistance, Export Losses, Stochastic Frontier Gravity

title: Unneglectable TerrestrialExportof Dissolved Organic Carbon in China
abstract: Transport of dissolved organic carbon (DOC) from land to inland waters is a crucial yet usually overlooked component of carbon budget. Its magnitude and response to global change are poorly quantified due to limited direct observation, especially in China. Here we compiled a database from 462 headwaters across China, primary based on our own observation, and applied a generalized additive model (GAM) to quantify terrestrial DOC export from 2000 to 2020. Our results reveal substantial underestimations in current assessments relying on riverine data. Over this period, terrestrial DOC export averaged 13.4 ± 1.5 Tg C yr−1, accounting for approximately 10% of national net biome productivity (NBP). Projections under SSP2-4.5 and carbon-neutral scenarios suggest an increase to 17.1 Tg C yr−1 in 2060, driven by decreasing atmospheric deposition and rising temperatures. This highlights the importance of considering DOC export in terrestrial carbon sink assessments, particularly as global change continues to evolve.
ch_abstract: 溶解有机碳（DOC）从陆地到内陆水体的输送是碳收支中至关重要却常被忽视的环节。由于直接观测数据有限，其规模及对全球变化的响应尚未得到充分量化，在中国尤其如此。本研究基于自主观测为主的数据，整合了中国462个源头水体的数据库，并采用广义加性模型（GAM）量化2000-2020年陆地DOC输出量。结果显示，当前依赖河流数据的评估存在显著低估。在此期间，陆地DOC年均输出量为13.4±1.5太克碳/年，约占全国净生物群系生产力（NBP）的10%。在SSP2-4.5和碳中和情景下，受大气沉降减少和气温上升驱动，2060年DOC输出量预计将增至17.1太克碳/年。这凸显了在全球变化持续演变的背景下，陆地碳汇评估中考虑DOC输出的重要性。
tags: Dissolved organic carbon, terrestrial export, headwaters DOC, carbon transport, terrestrial carbon sink

title: Securing Technological Leadership? The Cost ofExportControls on Firms
abstract: To safeguard its technological leadership, the U.S. has restricted domestic suppliers from exporting specific cutting-edge technologies to selected Chinese firms. Domestic firms affected by these export controls halt sales to Chinese customers, as intended, but struggle to establish new relations with alternative customers domestically or in politically aligned regions. As a result, domestic suppliers experience a $130 billion decline in market capitalization, along with reductions in profitability, employment, and bank lending. We also show how Chinese firms strategically respond to export controls. Overall, export controls impose significant costs on domestic firms producing the very technologies these policies intend to protect.
ch_abstract: 为维护其技术领先地位，美国限制国内供应商向特定中国企业出口某些尖端技术。受出口管制影响的国内企业如预期般停止向中国客户销售，却难以在本国或政治同盟地区建立新的客户关系。这导致国内供应商市值缩水1300亿美元，同时面临盈利能力下降、就业岗位减少及银行信贷紧缩。研究还揭示了中国企业如何战略应对出口管制。总体而言，出口管制给生产这些受保护技术的本国企业带来了巨大代价。
tags: geopolitical risk, export controls, decoupling

title: The Adverse Human Rights Impacts of Canadian Technology Companies: ReformingExportControlwith the Introduction of Mandatory Human Rights Due Diligence
abstract: Netsweeper, a Canadian company, has produced and sold Internet-filtering technology to authoritarian regimes abroad. According to public research from the Citizen Lab, this technology has been used to censor religious content in Bahrain, information on Rohingya refugees in Myanmar and India, political campaign content in United Arab Emirates, and information on HIV/AIDS in Kuwait. This article considers how Canadian export control law deals with technologies that negatively impact human rights abroad and identifies a gap in the existing export control scheme. We suggest this gap could be closed by adopting a proactive human rights due diligence requirement on companies seeking to export products under Canadian law. There is existing precedent in other jurisdictions for imposing a human rights due diligence requirement on companies more broadly as a matter of law. A legislative amendment to Canada’s export regime would move Canada towards meaningful compliance with the United Nations Guiding Principles, reflect a growing normative acceptance that companies have a duty to respect human rights under international law, and potentially open avenues for legal remedy.
ch_abstract: 加拿大公司Netsweeper生产并销售互联网过滤技术给海外专制政权。公民实验室的公开研究显示，该技术曾被用于巴林宗教内容审查、缅甸和印度罗兴亚难民信息封锁、阿联酋政治竞选内容限制，以及科威特艾滋病相关信息的管控。本文探讨了加拿大出口管制法律如何应对对海外人权产生负面影响的科技产品，并指出当前出口管制体系存在的漏洞。我们建议通过立法要求寻求出口产品的企业履行主动人权尽职调查义务来填补这一漏洞。其他司法管辖区已有将企业人权尽职调查作为法律义务的先例。对加拿大出口制度进行立法修订，将推动该国切实遵守《联合国指导原则》，反映国际法下企业尊重人权责任日益增长的规范认同，并可能为法律救济开辟新途径。
tags: Technology, human rights, surveillance, export law, Canada

title: The Impact of USExportControls on Korean Semiconductor Exports
abstract: This study empirically investigates the impact of recent US export controls on China on South Korea’s semiconductor exports. We analyze South Korean export data to shed light on the repercussions of US export restrictions on a third country. Our findings reveal a significant decline in Korean semiconductor exports following the October 2022 imposition of US controls. This decline was most pronounced in the memory, discrete devices, and discrete device components subsectors of the semiconductor industry. In addition, we observed a decrease in unit prices, especially for memory semiconductors, pointing to downward pressure on South Korea’s high-value-added semiconductor exports. These results provide some evidence of substantial negative impacts of US export controls on South Korea’s semiconductor industry, and particularly with regard to its high-tech products.
ch_abstract: 本研究实证考察了近期美国对华出口管制对韩国半导体出口的影响。通过分析韩国出口数据，我们揭示了美国出口限制对第三国产生的连锁效应。研究结果显示，2022年10月美国实施管制后，韩国半导体出口出现显著下滑，其中内存、分立器件及分立器件组件等细分领域跌幅最为明显。此外，我们观察到半导体产品单价下降，尤其是内存半导体，这表明韩国高附加值半导体出口面临下行压力。这些结果为美国出口管制对韩国半导体产业（特别是高科技产品领域）造成的重大负面影响提供了实证依据。
tags: US Export Controls, South Korean Exports, Semiconductors, Export Control Classification Numbers (ECCNs)

title: The Implications of the EU’s Dual-UseExportControlRegulation 2021/821 for Universities and Academics
abstract: This working paper aims to describe a basic framework regarding the EU’s export control regulation, Regulation (EU) 2021/821, for research organisations. Dual-use export controls regulate the international transfer of items (including knowledge) which could serve both civilian and military purposes. Such regulation is applicable to the development and dissemination of research and may limit academic activity when it is seen as posing security risks. The application of export controls to research may thus give rise to intricate tensions with the protection of academic freedom and the institutional autonomy of universities. The main objective of the paper is to provide an overview of the relevance of the regulation, as a basis for further research and discussion over academic freedom and export controls in complex geo-political contexts.
ch_abstract: 本工作文件旨在为研究机构概述欧盟出口管制法规（欧盟条例2021/821）的基本框架。两用物项出口管制针对具有民用和军用双重用途的物品（包括知识）的国际转移进行监管。此类法规适用于研究的开发与传播，当学术活动被视为存在安全风险时可能对其构成限制。因此，出口管制在研究领域的应用可能会与学术自由保护及大学机构自治权之间产生复杂矛盾。本文档的主要目标是阐明该法规的相关性，为复杂地缘政治背景下学术自由与出口管制的进一步研究和讨论奠定基础。
tags: dual-use, export controls, academic freedom, universities, trade, knowledge transfer

title: Arms, Exports, Influence: Institutional Corruption in the German ArmsExportRegime
abstract: The present article analyses the role of the arms industry in the German arms export control regime, and examines the claim that the illegitimate influence of industry interests has diverted the regime from its original restrictive function. The article applies the concept of institutional corruption, which is defined as a systemic or strategic influence that undermines an institution’s effectiveness by diverting it from its purpose. The article discusses the German arms export regime, examines the characteristics of the German weapons industry, and then goes on to analyze the strategic influence exerted by the German arms industry through the lens of the concept of institutional corruption. It discusses a range of practices associated with this concept, for example the so-called revolving door phenomenon and contributions to political parties, and their consequences for the regime’s trustworthiness. Finally, this article discusses the role of secrecy in making the German arms export regime more vulnerable to institutional corruption, and lays the basis for reform proposals. By using the concept of institutional corruption, this article sheds light on aspects of the issue that have long been ignored and connects the dots between lack of parliamentary control and of political transparency, and insufficient regulation of lobbying activities and other forms of interrelationships between politics and the industry. This article comes to the conclusion that both secrecy within the authorization regime and lack of transparency regarding corporate attempts to exert influence are causing the arms export regime to be extremely vulnerable to institutional corruption, since supervision and control by political and civil society actors are effectively limited.
ch_abstract: 本文分析了军火工业在德国武器出口管制体系中的作用，并探讨了行业利益的不当影响是否导致该体系偏离最初限制性功能的观点。文章运用了制度性腐败的概念——即系统性或战略性影响通过偏离制度初衷而削弱其效力的现象。研究首先梳理德国武器出口管制体系，考察德国军工产业特征，随后从制度性腐败视角分析德国军火工业施加的战略影响，探讨了与此概念相关的一系列实践（如"旋转门"现象和政党捐款）及其对体系公信力的影响。最后，文章论述保密机制如何加剧德国武器出口体系对制度性腐败的脆弱性，并为改革方案奠定基础。通过制度性腐败理论框架，本研究揭示了长期被忽视的问题维度，将议会监督缺位、政治透明度不足与游说活动监管不力等政商关联现象联系起来。文章得出结论：审批体系内部的保密机制与企业施加影响的非透明性，导致武器出口体系极易受到制度性腐败侵蚀，因为政治行为体和公民社会的监督效力受到实质性限制。
tags: Institutional corruption, revolving door, donations, campaign finance, arms industry, weapons exports, Bundestag, democratic control, Bundessicherheitsrat, Federal Security Council, Germany, transparency, secrecy, military-industrial complex, lobbyism, influence, export authorization, export control

title: A Study of the Impact of Command-and-ControlEnvironmental Regulation on theExportBehavior of Listed Chinese Textile and Apparel Firms
abstract: With the deepening global awareness of environmental issues, China's textile and apparel industry is rapidly emerging as a pioneer in the field of foreign trade. However, in the process of industrialized society, the environmental situation has become increasingly severe, the world's attention to green development has been increasing, and countries continue to improve environmental protection policies, with a view to achieving the dual goals of economic and environmental protection. This paper selects the micro data of listed textile and garment companies from 2001 to 2023, and empirically explores the impact of command-and-control environmental regulation on the export behavior of listed Chinese textile and garment companies in each province by using Heckman's two-step method and an econometric regression model. In addition, this paper conducts a robustness test on the regression results and examines the mechanism role of R&D investment in the relationship.The empirical results show that the command-and-control environmental regulation does not have a significant impact on the export decision of listed textile and garment enterprises, The empirical results support the applicability of the “pollution paradise hypothesis” in China. Based on the above empirical conclusions, this paper puts forward the corresponding suggestions from the perspectives of the government, industry and enterprises.
ch_abstract: 随着全球环境问题意识的加深，中国纺织服装产业正迅速崛起为外贸领域的先锋。然而在工业化社会进程中，环境形势日益严峻，世界对绿色发展的关注度不断提高，各国不断完善环境保护政策，以期实现经济与环保的双重目标。本文选取2001-2023年纺织服装上市公司的微观数据，运用Heckman两步法和计量回归模型，实证探究命令控制型环境规制对中国各省份纺织服装上市公司出口行为的影响。此外，本文对回归结果进行稳健性检验，并考察研发投入在二者关系中的机制作用。实证结果表明，命令控制型环境规制对纺织服装上市企业的出口决策没有显著影响，但对出口规模具有显著抑制作用，且该抑制作用在东部地区更为明显。进一步研究发现，命令控制型环境规制通过抑制企业研发投入进而抑制企业出口规模，实证结果支持"污染天堂假说"在中国的适用性。基于上述实证结论，本文从政府、行业和企业三个层面提出相应对策建议。
tags: command-and-control environmental regulation, firms' export behavior, heckman's two-step approach

title: Effect of Korea'sExportAssistance System onExportPromotion
abstract: This paper examines whether or not the export assistance system has contributed to export promotion in Korea. The current study starts from examining the stationarity of the concerned variables. The unit root tests show that all variables are not I(0) Time Series. Instead, they are I(1) Time Series. According to Johansen cointegration test, the concerned variables are not cointegrated. Thus, this study estimated OLS (Ordinary Least Square Method) based on the first differenced data. The empirical evidence shows that export insurance and trade exhibition did not have a significant effect on exports. That is, the export insurance system and trade exhibition system have not contributed to export promotion in Korea. The empirical evidence shows that duty drawback did have a significant effect on exports. That is, the efficiently managed duty drawback system may contribute to export promotion significantly in Korea
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了出口援助体系是否对韩国的出口促进有所贡献。当前研究首先检验了相关变量的平稳性。单位根检验表明，所有变量均非I(0)时间序列，而是I(1)时间序列。根据Johansen协整检验，相关变量不存在协整关系。因此，本研究基于一阶差分数据采用普通最小二乘法(OLS)进行估计。实证结果表明，出口保险和贸易展览对出口没有显著影响，即出口保险制度和贸易展览制度并未促进韩国出口增长。实证证据显示，退税制度确实对出口产生了显著影响，这表明高效管理的退税制度可能对韩国出口促进具有重要贡献。
tags: Duty Drawback, Export Assistance System, Export Insurance, Export Promotion

title: U.S.ExportControls of AI Models
abstract: Artificial intelligence models may pose serious risks in the coming years. In this paper, taking biosecurity risks as a case study, I provide an overview of what U.S. export control laws are, how they currently address AI biosecurity risks, and how they might be used to reduce such risks in the future. I make two main arguments. First, model developers and deployers may face substantial liability under current export control rules if their AI models materially assist anyone in the development or deployment of biological weapons. Second, the export control agencies likely have the statutory and regulatory authority to restrict model developers from (1) making the model weights of frontier models freely available for download, and (2) allowing their models to convey certain forms of dangerous expertise. Although both rules could face substantial First Amendment challenges, courts are likely to uphold narrowly targeted regulations that are well justified on national security grounds. In addition, courts are more likely to uphold controls on generative models that perform technical biological work—known as biological design tools (BDTs)—than controls on models, such as large language models (LLMs), with more traditionally expressive output If and when it is advisable to regulate AI models, U.S. export controls represent one ready, if imperfect tool to mitigate biosecurity risks. Export control rules govern the movement of U.S.-made products around the world, certain actions of U.S. citizens and permanent residents, and the transfer of U.S. technical information to foreign persons. These laws are flexible, backed by substantial criminal sanction, and generally exempt from stringent judicial review under the Administrative Procedure Act. The Commerce and State Departments have extensive leeway to use these laws as they see fit. Export controls have also been used for many decades to reduce biosecurity risks, largely in coordination with U.S. allies through the Australia Group. And export controls have been used historically to control the spread of technical information, software, and computer files, albeit with mixed success.
ch_abstract: 人工智能模型在未来几年可能构成严重风险。本文以生物安全风险为例，概述了美国出口管制法律的现状、当前应对AI生物安全风险的方式，以及未来如何利用这些法律降低此类风险。我提出两个核心观点：首先，若AI模型实质性协助生物武器研发或部署，模型开发者与部署者依据现行出口管制法规可能面临重大责任；其次，出口管制机构很可能拥有法定权限，可禁止开发者（1）公开前沿模型的权重参数供自由下载，（2）允许模型传播特定类型的危险专业知识。尽管这两项规定可能面临《第一修正案》的重大挑战，但法院很可能支持基于国家安全理由充分论证的精准监管措施。此外，相比主要输出传统表达性内容的大型语言模型（LLMs），法院更可能支持对执行生物技术工作的生成式模型（即生物设计工具BDTs）实施管制。当确需监管AI模型时，美国出口管制制度虽不完美，却是现成的生物安全风险缓释工具。该制度规范美国制造产品的全球流通、美国公民及永久居民的特定行为，以及美国技术信息向外国实体的转移。这些法律具有灵活性，以严厉刑事处罚为后盾，且通常不受《行政程序法》的严格司法审查约束。商务部和国务院拥有充分自主裁量权来实施这些法律。过去数十年间，出口管制通过"澳大利亚集团"与盟国协同，长期用于降低生物安全风险。历史上该制度也曾用于控制技术信息、软件及计算机文件的传播，尽管成效参差不齐。
tags: Biosecurity, artificial intelligence, pandemic, pathogen, generative AI, biological design tools, export control laws, large language models, health law, First Amendment, protein folding models, international law

title: Modes ofExportFinance and Firms’ExportPerformance: A Study of ChemicalExportUnits
abstract: The study is an attempt to analyse the impact of specific sources of finance on firms’ export performance by investigating empirically the SME exporters’ preferred mode of financing their various export operations and linking it with their export profitability. Based on the findings it is concluded that the funds sourced from commercial banks have a significant impact on their export performance, while profit ploughed back into the firms’ export operations were also found to be important. The effect of development finance sources’ such as EXIM bank, SIDBI, IFCI, etc., on export performance having considered the other forms of medium and long term finical facilities/sources was, however, insignificant.
ch_abstract: 本研究旨在通过实证分析中小出口企业为各项出口业务融资的偏好模式，并将其与出口盈利能力相关联，从而探讨特定融资来源对企业出口表现的影响。研究发现，商业银行提供的资金对出口表现具有显著影响，同时企业将利润再投资于出口业务也被证实至关重要。然而，在考虑其他中长期融资渠道/来源后，诸如进出口银行、印度小工业发展银行、印度工业金融公司等开发性金融机构对出口表现的影响并不显著。
tags: Financing Resources, Export Performance, Export Profitability, Small and Medium Size Firms

title: Moving Culture: The Future of National Cultural PropertyExportControls
abstract: Widespread border controls on the export of cultural property are for the most part a relatively recent phenomenon. Such controls only apply to physical objects that can be moved across national borders, and range from regimes that operate as embargoes on whole categories of tangible property to more selective systems  that only limit the export of objects perceived to be significant properties. The United States is notable for being the only important art market country  that has never had a comprehensive system of cultural property export controls. Export controls present a number of complex issues in both international and domestic law. This paper discusses the a number of important policy issues that need to be considered when developing, or amending, export control laws.
ch_abstract: 对文化财产出口实施广泛的边境管制在很大程度上是相对较新的现象。此类管制仅适用于可跨国境运输的实物，其范围涵盖对整个类别有形财产实施禁运的机制，到仅限制被视为重要财产物品出口的选择性体系。美国作为唯一从未建立全面文化财产出口管制体系的重要艺术品市场国家，显得尤为特殊。出口管制在国际法和国内法中都引发了一系列复杂问题。本文探讨了在制定或修订出口管制法律时需要考虑的若干重要政策议题。
tags: Export controls, Cultural property

title: Exporting CO2 for Offshore Storage – The London Protocol’sExportAmendment
abstract: The London Convention and London Protocol are the global treaties that protect the marine environment from pollution caused by the dumping of wastes. Since 2006, the London Protocol has provided a basis in international environmental law to allow carbon dioxide (CO2) storage beneath the seabed when it is safe to do so, and to regulate the injection of CO2 waste streams into sub-seabed geological formations for permanent isolation. However, Article 6 of the London Protocol prohibits the export of waste or other matter for dumping in the marine environment. Therefore in 2019, Contracting Parties to the London Protocol adopted a Resolution to allow provisional application of an amendment to Article 6 of the Protocol to allow export of CO2 for storage in sub-seabed geological formations. This now removed the last significant international legal barrier to carbon capture and storage (CCS), and means that CO2 can be transported across international borders to offshore storage. This paper will describe the background, details and requirements of this provisional application of the CCS export amendment, and the details and requirements of the two associated guidance and guideline documents, and their implications.
ch_abstract: 《伦敦公约》及其议定书是保护海洋环境免受废弃物倾倒污染的两项全球性条约。自2006年起，《伦敦议定书》为国际环境法提供了依据，允许在安全条件下将二氧化碳封存在海底，并规范将二氧化碳废物流注入海底地质构造以实现永久封存。然而该议定书第6条明确禁止为倾倒目的出口废弃物或其他物质。为此，2019年各缔约方通过决议，临时适用对第6条的修正案，允许为海底地质封存目的跨境运输二氧化碳。此举清除了碳捕集与封存技术（CCS）面临的最后一项重大国际法律障碍，意味着二氧化碳可跨境运输至海上封存设施。本文将阐述该修正案临时适用的背景、具体内容与实施要求，分析两份配套指导文件的细则规定，并探讨其潜在影响。
tags: Legal, Offshore, Transboundary, Export, CCS

title: ExportControls: America’s Other National Security Threat
abstract: While the public was transfixed by the Trump administration’s policies alleging that imports were a threat to America’s national security during 2017–20, there was a concomitant and more quiet US policy shift on the export side. Addressing the national security threat presented by exports posed different economic and institutional challenges from those associated with import policy, including the acknowledgment that export controls for legitimate national security reasons can be the first-best policy to confront the problem at its source. Yet, export controls could also be misused as a beggar-thy-neighbor policy to redistribute economic well-being across countries, even from one ally to another. This paper describes how US export control policy evolved over 2017–20, as well as the international institutions — first the Coordinating Committee for Multilateral Export Controls (COCOM), then the Wassenaar Arrangement — historically tasked with multi-lateralizing US export restrictions used to protect national security. With the potential for US export control policy to brush up more frequently against WTO rules designed to limit the use of export restrictions, the paper also highlights new challenges for the WTO’s system of resolving trade disputes. Overall, a US failure to strike the right balance for its export control policy would result in it being ineffective at addressing national security risks, costly for the economy, and problematic for trade and diplomatic relations.
ch_abstract: 2017至2020年间，当公众被特朗普政府指控进口威胁美国国家安全的政策所吸引时，美国在出口领域也悄然发生了政策转向。与进口政策不同，应对出口带来的国家安全威胁面临着独特的经济和制度挑战，包括承认出于正当国家安全理由实施出口管制可能是从源头解决问题的首选政策。然而出口管制也可能被滥用为"以邻为壑"的工具，在国家间——甚至盟国之间——重新分配经济利益。本文阐述了2017至2020年美国出口管制政策的演变历程，以及历史上负责将美国用于维护国家安全的出口限制多边化的国际机制——先是多边出口管制协调委员会（COCOM），后转为瓦森纳协定。随着美国出口管制政策可能更频繁地触碰旨在限制出口限制使用的WTO规则，本文还揭示了WTO贸易争端解决机制面临的新挑战。总体而言，若美国无法在出口管制政策上取得恰当平衡，将导致其既无法有效应对国家安全风险，又造成经济代价高昂，还会引发贸易和外交关系问题。
tags: National Security, Export Controls, Dual-Use Technologies, ECRA, Wassenaar Arrangement, Uncertainty

title: ExportEntry,ExportExit, and Productivity in German Manufacturing Industries
abstract: This paper contributes to the flourishing literature on exports and productivity by using a unique newly available panel of exporting establishments from the manufacturing sector of Germany from 1995 to 2004 to test three hypotheses derived from a theoretical model by Hopenhayn (Econometrica 1992): (H1) Firms that stop exporting in year t were in t-1 less productive than firms that continue to export in t. (H2) Firms that start to export in year t are less productive than firms that export both in year t-1 and in year t. (H3) Firms from a cohort of export starters that still export in the last year of the panel were more productive in the start year than firms from the same cohort that stopped to export in between. While results for West Germany support all three hypotheses, this is only the case for (H1) and (H2) in East Germany.
ch_abstract: 本文通过使用1995年至2004年德国制造业出口企业新构建的独特面板数据，检验了源自Hopenhayn（《计量经济学》1992）理论模型的三个假设，为日益丰富的出口与生产率研究文献做出了贡献：（H1）在第t年退出出口市场的企业，其在t-1年的生产率低于第t年持续出口的企业；（H2）在第t年新进入出口市场的企业，其生产率低于第t-1年和第t年持续出口的企业；（H3）在面板数据末期仍保持出口的初始出口企业群体中，其初始年份生产率高于同期退出出口的企业群体。研究结果显示，西德地区数据支持全部三个假设，而东德地区仅支持假设（H1）和（H2）。
tags: export entry, export exit, productivity

title: High PerformanceExportPortfolio: Design Growth-EnhancingExportStructure with Machine Learning
abstract: This paper studies the relationship between export structure and growth performance. We design an export recommendation system using a collaborative filtering algorithm based on countries' revealed comparative advantages. The system is used to produce export portfolio recommendations covering over 190 economies and over 30 years. We find that economies with their export structure more aligned with the recommended export structure achieve better growth performance, in terms of both higher GDP growth rate and lower growth volatility. These findings demonstrate that export structure matters for obtaining high and stable growth. Our recommendation system can serve as a practical tool for policymakers seeking actionable insights on their countries’ export potential and diversification strategies that may be complex and hard to quantify.
ch_abstract: 本文研究了出口结构与增长表现之间的关系。我们基于各国显示性比较优势，采用协同过滤算法设计了一个出口推荐系统。该系统用于生成涵盖190多个经济体、跨越30多年的出口组合建议。研究发现，出口结构与推荐出口结构契合度更高的经济体，在GDP增长率和增长波动性方面都表现出更优的增长绩效——既能实现更高的经济增长率，又能保持更低的增长波动。这些发现证明，出口结构对实现高增长和稳定增长至关重要。我们的推荐系统可为政策制定者提供实用工具，帮助他们获取关于本国出口潜力和多样化战略的可操作见解，这些领域往往复杂且难以量化。
tags: export diversification, comparative advantage, machine learning, collaborative filtering, economic growth, international trade, export structure, export portfolio recommendation, export recommendation system, performance export portfolio, export potential, Exports, Comparative advantage, Export diversification, Human capital, Total factor productivity, Global, East Asia

title: The Role of Innovation on Thailand's VehicleExportValue
abstract: The purpose of this report is to study the role of innovation on vehicle export value in Thailand during 2000-2015. The innovation is measured by the number of patents related to the automobile industry. The control variables include inflation rate, interest rate, production number, real effective exchange rate, terms of trade, world GDP growth, and oil price. The study found significant positive impacts of patents granted on Thailand’s vehicle export value implying the impact of innovation to the export value. The findings of this study would be helpful for export policymakers to obtain enhanced levels of economic development and growth of the country. The governments should encourage the development of research and development either at the company level or create and automotive technology institute that all companies could join to develop, share, and increase their technical capability. Moreover, the governments should allow or grant firms a deduction on expenditure (tax deduction) and financial support for internal research and development, innovation, and patents registration. They could give awards for the firms that are successful in developing new products and patents on the new technology.
ch_abstract: 本报告旨在研究2000-2015年间创新对泰国汽车出口价值的作用。创新通过汽车行业相关专利数量来衡量，控制变量包括通货膨胀率、利率、产量、实际有效汇率、贸易条件、全球GDP增长率及油价。研究发现专利授予对泰国汽车出口价值具有显著正向影响，表明创新对出口价值的作用。研究结果将有助于出口政策制定者实现更高水平的国家经济发展与增长。政府应鼓励企业层面的研发发展，或创建汽车技术研究所供所有企业参与技术能力的开发、共享与提升。此外，政府应允许或给予企业研发支出抵扣（税收减免）及内部研发、创新与专利注册的财政支持，可对成功开发新产品和新技术专利的企业给予奖励。
tags: Innovation, Patents Granted, Export Value, Vehicle Export, Thailand

title: Are the Benefits ofExportSupport Durable? Evidence from Tunisia
abstract: This paper evaluates the effects of the FAMEX export promotion program in Tunisia on the performance of beneficiary firms.  While most studies assess only the short-term impact of such programs, we consider also the longer-term impact.  Estimates suggest that beneficiaries initially saw both faster export growth and greater diversification across destinations and products.  However, three years after the intervention, beneficiaries growth rates and export levels were not significantly different from those of a control group even though they remained more diversified. We confirm that this divergence between export growth and diversification is not due to small export transactions to new markets creating an illusion of diversification; to greater exposure of beneficiary firms to crisis-affected economies leading to stunted export growth; or to spillover benefits for non-beneficiary firms resulting in their catching-up in export sales. We find some evidence that the divergence may be related to constraints within the firm, such as limited experience and in-house export capacity; to external constraints, such as access to finance; and to the design and implementation of the FAMEX program which placed greater emphasis on diversification than on export growth.
ch_abstract: 本文评估了突尼斯FAMEX出口促进计划对受益企业绩效的影响。与多数仅关注此类计划短期效果的研究不同，我们还考察了其长期影响。评估显示，受益企业最初在出口增速、目标市场及产品多元化方面均有提升。但项目实施三年后，尽管受益企业仍保持更高程度的多元化，其出口增长率与出口水平已与对照组无显著差异。我们证实这种出口增长与多元化的背离并非源于：新市场小额交易造成的多元化假象；受益企业过度依赖受危机影响经济体导致出口增长受阻；或非受益企业通过溢出效应在出口额上实现追赶。研究发现部分证据表明，这种背离可能与企业内部限制（如有限经验与自主出口能力）、外部制约（如融资渠道）以及FAMEX计划更侧重多元化而非出口增长的设计实施有关。
tags: export margins, Export promotion, firms, impact evaluation, matching grant, propensity-score matching, Tunisia

title: ExportControls: America's Other National Security Threat
abstract: The Trump administration's allegations that some imports are a threat to America's national security have received wide publicity during 2017-20. But the administration was undertaking a more quiet US policy shift on the export side in the same time frame. Addressing the national security threat presented by exports posed different economic and institutional challenges from those associated with import policy, including the acknowledgment that export controls for legitimate national security reasons can be the first-best policy to confront the problem at its source. Yet, export controls could also be misused as a beggar-thy-neighbor policy to redistribute economic well-being across countries, even from one ally to another. This paper describes how US export control policy evolved over 2017-20, as well as the international institutions - first the Coordinating Committee for Multilateral Export Controls (COCOM), then the Wassenaar Arrangement -historically tasked with multilateralizing US export restrictions used to protect national security. With the potential for US export control policy to brush up more frequently against WTO rules designed to limit the use of export restrictions, the paper also highlights new challenges for the WTO's system of resolving trade disputes. Overall, a US failure to strike the right balance for its export control policy would result in it being ineffective at addressing national security risks, costly for the economy, and problematic for trade and diplomatic relations.
ch_abstract: 特朗普政府关于某些进口产品对美国国家安全构成威胁的指控在2017-2020年间广受关注。但同期该政府在出口政策领域正悄然推动美国政策的转向。与进口政策不同，应对出口带来的国家安全威胁面临着独特的经济和制度挑战，包括承认出于正当国家安全理由实施出口管制可能是从源头解决问题的首选政策。然而出口管制也可能被滥用为"以邻为壑"的工具，在国家间——甚至盟国之间——重新分配经济利益。本文阐述了2017-2020年间美国出口管制政策的演变历程，以及历史上负责将美国用于保护国家安全的出口限制多边化的国际机制——先是多边出口管制协调委员会（COCOM），后转为瓦森纳协定。随着美国出口管制政策可能更频繁地触碰旨在限制出口限制使用的WTO规则，本文还着重分析了WTO贸易争端解决机制面临的新挑战。总体而言，若美国无法在出口管制政策上取得恰当平衡，将导致其既无法有效应对国家安全风险，又造成经济代价高昂，还会给贸易和外交关系带来问题。
tags: dual-use technologies, ECRA, export controls, National Security, uncertainty, Wassenaar Arrangement

title: An Investigation into China'sExport-Share Policy for Foreign-Invested Firms
abstract: This thesis analyses China’s export-share policy; a policy that requires foreign-invested firms to export a certain minimum share of their production.  The initial discussion focuses on the development of China’s foreign investment and foreign exchange control policies since the commencement of the Open Door Policy.  Data on foreign-invested firms is analysed to determine whether (i) the export-share requirements affect investor behaviour, and (ii) the pattern of requirements has changed over time.    The effect of export-share requirements on domestic welfare, foreign investment, and the level of foreign reserves are then examined within a partial equilibrium framework based on Herander and Thomas (1986).  A more extensive general equilibrium analysis is then undertaken within a model that extends and unifies the analyses of Rodrik (1987) and Chao and Yu (1991, 1992, 1994).  Urban unemployment is modelled using the framework of rural-urban migration proposed by Harris and Todaro (1970).  The effect on welfare, foreign investment, and foreign reserves are analysed under both quota and tariff protection for the importable sector. Finally, the results of the theoretical analysis are applied to the earlier discussion on China’s foreign investment and foreign exchange control policies.  It is found that the various policy goals pursued by China have conflicting optimal export-share requirements and, even though many of the theoretical results are ambiguous, the export-share policy implemented by China is likely to be non-optimal.
ch_abstract: 本论文分析了中国的出口比例政策，该政策要求外商投资企业必须出口其生产的最低特定比例。初始讨论聚焦于自开放政策实施以来中国外资和外汇管制政策的发展。通过分析外商投资企业的数据，旨在确定（i）出口比例要求是否影响投资者行为，以及（ii）这些要求的模式是否随时间发生变化。随后，基于Herander和Thomas（1986）的部分均衡框架，研究了出口比例要求对国内福利、外商投资及外汇储备水平的影响。进一步通过扩展并整合Rodrik（1987）与Chao和Yu（1991, 1992, 1994）的分析模型，进行了更广泛的总体均衡分析，其中采用Harris和Todaro（1970）提出的城乡迁移框架模拟了城市失业现象。研究考察了在进口部门受配额和关税保护两种情形下，政策对福利、外商投资及外汇储备的影响。最后，将理论分析结果应用于先前关于中国外资和外汇管制政策的讨论，发现中国追求的多重政策目标存在相互冲突的最优出口比例要求，且尽管许多理论结论具有不确定性，但中国实施的出口比例政策很可能并非最优。
tags: China, export-share, trade

title: The RubberExportIndustry in Thailand: An Analysis ofExportPerformance
abstract: Export performance in the industry is the top goal of business operation which can be measured from export’s sales volume, growth rate of sales volume, growth rate of benefits, marketing ability, acceptance in overseas markets, company’s demand in sales revenue increment, and growth rate in overseas markets. The mentioned factors impact on the company’s ability to sustain itself in the overseas markets. Factors that are related to export performance are export marketing strategies, competitiveness, the relationship between buyers and sellers, readiness of resources, and government support.
ch_abstract: 行业出口表现是企业运营的首要目标，可通过出口销量、销量增长率、收益增长率、营销能力、海外市场接受度、企业对销售收入增长的需求以及海外市场增长率来衡量。上述因素影响企业在海外市场的持续生存能力。与出口表现相关的因素包括出口营销策略、竞争力、买卖双方关系、资源准备情况以及政府支持。
tags: Competitiveness, Export Marketing Strategy, Export Performance

title: Imitating toexport
abstract: We document the existence of Chinese imitation of foreign firms on a large scale. China's export processing zones (EPZs) attract foreign companies to set up export processing operations. Chinese firms quickly imitate these companies in both export and import patterns. Exports of the products shipped from EPZs increase throughout the province, with the largest gains in the city containing the EPZ, and the next largest in the cities adjacent to the EPZ. Chinese companies also import the same equipment imported by companies in EPZs, suggesting that they imitate foreign technology. Furthermore, we find that firms that imitate EPZs leapfrog non-imitating firms in productivity. We conclude that a key ingredient of China's success in trade has been its ability to attract foreign firms and subsequently imitate them.
ch_abstract: 我们记录了中国企业对外资企业的大规模模仿现象。中国出口加工区吸引外资企业建立出口加工业务，中国企业迅速在进出口模式上对这些外资企业进行模仿。出口加工区产品的出口量在全省范围内增长，其中加工区所在城市增幅最大，邻近城市次之。中国企业还进口与出口加工区外资企业相同的设备，这表明它们在模仿外国技术。此外，我们发现模仿出口加工区的企业在生产率上实现了对非模仿企业的跨越式超越。我们得出结论：中国贸易成功的关键因素在于其吸引外资企业并随后进行模仿的能力。
tags: Export processing zones, export and import, imitate

title: Investigating the Effect of the U.S. SemiconductorExportControls on China
abstract: This report examines the significant impact of U.S. semiconductor export controls imposed under the Biden administration in October 2022. These controls, which target a broad range of semiconductor manufacturing facilities and AI chips, are part of a strategy aimed at curbing China’s advancement in critical technologies. A notable 32.5% decline in China’s imports of semiconductor manufacturing equipment has been observed, particularly in regions with advanced production capabilities and foreign company operations, such as those involving Samsung Electronics and SK hynix. While Korea experienced substantial drops in exports to China, the Netherlands saw an increase, reflecting its dominance in specific technologies like lithography. The AI chip sector has also been affected, with China turning to downgraded chips due to restricted access to high-performance models from companies like Nvidia. South Korea must adapt by strengthening its upstream semiconductor industry, considering reshoring production, and collaborating with international partners to mitigate risks. As U.S. export controls continue to evolve, the global semiconductor industry may face increased fragmentation, making strategic responses from affected nations essential to maintain competitiveness.
