Additionally, ongoing monitoring and adaptation to the dynamic regulatory environment shaped by these export controls are crucial.
ch_abstract: 本报告探讨了2022年10月拜登政府实施的美国半导体出口管制产生的重大影响。这些针对广泛半导体制造设施和人工智能芯片的管制措施，旨在遏制中国在关键技术领域的发展。中国半导体制造设备进口量显著下降32.5%，尤其在三星电子和SK海力士等外资企业运营的先进产能地区表现明显。韩国对华出口大幅下滑，而荷兰凭借光刻机等技术优势实现增长。人工智能芯片领域同样受冲击，中国因无法获得英伟达等公司的高性能芯片而转向降级产品。韩国需通过强化上游半导体产业、考虑产能回迁及加强国际合作来应对风险。随着美国出口管制持续升级，全球半导体产业可能面临更严重的割裂，受影响国家必须采取战略应对以保持竞争力。此外，持续监测并适应这些出口管制形成的动态监管环境至关重要。
tags: Semiconductor, Export Control, China, United States

title: Markups and Firm-LevelExportStatus
abstract: We derive an estimating equation to estimate markups using the insight of Hall (1986) and the control function approach of Olley and Pakes (1996). We rely on our method to explore the relationship between markups and export behavior using plant-level data. We find significantly higher markups when we control for unobserved productivity shocks. Furthermore, we find significant higher markups for exporting firms and present new evidence on markup-export status dynamics. More specifically, we find that firms' markups significantly increase (decrease) after entering (exiting) export markets. We see these results as a first step in opening up the productivity-export black box, and provide a potential explanation for the big measured productivity premia for firms entering export markets.
ch_abstract: 我们借鉴了Hall（1986）的理论框架与Olley和Pakes（1996）的控制函数方法，推导出测算加成率的估计方程。基于企业层面数据，我们运用该方法探究了加成率与出口行为的关系。研究发现：在控制未观测到的生产率冲击后，企业加成率显著提升；出口企业普遍具有更高的加成率，同时我们还揭示了加成率与出口状态动态关联的新证据——企业进入（退出）出口市场后，其加成率会显著上升（下降）。这些发现为揭开"生产率-出口"黑箱迈出了第一步，也为观测到的出口市场新进入企业存在巨大生产率溢价现象提供了合理解释。
tags: Markups, Control Function, Productivity, Exporting Behavior

title: When Market Fundamentalism and Industrial Policy Collide: The Tea Party and the USExport-Import Bank
abstract: For most major economies, state-backed export credit is a core element of industrial policy and their strategies to boost exports and economic growth.  Surprisingly, however, at a time when its competitors are increasing their use of this policy tool, state-backed export credit has become the subject of a hotly contested political battle in the US.  As a result of opposition from the Tea Party, the US Export-Import Bank was forced to halt its lending operations for five months in 2015 and subsequently limited to financing only the smallest transactions.  In this article, I show that the disruption of export credit is undermining the competitiveness of key US industrial sectors and encouraging the movement of advanced, high-value-added manufacturing overseas.  The case of export credit therefore presents an important puzzle:  Why is the US moving in the opposite direction of other states and taking steps that undermine its economic interests?  I argue that the internal US attack on export credit is fueled by the prevailing market fundamentalist ideology that has obscured the role of an active state in fostering the US’s economic success.  This article demonstrates how the rise of a powerful anti-state movement is hindering the ability of the US to conduct effective industrial policy and maintain its economic primacy in the face of growing global competitive pressures.
ch_abstract: 对大多数主要经济体而言，国家支持的出口信贷是产业政策及促进出口与经济增长战略的核心要素。然而令人惊讶的是，当竞争对手正加大运用这一政策工具时，国家支持的出口信贷却在美国成为激烈政治斗争的焦点。由于茶党势力的反对，美国进出口银行2015年被迫停止贷款业务五个月，随后被限制仅能为最小型交易提供融资。本文论证了出口信贷机制的中断正在削弱美国关键工业领域的竞争力，并推动先进高附加值制造业向海外转移。出口信贷案例由此引出一个重要谜题：为何美国正与其他国家背道而驰，采取损害自身经济利益的举措？笔者认为，美国国内对出口信贷的抨击源于盛行市场的原教旨主义意识形态，这种思潮遮蔽了积极政府在美国经济成功中的历史作用。本文揭示了在全球化竞争压力加剧之际，强势反国家主义运动的兴起如何阻碍美国实施有效产业政策及维持经济霸主地位的能力。
tags: United States, US, USA, industrial policy, developmental state, Tea Party, Export-Import Bank, Exim, export credit, neoliberalism

title: The Nexus betweenExportIncentive andExportPerformance in Ethiopia
abstract: The purpose of this study is to examine the nexus between export incentive and Ethiopian export performance from the year 1983 to 2017. The study is conducted by quantitative research method by using time series econometrics analysis. The study employs an Autoregressive Distributed Lag (ARDL) bound test model to co-integration to investigate the long-run relationship and Error Correction Model (ECM) for the short-run relationship between export and export incentive, real GDP, real exchange rate, gross capital formation, external debt stock, and inflation rate. The long-run empirical result using the bound test reveals that there is a stable long-run relationship between real export and explanatory variables. The study finds out that during the study period the Ethiopian export composition mainly focused on primary product and Europe was the main export destination. In the econometric analysis, the study finds that export incentive has a significant positive impact on export performance both in short-run and long run. Similarly, real GDP and inflation have a significant impact on export performance whereas gross capital formation, real exchange rate and external debt have a significant impact on short-run and long-run during the study period. Further, in the short run, one year lagged values of export and external debt have a positive impact on export performance. The coefficient of equilibrating error term suggests that the speed of adjustment (feedback effects towards the long-run equilibrium) takes a few years for full adjustment when there is a shock in the system. Therefore, export incentive and export performance in Ethiopia have a direct relationship both in the short run and in the long run.
ch_abstract: 本研究的目的是考察1983年至2017年间出口激励与埃塞俄比亚出口表现之间的关联。研究采用定量研究方法，运用时间序列计量经济学分析。通过自回归分布滞后（ARDL）边界检验模型研究出口与出口激励、实际GDP、实际汇率、资本形成总额、外债存量及通货膨胀率之间的长期协整关系，并采用误差修正模型（ECM）分析短期关系。边界检验的长期实证结果表明，实际出口与解释变量之间存在稳定的长期关系。研究发现，在研究期间埃塞俄比亚出口结构以初级产品为主，欧洲是主要出口目的地。计量分析显示，出口激励对短期和长期出口表现均具有显著正向影响；实际GDP和通货膨胀对出口表现影响显著，而资本形成总额、实际汇率和外债在研究期间对短期和长期均有显著影响。此外短期内，出口和外债的一年滞后值对出口表现具有正向影响。均衡误差项的系数表明，当系统受到冲击时，调整速度（向长期均衡的反馈效应）需要数年才能完全调整。因此，埃塞俄比亚的出口激励与出口表现在短期和长期均存在直接关联。
tags: Ethiopia, export incentive, export performance, ARDL, and ECM

title: ExportControls Game: Rethinking Global Integration
abstract: The article discusses how geopolitical interests are influencing trade policies and global supply chains. The U.S. and China are specifically highlighted, with the U.S. implementing export controls on semiconductors to prevent China's military advancement, while China responds with its own export restrictions on essential raw materials. Using a game-theoretic model, the study illustrates how countries use export control measures to balance security interests and economic benefits, ultimately impacting the global semiconductor supply chain and production decisions of multinational corporations.
ch_abstract: 文章探讨了地缘政治利益如何影响贸易政策和全球供应链。研究特别聚焦于美国和中国，美国实施半导体出口管制以遏制中国的军事发展，而中国则对关键原材料实施出口限制作为回应。通过博弈论模型，研究展示了各国如何利用出口管制措施在安全利益与经济收益间寻求平衡，最终影响全球半导体供应链及跨国企业的生产决策。
tags: Export Controls, Geoeconomic Fragmentation, Global Supply Chain, Security, Strategic Trade Policy

title: Impact of Riceexportban & Minimum Support Price on India's 2023 Food Inflation
abstract: This research explores the impact of inflation on India's 2023 rice export ban, with a special focus on the intricate dynamics surrounding the Minimum Support Price (MSP) and its implications for inflation control. It delves into how the export ban affects producer welfare and examines whether policies like export bans and state-imposed MSPs conflict with each other in the broader effort to curb inflation, especially in the context of the upcoming 2024 general elections. Given that cereals, particularly rice and wheat, are significant drivers of food inflation, MSP plays a crucial role as a price floor and benchmark. The study uses both primary and secondary data to analyse the effects of MSP and the export ban on food inflation, producer welfare, and urban consumers.
ch_abstract: 本研究探讨了通货膨胀对印度2023年大米出口禁令的影响，特别关注最低支持价格（MSP）的复杂动态及其对通胀控制的影响。研究深入分析了出口禁令如何影响生产者福利，并考察了在更广泛的抑制通胀努力中，出口禁令和国家实施的最低支持价格等政策是否相互冲突，尤其是在即将到来的2024年大选背景下。鉴于谷物（特别是大米和小麦）是推动食品通胀的重要因素，最低支持价格作为价格下限和基准发挥着关键作用。该研究通过一手和二手数据分析最低支持价格和出口禁令对食品通胀、生产者福利以及城市消费者的影响。
tags: Export ban, food Inflation, Minimum Support Price, Producer welfare, inflationary control, political economy, international economics, India rice export ban 2023, Food inflation in India, Rice and wheat price control India, Trade restrictions India, Agriculture policy India, MSP and inflation, indian government food policy, nflation control measures in India, Rice export restrictions and food security, Does the rice export ban benefit farmers in India?, urban consumers, Urban food inflation India, State control on food pricing, Food security in India, 2024 general elections and food prices, Economic impact of rice export ban

title: ExportGuarantees and Firm Performance in the Context of Corporate Governance
abstract: Micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) the forerunners of the Indian economy equipped with the greatest potential of growth and employment opportunities are the focus of this paper. By examining firm-level data for years 2007-2008 and 2017-2018, this paper captures the simultaneous expenditure on insurance premium and export earnings on the technical efficiency of firms. On applying stochastic frontier production function, results reveal that Indian MSMEs although being labour intensive have high average technical efficiency in the two comparative years. Results also indicate that factors such as firm size, age, ownership, technological imports both embodied and disembodied, expenditure on R&D, and export guarantees contribute to the technical efficiency of MSMEs. The top 25 percent of efficient MSMEs in 2017-2018 rely more on exports, have higher forex earnings with higher expenditure on marketing & advertising, and expenditure on export guarantees. This thus warrants a further improvement in technical efficiency through access to financial services, skilled labour, training of labour, enhancing and attracting foreign investment for operational collaborations, and incentives for easier and risk-free penetration in the world market.
ch_abstract: 微型、小型和中型企业（MSMEs）作为印度经济的先驱，具备最大的增长潜力和就业机会，是本文的研究重点。通过分析2007-2008年和2017-2018年的企业层面数据，本文探讨了保险费支出与出口收入对企业技术效率的同步影响。运用随机前沿生产函数模型的研究结果表明，尽管印度MSMEs属于劳动密集型产业，但在这两个对比年份中均表现出较高的平均技术效率。研究发现，企业规模、成立年限、所有权结构、实体与非实体技术引进、研发支出以及出口担保等因素均对MSMEs的技术效率产生积极影响。2017-2018年度效率排名前25%的MSMEs更依赖出口业务，其外汇收入更高，在营销广告和出口担保方面的支出也更为显著。这表明需要通过改善金融服务获取渠道、培养技术工人、加强劳动力培训、促进外资引进以开展运营合作，以及制定激励政策帮助企业更便捷、无风险地开拓国际市场，从而进一步提升技术效率水平。
tags: Corporate Governance, Firms, Technical Efficiency, Export Guarantees, Exports, MSME

title: China's ChangingExportStructure: A Factor-Based Analysis
abstract: While China’s stellar export performance is a well established fact, the issue of diversification of China’s exports continues to be debated. There are differing opinions on the factor proportions in its exports. Some argue that exports continue to be labour-intensive, while others have found a reallocation in favour of more skill-based and sophisticated exports. This paper is an attempt to address the ongoing debate. The study finds that post-2001 China’s exports have diversified. The major finding is that, based on the competitiveness analysis, the share of hi-tech manufactures has increased, while the share of unskilled labour-intensive products has gone down during 2001-06. Post-2001 hi-tech products command a share of 32% in China’s total exports and 43% in China’s total imports. This is indicative of the fact that imports of hi-tech parts and components are assembled in China to be exported as finished hi-tech goods.
ch_abstract: 尽管中国卓越的出口表现已成为公认事实，但关于其出口多元化的问题仍存争议。对其出口要素比例的判断存在分歧：有观点认为中国出口仍以劳动密集型产品为主，也有研究指出出口结构正向技能要求更高、工艺更复杂的产品转移。本文旨在回应这一持续讨论。研究发现，2001年后中国出口结构呈现多元化趋势。基于竞争力分析的主要结论显示，2001-2006年间，高技术制成品出口比重上升，非技能劳动密集型产品比重下降。2001年后，高技术产品已占中国出口总额的32%和进口总额的43%，这表明中国正进口高技术零部件进行组装，最终以高技术成品形式出口。
tags: China, export structure, factors

title: Does theExport-Led Growth Hypothesis Hold for Services Exports in Emerging Economies?
abstract: The export-led growth hypothesis states a positive relationship between the growth of exports and long-run economic growth. This study examines the validity of the export-led growth hypothesis of services exports in 5 emerging economies, including Brazil, India, Nigeria, China, and South Africa (BINCS), for the period of 1980-2019. The study employs the panel mean group autoregressive distributed lag (ARDL) procedure to identify a causal relationship between services exports and gross domestic product (GDP) per capita. The findings show that the export-led growth hypothesis in services only has a positive effect on economic growth in the short run while other variables, including foreign direct investment (FDI), gross capital formation, and labour, increase economic growth in the long run. Hence, the emerging countries should focus more on internal investment to boost growth in the long and short run.
ch_abstract: 出口导向型增长假说阐述了出口增长与长期经济增长之间的正向关系。本研究以巴西、印度、尼日利亚、中国和南非五个新兴经济体（BINCS）为样本，检验了1980-2019年间服务贸易出口导向型增长假说的有效性。研究采用面板均值组自回归分布滞后（ARDL）方法，识别服务出口与人均国内生产总值（GDP）之间的因果关系。结果表明：服务贸易的出口导向型增长假说仅在短期内对经济增长产生积极影响，而外国直接投资（FDI）、资本形成总额和劳动力等其他变量则能促进长期经济增长。因此新兴经济体应更注重国内投资，以推动长期与短期的经济增长。
tags: Exports, Economic Growth, Export-Led Growth, Services Exports, Emerging Economies.

title: Political Risk andExportPromotion: Evidence from Germany
abstract: Political risk represents an important hidden transaction cost that reduces international trade. This paper investigates the claim that German public export credit guarantees (Hermes guarantees) mitigate this friction to trade flows and hence promote exports. We employ an empirical trade gravity model, where we explicitly control for political risk in the importing country in order to evaluate the effect of export guarantees. The idea behind export promotion through public export credit agencies (ECAs) is that the private market is unable to provide adequate insurance for all risks associated with exports. As a consequence, firms' export activities are limited in the absence of insurance provision. Using a novel data set on guarantees we estimate the effect of guarantees in a static and dynamic panel model. We find a statistically and economically significant positive effect of public export guarantees on exports which indicates that export promotion is indeed effective. Furthermore, political risk turns out to be a robust determinant of exports and hence should be taken into account in any empirical model of trade.
ch_abstract: 政治风险是降低国际贸易的一项重要隐性交易成本。本文研究了德国公共出口信用担保（赫尔墨斯担保）能否缓解贸易流动中的这一摩擦从而促进出口的主张。我们采用实证贸易引力模型，在明确控制进口国政治风险的基础上评估出口担保的效果。通过公共出口信用机构（ECA）促进出口的理念在于，私人市场无法为出口相关风险提供充分保险，因此在缺乏保险的情况下企业出口活动会受到限制。基于一套新颖的担保数据集，我们通过静态和动态面板模型估算了担保的效应。研究发现公共出口担保对出口具有统计学和经济意义上显著的正向影响，表明出口促进政策确实有效。此外，政治风险被证实是出口的稳健决定因素，因此任何实证贸易模型都应予以考量。
tags: public export credit guarantees, political risk, panel regression

title: Evaluating the Impact ofExportFinance Support on Firm-LevelExportPerformance: Evidence from Pakistan
abstract: This paper evaluates the impact of two export finance support schemes: The Export Finance Scheme (EFS) and the Long-Term Finance Facility for Plant & Machinery (LTFF) on firm-level export performance. These policies offer loans to exporters at concessionary interest rates to finance short-term working capital and long-term investment in machinery and equipment respectively. To do so, we combine customs data with information about which firms participate in each scheme and the value of the loans they obtain between 2015 and 2017. We find that EFS and LTFF increased the growth rate of exports sales by 7 and 8-11 percentage points respectively. Neither policy exerts a significant impact on the number of products that a firm exports or the number of foreign countries it sells to. Our analysis indicates that facilitating long-term investment in physical capital is more cost effective to raise exports than subsidizing exporters’ working capital needs.
ch_abstract: 本文评估了两种出口融资支持计划——出口融资计划（EFS）和机械设备长期融资机制（LTFF）对企业层面出口表现的影响。这两项政策分别以优惠利率向出口商提供短期营运资金贷款和机械设备长期投资贷款。为此，我们将海关数据与2015至2017年间参与各计划的企业及其所获贷款金额信息相结合。研究发现，EFS和LTFF分别使出口销售额增长率提高了7个百分点和8-11个百分点。两项政策均未对企业出口产品数量或出口目的地国家数量产生显著影响。分析表明，与补贴出口商营运资金需求相比，促进实体资本长期投资对提升出口更具成本效益。
tags: trade finance, export credit, export subsidies, export margins, Pakistan

title: CO2Shipping -ExportTerminal Design
abstract: After the CO2has been captured, it must be transported to permanent storage to complete the CCS chain. The configuration of the chain, choice of capture technology, transport method and storage site) will vary from case to case. In this study, the CO2is captured in Rotterdam, Netherlands, and transported to an import hub at Kollsnes on the west coast of Norway by shipping. The site from which the CO2is transported from is the export terminal, and encompasses the CO2liquefaction, intermediate storage tank facility, and loading installation. Of these, especially the intermediate storage tank will be area demanding and could pose a challenge in cases where there is limited land area available, or the land purchase cost is high. Three different export terminal configurations have been investigated: onshore, combination of onshore and offshore, and offshore floating terminal. The investigation shows that there is potentially a high degree of flexibility regarding export terminal configuration as all three configurations are feasible. On sites where a fully onshore terminal is not possible other solutions are available. In the case of a fully offshore/near shore terminal parallels can be drawn to the LNG supply chain where floating processing terminals are gaining interest as it is reported to have several attractive advantages including lower cost and construction time.
ch_abstract: 二氧化碳被捕获后，必须运输至永久封存地点以完成碳捕集与封存链条。该链条的具体配置（包括捕集技术选择、运输方式及封存地点）将因情况而异。本研究以荷兰鹿特丹为二氧化碳捕集地，通过船运将其输送至挪威西海岸科尔斯尼斯的接收枢纽。二氧化碳运输起点为出口终端，涵盖液化装置、中间储罐设施及装载系统。其中中间储罐尤其需要占用大面积场地，在可用土地有限或购地成本高昂的情况下可能构成挑战。研究考察了三种不同的出口终端配置方案：全陆上终端、陆海混合终端以及海上浮动终端。研究表明出口终端配置具有高度灵活性，三种方案均具可行性。在无法建设全陆上终端的场地，可采用其他替代方案。对于全离岸/近岸终端方案，可参照液化天然气供应链中日益受关注的浮动处理终端模式，据报道该模式具有成本更低、建造周期更短等多项显著优势。
tags: CO2 liquefaction, CO2 intermediate storage, CO2 export terminal

title: Exportand Inventory: Evidence from Chinese Firms
abstract: This paper investigates the effect of export on firm inventory using Chinese firm data. We find that exporting increases firms’ inventory stocks. And exporting to more distant destinations is associated with less frequent and more concentrated export transactions.
ch_abstract: 本文利用中国企业数据研究了出口对企业存货的影响。研究发现，出口会增加企业的存货库存。同时，出口到更远的目的地会导致出口交易频率降低且更加集中。
tags: Firm inventory, export, export frequency

title: ExportTransitions
abstract: In this paper I use a broad multi-country dataset to analyze divergent experiences in export orientation over time. First, I use transition probability matrices for comparing how countries move across the world distribution for different time periods. I find that transitions toward high export ratios have been mainly experienced by Asian countries, but also some reformers like Mexico and Chile have been able to increase their exports significantly. Countries making transitions toward low export ratios are mainly from Africa, but these countries only constitute a half of economies with bad export performance. I focus then on which structural factors may be important for long-run transitions. The results suggest that more open economies and those with better institutions are more likely to move to high export ratios in the long-run. Finally, I explore within-country experiences for identifying episodes of export transitions. Using an event study methodology, I find a very weak association between export transitions and economic growth and investment rate. In contrast, my results suggest that transitions are potentially driven by improvements in financial development. Finally, favorable terms of trade, increments in productivity, and reductions in exchange rate distortions are not found to be a catalyst for export transitions.
ch_abstract: 本文采用广泛的多国数据集，分析了不同时期出口导向的差异化表现。首先，我运用转移概率矩阵比较各国在不同时段全球分布中的位次变化，发现亚洲国家是出口比率提升的主要群体，但墨西哥、智利等改革国家也实现了出口显著增长。出口比率下降的国家主要来自非洲，但这些国家仅占出口表现不佳经济体的一半。随后我重点研究了影响长期转型的结构性因素，结果表明经济开放度更高、制度更完善的国家更可能实现出口比率长期提升。最后通过国内案例分析识别出口转型阶段，运用事件研究法发现出口转型与经济增长率、投资率的关联性极弱。相反，研究显示金融发展水平的提升可能是驱动转型的关键因素。而有利的贸易条件、生产率提高及汇率扭曲减少等因素，均未显现出对出口转型的催化作用。
tags: export performance, transition, institutions, trade policy

title: ExportPromotion Programmes AsExportPerformance Catalysts for SMEs: Insights From an Emerging Economy
abstract: The purpose of the study is to analyse the joint impact of external factors of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), such as export promotion programmes (EPPs), which encompass trade mobility-, information-, education-, and training-related programmes, and internal factors of SMEs, which encompass export-related resources, preceding-year export performance, and its impact on current-period export performance. The study tests their relationship with structural equation modelling using a random sample of 95 exporting SMEs in an emerging economy, Peru. The results indicate that experiential knowledge provided by trade mobility-related programmes and export performance of the preceding year positively influence the resources of SMEs oriented towards export activity as well as current export performance. Moreover, the results highlight the need to review the efficacy and design of EPPs, acknowledging the available resources of SMEs as well as the internationalisation theories of the firm, in order to enhance their influence on the international development and export performance of SMEs. Finally, the study has extended the knowledge about emerging economies by showing the role EPPs play in SMEs’ export performance.
ch_abstract: 本研究旨在分析中小企业的外部因素（如出口促进计划，包括贸易流动、信息、教育和培训相关项目）与内部因素（包括出口相关资源、上年度出口表现）对当期出口表现的共同影响。研究采用结构方程模型，以新兴经济体秘鲁95家出口型中小企业为随机样本进行检验。结果表明，贸易流动相关项目提供的经验知识与上年度出口表现，对中小企业出口导向型资源及当期出口表现均产生积极影响。此外，研究强调需结合中小企业现有资源与企业国际化理论，重新审视出口促进计划的效能与设计，以增强其对中小企业国际发展与出口表现的影响。最后，本研究通过揭示出口促进计划在中小企业出口表现中的作用，拓展了关于新兴经济体的认知。
tags: SMEs, Export Promotion Programmes, organisational resources, export performance, structural equation models, Peru

title: An Analysis of Product-Market Strategy andExportPerformance: Evidence from SMEs in Saudi Arabia
abstract: This paper examines the relationship between product and export market characteristics with export marketing strategies and performance of SMEs in Saudi Arabia. Based on an extensive review of literature, a model was developed for the study and hypotheses were formulated. Empirical research was used to test the hypotheses. Primary data were collected through a survey from a sample of 214 exporting SMEs in Saudi Arabia. Results based on the use of multiple regression procedures suggest that while product and export market characteristics have an impact on export marketing strategy of SMEs in Saudi Arabia. Limited sample size and the generalization of results for the entire Kingdom although the sample are quite limited are the limitations of this study. The findings of this study provides useful insights to SMEs involved in exporting activities in marketing strategy deployment. This study makes a valuable contribution given the fact that there is a dearth of empirical studies c of this nature focusing on Saudi Arabia.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了沙特阿拉伯中小企业产品与出口市场特征同出口营销策略及绩效之间的关系。基于大量文献综述，研究构建了理论模型并提出假设，采用实证研究方法进行验证。通过问卷调查收集了214家沙特出口型中小企业的一手数据，多元回归分析结果表明：产品与出口市场特征对沙特中小企业的出口营销策略存在显著影响。研究局限性在于样本量有限，且样本代表性难以覆盖沙特全境。本研究成果为从事出口活动的中小企业制定营销策略提供了有益参考。鉴于目前针对沙特阿拉伯的同类实证研究稀缺，本研究具有重要学术价值。
tags: export, marketing strategy, performance, SME, Saudi Arabia

title: ExportRisk and Currency Returns
abstract: Export risk occurs when trade shocks affect expected foreign currency earnings. Economies with exports concentrated in fewer categories, are riskier than other economies. The risky economies also exhibit higher interest rates. These findings are consistent with a two-period Ricardian trade model showing a positive relation between export risk and expected currency returns in a costly production environment, where cost shocks are impactful. A hedge portfolio capturing export risk explains average excess currency returns in the cross-section. The export risk factor is negatively related to innovations in market volatility, but unlike other factors, is positively related to US dollar returns.
ch_abstract: 出口风险在贸易冲击影响预期外汇收入时产生。出口集中于较少类别的经济体比其他经济体风险更高。这些高风险经济体还表现出更高的利率。这些发现与一个两期李嘉图贸易模型一致，该模型显示在成本冲击影响显著的高成本生产环境中，出口风险与预期货币回报呈正相关。一个捕捉出口风险的对冲投资组合能够解释横截面上的平均超额货币回报。出口风险因子与市场波动性创新呈负相关，但与其他因子不同，它与美元回报呈正相关。
tags: Export Quality, Export Concentration, Export Risk, Currency Returns.

title: Resources Investment andExportCompetitive Advantage of Firms in a Transition Economy: The Moderating Role of Domestic Institutional Environment and Competitive Pressures
abstract: In this study, we provide a research framework that unbundles the impact of different institutional attributes (i.e., the degree of perceived specificity, stability, predictability, and enforceability of property rights and contracting institutions) on the firm's resources and capabilities investment, as well as competitive advantage under different degrees of competitive pressures in domestic and overseas markets. We empirically test this model with a sample of exporting firm in an emerging and transition economy, i.e., Vietnam. The statistical results show that there are strong relationships between the domestic institutional environment and the firm's export-related resources and capabilities investment, as well as between export-related resources and capabilities investment and export competitive advantage. Nevertheless, the moderating effect of competitive pressures is not statistically supported. Implications for managers, policy makers and researchers are suggested.
ch_abstract: 本研究提出了一个研究框架，旨在解构不同制度属性（即产权与契约制度在感知特异性、稳定性、可预测性及可执行性方面的程度）对企业资源能力投资的影响，以及这些投资在国内外市场不同竞争压力下对竞争优势的作用。我们以新兴转型经济体越南的出口企业为样本对该模型进行实证检验。统计结果表明：国内制度环境与企业出口相关资源能力投资之间存在显著关联，出口相关资源能力投资与出口竞争优势之间亦存在密切联系。然而，竞争压力的调节作用未获得统计学支持。本文最后为管理者、政策制定者和研究者提出了实践启示。
tags: export, resources, Vietnam, transition

title: Determinants ofExportBehaviour of German Business Services Companies
abstract: The determinants of export behaviour at firm level have been widely investigated for manufacturing companies. By contrast, what has remained largely neglected is a detailed investigation in the service sector. As aggregate statistics show, international trade in services has grown significantly over the last few years. However, it is unclear why some companies export and others do not. This paper presents some initial results about the German business services sector at firm level. Using a unique panel dataset of enterprises from the business services sector (transport, storage and communication, real estate, renting and business activities) for the years 2003 to 2005, we analysed the impact of several firm-specific characteristics such as size, productivity, human capital, experience on the national market in Germany, etc. on the firms' export performance. Further, we used the pooled fractional probit estimator, recently introduced by Papke & Wooldridge, an approach that considers both the special nature of the export intensity variable and in addition unobserved time-invariant characteristics. When there is no control for fixed enterprise effects the overall results are in line with previous studies. When there is a control for unobserved heterogeneity, the positive effects of productivity and human capital disappear, indicating that these variables are not per se positively related to export performance, but rather to time-constant characteristics that are unobserved. Size and product diversification still have a positive and significant effect.
ch_abstract: 企业层面出口行为的影响因素在制造业企业中已得到广泛研究。相比之下，服务业领域的详细调查在很大程度上仍被忽视。综合统计数据显示，过去几年国际服务贸易显著增长。然而，目前尚不清楚为何有些企业出口而另一些则不出口。本文展示了关于德国商业服务业企业层面的一些初步研究成果。通过使用2003至2005年商业服务业（运输、仓储与通信、房地产、租赁及商业活动）企业的独特面板数据集，我们分析了企业规模、生产率、人力资本、在德国国内市场的经验等多项企业特定特征对其出口表现的影响。此外，我们采用了Papke & Wooldridge最新提出的混合分数概率估计方法，该方法既考虑了出口强度变量的特殊性，又兼顾了未观察到的时不变特征。当未控制企业固定效应时，总体结果与既往研究一致。当控制未观察到的异质性后，生产率和人力资本的积极影响消失，表明这些变量本身与出口表现并无正向关联，而是与未被观察到的时不变特征相关。企业规模和产品多元化仍具有显著正向影响。
tags: Business services sector, export behaviour, firm performance

title: Intellectual Property Rights Protection andExportQuality Upgrading
abstract: This paper evaluates the impact of effective IPRs protection on export quality using a factor-proportion model and a sample of 96 Developing countries and economies in transition between 1996-2011. I find that countries with more effective IPRs protection have comparative advantage in producing and exporting higher quality R&D intensive goods. This effect is however contingent on both a country’s level of development and technological capability. The results are robust to batteries of sensitivity checks and alternative indicators of export quality including, export sophistication and complexity.
ch_abstract: 本文通过要素比例模型和1996-2011年间96个发展中国家及转型经济体的样本，评估了有效知识产权保护对出口质量的影响。研究发现，知识产权保护更有效的国家在生产和出口更高研发密集型商品方面具有比较优势。但这一效应取决于国家的发展水平和技术能力。研究结果对包括出口复杂度与精密度在内的多种出口质量替代指标及敏感性检验均保持稳健。
tags: Intellectual Property Rights; Export Quality; Export Sophistication; Export Complexity

title: Diversification Through Promotion ofExport-Oriented Production and 'Green Transformation' in Azerbaijan
abstract: Diversification is an important component of the development of any economy. The reason for this is the increase in the country's resilience to external stimuli, which makes progress more gradual, constant and predictable. Thus, the study of the possibilities of diversifying the economy is very relevant, especially in today's geopolitical conditions. The purpose of the work was to analyse some methods of diversifying the economy of Azerbaijan, namely the development of export-oriented production and the implementation of the “green transformation”. Analysis became the main method in writing the article, but historical, modelling, deduction, abstract-logical methods also played an important role. Thus, the work examined and analysed the export of Azerbaijan, during which a significant dependence of the country on oil sales to foreign markets was revealed. Since such a prospect is dangerous for the sustainable development of the country, it is important to carry out certain measures aimed at increasing the diversification of its exports. First of all, they are associated with public private partnerships, but they also take other forms, such as attracting investments and building infrastructure. In addition, the paper describes how the “green transformation” of the country can help achieve the goals of economic diversification and at what stage is the level of “greening” of the state economy; the paper also describes the prospects for the state in achieving these goals. The article brings new knowledge to understand the features of the functioning of the Azerbaijani economy, as well as to the theory of economic and sustainable development, as well as trade.
ch_abstract: 多元化是任何经济发展的重要组成部分。其原因在于这能增强国家应对外部冲击的韧性，使发展进程更加渐进、持续且可预测。因此，研究经济多元化的可能性具有重要现实意义，在当前地缘政治环境下尤为如此。本研究旨在分析阿塞拜疆经济多元化的若干路径，具体包括发展出口导向型产业和实施"绿色转型"。文章主要采用分析法，同时结合历史研究法、模型构建法、演绎法及抽象逻辑法等多种研究方法。通过系统考察阿塞拜疆出口状况，研究发现该国对外石油销售存在显著依赖性。鉴于这种单一经济结构将危及可持续发展，实施提升出口多元化的政策措施至关重要。这些措施以公私合营为主，同时涵盖吸引投资和基础设施建设等其他形式。此外，本文阐述了"绿色转型"如何助力经济多元化目标实现，评估了该国经济"绿色化"的当前阶段，并展望了实现这些目标的前景。本研究为理解阿塞拜疆经济运行特征提供了新认知，同时对经济发展理论、可持续增长理论及贸易理论作出了学术贡献。
tags: economy of Azerbaijan, sustainable development, export concentration, export diversification, “green transformation” of business

title: Modelling Dual-Use TradeControlSystems - A Portuguese Point of View
abstract: This paper discusses several aspects of the law applicable to export control of dual-use items in the EU.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了欧盟适用于两用物品出口管制的法律的若干方面。
tags: Dual-Use, Export Control, European Union

title: Complying withExportLaws without Importing Discrimination Liability: An Attempt to Integrate Employment Discrimination Laws and the DeemedExportRules
abstract: The federal deemed export rules prohibit certain individuals from receiving any information about certain technologies without the required license, even if those individuals are otherwise authorized to work within the United States.  In other words, employers who deal with technology or software subject to export control may be considered to be illegally exporting such technology or software, simply by allowing certain foreign nationals to work with or gain information about the restricted items. This article will attempt two moderately simple tasks and one more difficult.  The first task is to identify the tensions that exist between the deemed export rules and the federal anti-discrimination statutes, creating awareness about potential issues that might arise if employers use general human resources advice, while neglecting deemed export requirements. Second, the article will attempt to demonstrate how employers who want to become involved in the complex deemed export regime can do so, consistent with the federal anti-discrimination statutes.  While concern exists that employers complying with the deemed export rules may be placing themselves in violation of Title VII and IRCA, this article argues that, in most cases, employment screenings for deemed export requirements should not yield liability under either Title VII or IRCA. The third task is more complex.  To comply with deemed export law, an employer must obtain an employee-specific export license prior to making the restricted technology available to the foreign national.  The required licenses often take months to obtain, and, it may be difficult or impossible for employers to obtain such licenses for certain employees.  To comply with the deemed export requirements in a hiring or promotion context, the employer would be required to limit an employee's job responsibilities to non-export controlled work or to place the foreign national employee on unpaid leave until the government made its decision on whether to issue the license.  This places the employer in the position of leaving certain tasks unperformed or requiring other employees to take on additional job responsibilities during the interim, causing project delays. Once an employer becomes involved in the deemed export regime, it has responsibilities to ensure that the employee's access to technology remains within the granted license and that all of the conditions of the license continue to be met.  This article argues that, consistent with the federal anti-discrimination statutes, employers should be able, in certain instances, to choose not to hire, assign, or promote certain foreign nationals, simply because to do so would trigger the employer's involvement in the legally perilous, complex, and uncertain deemed export regime.  Additionally, the article argues that employers should be allowed to engage in a cost-benefit analysis regarding whether the value added by particular job positions merits involvement with the deemed export regime. To be clear, this article does not advocate that all employers begin to consider national origin or country of citizenship when hiring.  Nor does it advocate that an employer should be able to use the deemed export rules as a pretext for discrimination based on national origin or citizenship.  Rather, the article demonstrates that neither Title VII nor IRCA prohibit an employer from refusing to hire an individual, if the reason for that decision is a desire to avoid becoming involved in the deemed export regime.
ch_abstract: 联邦推定出口规则禁止某些个人在未获得必要许可证的情况下接收特定技术的任何信息，即使这些个人已获准在美国工作。换言之，处理受出口管制技术或软件的雇主若允许某些外籍人士接触或获取受限物品的相关信息，可能被视为非法出口此类技术或软件。本文试图完成两项相对简单的任务和一项更复杂的任务。首要任务是揭示推定出口规则与联邦反歧视法规之间的张力，警示雇主若仅遵循通用人力资源建议而忽视推定出口要求可能引发的潜在问题。其次，本文试图论证有意参与复杂推定出口机制的雇主如何在遵守联邦反歧视法规的前提下实现合规。尽管存在对合规行为可能违反《民权法案第七章》和《移民改革与控制法案》的担忧，但本文主张在多数情况下，基于推定出口要求进行的雇佣筛查不应导致这两项法案下的法律责任。第三项任务更为复杂。为遵守推定出口法律，雇主必须在外籍员工接触受限技术前获取针对该员工的出口许可证。此类许可证通常需数月才能获批，且某些员工的许可证可能难以或无法取得。在雇佣或晋升场景中，为满足推定出口要求，雇主需将员工职责限制在非出口管制工作范围内，或令外籍员工在政府作出许可证审批决定前处于无薪休假状态。这将导致雇主面临特定任务无人执行或需其他员工临时承担额外职责的困境，造成项目延误。一旦雇主涉足推定出口机制，便有责任确保员工对技术的接触始终不超出许可证授权范围，并持续满足所有许可条件。本文主张，在符合联邦反歧视法规的前提下，雇主应有权在某些情况下仅因可能涉足法律风险高、复杂且不确定的推定出口机制，就决定不雇佣、不分配或不晋升特定外籍人士。此外，本文认为应允许雇主进行成本效益分析，评估特定岗位的附加值是否值得涉足推定出口机制。需要明确的是，本文并非主张所有雇主在招聘时开始考虑国籍或公民身份因素，也不支持雇主以推定出口规则为借口实施基于国籍或公民身份的歧视。相反，本文论证当决策动机是避免涉足推定出口机制时，《民权法案第七章》和《移民改革与控制法案》均不禁止雇主拒绝雇佣某个人。
tags: deemed export, Title VII, IRCA

title: A Review of America's SemiconductorExportControls
abstract: Semiconductor export controls, which regulate the overseas sale of microchips and related technologies from the United States, have become a critical policy issue given the industry’s strategic importance for economic and national security interests. With the recent addition of export regulations on semiconductor manufacturing items to the ​​Export Administration Regulation (EAR), these restrictions greatly shape complex geopolitical dynamics. Moreover, the passing of the CHIPS and Science Acts underscores the recent shift in America’s policies toward domestic production to maintain America's security and economic advantage.This report provides an in-depth examination of the current export control policies as well as developments domestically to support semiconductor innovation. In response to policy changes in the EAR, the report further examines the impacts export controls have on US companies and international countries. Finally, after examining potential limitations in the EAR’s effectiveness, we provide several recommended courses of action.
ch_abstract: 半导体出口管制政策规范了美国微芯片及相关技术的海外销售，鉴于该行业对经济和国家安全的战略重要性，已成为关键政策议题。随着近期半导体制造设备出口管制条例被纳入《出口管理条例》（EAR），这些限制措施极大地塑造了复杂的地缘政治格局。此外，《芯片与科学法案》的通过凸显了美国近期政策转向本土生产，以维护其安全与经济优势。本报告深入分析了现行出口管制政策及国内支持半导体创新的发展动态，针对EAR政策调整进一步探讨了出口管制对美国企业及国际社会的影响。最后在审视EAR政策实效性潜在局限的基础上，我们提出了若干行动建议。
tags: semiconductor, export controls, political economy, trade, national security, microchips, tariffs

title: Diversification through Promotion ofExport-Oriented Production and 'Green Transformation' in Azerbaijan
abstract: Diversification is an important component of the development of any economy. The reason for this is the increase in the country's resilience to external stimuli, which makes progress more gradual, constant and predictable. Thus, the study of the possibilities of diversifying the economy is very relevant, especially in today's geopolitical conditions. The purpose of the work was to analyse some methods of diversifying the economy of Azerbaijan, namely the development of export-oriented production and the implementation of the “green transformation”. Analysis became the main method in writing the article, but historical, modelling, deduction, abstract-logical methods also played an important role. Thus, the work examined and analysed the export of Azerbaijan, during which a significant dependence of the country on oil sales to foreign markets was revealed. Since such a prospect is dangerous for the sustainable development of the country, it is important to carry out certain measures aimed at increasing the diversification of its exports. First of all, they are associated with public-private partnerships, but they also take other forms, such as attracting investments and building infrastructure. In addition, the paper describes how the “green transformation” of the country can help achieve the goals of economic diversification and at what stage is the level of “greening” of the state economy; the paper also describes the prospects for the state in achieving these goals. The article brings new knowledge to understand the features of the functioning of the Azerbaijani economy, as well as to the theory of economic and sustainable development, as well as trade.
ch_abstract: 多元化是任何经济发展的重要组成部分。其原因在于国家对外部刺激的抵御能力增强，使得发展进程更加渐进、持续且可预测。因此，研究经济多元化的可能性具有重大现实意义，尤其是在当前地缘政治环境下。本文旨在分析阿塞拜疆经济多元化的若干方法，具体包括发展出口导向型产业和实施"绿色转型"。分析是文章撰写的主要方法，但历史研究、模型构建、演绎法和抽象逻辑方法也发挥了重要作用。通过研究，本文考察并分析了阿塞拜疆的出口状况，发现该国对石油出口存在严重依赖。鉴于这种前景将危及国家可持续发展，实施提升出口多元化的措施至关重要。这些措施主要涉及公私合作模式，同时也包括吸引投资和基础设施建设等其他形式。此外，本文阐述了国家"绿色转型"如何助力实现经济多元化目标，评估了当前国民经济"绿色化"水平，并展望了该国实现这些目标的前景。本研究为理解阿塞拜疆经济运行特点、经济发展与可持续性理论以及贸易理论提供了新的认知。
tags: economy of Azerbaijan, sustainable development, export concentration, export diversification, “green transformation” of business

title: Learning toExportfrom Neighbors
abstract: This paper studies how learning from neighboring firms affects new exporters’ performance and dynamics. We develop a statistical decision model in which a firm updates its prior belief about demand of a foreign market based on the number of neighbors currently selling there, the level and heterogeneity of their export sales, and the firm’s own prior knowledge about the market. A positive signal about demand inferred from neighbors’ export performance raises the firm’s probability of entry and initial sales in the market, but lowers post-entry growth, conditional on survival. These learning effects are stronger when there are more neighbors revealing the signal or when the firm is less familiar with the market. Decisions to exit are independent of the prevalence of neighboring export activities. We find supporting evidence from the transaction-level export data for all Chinese exporters over 2000-2006. Our findings are robust to controlling for firms’ supply shocks, countries’ demand shocks, and city-country fixed effects.
ch_abstract: 本文研究了从邻近企业学习如何影响新出口商的绩效与动态变化。我们构建了一个统计决策模型，企业根据当前在该市场销售的邻近企业数量、其出口销售额水平与差异性，以及企业自身对该市场的先验认知，来更新其对国外市场需求的先验判断。从邻近企业出口表现推断出的积极需求信号会提高企业进入该市场的概率和初始销售额，但会降低存活企业的后续增长。当传递信号的邻近企业数量更多，或企业对市场熟悉度较低时，这种学习效应更为显著。退出决策与邻近出口活动的普遍性无关。我们利用2000-2006年间中国所有出口企业的交易级数据找到了支持性证据。研究结果在控制企业供给冲击、国家需求冲击及城市-国家固定效应后依然稳健。
tags: learning to export, knowledge spillover, uncertainty, export dynamics

title: Exporting Against Risk? Theory and Evidence from PublicExportInsurance Schemes in OECD Countries
abstract: This paper endeavours to find out in how far public export insurance schemes foster international trade. Thereto, a gravity equation is derived, which accounts for the risk of financial losses in case firms contract defaulting foreign buyers. Empirical results suggest that OECD countries issuing trade credits with generous state-guarantees did not, during the 1999 to 2005 period, witness more exports towards politically and commercially more unstable low income countries. Rather, publicly indemnified trade finance has promoted exports, to a modest degree, towards high and middle-income countries, where financial intermediaries and markets provide viable alternatives to hedge against payment risks.
ch_abstract: 本文旨在探究公共出口保险计划在多大程度上促进了国际贸易。为此，研究推导出一个引力方程，用于衡量企业遭遇外国买家违约时面临的财务损失风险。实证结果表明，在1999至2005年期间，提供国家高额担保贸易信贷的经合组织成员国，并未显著增加对政治和商业环境更不稳定的低收入国家的出口。相反，获得公共补偿的贸易融资在一定程度上促进了向高收入和中高收入国家的出口——这些国家的金融中介和市场本身已具备对冲付款风险的可行替代方案。
tags: Export Credit Insurance, Export Promotion, Default Risk, Gravity Equation

title: How Rising Powers Create Governance Gaps: The Case ofExportCredit and the Environment
abstract: How are rising powers affecting global governance?  This article analyzes their impact on an important but understudied area of global governance at the intersection of trade and environment:  export credit.  State-backed export credit agencies (ECAs) play a major role in financing large infrastructure and energy projects, particularly in developing countries.  Many of these projects carry significant environmental implications, yet there has been little scholarly attention to their governance.  Since the 1990s, global governance of the environmental practices of ECAs has been progressively expanded and strengthened via the OECD Arrangement on export credit and Common Approaches for environmental and social due diligence.  Recently, however, there has been a dramatic increase in export credit provision by rising powers, such as India and China, who are not members of the OECD nor subject to the Arrangement or Common Approaches.  In this article, I argue that existing governance mechanisms have not caught up with the rapidly changing landscape of export credit.  Drawing on the case of India’s financing for the Rampal coal-fired power plant in Bangladesh, I show that the problem of environmental governance for export credit increasingly extends beyond the advanced-industrialized states of the OECD.  In a context where nearly half of all export credit is now provided by countries outside the OECD, I argue, existing governance mechanisms are no longer sufficient.  The failure to cover the large and growing volume of export credit provided by the emerging powers represents a major gap in the established system of environmental governance for export credit.
ch_abstract: 新兴大国如何影响全球治理？本文分析它们对一个重要但研究不足的全球治理领域——贸易与环境交叉领域的出口信贷——所产生的影响。国家支持的出口信贷机构（ECAs）在为大型基础设施和能源项目提供融资方面发挥着重要作用，尤其是在发展中国家。这些项目中许多都具有重大的环境影响，然而对其治理的学术关注却很少。自20世纪90年代以来，通过经合组织（OECD）的出口信贷安排及环境和社会尽职调查共同方法，对ECA环境实践的全球治理逐步扩大和加强。然而最近，印度和中国等新兴大国提供的出口信贷急剧增加，它们不是OECD成员，也不受该安排或共同方法的约束。在本文中，我认为现有的治理机制未能跟上出口信贷格局的快速变化。以印度为孟加拉国拉姆帕尔燃煤电厂提供融资的案例为例，我表明出口信贷环境治理问题日益超出OECD先进工业化国家的范围。在如今近半数出口信贷由非OECD国家提供的背景下，我认为现有治理机制已不再足够。未能涵盖新兴大国提供的大量且不断增长的出口信贷，是现有出口信贷环境治理体系中的一个重大缺口。
tags: export credit, global environmental governance, global economic governance, global governance, rising powers, India, OECD Arrangement, coal, power plant

title: USExportControls Under WTO Law
abstract: This article innovatively examines US export control law and policy under WTO law, filling up a research gap in this important field. Arguably, US export controls are characterised by excessive national discretion, especially in terms of policy coherence with WTO law, the US domestic status of WTO law and regulatory reasons. Corresponding suggestions are provided for constraining the discretion in the aforesaid aspects in the direction of consistency with WTO law and trade liberalisation. On the other hand, in the area of trade facilitation, in spite of weaknesses in several limited aspects, such as division of powers, simplicity and convenience, the US export controls are generally viewed as sound and not requiring further improvement.
ch_abstract: 本文创新性地从WTO法视角审视了美国出口管制法律与政策，填补了这一重要领域的研究空白。研究表明，美国出口管制制度存在国家裁量权过度的特征，尤其体现在与WTO法的政策协调性、WTO法在美国国内法地位及管制理由等方面。针对上述维度的裁量权过度问题，研究提出了遵循WTO法框架与贸易自由化导向的约束建议。另一方面，在贸易便利化领域，尽管存在权力分配、程序简捷性等有限环节的不足，美国出口管制制度整体上仍被视为完善且无需重大改进。
tags: Export Controls, International Trade, National Security, United States, World Trade Organization

title: Revisiting the Moderation Effect of Network on theExportBarrier –ExportPerformance in the Cameroon Context
abstract: The performance of small and medium size enterprises (SMEs) is an important determinant of economic development, especially in developing countries like Cameroon. However, due to financial constraints, SMEs in Cameroon do face significant challenges to exporting, which affect their export performance. Many SMEs develop relationships with financial institutions to benefit from loans to overcome export barriers. However, there is no evidence as to whether such benefits help them overcome the limitations of their financial constraints to improve their export performance. Using data from the World Bank Enterprise Survey 2016 in Cameroon, we examine the moderation effect of loans as a benefit of networks on the relationship between financial constraints and export performance for SMEs in Cameroon using regression analysis. Our results show that financial constraints negatively affect export performance. The moderation effect was significant but negative which means the benefit of network (loans) was not enough to offset the negative effect of financial constraints on export performance. Studies on export barriers and export performance for SMEs in Cameroon are scarce and our research provides some policy and managerial implications to help SME exporting in Cameroon.
ch_abstract: 中小企业的表现是经济发展的重要决定因素，尤其是在喀麦隆等发展中国家。然而，由于财务限制，喀麦隆的中小企业在出口方面确实面临重大挑战，这影响了它们的出口表现。许多中小企业与金融机构建立关系，以获得贷款来克服出口障碍。然而，目前尚无证据表明这些贷款是否有助于它们克服财务限制，从而改善出口表现。我们利用2016年喀麦隆世界银行企业调查的数据，通过回归分析研究了贷款作为网络利益对喀麦隆中小企业财务约束与出口表现之间关系的调节作用。我们的研究结果表明，财务约束对出口表现有负面影响。调节作用显著但为负，这意味着网络利益（贷款）不足以抵消财务约束对出口表现的负面影响。关于喀麦隆中小企业出口障碍和出口表现的研究较少，我们的研究为帮助喀麦隆中小企业出口提供了一些政策和管理方面的启示。
tags: Export barriers, Lack of finance, Network, Export performance, and Cameroon

title: ExportPromotion: What Works?
abstract: A recent literature has argued that resources spent on export promotion help export growth (Van Biesebroeck, Konings and Volpe, 2016). In this paper we build on this work and examine the heterogeneity in returns across countries to disentangle which are the characteristics of Trade Promotion Organizations (TPOs) that are more likely to generate higher returns. Results suggest that on average a one percent increase in export promotion budgets increases exports by 0.074 percent, confirming results in the earlier literature. Our results also suggest that these export gains translate into very large GDP per capita gains. Indeed, a one percent increase in export budgets generates a 0.065 percent increase in GDP per capita. More interestingly, our results show which TPO characteristics generate large increases in exports, and which generate large gains in terms of GDP per capita.
ch_abstract: 近期有文献指出，用于出口促进的资源有助于出口增长（Van Biesebroeck、Konings和Volpe，2016年）。本文基于这一研究，考察了不同国家间回报的异质性，以厘清哪些贸易促进组织（TPO）的特征更可能产生更高的回报。结果表明，出口促进预算每增加1%，平均会使出口增长0.074%，这验证了早期文献的结论。我们的研究还表明，这些出口收益会转化为非常大的人均GDP增长。事实上，出口预算每增加1%，人均GDP就会增长0.065%。更有趣的是，我们的结果揭示了哪些TPO特征会导致出口大幅增长，以及哪些特征会带来人均GDP的大幅提升。
tags: Export Promotion, Impact Evaluation

title: An Economic Perspective of theExportPotentiality of Aromatic Rice in Bangladesh
abstract: The study was conducted to assess the export potential of aromatic rice in Bangladesh as well as identify the factors affecting gross return from aromatic rice production. About 45 aromatic rice farms were selected from five villages of Dinajpur district using stratified sampling method for the study. Data were analyzed with a combination of descriptive statistics, mathematical and statistical techniques. Cobb-Douglas production function represented that three out of seven independent variables had significant impact on gross return from aromatic rice production. The significant variables were education, power tiller cost and fertilizer cost. Domestic Resource Cost (DRC) analysis showed that Bangladesh had comparative advantage in aromatic rice production both from the view point of export and import substitution, as DRC was 0.51 and 0.64 for import and export parity prices, respectively. The study suggests that price of fertilizer, seeds and other inputs should be maintained and marketing and trade related costs and barriers should be minimized to amplify the potential of aromatic rice production in Bangladesh.
ch_abstract: 本研究旨在评估孟加拉国香米的出口潜力，并识别影响香米生产总收益的因素。研究采用分层抽样法，从迪纳杰布尔地区的五个村庄选取了约45个香米种植农场。通过结合描述性统计、数学及统计技术对数据进行分析。柯布-道格拉斯生产函数显示，七个自变量中有三个对香米生产总收益具有显著影响，分别为教育水平、动力耕作机成本和肥料成本。国内资源成本（DRC）分析表明，从出口和进口替代的角度来看，孟加拉国在香米生产上均具有比较优势，其进口平价和出口平价的DRC值分别为0.51和0.64。研究建议应稳定肥料、种子及其他投入品的价格，同时降低营销和贸易相关成本与壁垒，以提升孟加拉国香米生产的潜力。
tags: Aromatic Rice, Production, Export, Comparative Advantage, Bangladesh

title: The Impact ofExportRestraints on Rising Grain Prices
abstract: Commodity prices in maize and wheat have risen by more than 50 percent since 2006. While much of this increase reflects increasing demand and some constraints on supply, another factor contributing to the rising prices is the export restraints implemented by major grain exporting countries, such as China, Ukraine, and Argentina. While these measures are intended to keep domestic prices low, they tighten global supply and put upward pressure on prices for importers. This report presents quantitative evidence of the impact of export restrictions on the global agricultural market by evaluating these recent cases of export restraints using available monthly and annual trade data. When an exporting country enacts restrictive measures, their importing partners must often purchase grain from other exporters, causing more intense competition for the remaining available supplies. The impact of export restraints in these cases suggests that governments should use them cautiously.
ch_abstract: 自2006年以来，玉米和小麦等大宗商品价格已上涨超过50%。虽然这一增长主要反映了需求增加和部分供应限制，但另一个推高价格的因素是中国、乌克兰和阿根廷等主要粮食出口国实施的出口限制措施。尽管这些措施旨在保持国内低价，但它们却导致全球供应趋紧，并给进口国的价格带来上行压力。本报告通过利用现有的月度及年度贸易数据评估近期出口限制案例，量化呈现了出口限制对全球农产品市场的影响。当出口国实施限制措施时，其进口伙伴往往不得不从其他出口国购买粮食，从而加剧对剩余可用供应的竞争。这些案例中出口限制的影响表明，各国政府应谨慎使用此类措施。
tags: grain, prices, export restraints, export ban, export quota, trade

title: TheExportPerformance of Emerging Economy Firms: The Influence of Firm Capabilities and Institutional Environments
abstract: We advance a two-stage theoretical model which contends that the export performance of emerging economy firms (EEFs) will depend both upon their firm-specific capabilities and their home institutional environments. Specifically, we argue that EEFs will be more likely to export when facing more uncertainty at home from greater political instability, substantial informal competition, and high corruption. Furthermore, we hypothesize that firms’ export intensities will be contingent upon specialized internal capabilities such as a skilled workforce, top managerial experience, and access to external technologies. We test these hypotheses using a dataset of more than 16,000 firms from the four BRIC economies (i.e., Brazil, Russia, China and India). Our results confirm that political instability and informal competition have robust effects on the export propensity of EEFs, whilst export intensity is contingent upon the availability of skilled workers and access to external technologies via licensing.
ch_abstract: 我们提出一个两阶段理论模型，认为新兴经济体企业（EEFs）的出口表现既取决于其企业特定能力，也受母国制度环境影响。具体而言，我们认为当母国因政治不稳定、非正规竞争激烈和腐败严重而存在更高不确定性时，EEFs更可能选择出口。此外，我们假设企业出口强度将取决于专业化内部能力，如熟练劳动力、高层管理经验及外部技术获取。我们使用来自金砖四国（即巴西、俄罗斯、中国和印度）超过16,000家企业的数据集验证这些假设。研究结果证实，政治不稳定和非正规竞争对EEFs出口倾向具有显著影响，而出口强度则取决于熟练工人的可获得性及通过许可获取外部技术的能力。
tags: Emerging economy firms; Export performance; Firm capabilities;  Institutions; Heckman selection

title: Industrial Linkages andExportSpillovers from FDI
abstract: In this paper we investigated the hypothesis of export spillovers from foreign multinationals to domestic firms using a data set of UK manufacturing firms from 1992 to 1999.  Unlike previous studies we allow not only for the possibility of horizontal (i.e. intra-industry) and regional externalities, but also for vertical ones (i.e. inter-industry:  forward and backward).  Deploying and Heckman selection process we modelled the two decisions of whether to export or not, and how much to export, separately.  The results indicate that the decision to start exporting is positively associated with the presence of foreign firms in the same industry and region;  furthermore export oriented foreign affiliates seem to be the source of stronger export spillovers.  The decision concerning how much to export is affected positively by foreign firms in downstream industries and by those in the same industry and region that do not export.
ch_abstract: 本文利用1992年至1999年英国制造业企业的数据集，研究了外国跨国公司对本土企业的出口溢出效应假说。与以往研究不同，我们不仅考虑了横向（即行业内）和区域外部性的可能性，还纳入了纵向外部性（即行业间：前向与后向）。通过采用赫克曼选择模型，我们分别对"是否出口"和"出口多少"两个决策进行了建模。研究结果表明：开始出口的决策与同行业同地区外资企业的存在呈正相关；且出口导向型外资子公司似乎能产生更强的出口溢出效应。而关于出口量的决策则受到下游行业外资企业，以及同行业同地区非出口型外资企业的正向影响。
tags: FDI, export spillovers, export platforms

title: CanExportTax be Genuine Climate Policy? An Analysis on China’sExportTax andExportVAT Refund Rebate Policies
abstract: Export VAT refund rebate and export tax (EVRRET) measures have been adopted on energy intensive products in recent years in China. They are proclaimed to be climate policy, yet there is no explicit and unique carbon cost set on export - the implicit export carbon tax rates vary dramatically across sectors and over different periods. This paper provides a method of introducing an explicit and unique carbon cost into the current EVRRET. By setting a comparable carbon cost (2'9/tCO2 and 3'9/tCO2) for eight major energy-intensive sectors to which the EVRRET are massively applied, it derives the corresponding ad valorem average rate for each sector. This paper finds that the introduction of a carbon cost into export VAT refund rebate policy would not increase the current export VAT refund rebate rate (except for the chemical sector), but would simply define a ceiling, while the same introduction into the export tax policy would lead to an overall increase in sectoral export tax rates. This paper concludes by examining competitiveness and WTO concerns, suggesting that the better option for introducing a carbon cost into Chinese exports would be through reforming export VAT refund rebate policy.
ch_abstract: 近年来，中国对高耗能产品采取了出口增值税退税与出口税（EVRRET）措施。这些措施虽被宣称为气候政策，但并未对出口设定明确统一的碳成本——不同行业和时期的隐含出口碳税率差异显著。本文提出一种方法，将明确统一的碳成本引入现行EVRRET体系。通过为EVRRET广泛适用的八大高耗能行业设定可比碳成本（2'9美元/吨CO2和3'9美元/吨CO2），推算出各行业相应的从价平均税率。研究发现：在出口增值税退税政策中引入碳成本不会提高现行退税率（化工行业除外），仅会形成税率上限；而将其引入出口税政策则会导致行业出口税率普遍上升。最后本文通过评估竞争力与WTO合规性问题，指出改革出口增值税退税政策是中国出口领域引入碳成本的更优选择。
tags: carbon tax, export tax, export VAT refund rebate, climate change, China

title: Competing Internationally: On the Importance of R&D forExportActivity
abstract: Export is an important factor to improve growth and welfare especially for industrialized small, open economies such as Belgium. Policy may be interested in key variables that can influence export. This paper finds evidence for the importance of R&D for export activities using Belgian firm-level data. To control for reverse causality, R&D-subsidy variables are used to instrument R&D. The results show that R&D policies may indirectly help to increase the export performance of the economy. Due to the exceptionally high openness of Belgium, two sub-samples of firms are considered, domestic firms and multinational firms. We observe positive effects of R&D on export for both domestic and MNEs. Once we instrument R&D because of its potential endogeneity, however, it turns out that the effect of R&D on exports is larger for domestic firms than for multinational companies.
ch_abstract: 出口是提升增长与福利的重要因素，尤其对比利时这类工业化小型开放经济体而言。政策制定者可能关注影响出口的关键变量。本文利用比利时企业层面数据，为研发活动对出口的重要性提供了实证依据。为控制反向因果关系，研究采用研发补贴变量作为研发的工具变量。结果表明，研发政策可能间接助力提升经济体的出口表现。鉴于比利时极高的开放度，研究将企业分为本土企业和跨国企业两个子样本进行考察。我们发现研发对两类企业的出口均有积极影响。但当我们针对研发潜在内生性采用工具变量法后，结果显示研发对本土企业出口的促进作用显著大于跨国公司。
tags: Export, R&D, Multinational enterprises, Innovation Policy

title: Competing Internationally: On the Importance of R&D forExportActivity
abstract: Export is an important factor to improve growth and welfare especially for industrialized small, open economies such as Belgium. Policy may be interested in key variables that can influence export. This paper finds evidence for the importance of R&D for export activities using Belgian firm-level data. To control for reverse causality, R&D-subsidy variables are used to instrument R&D. The results show that R&D policies may indirectly help to increase the export performance of the economy. Due to the exceptionally high openness of Belgium, two subsamples of firms are considered, domestic firms and multinational firms. We observe positive effects of R&D on export for both domestic and MNEs. Once we instrument R&D because of its potential endogeneity, however, it turns out that the effect of R&D on exports is larger for domestic firms than for multinational companies.
ch_abstract: 出口是提升增长与福利的重要因素，尤其对比利时这类工业化小型开放经济体而言。政策制定者可能关注影响出口的关键变量。本文利用比利时企业层面数据，证实了研发对出口活动的重要性。为控制反向因果关系，研究采用研发补贴变量作为研发的工具变量。结果表明，研发政策可能间接助力提升经济体的出口表现。鉴于比利时极高的开放度，研究将企业分为本土公司和跨国公司两个子样本。我们观察到研发对两类企业的出口均有积极影响。但当我们针对潜在内生性问题对研发进行工具变量处理后发现，研发对本土企业出口的促进作用显著大于跨国公司。
tags: Export, R&D, Multinational Enterprises, Innovation Policy

title: Foreign Market Experience, Learning by Hiring and FirmExportPerformance
abstract: Export experience of managers and other top specialists is among the key drivers of export decisions in firms. We show evidence of this regularity based on employer-employee level data from the manufacturing industry in Estonia. We find that hiring managers and other high-wage employees with prior experience in exporting to a specific geographical region is associated with a higher probability of export entry to that region. However, there is little evidence of significant effects on export intensity. Notably, the relationship between export experience and a firm’s export decisions is usually stronger if the prior export experience is from an exporter that is located nearby in the product space. Our findings suggest that the contribution of prior trade experience of employees and the firm’s productivity as drivers of export market entry are of comparable magnitude.
ch_abstract: 管理者及其他高层专业人员的出口经验是企业出口决策的关键驱动因素之一。我们基于爱沙尼亚制造业雇主-雇员层面的数据验证了这一规律。研究发现，雇佣具有特定地理区域出口经验的管理者及其他高薪员工，会显著提高企业向该地区出口的概率，但对出口强度的影响则缺乏显著证据。值得注意的是，当员工此前的出口经验来自产品空间邻近的出口企业时，其出口经验与企业出口决策之间的关联性通常更强。研究结果表明，员工过往贸易经验与企业生产率作为出口市场进入驱动因素的贡献程度相当。
tags: export experience, export entry, labour mobility, learning-to-export

title: Effect of Green Supply Chain Management on Environmental Performance andExportPerformance: A Case Study of Textile Industries in Pakistan
abstract: This study investigated the GSCM effect on the performance of export by also seeing its mediating influence on the environmental performance of the textile sector of Pakistan. The data has been gathered by means of the questionnaire with a five point’s Likert scale from which a total of 350 responses are collected from the textile sector of Pakistan. Data were analysed using structural equation modelling. The Findings showed that there is a significant relation among the GSCM, export performance and environmental performance. Hence, green practices can essentially help to enhance the environmental and export performance of textile industry Moreover, export performance can also be increased it companies focus on environmentally friendly measures. The findings of the study are essentially contributing to explaining the role of GSC practices on export and environmental performance in the textile industry. By applying these practices, the textile industry of Pakistan can place significant changes in increasing its export performance and revenues.
ch_abstract: 本研究探讨了绿色供应链管理（GSCM）对出口绩效的影响，并考察了其对巴基斯坦纺织行业环境绩效的中介作用。数据通过采用五级李克特量表的问卷收集，共获得巴基斯坦纺织行业350份有效回复。研究采用结构方程模型分析数据，结果表明GSCM、出口绩效与环境绩效之间存在显著关联。绿色实践能有效提升纺织行业的环境绩效和出口绩效，而企业实施环保措施亦可促进出口增长。这些发现为阐释GSC实践在纺织行业出口与环境绩效中的作用提供了重要依据。通过应用这些实践，巴基斯坦纺织行业可在提升出口绩效和收入方面实现显著改善。
tags: green supply chain, environmental performance, textile industries, export performance

title: Convergence and Innovation inExportQuality and the World Income Distribution
abstract: Previous research has documented a strong correlation between countries’ income levels and the quality of their export goods. Given the evidence of fast unconditional convergence in export quality, this raises the question how to reconcile these stylized facts with a stable world income distribution.This paper is the first to document why cross-country export quality convergence within products does not entail aggregate export quality convergence across countries. In fact, the latter is absent because the country-product-specific residual after accounting for export quality convergence is biased in favor of high-income countries’ exports. To document this pattern of export quality dynamics and assess its aggregate implications, we construct bilateral export quality estimates for 122 countries and 2,700 manufacturing goods.Furthermore, we show that the key explanation for this country-product-specific ‘quality innovation residual’ is the fact that high-income countries are more capital abundant and financially developed and export goods that are better aligned to their human capital endowments, all of which are correlated with export quality innovation.
ch_abstract: 先前的研究已证实，国家收入水平与其出口商品质量之间存在显著相关性。鉴于出口质量呈现快速无条件趋同的证据，这引发了一个问题：如何将这些典型事实与稳定的世界收入分配相协调？本文首次揭示了为何产品内部的跨国出口质量趋同并未导致国家间整体出口质量的趋同。事实上，后者之所以缺失，是因为在考虑出口质量趋同后，特定国家-产品层面的残差偏向于高收入国家的出口。为记录这种出口质量动态模式并评估其总体影响，我们构建了122个国家和2700种制造业产品的双边出口质量估算值。此外，我们发现这种特定国家-产品层面的"质量创新残差"关键成因在于：高收入国家资本更充裕、金融体系更发达，且其出口商品与人力资本禀赋更匹配——这些因素均与出口质量创新密切相关。
tags: export quality, convergence, export upgrading, quality ladders

title: Innovation and the FirmExportIntensity: The Moderating Effect of the Mode of Entry
abstract: This article studies the relationships between innovation, the mode of entry adopted by a firm and its export performance. In addition, it identifies the mode of entry that is most favourable for the development of the export intensity of the innovative firm. In order to achieve this, the study analyzes the behaviour of more than 1,100 manufacturing firms in Spain in 2005, and concludes that, in line with the transaction costs theory prescriptions, firms adopting modes of entry with high levels of control develop greater export intensity. With reference to the interactions between the variables analyzed, the moderating effect of the mode of entry is greater when considered together with the innovative activity input; that is to say, with the R&D investment.
ch_abstract: 本文研究了企业创新、进入模式与出口绩效之间的关系，并确定了最有利于创新型企业出口强度发展的进入模式。为此，研究分析了2005年西班牙1100多家制造企业的行为，得出结论：根据交易成本理论的要求，采用高控制度进入模式的企业能实现更高的出口强度。关于各变量间的交互作用，进入模式的调节效应在与创新活动投入（即研发投资）共同考量时更为显著。
tags: Export intensity, R&D, Product innovation, Process innovation, Entry mode, Management of export operations

title: Exporting Waste: Regulation of theExportof Hazardous Wastes from the United States
abstract: The international trade in hazardous wastes has been a subject of controversy for decades.   Notorious examples of hazardous wastes being improperly disposed of in Africa have created concern about the legitimacy of developed western countries “dumping” the hazardous byproducts of their industrial development on less-developed countries. This article examines the legal bases for EPA’s regulation of the exports of hazardous waste under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act. It contains a detailed examination of EPA’s complex sets of export regulations and provides data on the actual scope of exports reported to EPA.  It examines a series of questions regarding EPA’s authority to regulate the export of hazardous wastes: what domestic authority does EPA derive from the international agreements; what is the scope of EPA’s authority to exclude hazardous wastes from export control; what authority does EPA have to ban the export of hazardous wastes to countries with whom we do not have an international agreement and which may not manage the waste properly?  The article also examines the extent to which EPA regulations address the significant concerns associated with the largely unregulated export of electronic wastes. The article reaches a number of perhaps surprising conclusions.  First, the article suggests that provisions of RCRA that purport to give domestic legal effect to future international agreements would violate constitutional procedures required to implement actions with legislative effect.  It also analyzes case law that suggests that conferring binding authority on a Decision of the OECD would constitute an unconstitutional delegation of authority to an international entity. Second, the article questions the legal basis of the U.S. decision not to ratify the Basel Convention on the Transboundary Movement of Hazardous Waste.  Although the U.S. has signed and the Senate has consented to ratification, the U.S. has not formally ratified the Convention based on the position of the Department of State and EPA that Basel cannot be implemented without statutory changes to RCRA. This article suggests that RCRA currently contains adequate authority to implement Basel and thus ratification could be immediately undertaken.  The article argues, however, that control of the international trade in U.S. hazardous waste may be better served by the U.S. not ratifying Basel. Third, there may be a substantial misperception, fostered by EPA, about the regulation of electronic wastes under RCRA.  EPA has suggested that only waste “cathode ray tubes” are a hazardous waste under RCRA, but EPA’s own data suggest that a substantial amount of other e-wastes should be classified as hazardous wastes and thus subject to export controls. Perhaps the most significant step EPA could take to strengthen its existing export regulations would be to clarify the status of such e-wastes. Fourth, EPA does have the authority under RCRA to impose export controls on hazardous wastes that it has excluded from domestic regulation.  Thus, EPA could regulate the export of e-wastes while not imposing requirements on the domestic recycling of such wastes.   Finally, EPA’s management of the export of hazardous waste would be improved by providing more transparency through online posting of export data.   Concerns about releasing confidential business information do not stand as a significant obstacle to providing this information.
ch_abstract: 危险废物的国际贸易几十年来一直是一个争议话题。发达国家将工业发展产生的危险副产品"倾倒"给欠发达国家的行为，因非洲多起危险废物不当处置的恶劣案例而引发合法性担忧。本文考察了美国环保署根据《资源保护与回收法》监管危险废物出口的法律依据，详细梳理了环保署复杂的出口监管体系，并提供了向环保署申报的实际出口数据。研究聚焦环保署监管危险废物出口权限的核心问题：国际协定赋予环保署哪些国内权限？环保署在豁免危险废物出口管制方面的权限边界如何？对于未签署国际协定且可能无法妥善处理废物的国家，环保署是否有权禁止危险废物出口？. . 文章还探讨了环保署法规在应对电子废物无序出口问题上的效力，得出若干出人意料的结论：首先，《资源保护与回收法》中关于赋予未来国际协定国内法律效力的条款，可能违反宪法关于立法程序的规定；将经合组织决定赋予约束力的判例，构成违宪的国际机构授权。其次，美国拒绝批准《巴塞尔公约》的法律基础值得商榷——尽管已完成签署和参议院批准程序，但国务院和环保署以需修改国内法为由迟迟未正式批准。研究表明现行《资源保护与回收法》已具备实施公约的充分授权，但文章同时指出不批准公约反而更有利于管控危险废物国际贸易。. . 第三，环保署对电子废物的监管存在重大认知偏差：虽然仅将阴极射线管明确列为危险废物，但其自身数据表明大量其他电子废物应被归类为受出口管制的危险废物。厘清这类电子废物的法律地位将是强化出口监管的最有效措施。第四，环保署确实有权对豁免国内监管的危险废物实施出口管制，这意味着可在不干预国内回收体系的前提下管控电子废物出口。最后，通过在线公开出口数据提升透明度将显著改善监管效能，商业秘密保护并不构成实质障碍。
tags: hazardous waste, Basel Convention, export

title: Political Risk andExportPromotion: Evidence from Germany
abstract: Political risk represents an important hidden transaction cost that reduces international trade. This paper investigates the claim that German public export credit guarantees (Hermes guarantees) mitigate this friction to trade flows and hence promote exports. We employ an empirical trade gravity model, where we explicitly control for political risk in the importing country in order to evaluate the effect of export guarantees. The idea behind export promotion through public export credit agencies (ECAs) is that the private market is unable to provide adequate insurance for all risks associated with exports. As a consequence, firms' export activities are limited in the absence of insurance provision. Using a novel data set on guarantees we estimate the effect of guarantees in a static and dynamic panel model. We find a statistically and economically significant positive effect of public export guarantees on exports which indicates that export promotion is indeed effective. Furthermore, political risk turns out to be a robust determinant of exports and hence should be taken into account in any empirical model of trade.
ch_abstract: 政治风险是降低国际贸易的一项重要隐性交易成本。本文研究了德国公共出口信用担保（赫尔墨斯担保）能否缓解贸易流动中的这一摩擦从而促进出口的主张。我们采用实证贸易引力模型，通过明确控制进口国的政治风险来评估出口担保的效果。通过公共出口信用机构（ECAs）促进出口的理念在于，私营市场无法为出口相关的所有风险提供充分保险。因此，在缺乏保险保障的情况下，企业的出口活动会受到限制。利用新构建的担保数据集，我们在静态和动态面板模型中估算了担保的效果。研究发现公共出口担保对出口具有统计显著且经济意义重大的正向影响，表明出口促进政策确实有效。此外，政治风险被证实是出口的稳健决定因素，因此任何贸易实证模型都应将其纳入考量。
tags: public export credit guarantees, political risk, panel regression

title: BringingExportPerformance Metrics into Annual Reports: The Perfex Scorecard
abstract: At a time when exporting activity is becoming a major resource for creating firms' value and national economic wealth, it is surprising that annual company reports rarely distinguish between domestic market performance and the performance of export markets' operations. Even more rarely do annual reports provide information on annual indicators of specific export ventures performance. Shareholders might assume that if executives choose not to disclose export information in annual reports their exporting activity is not relevant or not successful. Trying to overcome this state of affairs, the authors develop and test a new measure for assessing the Annual Performance of an Export Venture (the APEV scale). The new measure comprises five dimensions: 1) annual export venture's financial performance; 2) annual export venture's strategic performance; 3) annual export venture's achievement; 4) contribution of the export venture to annual exporting operations; and 5) satisfaction with annual export venture's overall performance. In addition, the APEV scale is used to generate a scorecard of PERFormance in EXporting (the PERFEX scorecard) to be included in annual reports. The PERFEX scorecard allows the assessment of export performance at the corporate level while comparatively evaluating all export ventures of the firm. Both the scale and the scorecard are expected to help disclose export (ventures') performance and are provided as useful instruments for annual planning, management, monitoring, and improvement of exporting programs.
ch_abstract: 在出口活动日益成为创造企业价值和国民经济财富主要来源的当下，令人惊讶的是企业年报很少区分国内市场表现与出口市场运营表现。年报更少提供具体出口项目年度绩效指标的信息。股东们可能会认为，如果管理层选择不在年报中披露出口信息，说明其出口活动无关紧要或并不成功。为改变这一现状，作者开发并测试了一种评估出口项目年度绩效的新指标（APEV量表）。该指标包含五个维度：1）出口项目年度财务绩效；2）出口项目年度战略绩效；3）出口项目年度成果；4）出口项目对年度出口业务的贡献；5）对出口项目年度整体表现的满意度。此外，APEV量表还用于生成出口绩效记分卡（PERFEX记分卡）并纳入年报。PERFEX记分卡可在企业层面评估出口绩效，同时横向比较公司所有出口项目。该量表和记分卡都有助于披露出口（项目）绩效，是出口项目年度规划、管理、监控和改进的有效工具。
tags: Export Performance, Export Marketing, APEV, PERFEX, EXPERF, Scorecard

title: The Forgotten History of FoodSecurityin MultilateralTradeNegotiations
abstract: Food security emerged as a major source of political deadlock in the WTO Doha Round negotiations. Concerns about food security only intensified at the WTO following the 2008 Global Food Crisis, with the Bali and Nairobi Ministerials revealing polarized views between the US and India on the financing of public food stockholding. These “food fights” at the WTO have attracted significant international media, civil society and scholarly attention. In this article, I argue that inter-state disagreement on food security is not new or specific to the Doha Round but instead has been a recurrent phenomenon in the multilateral trade system for decades. Employing an historical approach, I show that food security has repeatedly been an item of negotiation in successive GATT negotiating rounds and has been steadily codified in international trade law over time. Today, food security is deeply integrated into the rules of the trade regime, making the WTO an important yet largely unacknowledged institution in global food security governance.
ch_abstract: 粮食安全成为世贸组织多哈回合谈判中政治僵局的主要根源。2008年全球粮食危机后，世贸组织内部对粮食安全的担忧进一步加剧，巴厘和内罗毕部长级会议暴露出美国与印度在公共粮食储备融资问题上的尖锐对立。这些世贸组织框架下的"粮食之争"引发了国际媒体、民间团体和学术界的广泛关注。本文认为，国家间在粮食安全问题上的分歧并非多哈回合独有，而是数十年来多边贸易体系中反复出现的现象。通过历史研究视角，本文论证粮食安全历来是关贸总协定历轮谈判的议题，并逐渐被纳入国际贸易法体系。如今，粮食安全已深度融入贸易体制规则，使世贸组织成为全球粮食安全治理中重要却未获充分认知的机构。
tags: WTO, GATT, Food Security, Trade Negotiations

title: Improving County-Level Earnings Estimates with a New Methodology for Assigning Geographic and Demographic Information to U.S. Workers
abstract: This article describes a new methodology developed by the Office of Research, Evaluation, and Statistics (ORES) of the Social Security Administration (SSA) to indicate the state and county of residence, date of birth, and sex of nearly all workers for whom tax records provide earnings data in a given year.  Applying these geographic and demographic indicators will enable ORES to use a vastly larger sample of workers to generate annual earnings estimates.  The current methodology assigns state and county codes and demographic information only to workers in SSA’s 1-percent Continuous Work History Sample—fewer than 1.7 workers million in 2017.  The new methodology would assign state and county codes and demographic information to more than 178 million workers for 2017.  A much larger sample of workers mitigates the limitations associated with the current estimation process and enables ORES to generate more comprehenssive and accurate county-level earnings estimates.
ch_abstract: 本文介绍了美国社会保障局(SSA)下属研究、评估与统计办公室(ORES)开发的新方法，该方法可显示几乎所有在特定年份有税务记录收入数据的劳动者的居住州/县、出生日期及性别信息。应用这些地理和人口统计指标将使ORES能够使用更庞大的劳动者样本来生成年度收入估算。现行方法仅对SSA的1%连续工作历史样本中的劳动者分配州/县代码和人口统计信息——2017年覆盖人数不足170万。而新方法将为2017年超过1.78亿劳动者分配这些代码和信息。更大规模的劳动者样本有效缓解了当前估算流程的局限性，使ORES能够生成更全面、更精准的县级收入估算数据。
tags: Counties, Earnings estimates, Data disclosure rules, Imputation, Methodology, Sample size

title: Balancing the Global FoodSecurityEquation: T3/C3
abstract: Achieving Food Security is one of the most important public policy goals regardless of the level of development of a country. The challenges, however, are numerous including those beyond one’s control and territorial jurisdiction such as the climate change, conflicts and pandemics like the COVID-19. The solutions are there as well, but the most important ones such as the trade and technology need cross-border collaboration. This makes the Food Security a global problem with global solutions. Having food self-sufficiency may not be practical beyond a few countries. The following note outlines challenges (Climate Change, Conflicts, COVID-19) and Solutions (Territorial Productivity, Trade, Technology) for achieving a Global Food Security. It also proposes global actions such as the “Global Compact on Food Security”, “Global Agriculture Technology Pool”, and “Global Food Security Impact Bonds”.
ch_abstract: 实现粮食安全是各国最重要的公共政策目标之一，无论其发展水平如何。然而挑战众多，包括气候变化、冲突和新冠疫情等超出国家控制与管辖范围的因素。解决方案同样存在，但贸易与技术等关键措施需要跨境协作。这使得粮食安全成为需全球共同应对的难题。仅有少数国家可能实现粮食自给自足。本文件概述了全球粮食安全面临的挑战（气候变化、冲突、新冠疫情）与解决路径（本土生产力提升、贸易、技术），并提议发起"全球粮食安全契约"、"全球农业技术共享库"及"全球粮食安全影响债券"等国际行动。
tags: Food Security, Trade, Climate Change, COVID19, Technology, Productivity, Agriculture, Conflicts

title: Introduction: EnergySecurity,Tradeand the EU: Regional and International Perspectives
abstract: Energy security is a burning issue in a world where 1.4 billion people still have no access to electricity.  This pioneering book is about finding solutions for energy security through the international trading system. Focusing mainly on the European Union (EU) as a case study, this holistic and comprehensive analysis of the existing legal and geopolitical instruments strives to identify the shortcomings of the international and EU energy trade governance systems, concluding with the notion of a European Energy Union and what the EU is politically prepared to accept as part of its unified energy security. This snapshot of multilateral, regional and bilateral energy trade governance deals with energy transit from the perspective of the Energy Charter Treaty as a means to enhance EU energy security, and examines the system of law and governance of international trade in unconventional fossil fuels. The authors analyze concerns that arise from preferential trade agreements and renewable energy from the EU’s perspective, and explain how the EU can diversify its energy supply to improve its energy security.
ch_abstract: 能源安全在一个仍有14亿人无电可用的世界中是当务之急。这本开创性著作探讨如何通过国际贸易体系寻求能源安全解决方案。研究以欧盟为主要案例，通过全面分析现有法律与地缘政治工具，揭示国际及欧盟能源贸易治理体系的缺陷，最终提出"欧洲能源联盟"构想，并探讨欧盟在政治层面愿意为统一能源安全接受哪些内容。该书从《能源宪章条约》视角审视多边、区域与双边能源贸易治理中能源过境问题，将其作为强化欧盟能源安全的手段，同时剖析了非常规化石燃料国际贸易的法律与治理体系。作者从欧盟立场分析了优惠贸易协定与可再生能源引发的关切，阐释了欧盟如何通过能源供应多元化提升能源安全。
tags: energy security, international trade, European Union, energy trade governance, energy transit, unconventional fossil fuel sources, renewables, preferential trade agreements, European Energy Union

title: FoodSecurity, International AgriculturalTrade, and Economic Growth in China
abstract: China, with the largest population in the world, has always been concerned about its food security. Recently, rapid economic growth in China has led to the disappearance of absolute hunger, but an increase in food consumption and environmental problems still threaten the maintenance of China’s food security.
