In particular, it focuses on the 1939 Social Security Amendments and the subsequent tax-rate freezes enacted between 1939 and 1949. It examines the origins of these taxing policies and assesses the impact of the rate freezes on the long-range actuarial balance of the Social Security program during this period.
ch_abstract: 本文追溯了美国社会保障体系自1935年原法案通过至1950年《社会保障法修正案》颁布期间的融资历程，重点剖析1939年社会保障修正案及此后十年间（1939-1949年）实施的税率冻结政策。研究探讨了这些税收政策的形成背景，并评估了费率冻结对该时期社会保障计划长期精算平衡的影响。
tags: Social Security system, 1950 Amendments, Social Security Amendments, tax-rate freezes

title: An Overview of American Indians and Alaska Natives in the Context of SocialSecurityand SupplementalSecurityIncome
abstract: This article examines the economic security of the American Indian and Alaska Native (AIAN) population by exploring AIAN receipt of Social Security benefits and Supplemental Security Income (SSI). This analysis uses data from the 2005–2009 American Community Survey Public Use Microdata Sample, which provides a larger AIAN sample size than many other sources, thereby enabling more reliable estimates. We find that adult AIANs are less likely to receive Social Security benefits and more likely to receive SSI than are adults in the total population. In both programs, median benefit amounts are lower for AIAN recipients than for recipients in the total population.
ch_abstract: 本文通过探讨美国印第安人和阿拉斯加原住民（AIAN）群体领取社会保障福利及补充保障收入（SSI）的情况，研究了该群体的经济安全状况。该分析采用2005-2009年美国社区调查公共使用微观数据样本，其AIAN样本量较其他多数数据源更为充足，从而能提供更可靠的评估结果。研究发现，与总体成年人口相比，成年AIAN群体领取社会保障福利的比例更低，而领取SSI的比例更高。在这两项福利计划中，AIAN受益者的中位福利金额均低于总体受益者水平。
tags: Social Security, wealth, minorities, race, SSI

title: Earnings Sharing in SocialSecurity: Projected Impacts of Alternative Proposals Using the MINT Model
abstract: Changes in American family and work patterns over the past decades have prompted various policy proposals for changing the structure of Social Security benefits. In this article, we use the Social Security Administration’s Modeling Income in the Near Term (MINT) microsimulation model to project how Social Security benefit amounts would change in response to incorporating earnings sharing into benefit calculations for the population aged 62 or older in 2030 under three hypothetical policy scenarios. The earnings sharing scenarios modeled in the article would reduce benefits for the majority of individuals, although there are important differences among married, divorced, and widowed individuals. Some groups of men and women would experience increases in Social Security benefits, while some would receive reduced benefits in comparison to current law, particularly widowed individuals. Allowing widows to inherit the earnings records of their deceased husbands would improve their outcomes.
ch_abstract: 过去几十年美国家庭和工作模式的变化促使人们提出各种政策建议，以改变社会保障福利的结构。在本文中，我们使用社会保障管理局的"近期收入建模"（MINT）微观模拟模型，预测在三种假设政策情景下，将收入共享纳入2030年62岁及以上人群的福利计算后，社会保障福利金额将如何变化。文章模拟的收入共享情景将减少大多数人的福利，尽管已婚、离异和丧偶人群之间存在重要差异。部分男性和女性群体的社会保障福利会增加，而另一些群体——尤其是丧偶者——相较于现行法律将获得更少的福利。允许寡妇继承已故丈夫的收入记录将改善她们的福利状况。
tags: microsimulation, earnings sharing, Social Security, retirement, MINT

title: Disabled Workers and the Indexing of SocialSecurityBenefits
abstract: We show the distributional effects of changing the Social Security indexing scheme with an emphasis on the effects upon disabled-worker beneficiaries. Although a class of reform proposals that would slow the rate of growth of initial benefit levels over time - including price indexing and longevity indexing - initially appears to affect all beneficiaries proportionally, there can be different impacts on different groups of beneficiaries. The impacts between and within groups are mitigated by the offsetting effect of changes in Supplemental Security Income benefits and the dampening effect of other family income. We present estimates of the size of these effects.
ch_abstract: 我们展示了改变社会保障指数化方案的分配效应，重点关注对残疾工人受益者的影响。尽管一类旨在逐步减缓初始福利水平增长速度的改革提案——包括价格指数化和长寿指数化——最初看似对所有受益者按比例产生影响，但不同受益群体可能受到不同影响。补充保障收入福利变化的抵消效应及其他家庭收入的缓冲作用，减轻了群体间及群体内部的影响差异。我们提供了这些效应规模的估算结果。
tags: Social Security indexing scheme, disabled-worker beneficiaries, Supplemental Security Income

title: Employment at Older Ages and SocialSecurityBenefit Claiming
abstract: A retired worker’s Social Security benefit depends in part on the age at which he or she claims benefits. Working longer and claiming benefits later increase the monthly benefit. Information about trends in employment at older ages and the age at which individuals claim Social Security benefits can help policymakers assess the effectiveness of current policies in influencing the timing of retirement and benefit claims. Both the labor force participation rate among older Americans and the age at which they claim Social Security retirement benefits have risen in recent years. For example, from 2000 through 2015, the labor force participation rate among individuals aged 65–69 rose from 30 percent to 37 percent for men and from 19 percent to 28 percent for women. Since 2000, the proportion of fully insured men and women who claim retirement benefits at the earliest eligibility age of 62 has declined substantially.
ch_abstract: 退休工人的社会保障福利部分取决于其开始申领福利的年龄。工作更长时间、延迟申领福利会增加月度福利金额。了解高龄人群就业趋势及个人申领社保福利的年龄信息，有助于政策制定者评估现行政策对退休和福利申领时机的调控效果。近年来美国高龄劳动者的劳动参与率与社保退休福利申领年龄均呈上升趋势。例如2000至2015年间，65-69岁男性的劳动参与率从30%升至37%，女性该比例从19%增至28%。自2000年以来，在最早申领年龄62岁即申领退休福利的完全参保男女比例已显著下降。
tags: Social Security, Retirement, Aging, Elderly, Income, Pensions

title: Strategies for Increasing Scale and Quality of Cybersecurity Capacity-Building Investments (White Paper)
abstract: On 12 March 2014 the Global Cyber Security Capacity Centre (Oxford Centre) held its second conference entitled “Strategies for Increasing Scale and Quality of Cyber-security Capacity-Building Investments”, hosted at the Oxford Martin School. The purpose of this conference was to address three core issues: how to move from cyber-security models and indices to achieve real impact on operations; how to measure the effectiveness of cyber capacity-building efforts and investments; and how to choose the most appropriate investment models for improving capacity in the short-term with limited resources. The Centre has identified the value of addressing any of these issues as a means to significantly enhance capacity-building activities around the world. Failure to address any of these issues could lead result in unavoidable limitations to capacity-building in the future.
ch_abstract: 2014年3月12日，全球网络安全能力中心（牛津中心）在牛津马丁学院举办了题为"扩大规模与提升质量：网络安全能力建设投资战略"的第二届会议。本次会议旨在解决三个核心问题：如何将网络安全模型和指标转化为实际运营影响；如何衡量网络能力建设投入的成效；如何在资源有限的情况下选择最合适的投资模式以实现短期能力提升。该中心认为解决其中任何一个问题都将显著提升全球范围内的能力建设活动。若未能解决这些问题，未来能力建设将不可避免地面临发展瓶颈。

title: Swiss Policies for More FoodSecurity
abstract: Resource-poor yet blissful Switzerland is also one of the most food-secure countries in the world: there are abundant food supplies, relatively low retail prices in terms of purchasing power parity, with few poverty traps. Domestic production covers 70% of net domestic consumption. A vast and efficient food reserve scheme insures against import disruptions. Nonetheless, the food security contribution by the four sectoral policies involved is mutually constrained: our agriculture is protected by the world’s highest tariffs. Huge subsidies, surface payments, and some production quotas substitute market signals with rent maximisation. Moreover, these inefficiencies also prevent trade and investment policies which would keep markets open, development policies which would provide African farmers with the tools to become more competitive, and supply policies which would work against speculators. The paralysing effect of Swiss agricultural policies is exacerbated by new “food security subsidies” in the name of “food sovereignty” while two pending people’s initiatives might yet increase the splendid isolation which in effect reduce Swiss farmer competitiveness and global food security. Is there a solution? Absent a successful conclusion of the Doha Round (WTO) or a Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership Agreement (TTIP) further market openings and a consequent “recoupling” of taxpayer support to public goods production remain highly unlikely. To the very minimum Switzerland should resume the agricultural reform process, join other countries trying to prevent predatory behaviour of its investors in developing countries, and regionalise its food reserve.
ch_abstract: 资源匮乏却幸福满满的瑞士也是全球粮食安全水平最高的国家之一：食品供应充足，按购买力平价计算的零售价格相对较低，贫困陷阱极少。国内生产满足了70%的净消费需求。庞大高效的粮食储备计划为进口中断提供了保障。然而，四大领域政策对粮食安全的贡献却相互制约：我国农业受全球最高关税保护。巨额补贴、耕地补贴和部分生产配额以租金最大化取代了市场信号。这些低效措施还阻碍了维持市场开放的贸易投资政策、帮助非洲农民提升竞争力的发展政策，以及抑制投机行为的供应政策。打着"粮食主权"旗号新增的"粮食安全补贴"进一步加剧了瑞士农业政策的僵化效应，两项待决的全民动议可能强化这种实际削弱瑞士农民竞争力和全球粮食安全的"光荣孤立"。出路何在？在多哈回合谈判（WTO）或跨大西洋贸易与投资伙伴协定（TTIP）无果而终的情况下，进一步开放市场并将纳税人补贴重新定向公共产品生产仍难实现。瑞士至少应重启农业改革进程，加入遏制投资者在发展中国家掠夺性行为的国际行动，并推动粮食储备区域化。
tags: Food Security, Food Sovereignty, Switzerland

title: Trade'sSecurityExceptionalism
abstract: At the core of U.S. trade law is an understudied structural dichotomy. On the one hand, well-established statutory authorities enable the president to eliminate trade barriers through negotiations with U.S. trading partners. On the other hand, different, lesser-known authorities allow the president to erect trade barriers on an exceptional basis where necessary for U.S. economic security. Rather than thinking of free trade as a source of or tool for economic security as political theorists long have, our law codifies them in contrast to one another – allowing departures from the free trade norm when security so demands. Further, the two categories of authorities suffer from a mismatch in what I call “trade delegation disciplines”: while Congress kept tight controls on the president’s free trade negotiations, it abandoned controls on the exceptional security-driven authorities, empowering the executive to handle U.S. trade interests in an unbridled way that our nation’s founders feared.This Article is the first to identify how trade law has exceptionalized security. It develops an original typology of the categories of congressional delegations that constitute our exceptional trade apparatus. This structural account delivers both positive and normative payoffs. Apart from explaining the institutional terrain, identifying the dichotomy challenges the traditional assumption that all executive departures from the prevailing free trade norm are illegal and illegitimate. The historical record demonstrates that, surprisingly, security exceptionalism in U.S. trade law is the product of misunderstood statutes that have been unmoored from their original purposes. Finally, although the exceptions may be difficult to undo or to correct, this analysis shows that trade law has space for a wide array of innovative and non-traditional disciplines that could serve to limit the damage that exceptionalizing security has caused. A review of those options likewise prescribes certain lessons for the limitations of the nondelegation doctrine and separation of powers.
ch_abstract: 美国贸易法的核心存在一种未被充分研究的结构性二分法。一方面，完善的法定授权使总统能够通过与贸易伙伴的谈判消除贸易壁垒；另一方面，不同且鲜为人知的授权允许总统在维护美国经济安全的必要情况下，以例外方式设立贸易壁垒。与政治理论家长期将自由贸易视为经济安全的来源或工具不同，我国法律将二者对立起来——当安全需要时，允许背离自由贸易准则。此外，这两类授权存在我称之为"贸易授权纪律"的错配：国会严格限制总统的自由贸易谈判权，却对例外性安全驱动授权放任自流，使行政分支能以我国开国元勋所担忧的失控方式处理贸易利益。. . 本文首次揭示贸易法如何将安全例外化，并原创性地对构成例外贸易机制的国会授权类型进行分类。这种结构性分析具有实证与规范双重价值：不仅厘清了制度格局，其揭示的二分法更挑战了"所有行政分支背离自由贸易准则的行为皆不合法"的传统假设。历史记录表明，美国贸易法中的安全例外主义竟是源于被曲解且偏离立法初衷的法规。尽管这些例外难以撤销或修正，但分析表明贸易法仍存在广阔空间，可建立创新性非传统纪律以限制安全例外化造成的损害。对此类选项的审视也为非授权原则与权力分立提供了重要启示。
tags: trade, security, separation of powers, delegation

title: A Profile of SocialSecurityChild Beneficiaries and their Families: Sociodemographic and Economic Characteristics
abstract: Using a rich dataset that links the Census Bureau's Survey of Income and Program Participation calendar-year 2004 file with Social Security benefit records, this article provides a portrait of the sociodemographic and economic characteristics of Social Security child beneficiaries. We find that the incidence of benefit receipt in the child population differs substantially across individual and family-level characteristics. Average benefit amounts also vary across subgroups and benefit types. The findings provide a better understanding of the importance of Social Security to families with beneficiary children. Social Security is a major source of family income for many child beneficiaries, particularly among those with low income or family heads with lower education and labor earnings.
ch_abstract: 本文利用美国人口普查局的收入与项目参与调查2004日历年度文件与社会保障福利记录相结合的丰富数据集，描绘了社会保障儿童受益人的社会人口与经济特征。研究发现儿童群体中福利领取率在不同个体及家庭特征间存在显著差异。各子群体和福利类型的平均受益金额也呈现明显差别。这些发现有助于更深入理解社会保障对受益儿童家庭的重要性。对许多儿童受益人而言，社会保障是其家庭收入的主要来源，特别是在低收入家庭或家长教育程度及劳动收入较低的家庭中尤为突出。
tags: Social Security Child Beneficiaries, Social Insurance, Administrative Records, Family

title: Cyber-Security
abstract: This textbook chapter analyses why cyber-security is considered one of the key national security issues of our times. The first section provides the necessary technical background information. The second unravels three different, but interrelated discourses about cyber-security: discourse number one has a technical focus and is about viruses and worms. Number two looks at the interrelationship between the phenomenon of cyber-crime and cyber-espionage. Number three is a military and civil defense-driven discourse about the double-edged sword of fighting wars in the information domain and the need for critical infrastructure protection. Based on this, the third section turns to selected protection concepts from each of the three discourses. The final section sets the threat into perspective: despite heightened media attention and a general feeling of impending cyber-doom in some government circles, the level of cyber-risk is generally overstated. This has important repercussions for decision-makers and students, which are addressed in the concluding section.
ch_abstract: 本教科书章节分析了为何网络安全被视为当今时代的关键国家安全议题之一。第一部分提供了必要的技术背景知识。第二部分解构了三种不同但相互关联的网络安全论述：第一种论述以技术为核心，聚焦病毒与蠕虫；第二种探讨网络犯罪与网络间谍现象之间的关联；第三种是从军事与民防角度出发的论述，涉及信息战领域这把双刃剑及关键基础设施保护的必要性。基于此，第三部分分别从这三种论述中选取了若干防护理念进行探讨。最后部分对威胁进行了客观评估：尽管媒体高度关注且某些政府机构普遍存在网络末日将至的担忧，但网络安全风险总体被夸大。这对决策者和学生具有重要影响，结论部分对此进行了阐述。
tags: cyber-security, cyber-war, securitization, cyber-crime, cyber-espionage

title: India’s Quest for FoodSecurity: Rethinking InternationalTradeNorms
abstract: In contemporary times, food security has emerged as a central global issue, exacerbated by the COVID-19 pandemic and the Russia-Ukraine conflict. The ongoing crisis in West Asia has aggravated the same. Developing nations, particularly, face significant challenges in food stockpiling, which are further exacerbated by the disruptions in supply chains. According to the data of the Ministry of Consumer Affairs, 80 crore Indians were covered under food security measures during COVID-19. Thus, India's PDS measures require a large amount of public stock. Many Western countries have termed it protective measures and a protectionist market approach as it includes subsidies for local farmers. Such practices violate international trade rules and advocate for trade liberalization a solution to food security issues.
ch_abstract: 当今时代，粮食安全已成为全球核心议题，新冠疫情和俄乌冲突加剧了这一问题的严峻性。当前西亚地区持续动荡的局势使情况进一步恶化。发展中国家在粮食储备方面面临巨大挑战，而供应链中断更令其雪上加霜。印度消费者事务部数据显示，新冠疫情期间有8亿印度民众被纳入粮食安全保障体系。因此，印度的公共分配制度需要大量政府储备粮。由于该制度包含对本国农民的补贴政策，许多西方国家将其称为保护性措施和贸易保护主义市场策略。此类做法被认为违反国际贸易规则，这些国家主张以贸易自由化作为解决粮食安全问题的方案。
tags: Food Security, Minimum Support Price, Public Distribution System, Agreement on Agriculture, Public Stockholding, World Trade Organization, Trade Liberalisation

title: TradeLiberalisation, Market Behaviour and FoodSecurity: Evidence from Tanzania
abstract: The increasing dependency on food imports for food security in the Global South implies a higher vulnerability to trade shocks. Trade barriers, such as export restrictions on stable food crops, are commonly used by developing countries in times of crisis. Surges in international food prices raise the real incomes of the farmers selling food while hurting the net food consumers. Trade restrictions may stabilise the domestic availability and price of food for net consumers in the short run. However, the question remains how liberalisation after a long period of ad-hoc export restriction influences rural producers. This working paper examines the effects of lifting a maize export ban on farmers’ food security and market behaviour in Tanzania. Using data from the National Panel Surveys over multiple waves, the study employs a difference-in-difference methodology to analyse the association at the household and district level. The results suggests that farmers who sold maize under the ban reduced their maize production and shifted to other stable crops, becoming less commercialised and disconnected from the market after liberalisation. A borderline significant negative association on household-level dietary diversity and quality is observed in regards to food security.
ch_abstract: 全球南方国家日益依赖粮食进口来保障粮食安全，意味着更容易受到贸易冲击的影响。发展中国家在危机时期常采取贸易壁垒手段，例如对主粮作物实施出口限制。国际粮价飙升会提高售粮农民的实际收入，同时损害粮食净消费者的利益。短期内，贸易限制可能稳定净消费者群体的国内粮食供应和价格。但长期临时性出口限制后实施贸易自由化将如何影响农村生产者，这个问题仍然存在。本工作论文研究了坦桑尼亚取消玉米出口禁令对农民粮食安全和市场行为的影响。研究利用多轮国家面板调查数据，采用双重差分法分析家庭和地区层面的关联。结果表明，禁令期间出售玉米的农户减少了玉米种植，转而种植其他主粮作物，在贸易自由化后商业化程度降低且与市场脱节。在粮食安全方面，观察到家庭膳食多样性与质量存在临界显著的负相关。
tags: Food Security, Export Ban, Food Trade, Tanzania, Market Integration

title: How Effective Is the SocialSecurityStatement? Informing Younger Workers About SocialSecurity
abstract: This article analyzes the impact of the Social Security Statement on younger workers' knowledge of Social Security programs and benefits, using data from surveys commissioned by the Social Security Administration (SSA). We found that younger workers generally were knowledgeable about Social Security before receiving a Statement and significantly more so afterward. Younger workers' knowledge was stronger in broader program-level aspects than in some narrower benefit-specific aspects. The gap in knowledge about benefits poses potential risks for their retirement security and indicates that SSA should emphasize certain types of information in continuing outreach efforts. We found no consistent knowledge gaps related to demographic characteristics that would indicate a need for targeted outreach to certain groups.
ch_abstract: 本文利用美国社会保障局(SSA)委托开展的调查数据，分析了《社会保障报表》对年轻工作者了解社会保障计划和福利的影响。研究发现，年轻工作者在收到报表前普遍对社会保障有所了解，收到报表后认知度显著提升。他们对宏观计划层面的认知强于某些具体福利细节。关于福利知识的缺口可能对其退休保障构成潜在风险，表明SSA应在持续宣传中重点强化某些类型的信息。研究未发现与人口特征相关的系统性认知差异，因此暂不需要针对特定群体开展定向宣传。
tags: Social Security, Retirement

title: Adjudication of the GATTSecurityClause: To Be or Not to Be, This is the Question
abstract: Amidst the severe crisis the WTO’s crown jewel is facing these days, the WTO tribunals are confronted with another perplexed matter – adjudication of the security exception. In a number of the ongoing disputes the parties invoked national security to justify their trade-restrictive measures. The interpretation of the security exception raises a number of vexed questions. Before delving into the discussion of the interpretative intricacies, it is prudent to inquire whether the WTO tribunals have jurisdiction over the security clause and if it is justiciable.
ch_abstract: 在世贸组织引以为豪的争端解决机制深陷严峻危机之际，其仲裁庭正面临另一棘手难题——国家安全例外条款的裁决。多起未决争端中，缔约方纷纷援引国家安全为由，为其贸易限制措施辩护。该例外条款的解释引发诸多争议。在深入探讨解释难题之前，需审慎考量世贸仲裁庭是否对安全条款拥有管辖权，以及该条款是否具备可司法性。
tags: GATT 1994, Security Exception, Jurisdiction, Justiciability

title: TradeSecrets and InformationSecurityin the Age of Sports Analytics
abstract: The growth of sports analytics has made professional teams more and more reliant on proprietary data and algorithms, which are only valuable so long as they remain unknown to competitors. Teams are, however, relatively poorly equipped to protect these secrets. This chapter reviews five options available to teams looking to protect their secret information: league rules and norms, nondisclosure and noncompete agreements, trade-secrecy law, criminal law, and information-security efforts. None of the legal options are perfect, since breaches can be difficult to detect and legal remedies expose teams to unwanted publicity and risks of further breaches. Teams, then, should focus their efforts on building robust security systems to prevent problems from arising in the first place. The chapter concludes by discussing trends that are likely to increase the importance of information security in professional sports.
ch_abstract: 体育分析的发展使得职业球队越来越依赖专有数据和算法，这些信息只有在竞争对手不知情的情况下才具有价值。然而，球队在保护这些机密方面相对缺乏准备。本章回顾了球队保护机密信息的五种可选方案：联盟规则与规范、保密协议与竞业禁止条款、商业秘密法、刑法以及信息安全措施。这些法律手段均非完美之选，因为违规行为可能难以察觉，而法律救济又会使球队面临不必要的舆论关注和进一步泄密的风险。因此，球队应着力构建强大的安全系统，从根本上预防问题的发生。本章最后探讨了可能提升职业体育信息安全重要性的趋势。
tags: sports law, trade secrets, information security

title: The SocialSecurityWindfall Elimination Provision: Issues and Replacement Alternatives
abstract: The Windfall Elimination Provision (WEP) reduces the Social Security benefits of individuals who would otherwise receive a full benefit based on earnings in Social Security–covered employment as well as pension income from noncovered employment. Since the WEP was established in 1983, critics have asserted that it overcorrects the would-be windfall for affected beneficiaries and is difficult to administer. This article considers two WEP replacement options that would modify the benefit calculation methodology. It compares the current WEP with the two options and discusses some of the possible effects of changing the current law.
ch_abstract: 《意外之财消除条款》(WEP) 减少了那些本应基于社会保障覆盖工作的收入和非覆盖工作的养老金收入获得全额福利的个人社会保障福利。自1983年WEP设立以来，批评者一直认为它对受影响受益人的潜在意外之财进行了过度修正，并且难以实施。本文探讨了两种修改福利计算方法的WEP替代方案，将现行WEP与这两种方案进行比较，并讨论了改变现行法律可能产生的一些影响。
tags: Windfall Elimination Provision (WEP), Social Security reform, retirement benefits

title: Toward Best Practices forTrade-SecurityMeasures
abstract: The global economy is increasingly being weaponized.  Citing security concerns from traditional defense to economic competitiveness, health emergency, and climate crisis, states are turning to sanctions, tariffs, export controls, investment screening, and subsidies.  But while economic statecraft is becoming common, rules remain scarce.  Questions about notice, duration, proportionality, harm minimization, compensation, retaliation and/or rebalancing lack clear answers and seem almost theoretical.Once, we might have hoped the WTO would play a role in developing such rules.  But in the absence of an Appellate Body and in the face of state rejections of review, WTO deliberative processes have ground to a halt.This essay argues for a new approach, focused less on adjudicating security disputes than on developing best practices for invoking and using trade security measures.  It explains why a new approach is necessary, detailing both how the WTO’s deliberative engine broke down and why dispute settlement is ill-suited to develop guidance now needed.  It suggests where and how best practices might be developed, before considering an agenda for such a best practice process.  In the end, the hope is a process that can develop expectations - expectations that might make a world of economic statecraft a bit less dangerous.
ch_abstract: 全球经济正日益被武器化。各国以传统国防、经济竞争力、突发卫生事件和气候危机等安全关切为由，纷纷诉诸制裁、关税、出口管制、投资审查和补贴手段。然而尽管经济治国术日益普遍，相关规则却依然匮乏。关于措施通知、实施期限、相称性原则、损害最小化、补偿机制、报复及/或再平衡等问题缺乏明确答案，几乎停留在理论探讨层面。我们曾寄望世贸组织能推动此类规则制定，但随着上诉机构停摆及成员国拒绝接受审查，WTO的审议机制已陷入瘫痪。本文主张转向新路径——将重心从裁决安全争端转向制定援引和使用贸易安全措施的最佳实践。文章阐释了新路径的必要性，既剖析了WTO审议机制失灵的原因，也论证了争端解决机制为何难以适应当前制定准则的需求。在探讨最佳实践制定议程之前，本文提出了具体领域和方法建议。最终目标是建立一套能形成行为预期的流程——这些预期或许能让这个经济治国术盛行的世界少几分危险。
tags: trade security, World Trade Organization, WTO, Appellate body, best practices, economic statecraft

title: Housing Expenditures of SocialSecurityBeneficiaries, 2005–2018
abstract: This article uses data from the public-use files of the Census Bureau’s American Community Survey for selected years 2005–2018 to examine the annual housing expenditures of households that include at least one person who received income from Social Security. In all years, the median percentage of income spent on housing was higher in households that included at least one Social Security beneficiary than in households with no beneficiaries.  In households with at least one Social Security beneficiary, the median share of income spent on housing varied by tenure. In the period 2005–2018, the median shares rose from 31.7 percent to 32.5 percent for renter households, declined from 27.3 percent to 25.1 percent for homeowner households with a mortgage, and declined from 13.9 percent to 12.4 percent for homeowner households without a mortgage.
ch_abstract: 本文利用美国人口普查局美国社区调查2005-2018年公开数据，研究了至少有一人领取社会保障金的家庭年度住房支出情况。所有年份数据显示，含社会保障受益人的家庭住房支出收入中位数占比均高于无受益人家庭。在含社会保障受益人的家庭中，住房支出占比因住房 tenure（租住/自有）类型存在差异：2005-2018年间，租房家庭该指标从31.7%升至32.5%，有房贷的自有住房家庭从27.3%降至25.1%，无房贷的自有住房家庭则从13.9%降至12.4%。
tags: Housing expenditures, Housing tenure, Mortgages, Renters, Homeowners, Social Security beneficiaries, Household income

title: Trump,Tradeand NationalSecurity: Will Federal Courts Rein in the President?
abstract: Ever since the inauguration of President Trump, I have written about President Trump’s trade policy.  In part, I have focused on the president’s reliance on federal statutes. Especially those delegating congressional authority to him to take trade actions that rely upon his sole discretionary determinations of national security risks or national emergencies.We are now at a point where federal courts in the United States, the largest economy in the world, have been asked to review the validity of presidential trade actions. Specifically, the central legality of the broad delegation of congressional trade authority that has occurred over the last 75 years.While it is always dangerous to predict how a federal court or the Supreme Court will decide a case, I predict the federal courts will uphold the separation of powers in the face of the outrageous and unprecedented onslaught of presidential tariff and trade actions by a president relying upon dubious claims of national security and national emergency. Personal gripes can never be a basis for trade policy. My guess is that this will come from the steel importers’ case concerning Section 232.
ch_abstract: 自特朗普总统就职以来，我一直撰文分析其贸易政策。其中我重点关注了总统对联邦法规的依赖，尤其是那些将国会权力授予总统的条款——允许他基于单方面裁定的国家安全风险或国家紧急状态采取贸易行动。如今美国作为全球最大经济体，其联邦法院已被要求审查总统贸易行动的合法性，核心争议聚焦于过去75年间国会贸易权力的大范围下放是否合法。虽然预测联邦法院或最高法院的裁决总是充满风险，但我认为面对一位总统以可疑的国家安全和国家紧急状态为由发起的、史无前例的荒谬关税与贸易行动攻势，联邦法院将捍卫三权分立原则。个人恩怨绝不能成为贸易政策的基础。我推测这一裁决可能源自钢铁进口商依据《232条款》提起的诉讼案。
tags: National Security, Delegation of Congressional authority, Trump's trade authority, Federal courts and trade

title: Hispanics, SocialSecurity, and SupplementalSecurityIncome
abstract: This article uses a relatively new data source - the American Community Survey (ACS) - to document the economic and demographic characteristics of the Hispanic population in the United States. Although the article focuses on Social Security beneficiaries and Supplemental Security Income (SSI) recipients, other segments of the population are also examined. The ACS data show that the Hispanic population is significantly different from the overall population, particularly with regard to age distribution, education, and economic well-being.
ch_abstract: 本文采用了一个相对较新的数据来源——美国社区调查（ACS），来记录美国西班牙裔人口的经济和人口特征。尽管文章主要关注社会保障受益者和补充保障收入（SSI）领取者，但也考察了其他人群。ACS数据显示，西班牙裔人口在年龄分布、教育程度和经济状况方面与整体人口存在显著差异。
tags: American Community Survey, Hispanic population, Supplemental Security Income

title: Alternate Measures of Replacement Rates for SocialSecurityBenefits and Retirement Income
abstract: Discussions of retirement planning and Social Security policy often focus on replacement rates, which represent retirement income or Social Security benefits relative to pre-retirement earnings. Replacement rates are a rule of thumb designed to simplify the process of smoothing consumption over individuals' lifetimes. Despite their widespread use, however, there is no common means of measuring replacement rates. Various measures of pre-retirement earnings mean that the denominators used in replacement rate calculations are often inconsistent and can lead to confusion. Whether a given replacement rate represents an adequate retirement income depends on whether the denominator in the replacement rate calculation is an appropriate measure of pre-retirement earnings. This article illustrates replacement rates using four measures of pre-retirement earnings: final earnings; the constant income payable from the present value (PV) of lifetime earnings (PV payment); the wage-indexed average of all earnings prior to claiming Social Security benefits; and the inflation-adjusted average of all earnings prior to claiming Social Security benefits (consumer price index (CPI) average). The article then measures replacement rates against a sample of the Social Security beneficiary population using the Social Security Administration's Modeling Income in the Near Term (MINT) microsimulation model. Replacement rates are shown based on Social Security benefits alone, to indicate the adequacy of the current benefit structure, as well as on total retirement income including defined benefit pensions and financial assets, to indicate total preparedness for retirement. The results show that replacement rates can vary considerably based on the definition of pre-retirement earnings used and whether replacement rates are measured on an individual or a shared basis. For current new retirees, replacement rates based on all sources of retirement income seem strong by most measures and are projected to remain so as these individuals age. For new retirees in 2040, replacement rates are projected to be lower, though still adequate on average based on most common benchmarks.
ch_abstract: 关于退休规划和社保政策的讨论常聚焦于替代率，即退休收入或社保福利相对于退休前收入的比例。替代率作为经验法则，旨在简化个人终身消费平滑化的过程。然而尽管应用广泛，替代率的测算方法却缺乏统一标准。退休前收入的不同衡量方式导致替代率计算中的分母常不一致，可能引发混淆。特定替代率能否代表充足的退休收入，取决于计算时所采用的分母是否恰当衡量了退休前收入。本文采用四种退休前收入指标阐释替代率：最终收入；终身收入现值（PV）可支付的恒定收入（PV支付）；申领社保福利前全部收入的工资指数化平均值；以及申领社保福利前全部收入的通胀调整平均值（消费者价格指数CPI均值）。文章随后运用社保局"近期收入建模"（MINT）微观模拟模型，以社保受益人群样本实测替代率。结果显示的替代率既包含仅社保福利的情况（反映现行福利结构充足性），也涵盖含固定收益养老金及金融资产的总退休收入（反映整体退休准备度）。研究表明，替代率会因退休前收入定义方式及个体/共享测算基础而产生显著差异。对当前新退休群体而言，基于全收入来源的替代率在多数指标下表现强劲，且预计将随年龄增长保持稳定；而对2040年的新退休群体，预计替代率虽有所下降，但按多数常见基准仍处于平均充足水平。
tags: replacement rate, Social Security, retirement income

title: Increasing the Early Retirement Age Under SocialSecurity: Health, Work, and Financial Resources
abstract: Policies that would reduce or eliminate Social Security benefits for early retirees could have adverse consequences for older workers in poor health. This Brief documents the health and financial status of people aged 62-64 who receive reduced Social Security benefits as retired workers, spouses, and widowed spouses. Although most of these early retirees do not have a serious health condition, almost half report some type of health problem. About 25 percent are estimated to have health problems that substantially impair their ability to work. When compared to other early retirees, those who have severe health problems have lower lifetime earnings, are more reliant on Social Security benefits, have fewer financial assets, and are less likely to have health insurance. About 12 percent of early retirees are estimated to meet the strict disability criteria for receiving Social Security Disability Insurance (DI) or Supplemental Security Income (SSI). Many of them do not receive DI because they lack sufficient work histories to qualify. Another larger subgroup does not meet the test of low income and limited financial assets for means-tested SSI disability benefits. About as many 62-64 year olds classified as severely disabled receive early retirement benefits as receive disability benefits from DI or SSI. The evidence suggests that Social Security early retirement benefits serve as a substantial, albeit unofficial, disability program for some early retirees.
ch_abstract: 那些会减少或取消提前退休者社会保障福利的政策，可能对健康状况不佳的年长工作者产生不利影响。本简报记录了62至64岁人群的健康和财务状况，这些人群以退休工作者、配偶及丧偶配偶身份领取减少的社会保障福利。尽管大多数提前退休者没有严重健康问题，但近半数报告存在某种健康问题。据估计，约25%的人存在严重影响工作能力的健康问题。与其他提前退休者相比，健康状况严重不佳者终身收入更低、更依赖社会保障福利、金融资产更少、且更可能没有医疗保险。估计约12%的提前退休者符合领取社会保障残障保险（DI）或补充保障收入（SSI）的严格残障标准。其中许多人因缺乏足够工作经历而无法获得DI。另一更大群体则不符合SSI残障福利基于经济状况调查的低收入及有限资产标准。在62至64岁被归类为严重残障的人群中，领取提前退休福利者与领取DI或SSI残障福利者数量相当。证据表明，社会保障提前退休福利对部分提前退休者而言，实质上发挥着非正式残障保障计划的作用。
tags: Retirement, retirement age, social security, financial resources

title: Prevalence, Characteristics, and Poverty Status of SupplementalSecurityIncome Multirecipients
abstract: “Multirecipients” are people who receive Supplemental Security Income (SSI) payments while living with other recipients (not including an SSI-eligible spouse). Using Social Security Administration records matched to Current Population Survey data for 2005, this article examines multirecipients' personal, family, household, and economic characteristics. I find that no more than 20 percent of the 2005 SSI population were multirecipients. Most multirecipients were adults, lived with one other recipient, and/or shared their homes with related recipients. Multirecipients were generally less likely to be poor than SSI recipients as a whole; but those who were children, lived with one other recipient, and/or shared their homes with a nonrecipient were more likely to be poor. Implementing sliding-scale SSI benefit reductions for children in multirecipient households would affect about 23 percent of multirecipients, or about 5 percent of all SSI recipients.
ch_abstract: “多重受助者”是指与其他受助者（不包括符合SSI资格的配偶）同住并领取补充保障收入（SSI）款项的人。本文利用2005年当前人口调查数据中匹配的社会保障管理局记录，研究了多重受助者的个人、家庭、住户及经济特征。研究发现，2005年SSI受助群体中不超过20%为多重受助者。大多数多重受助者为成年人，与另一名受助者同住，且/或与亲属受助者共享住所。总体而言，多重受助者陷入贫困的概率低于SSI受助者整体水平；但其中儿童、仅与另一名受助者同住、且/或与非受助者共享住所的群体贫困率更高。若对多重受助家庭中的儿童实施SSI福利分级递减政策，将影响约23%的多重受助者，约占SSI受助者总数的5%。
tags: Supplemental Security Income, Poverty, Current Population Survey, Multirecipients

title: FoodSecurityPolicies in Latin America
abstract: As a consequence of the 2006-08 food crisis, food security has become a mayor political concern in the LA region. The crisis has led to intense political discussions at both the regional and country levels, and has resulted in new policy responses that have attempted to protect vulnerable social sectors from the negative impacts of the crisis.
ch_abstract: 2006-08年的粮食危机导致粮食安全成为拉美地区的主要政治关切。这场危机引发了地区和国家层面的激烈政治讨论，并催生了新的政策应对措施，旨在保护弱势社会群体免受危机负面影响。
tags: Food Security, Latin America, Policies

title: Measuring the Relative Importance of SocialSecurityBenefits to the Elderly
abstract: Provided is a discussion of the cumulative effects of the measurement alternatives described in the three previous articles: considering family income of persons rather than aged units, using administrative data in place of survey reported data, and switching the data source from the Current Population Survey (CPS) to the Survey of Income and Program Participation (SIPP). The current-methodology CPS statistic of 17.9 percent of beneficiary aged units receiving all of their income from Social Security in 1996 falls to a substantially smaller estimated 4.5 percent of elderly beneficiary persons based on family income when using the SIPP and Social Security administrative data.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了前三篇文章所述测量方法变更的累积效应：以个人家庭收入替代老年单位收入、采用行政数据取代调查上报数据，以及将数据源从当前人口调查（CPS）转为收入与项目参与调查（SIPP）。根据1996年数据，采用现行CPS方法统计显示17.9%的老年受益人单位完全依赖社会保障金生活；而改用SIPP结合社会保障行政数据、按家庭收入计算时，该比例预计将大幅降至4.5%的老年受益个人。
tags: income, Social Security, data quality

title: Resurrecting Magnuson-Moss Rulemaking: The FTC at a DataSecurityCrossroads
abstract: Welcome to the digital age, where consumer data is more valuable than gold. In this era of information, companies treat personal data as a prized commodity, leveraging its potential to boost business and engage an ever-growing number of customers. Yet when companies fail to protect the sensitive data that they hold, consumers are left with few avenues to obtain redress for the harms they may have suffered. In an effort to protect consumers, the Federal Trade Commission has been policing inadequate data security practices since the early 2000s. Using its broad authority under Section 5 of the Federal Trade Commission Act, the FTC routinely brings enforcement actions against companies that have sustained data breaches, yet could have implemented reasonable security measures to prevent them. In the vast majority of proceedings, the violating entity chooses to settle with the FTC rather than incur the various costs associated with litigation. The orders that accompany the conclusion of every enforcement proceeding typically require the violator to enact a comprehensive data security overhaul.In 2018, such an FTC order was vacated by the Eleventh Circuit Court of Appeals. On the heels of this decision, it is apparent that the FTC must recalibrate its approach to enforcing unlawful data security practices. This Comment contends that the Commission should draw on its substantial experience with data protection and promulgate a rule that transparently specifies the standard by which data security is to be regulated. Although the FTC’s decision to abstain from using its Magnuson-Moss rulemaking authority may have been prudent in the early days of its foray into data security, times have changed. Embracing the heightened public participation interwoven throughout the hybrid rulemaking process, the FTC is fully capable of delineating a data security standard in a reasonable amount of time. And once the rule-based standard is in place, the FTC can reap the benefits of a framework that provides the regulated community with enhanced guidance and the consumer public with greater protection from preventable data harms.
ch_abstract: 欢迎来到数字时代，消费者数据比黄金更珍贵。在这个信息时代，企业将个人数据视为宝贵商品，利用其潜力推动业务发展并吸引不断增长的客户群。然而当企业未能保护好其持有的敏感数据时，消费者往往难以就所受损害获得救济。为保护消费者权益，美国联邦贸易委员会自21世纪初便开始监管不完善的数据安全实践。根据《联邦贸易委员会法案》第5条赋予的广泛权力，该机构定期对发生数据泄露但本可采取合理防护措施的企业提起执法诉讼。绝大多数案件中，违规企业选择与委员会达成和解以避免诉讼产生的各项成本。每项执法程序结束时发布的命令通常要求违规企业实施全面的数据安全改革。2018年，第十一巡回上诉法院撤销了联邦贸易委员会的一项此类命令。随着这一裁决的出现，委员会显然需要重新调整其针对非法数据安全实践的执法方式。本文主张委员会应借鉴其在数据保护领域的丰富经验，制定明确规范数据安全监管标准的规则。尽管联邦贸易委员会早期涉足数据安全领域时未行使《马格努森-莫斯法案》赋予的规则制定权或属审慎之举，但时过境迁。通过采用混合式规则制定程序中强化的公众参与机制，委员会完全有能力在合理时间内确立数据安全标准。一旦基于规则的标准得以确立，联邦贸易委员会便能从新框架中获益：既为受监管群体提供更明确的指引，又为公众提供更强有力的保护，使其免受本可预防的数据侵害。
tags: Data Security, FTC, Federal Trade Commission, Magnuson-Moss, Cyber Security, Hybrid Rulemaking

title: TradeSecrecy as an Instrument of NationalSecurity? Rethinking the Foundations of Economic Espionage
abstract: Since its inception, the Economic Espionage Act has been touted as a way to advance U.S. national security interests.  Specifically, proponents in Congress and law enforcement and intelligence officials since then have argued that economic espionage harms national security by undermining U.S. competitiveness and technological advantage. The domains of national security and trade secrecy, however, have conflicting and irreconcilable structures for protecting information.  The notion that United States law enforcement and intelligence agencies can effectively address economic espionage without altering the basic contours of trade secret protection is misguided.  These agencies rarely have access to firm-level information about threats to economically valuable information, but the firms that own trade secrets lack the perspective that might allow them to identify and defend against state-sponsored threats.  Using diplomatic means to gain a better understanding of how other nations fund scientific and technical research development offers a more promising means of reducing the incentives and cover for economic espionage than does the current strategy of attempting to make incompatible legal paradigms work together.
ch_abstract: 自颁布以来，《经济间谍法》一直被吹捧为推动美国国家安全利益的手段。具体而言，国会支持者及执法与情报官员此后一直主张，经济间谍行为通过削弱美国竞争力和技术优势危害国家安全。然而国家安全与商业秘密领域在信息保护机制上存在根本性冲突且无法调和。认为美国执法和情报机构能在不改变商业秘密保护基本框架的前提下有效应对经济间谍的观点实属谬误。这些机构几乎无法获取企业层面关于经济价值信息威胁的情报，而掌握商业秘密的企业又缺乏识别和抵御国家资助威胁的全局视野。相较于当前试图调和互斥法律范式的策略，通过外交途径深入了解他国资助科技研发的机制，才是更有望减少经济间谍动机与掩护的更有效途径。
tags: Intellectual property, trade secrets, economic espionage, national security

title: Estimated Retirement Benefits in the SocialSecurityStatement
abstract: Since 1999, the Social Security Administration (SSA) has mailed an annual Social Security Statement to individuals aged 25 or older showing their reported earnings history. The Statement also provides workers with estimates of benefit amounts available under the Social Security programs. This note focuses on estimates of retirement benefits in the annual Social Security Statement. Estimated benefits are adjusted for economy-wide average wage growth from about the time of Statement issuance to about the time of retirement. In addition, the Social Security Statement uses certain assumptions about current and future individual earnings to estimate retirement benefits. This note evaluates whether the Statement's assumptions produce accurate estimates, using data from a sample of recently eligible retired workers in SSA's Modeling Income in the Near Term (MINT) microsimulation model.
ch_abstract: 自1999年起，美国社会保障局（SSA）每年向25岁及以上人群邮寄社会保障年度报表，列明其申报的收入历史记录。该报表还向工作者提供社会保障计划下可领取的福利金额估算。本说明重点关注年度社会保障报表中的退休福利估算。估算福利会根据从报表发布时到退休时期间的全经济范围平均工资增长进行调整。此外，社会保障报表采用关于当前及未来个人收入的特定假设来估算退休福利。本说明利用SSA"近期收入建模"（MINT）微观模拟模型中一组近期符合资格的退休人员样本数据，评估这些假设是否能够生成准确的福利估算。
tags: Social Security Statement, Benefit Estimates, Microsimulation

title: Workers’ Expectations About Their Future SocialSecurityBenefits: How Realistic Are They?
abstract: This study examines workers’ expectations about their future Social Security benefits. The authors compile and analyze results of more than 60 individual surveys covering 1971 through 2020, with more than 130,000 respondents in total. The authors compare results over time and by demographic group to examine how Social Security expectations vary. They  investigate possible explanations for the variations they find as well as for the finding that workers’ expectations tend to be more pessimistic than Social Security actuarial projections.
ch_abstract: 本研究探讨了工作者对未来社会保障福利的预期。作者汇总并分析了1971年至2020年间60多项独立调查的结果，受访者总数超过13万人。通过对比不同时期和人口群体的数据，作者研究了社会保障预期的变化模式，并对其差异及工作者预期普遍比社会保障精算预测更为悲观的现象进行了成因探析。
tags: Social Security benefits, Retirement expectations, Financial literacy, Projections, Surveys

title: An Intercultural Study on theSecurityFactors of Global Internet Shopping
abstract: The development of Global Internet shopping has opened up exciting opportunities for finding new and efficient way of doing businesses. Although the advance in information infrastructure makes connectivity possible to reach almost anywhere in the world, it does not necessarily ensure a successful development of an Global Internet shopping environment. Many constraints, such as the security constraint, exist. Especially, the fears on the information theft and other security concerns keep this mode of Global Internet shopping from developing as rapidly as it could. Based on the literature study, several variables are selected to investigate any cultural differences between the U.S. and S. Korea and a conceptual framework of the study is suggested to investigate the security concerns of the Internet shoppers. For a better understanding of security aspects in Global Internet shopping, the survey among more than a hundred shoppers for both in the United States and Korea are performed. An one-way ANOVA for each non-metric variable and two metric dependent variables was performed. As expected, The results of ANOVAs indicated that on-line shoppers with different cultural background were significantly different in their perception on a variables identified-Copyrights and other proprietary information. Compared to the U.S. shoppers, Korean on-line shoppers were more likely to agree with the idea that the Internet service with copyrights is more favorable for their shopping satisfaction concern. Variables such as credit card information and data, privacy, and message security did not make any difference in the concerns of on-line shoppers.
ch_abstract: 全球互联网购物的发展为寻找新颖高效的商业方式开辟了激动人心的机遇。尽管信息基础设施的进步使得全球几乎任何地方都能实现互联，但这并不必然确保全球互联网购物环境的成功发展。诸多限制因素依然存在，例如安全约束。特别是对信息盗窃及其他安全问题的担忧，阻碍了这种全球互联网购物模式以应有的速度发展。通过文献研究，本文选取若干变量来探究美国与韩国之间的文化差异，并构建研究概念框架以考察网络购物者的安全顾虑。为更深入理解全球互联网购物中的安全因素，研究对美韩两国共百余名购物者开展了问卷调查。针对每个非计量变量和两个计量因变量进行了单因素方差分析。结果显示，正如预期那样，不同文化背景的在线购物者对"版权及其他专有信息"这一变量的认知存在显著差异。与美国消费者相比，韩国网络购物者更认同"具有版权保护的网络服务更能提升购物满意度"的观点。而信用卡信息、数据隐私及通信安全等变量在两国消费者的关注度上未呈现差异。
tags: Cultural Differences, Global Internet Shopping, Security Factors

title: The Impact of Survey Choice on Measuring the Relative Importance of SocialSecurityBenefits to the Elderly
abstract: This article provides insight into how measures of elderly economic well-being are sensitive to the survey data source. In the Social Security Administration's publication Income of the Population 55 or Older, data are based on the national Current Population Survey (CPS). The preciseness of the survey statistics depends upon the willingness and ability of CPS respondents to answer questions accurately. This article contrasts income statistics calculated using the CPS and the Survey of Income and Program Participation. Administrative data for Social Security benefits and Supplemental Security Income are also used to evaluate the accuracy of the income estimates.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了衡量老年人经济福祉的指标如何因调查数据来源的不同而有所差异。美国社会保障局发布的《55岁及以上人口收入》报告中的数据基于全国现时人口调查(CPS)。调查统计的精确性取决于CPS受访者准确回答问题的意愿和能力。本文将CPS计算的收入统计数据与收入与计划参与调查(SIPP)的统计结果进行对比，同时利用社会保障福利和补充保障收入的行政数据来评估收入估算的准确性。
tags: income, Social Security, data quality

title: SocialSecurity: A Program and Policy History
abstract: The publication of this article coincides with the celebration of the 70th anniversary of the Social Security Act. The history and development of the Social Security program from its inception to the present is discussed. Special attention is given to historical debates that have relevance to today's policy discussions. In particular, the article discusses themes regarding program growth, pay-as-you-go financing, reserve funding, rates of return on payroll contributions, and the adequacy of benefits.
ch_abstract: 本文发表之际，正值《社会保障法》颁布七十周年纪念。文章探讨了社会保障计划从创立至今的历史沿革与发展历程，着重分析了与当前政策讨论具有关联性的历史争议。特别针对计划规模扩张、现收现付筹资模式、储备基金运作、工资税缴纳收益率以及福利充足性等核心议题展开了论述。
tags: Social Security, pay-as-you-go financing, Social Security benefits

title: Human RightsStandards: Learning from Experience
authors: ICHRP International Council on Human Rights Policy
abstract: Since the Universal Declaration on Human Rights was adopted in 1948, numerous human rights standards have been created at the initiative of states, non-governmental organisations, victims, and other actors. They have transformed international law. Human Rights Standards: Learning from Experience examines the unpredictable history of past standard-setting and the options available to those who advocate new standards in the future. It considers when new standards are needed, the forms they take, where they can be negotiated, and who is involved.
ch_abstract: 自1948年《世界人权宣言》通过以来，各国、非政府组织、受害者及其他行为体共同推动制定了大量人权标准。这些标准深刻改变了国际法体系。《人权标准：经验启示录》一书探讨了过往标准制定历程中难以预料的发展轨迹，为未来倡导新标准的行动者提供了多元路径选择。该书系统分析了新标准制定的必要时机、表现形式、协商场域及参与主体等核心问题。
tags: human rights, standards

title: ABAStandardsfor Criminal Justice: Law Enforcement Access to Third Party Records
abstract: I served as Reporter drafting these Standards over the past six years; the black letter was adopted by the American Bar Association (ABA) House of Delegates in February, 2012.  These Criminal Justice Standards on Law Enforcement Access to Third Party Records provide much needed guidance to legislatures, courts, and administrative agencies having to decide how to regulate law enforcement access to existing records in the hands of third parties. It is the first framework of its kind, and it can do much to improve the current system of ad hoc protections in both state and federal systems. Decision makers are struggling to determine when to permit law enforcement access to medical records, location records, communications records, and myriad other information, and these Standards provide a framework via which they can bring greater consistency to existing law, and, where necessary, frame new law that accounts for changing technologies and social norms, the needs of law enforcement, and the interests of privacy, freedom of expression, and social participation.
ch_abstract: 在过去的六年里，我作为报告员负责起草这些标准；其正式文本于2012年2月经美国律师协会（ABA）众议院通过。这套《刑事司法第三方记录执法调取标准》为立法机构、法院及行政机构提供了迫切需要的指导，这些部门需要决定如何规范执法机关获取第三方持有的现有记录。这是该领域首个系统性框架，能有效改进当前联邦与各州临时性保护措施的现状。决策者正艰难权衡执法机关调取医疗记录、位置记录、通讯记录及海量其他信息的权限边界，而本标准通过系统性框架帮助决策者提升现有法律的一致性，并在必要时制定新法律——兼顾技术变革与社会规范演变、执法需求，以及隐私权、言论自由和社会参与等权益的平衡。
tags: search, privacy, information privacy, Fourth Amendment, third party doctrine

title: Children in Pretrial Detention: Promoting StrongerInternationalTime Limits (A Collaborative Project with Juvenile Justice AdvocatesInternationaland the University of Minnesota Law School Human Rights Center)
abstract: This report urges state actors, civil society, and international bodies to recognize that reducing the duration of pretrial detention for children is an urgent priority. While significant research, documentation, and promising practices exist for monitoring detention conditions and implementing alternatives to detention, there is a gap in research on the duration of child pretrial detention. This report attempts to fill this gap. It summarizes existing literature on the negative impacts of pretrial detention on children, and examines existing international and regional human rights standards and recommendations on the topic. Its perhaps most significant contribution is the documentation of existing international and regional human rights standards or court-imposed time limits for child pretrial detention across 118 countries. The report offers recommendations for international, regional, and national human rights bodies to adopt that will significantly reduce the amount of time children spend deprived of liberty while awaiting adjudication.
ch_abstract: 本报告敦促各国政府、民间社会和国际机构认识到，缩短儿童审前拘留期限是一项紧迫任务。尽管在监督拘留条件和实施替代拘留措施方面已有大量研究、记录和良好实践，但关于儿童审前拘留期限的研究仍存在空白。本报告试图填补这一空白，综述了现有关于审前拘留对儿童负面影响的文献，并检视了相关国际和区域人权标准与建议。其最重要的贡献或许是记录了118个国家现行国际及区域人权标准或法院规定的儿童审前拘留时限。报告为国际、区域和国家人权机构提供了可采纳的建议，这些措施将显著减少儿童在候审期间被剥夺自由的时间。
tags: detention, juvenile justice, international human rights

title: Juvenile Justice in Australia: How Well Do We Comply withInternationalStandards?
abstract: This paper explores the different approaches to juvenile justice across Australian jurisdictions, and examines whether or not Australia is compliant with international standards. Compliance is assessed according to three principles: the use of imprisonment and detention as a last resort, the availability and use of diversion options, and the prohibition against racial discrimination. The paper includes an outline of potential improvements to diversionary strategies, and the need for legislation to provide clarity and consistency.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了澳大利亚各司法管辖区对青少年司法的不同处理方式，并检验澳大利亚是否符合国际标准。合规性评估基于三项原则：将监禁和拘留作为最后手段、分流措施的可用性与使用情况，以及禁止种族歧视。文中概述了分流策略的潜在改进方向，并指出需要通过立法确保清晰性与一致性。
tags: Indigenous, Juvenile Justice, International standards, Diversion, Criminology

title: Power Politics andInternationalLaborStandards
abstract: This paper analyzes how a country's commitment to labor standards is affected by the relative international political power they possess.  Powerful countries may be less committed to actual enforcement of certain labor standards since they are unlikely to face significant threats of international sanctions regardless of their actions.  The paper introduces an index of international power for 116 countries that is used to examine how power affects the extent to which countries enforce standards relating to freedom of association and collective bargaining.  The evidence strongly suggests that, even after controlling for differences in wealth, productivity and market freedom, powerful countries are significantly less committed to the protection of labor standards than less powerful countries.
ch_abstract: 本文分析了一个国家对劳工标准的承诺如何受到其所拥有的相对国际政治力量的影响。强国可能对实际执行某些劳工标准的承诺较低，因为无论其行为如何，它们都不太可能面临重大国际制裁的威胁。本文引入了一个涵盖116个国家的国际权力指数，用于研究权力如何影响各国执行与结社自由和集体谈判相关标准的程度。证据强烈表明，即使在控制了财富、生产力和市场自由度的差异后，强国对保护劳工标准的承诺也明显低于较弱的国家。
tags: International Labor Standards, ILO Conventions, Sanctions, Power

title: IDPC Response to the 2010 Annual Report of theInternationalNarcotics Control Board
abstract: The Report of the International Narcotics Control Board (INCB) for 2010 reveals not only the INCB’s continuing habit of exceeding its mandate, but also an enthusiasm for censuring what it regards as moves towards the liberalization of policy practice while preferring to remain silent on other areas that are within its purview and merit attention. This IDPC report concludes that this year’s Report does reflect some positive changes in the INCB’s outlook, but these are still outweighed by familiar negative practices and positions.
ch_abstract: 国际麻醉品管制局（INCB）2010年的报告不仅揭示了该局一贯越权的习惯，还显示出其对所谓政策实践自由化倾向的热衷批评，同时却对其职权范围内其他值得关注的领域保持沉默。这份IDPC报告认为，今年的报告确实反映了INCB观念上的一些积极变化，但熟悉的负面做法和立场仍占据上风。
tags: International policy, Global, INCB

title: Response to the 2008 Annual Report of theInternationalNarcotics Control Board
abstract: As in previous years, the 2008 Annual Report of the International Narcotics Control Board (INCB) contains a wealth of technical information on the operation of the international drug control system that attempts to manage the global licit market for narcotic and psychotropic substances for medical and research uses while simultaneously stifling the illicit market.  Interspersed with these operational descriptions are references and discussions on certain policy issues – primarily observations on the strengths and weaknesses of the system and what the INCB considers the main risks and threats to the effectiveness of that system.  While much of this data and debate is a welcome contribution to the policy process, the IDPC continues to be troubled with the selective and subjective nature of the INCB’s concerns; concerns that do not seem to flow from a balanced assessment of what constitutes non-compliance with the UN drug control conventions. In this response to the Annual Report attention is given to the INCB’s analysis of a number of inter-connected issues, including the history of the drug control system and on its positions on three contemporary debates – harm reduction, the search for effective cannabis control, and the Bolivian request for reconsideration of the status of the coca leaf.  The response concludes that the INCB continues to be quick to condemn what it sees as any move towards liberalization of policy and practice, while ignoring clear breaches of the spirit and letter of the conventions that arise from repressive policy in many countries.  Recognizing that the INCB has a crucial role to play within a global control system that is fit for purpose in the 21st century, it is argued that the Board will need to make significant changes to both its perspectives and operating procedures if it is to gain the confidence of many civil society and government stakeholders in the future.
ch_abstract: 与往年一样，2008年国际麻醉品管制局（INCB）年度报告包含了大量关于国际毒品管制体系运作的技术信息，该体系旨在管理用于医疗和科研用途的麻醉品和精神药物的全球合法市场，同时遏制非法市场。这些操作性的描述中穿插着对某些政策问题的提及和讨论——主要是对该体系优势和弱点的观察，以及INCB认为影响该体系有效性的主要风险和威胁。尽管这些数据和讨论对政策进程是有益的贡献，但国际药物政策联盟（IDPC）仍对INCB所关注问题的选择性和主观性感到不安；这些问题似乎并非基于对违反联合国毒品管制公约行为的平衡评估。在对年度报告的回应中，重点关注了INCB对一些相互关联问题的分析，包括毒品管制体系的历史，以及其在三个当代辩论中的立场——减害、寻求有效的大麻管制，以及玻利维亚要求重新考虑古柯叶地位的请求。回应总结认为，INCB继续迅速谴责其认为任何政策与实践自由化的动向，同时忽视了许多国家压制性政策对公约精神和条款的明显违反。认识到INCB在适合21世纪的全球管制体系中扮演着关键角色，文章认为，该机构若要在未来赢得许多民间社会和政府利益相关者的信任，就需要对其观点和操作程序做出重大改变。
tags: international policy, World, INCB

title: Can GlobalStandardsbe Principle Based?
abstract: This paper examines issues pertaining to standard setting in an increasingly interconnected world. It is argued that many present day accounting standards are flawed, generally because of inherent compromises welded into their structure, yielding needless complexity and sometimes absurd results. Using examples drawn from contemporary practice, including pension accounting, financial instruments and lease accounting, an argument for a move towards more simplified, principles based accounting is made. Some of the potential gains from such a project are discussed, as well as potential barriers and how these might be avoided in the quest for better accounting.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了在日益互联的世界中与准则制定相关的问题。文章指出，当前许多会计准则存在缺陷，通常是由于其结构中固有的妥协所致，导致了不必要的复杂性，有时甚至产生荒谬的结果。通过引用养老金会计、金融工具和租赁会计等当代实务案例，本文提出了向更简化、基于原则的会计体系转变的论点。文中讨论了这一改革可能带来的潜在收益，以及可能遇到的障碍，并探讨了在追求更优会计体系过程中如何规避这些障碍。
tags: accounting standards, pension accounting, financial instruments, lease accounting

title: AccountingStandardsin the Australian and New Zealand Public Administrations:. Experiences and Perspectives
abstract: This paper examines the current move to the international harmonisation of public sector accounting standards in Australia and New Zealand. It argues that an examination of the historical arrangements to standard setting will do much to inform the current dilemmas posed by the current international harmonisation process. New Zealand has always had an 'adoption' culture and has had sector neutral standards. On the other hand, in Australia the private sector has dominated the consciousness of the professional accounting standards regulators. The public sector has been the forgotten sector, and rather than being allowed to develop its own standards that suit its unique operating characteristics, it has had to fall in line with the political decisions made on behalf of the private sector. The paper draws on examples to illustrate the unintended consequences of these decisions.
ch_abstract: 本文探讨了澳大利亚和新西兰当前推动公共部门会计准则国际趋同的动向。文章认为，审视历史上准则制定的制度安排，将有助于理解当前国际趋同进程所引发的困境。新西兰历来秉持"采纳"文化，并实行部门中立的会计准则。反观澳大利亚，私营部门长期主导着专业会计准则制定者的思维。公共部门沦为被遗忘的领域，非但未能制定符合其独特运营特性的专属准则，反而必须服从代表私营部门利益的政治决策。论文通过实例揭示了这些决策带来的非预期后果。
tags: international harmonisation of public sector accounting standards, Australia, New Zealand, professional accounting standards, Public Sector

title: CoordinatingInternationalStandards: The Formation of the ISO
abstract: Standard setting has been among the nuts and bolts of globalizing industrial capitalism since its beginning, assuring that things needing to work together fit from product to product, industry to industry, and country to country. The foci of the first two of the now 229 technical committees of the non-specialized international standards organizations that emerged after the two world wars - the interwar International Standards Association [ISA] and the post-World War II International Organization for Standardization [ISO] - are iconic: Screw Threads and Bolts, Nuts and Accessories. Over the past two decades, voluntary standardization processes, invented by turn-of-the-twentieth-century engineers working in national and international technical committees, have increasingly been applied to issues that have little in common with those of fitting one mechanical part to another, such as work processes (ISO 9000), environmental pollution (ISO 14,000), and human rights (SA 8000 and the planned ISO 26000). This rapidly expanding scope, plus the high visibility of standards in networked areas such as telecommunications, has led to a new scholarly interest in standard setting practices.
ch_abstract: 自工业资本主义全球化之初，标准制定就已成为其基础要素之一，确保需要协同运作的事物能在产品与产品、行业与行业、国家与国家之间相互匹配。两次世界大战后成立的非专业国际标准组织——战间的国际标准协会[ISA]和战后的国际标准化组织[ISO]——如今拥有229个技术委员会，其中前两个委员会的关注点极具象征意义：螺纹，以及螺栓、螺母和配件。过去二十年间，由二十世纪之交活跃于国内外技术委员会的工程师们创立的自愿标准化流程，已越来越多地应用于与机械部件适配截然不同的问题领域，如工作流程（ISO 9000）、环境污染（ISO 14000）和人权（SA 8000及筹划中的ISO 26000）。这种快速扩展的适用范围，加之标准在电信等网络化领域的高度可见性，引发了学术界对标准制定实践的新关注。
tags: international standards

title: Taking Duties Seriously: Individual Duties inInternationalHuman Rights Law
authors: ICHRP International Council on Human Rights Policy
abstract: Notions of individual duties and responsibilities have often been set against the notion of human rights. This short publication collates and organizes in a readable way the various references to notions of individual duties and responsibilities in international human rights standards.
ch_abstract: 个人义务与责任的观念常与人权概念相对立。本简短出版物以易读的方式整理并归类了国际人权标准中关于个人义务与责任的各种表述。
tags: human rights, individual, duty, responsibility

title: Combating Exclusion: Why Human Rights are Essential for the MDGs
abstract: The Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) represent a global consensus on the need to tackle poverty.  While the MDGs have played an important role in focusing international attention on issues of development and poverty reduction, this article argues that the MDGs do not fully reflect the ambition of the Millennium Declaration, which promised to strive for the protection and promotion of all human rights - civil, cultural, economic, social and political - for all. This article outlines some of the aspects in which the MDG framework, while covering areas where states have clear obligations under international human rights law such as food, education and health, fails to reflect these standards. It focuses on three main issues - gender equality (Goal 3), maternal health (Goal 5) and slums (Goal 7) - as illustrative examples of the gaps between MDG commitments and human rights standards. It argues that this gap is also one of the main factors behind the lack of equitable progress on the MDGs. The article stresses the importance of ensuring that all efforts towards all the MDGs are fully consistent with human rights standards, and that non-discrimination, gender equality, participation and accountability are at the heart of all efforts to tackle poverty and exclusion.
ch_abstract: 千年发展目标（MDGs）体现了全球关于消除贫困必要性的共识。尽管这些目标在聚焦国际社会对发展和减贫问题的关注上发挥了重要作用，但本文认为它们并未充分反映《千年宣言》的宏伟愿景——该宣言承诺努力保障和促进所有人享有公民、文化、经济、社会及政治等各项人权。文章指出，虽然千年发展目标框架涵盖了各国根据国际人权法在粮食、教育和健康等领域应履行的明确义务，但仍存在未能体现这些标准的若干方面。文章重点探讨了性别平等（目标3）、孕产妇健康（目标5）和贫民窟（目标7）三个核心议题，以此揭示千年发展目标承诺与人权标准之间的差距，并论证这种差距正是导致千年发展目标未能实现公平进展的主要因素之一。文章强调，必须确保所有实现千年发展目标的努力完全符合人权标准，同时将不歧视、性别平等、公众参与和问责制置于应对贫困与排斥问题的核心位置。
tags: MDGs, Human Rights

title: InternationalAccountingStandardsand Accounting Quality
abstract: We examine whether application of International Accounting Standards is associated with higher accounting quality. The application of IAS reflects the combined effects of features of the financial reporting system, including standards, their interpretation, enforcement, and litigation. We find that firms applying IAS from 21 countries generally evidence less earnings management, more timely loss recognition, and more value relevance of accounting amounts than do a matched sample of firms applying non-US domestic standards. Differences in accounting quality between the two groups of firms in the period before the IAS firms adopt IAS do not account for the post-adoption differences. We also find that firms applying IAS generally evidence an improvement in accounting quality between the pre- and post-adoption periods. Although we cannot be sure that our findings are attributable to the change in the financial reporting system rather than to changes in firms' incentives and the economic environment, we include research design features to mitigate the effects of both.
ch_abstract: 我们研究国际会计准则的应用是否与更高的会计质量相关。国际会计准则的应用反映了财务报告体系各要素的综合影响，包括准则本身、准则解释、执行力度及诉讼环境。通过比较21个国家采用国际会计准则的企业与采用非美国本土准则的匹配企业样本，我们发现前者普遍表现出更少的盈余管理行为、更及时的亏损确认以及会计数据更高的价值相关性。两组企业在采用国际会计准则前的会计质量差异并不能解释采用后的差异。我们还发现，采用国际会计准则的企业在准则实施前后通常呈现出会计质量的提升。尽管我们无法确定这些发现完全归因于财务报告体系的变革而非企业激励或经济环境的变化，但我们在研究设计中已采取措施以降低这两类因素的影响。
tags: IAS, IASB, International Accounting Standards, International Accounting Standards Board, International Financial Reporting Standards

title: Advocacy Note - A Call to the New Secretary of theInternationalNarcotics Control Board: Ongoing Challenges
abstract: On February 1 201'8 Jonathan Lucas was appointed as the new Secretary of the International Narcotics Control Board (INCB or Board) and chief of the INCB Secretariat. He starts with this new challenge the week after this year’s CND session taking place from 8-12 March. The Secretariat plays an important role in assisting the Board in the exercise of its treaty related functions and operates as an 'administrative entity' of the UN Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC) in Vienna. Mr Lucas succeeds Mr Koli Kouame who retired from the organization on 31 January having served as Secretary and chief for nearly six years. The IDPC offers its congratulations to Mr Lucas for his appointment to this prestigious post and, as we approach the first CND session to follow the High Level Segment (HLS) of the Commission last year, increasingly pivotal post. 12-months ago, member states met to evaluate the targets set at the 1998 UN General Assembly Special Session on Drugs (UNGASS). While intended to produce a unitary position on the direction of international drug control for the next decade or so, the HLS and resultant Political Declaration revealed a clear divide in state’s attitudes towards domestic drug control. On one side of the divide stand a growing number of nations that are choosing to adopt pragmatic evidence-based harm reduction policies, while on the other side stand countries continuing to put faith in a zero-tolerance approach that has failed to produce any significant and sustained result over the past decade. This mounting lack of consensus puts the INCB, and its Secretariat, in an increasingly important position within the UN drug control framework. As the watchdog of the drug control treaties, it is essential that the Board deals respectfully and sensitively with the deepening variance in interpretation of the treaties by their owners; the member states themselves.     In this advocacy note, the IDPC has identified key areas of concern that it would like to bring to the attention of the incoming Secretary. These include: the lack of objectivity on the INCB’s part regarding alternative drug policy choices from member states and its refusal to encourage open and constructive debate on drug policy between the Board, member states, relevant UN bodies, civil society and NGOs; the need for a balanced approach in the INCB’s work on drug policy; the need for a more diverse range of expertise in INCB membership; the lack of transparency for the Board’s operations; the need for increased engagement with civil society to ensure the fulfillment of the Board’s functions; and the need for a more pro-active attitude to monitor the functioning of the Board within its mandate, and to encourage a process of modernization of its role in line with established UN practices.
ch_abstract: 2018年2月1日，乔纳森·卢卡斯被任命为国际麻醉品管制局（INCB或麻管局）新任秘书长兼麻管局秘书处主任。他将在今年3月8日至12日举行的麻醉药品委员会会议结束后的一周内，迎接这一新挑战。秘书处在协助麻管局履行条约相关职能方面发挥着重要作用，并作为联合国毒品和犯罪问题办公室（UNODC）维也纳办事处的"行政实体"运作。卢卡斯先生接替了于1月31日退休的科利·夸梅先生，后者担任秘书长兼主任近六年。国际药物政策联盟（IDPC）祝贺卢卡斯先生担任这一 prestigious 职位，随着我们迎来去年委员会高级别会议（HLS）后的首次麻醉药品委员会会议，这一职位日益关键。12个月前，成员国开会评估1998年联合国大会毒品问题特别会议（UNGASS）设定的目标。虽然高级别会议及其产生的政治宣言旨在就未来十年左右的国际毒品管制方向达成统一立场，但却揭示了各国对国内毒品管制态度的明显分歧。分歧的一方是越来越多选择采取务实、基于证据的减害政策的国家，而另一方则是继续坚持零容忍政策的国家，这些政策在过去十年中未能产生任何重大和持续的成果。这种日益缺乏共识的情况使麻管局及其秘书处在联合国毒品管制框架中处于越来越重要的位置。作为毒品管制条约的监督机构，麻管局必须尊重并敏感地对待成员国对条约解释的日益加深的分歧。在这份倡议说明中，IDPC指出了希望提请新任秘书长关注的关键问题领域。这些问题包括：麻管局对成员国替代性毒品政策选择缺乏客观性，拒绝鼓励麻管局、成员国、相关联合国机构、民间社会和非政府组织之间就毒品政策进行开放和建设性的辩论；麻管局在毒品政策工作中需要采取平衡的方法；麻管局成员需要更多样化的专业知识；麻管局运作缺乏透明度；需要加强与民间社会的接触，以确保麻管局职能的履行；以及需要采取更积极的态度，监督麻管局在其授权范围内的运作，并鼓励根据既定的联合国做法对其角色进行现代化改造。
tags: international policy, INCB

title: Response to the 2009 Annual Report of theInternationalNarcotics Control Board
abstract: As is always the case, the Report contains an impressive array of technical information on the operation of the international drug control system; a system constructed with the aim of managing the global licit market for narcotic and psychotropic substances for medical and research uses while simultaneously suppressing the illicit market. Such operational descriptions are interspersed with references and discussions on certain policy issues. These, as is the norm, are primarily observations on what the Board perceives to be the strengths and weaknesses of the system and are in the main a welcome contribution to the policy process. However, despite what has turned out to be only a hiatus in the Ghodse-Emafo dynasty (Hamed Ghodse re-assumed the Chairmanship in May 2010), the Report also displays a certain continuity of approach in terms of its more worrying content. Although at points perhaps more conciliatory in tone than in previous years, the document reveals the Board as a body that maintains a very narrow and selective interpretation of the drug control conventions. Within this context it remains keen to censure what it regards as moves towards the liberalization of policy practice, yet stays silent on other areas that are worthy of attention; particularly those relating to the non-punitive aspects of the conventions. As policy debates around the world grow richer and more diverse, the INCB is in danger of being left behind.
ch_abstract: 一如既往，报告详尽罗列了国际毒品管制体系运作的技术信息；该体系旨在管理用于医疗和科研的麻醉及精神药物全球合法市场，同时遏制非法市场。这些运作描述中穿插着对某些政策问题的提及与讨论。按照惯例，这些内容主要是委员会对该体系优缺点的观察，总体上为政策进程提供了有益贡献。然而，尽管只是戈德西-埃马福王朝的短暂中断（哈米德·戈德西于2010年5月重新担任主席），报告中更令人担忧的内容仍显示出某种延续性。尽管文件语气在某些方面可能比往年更为缓和，但揭示出委员会作为一个机构，对毒品管制公约保持着极其狭隘和选择性的解读。在此背景下，它仍热衷于谴责其认为政策实践自由化的动向，却对其他值得关注的领域保持沉默——尤其是公约中与非惩罚性措施相关的部分。随着全球政策辩论日益丰富多元，国际麻醉品管制局正面临被时代抛下的风险。
tags: international policy, World, INCB

title: The 2009 World Drug Report: A Response from theInternationalDrug Policy Consortium
abstract: The World Drug Report 2009 was the first publication of note to come from the UNODC since the High Level Segment of the 52nd session of the Commission on Narcotic Drugs.  As such, it was eagerly anticipated for not only what it would say about the trends in world drug markets, but also what it might reveal about the outlook of the senior management of the Office itself after the UNGASS review. In this response to Report the IDPC welcomes improvements in the way in which sections of the Office have moved to approach the complex problem of presenting and interpreting data on global illicit drug markets as well as the associated increase in transparency surrounding working methodologies. The response, however, also highlights that the increased sophistication of the discussion of trends in world drug markets making up the bulk of the Report were not matched by the arguments put forward in the Executive Director’s Preface.  As a result, the World Drug Report 2009 can be viewed in many ways as a fractured discourse containing both welcome improvements and alarming developments. This brief review explores three key themes raised by an analysis of the document: the Executive Director’s Preface; a new approach towards the presentation of data; and the unintended consequences of the international drug control system.
ch_abstract: 《2009年世界毒品报告》是联合国毒品和犯罪问题办公室自麻醉药品委员会第五十二届会议高级别会议后发布的首份重要出版物。因此，人们不仅期待其揭示全球毒品市场趋势，更关注其中可能反映的联合国大会特别会议审议后该办公室高层管理者的政策取向。国际毒品政策联盟在对本报告的回应中，赞赏了该办公室部分部门在处理全球非法毒品市场数据呈现与解读这一复杂问题时的改进举措，以及相关工作方法透明度的提升。但回应同时指出，报告主体部分对全球毒品市场趋势的精细分析，与执行主任前言中提出的论点存在明显落差。这使得《2009年世界毒品报告》在某种程度上呈现出一种割裂的叙事——既包含可喜进步，又显露令人担忧的动向。本短评通过文件分析聚焦三个关键议题：执行主任前言、数据呈现的新方法，以及国际毒品管制体系的意外后果。
tags: International policy, World, UNODC

title: IDPC Response to the 2007 Annual Report of theInternationalNarcotics Control Board
abstract: The latest INCB Annual Report was published on 4th March 2008. This brief response explains the contents of the report, and comments on the positions taken by the Board on proportionality in drug law enforcement, the scheduling of coca leaf, and harm reduction.
ch_abstract: 国际麻醉品管制局最新年度报告于2008年3月4日发布。本简短回应阐述了报告内容，并就委员会在毒品执法比例性、古柯叶列管及减害措施方面所持立场作出评论。
tags: INCB, International drug policy evaluation, harm reduction

title: SPS:InternationalStandards
abstract: International standards are central to domestic rule-making processes. While these standards-developed outside the WTO-are in and of themselves not binding, the SPS Agreement gives them a quasi-binding character as WTO members must provide scientific justification should they wish to deviate from international standards. Developing countries are particularly disadvantaged in the standard-making process.
ch_abstract: 国际标准是国内规则制定过程的核心。虽然这些标准是在世贸组织外部制定的，本身并不具有约束力，但《实施卫生与植物卫生措施协定》赋予了它们准约束力，因为世贸组织成员若想偏离国际标准，必须提供科学依据。发展中国家在标准制定过程中尤其处于不利地位。
tags: Trade, International Trade, WTO, World Trade Organization, Standards, SPS, Sanitary and Phytosanitary

title: Reducing ProductStandardsHeterogeneity ThroughInternationalStandardsin the WTO: How Far Across the River?
abstract: Heterogeneity in product standards across World Trade Organization (WTO) members adversely affects the international flow of goods and its reduction will increase global economic welfare if legitimate regulatory objectives are not violated. The Uruguay Round has seen the incorporation of international standards in both the Agreement on Technical Barriers to Trade (TBT) and the Agreement on the Application of Sanitary and Phytosanitary Measures (SPS) Agreement as a harmonization device. Despite many benefits that international standards may offer, WTO’s attachment to international standards has been subject to various criticisms. This paper intends to offer a detailed analysis of the role of international standards in the TBT and the SPS Agreement. Especially, I will examine whether and to what extent international standards have constrained WTO Members’ regulatory autonomy in setting domestic product standards.
ch_abstract: 世界贸易组织（WTO）成员间产品标准的差异性对国际货物流动产生了不利影响，在不违背正当监管目标的前提下，减少这种差异将提升全球经济福利。乌拉圭回合谈判将国际标准纳入《技术性贸易壁垒协定》（TBT协定）和《实施卫生与植物卫生措施协定》（SPS协定），作为协调工具。尽管国际标准可能带来诸多益处，但WTO对国际标准的依赖仍受到多方质疑。本文旨在深入分析国际标准在TBT与SPS协定中的作用，重点探讨国际标准是否以及在何种程度上限制了WTO成员制定国内产品标准的监管自主权。
tags: product standards, International Standard, TBT, SPS, WTO

title: ODR Ethics andStandards: The Revised NCTDR and ICODRStandards
abstract: The panelists present the latest edition of the online dispute resolution standards published by the National Center for Technology and Dispute Resolution (NCTDR) and the International Council for Online Dispute Resolution.
ch_abstract: 小组成员介绍了由美国国家技术与争议解决中心（NCTDR）和国际在线争议解决理事会共同发布的最新版在线争议解决标准。
tags: ODR, standards of practice, ethics

title: Outer Space Traffic SafetyStandards
abstract: An essential ingredient of safety standards is that they apply uniformly everywhere. All participating parties can expect everybody to conform with the standards unless they have given adequate notice of deviations. Several space organizations have recognized those advantages, and are beginning to promote coordinated safety efforts. In addition, there are safety rules in the transportation modes that could serve as models for commercial space. Standards would not only lead to safety in outer space. They would prevent economic loss and save insurance costs. They would facilitate international trade in space objects.
ch_abstract: 安全标准的一个基本要素是它们在任何地方都统一适用。所有参与方都可以预期每个人都会遵守这些标准，除非他们已充分通知了偏差。一些航天组织已经认识到这些优势，并开始推动协调的安全工作。此外，现有运输方式中的安全规则可以作为商业航天的参考范例。标准不仅有助于保障外层空间的安全，还能防止经济损失并节省保险成本。它们还将促进空间物体的国际贸易。
tags: Space Law, International Law, Space Traffic

title: InternationalTrade and LaborStandards: A Proposal for Linkage
abstract: Should some rights to engage in international trade be made conditional on the promotion of labor standards?  The critics of such conditionality, known as linkage, are right to be concerned about its possible adverse effects. However, linkage can be desirable.  A set of rules for international trade that incorporates linkage can serve the interests of developing countries, and in particular of less advantaged individuals within them - if it is un-imposed, transparent and rule-based, applied in a manner reflecting a country's level of development, demands adequate international burden-sharing, and incorporates measures that ensure that appropriate account is taken of different viewpoints within each country. Such a linkage system could substantially reduce the costs that are incurred by exporting countries when they attempt to promote the interests of workers. By enabling and encouraging countries to promote labor standards, an appropriate form of linkage can serve as a cornerstone of a worker-oriented world trading system.
ch_abstract: 是否应将某些从事国际贸易的权利与促进劳工标准挂钩？反对这种挂钩条件的批评者对其可能带来的负面影响表示担忧是正确的。然而，挂钩机制也可能具有积极意义。一套包含挂钩机制且符合以下条件的国际贸易规则，可以服务于发展中国家的利益，尤其是其中处于弱势地位的群体——只要这种机制非强制实施、透明且基于规则，应用时能反映国家发展水平，要求合理的国际责任分担，并包含确保充分考虑各国国内不同观点的措施。这样的挂钩体系能显著降低出口国在试图维护工人权益时产生的成本。通过赋能并鼓励各国提升劳工标准，恰当的挂钩形式可成为以工人为核心的世界贸易体系的基石。
tags: linkage, labor standards, international trade, WTO

title: Beyond Voluntarism: Human Rights and the DevelopingInternationalLegal Obligations of Companies
authors: ICHRP International Council on Human Rights Policy
abstract: The private sector increasingly accepts that it has social and moral responsibilities. In recent years many companies have introduced codes of conduct and other forms of voluntary initiatives. But do private companies have a legal responsibility to respect human rights? In the last 50 years the world’s governments, particularly through the United Nations, have agreed dozens of standards that define and guarantee basic human rights and freedoms. To what extent might these standards – originally aimed at states – create binding legal obligations on companies? This report sets out the legal obligations of states when business activity has an impact on human rights, and explores the degree to which companies might have direct obligations under international human rights law.
ch_abstract: 私营部门日益认识到自身承担着社会和道德责任。近年来许多企业制定了行为准则及其他形式的自愿性举措。但私营企业是否负有尊重人权的法律责任？过去五十年间，世界各国政府——特别是通过联合国——已达成数十项界定和保障基本人权与自由的标准。这些原本针对国家制定的标准，可能在多大程度上对企业产生具有约束力的法律义务？本报告阐述了商业活动影响人权时国家应承担的法律义务，并探讨了企业在国际人权法框架下可能承担直接义务的程度。
tags: human rights, business, private sector

title: InternationalLaborStandards: How Far is India?
abstract: Growing concerns and debate over rights of workers have been much discussed in the contemporary treatise. While, most countries have ratified all international conventions on labor standards, there still exist many who do not agree with some of them. India is one of those countries. India has only partially accepted international labor standards and is being constantly urged to adopt the rest. This paper is one contribution to the debate of India’s ratification of International labor standards. Over the course of analysis, we seek to argue that India’s discourse on labor legislation has not necessarily been flawed merely because it has not ratified some of the conventions. The paper focuses on the 8 fundamental conventions identified by the International Labor organization. The paper analyses India’s national labor legislations from the perspective of International labor standards.     The paper is divided in three parts. The first describes India’s profile as per ILO. The second part, which comprises of further subparts, will discuss corresponding laws in India for the conventions not ratified by it, and will try to understand the reason for non-ratification with the help of case studies. The last part of the paper offers an opinion on India’s decision of non-ratification. Following this discussion, the paper is concluded.
ch_abstract: 当代论著中对工人权益日益增长的关注与争议多有讨论。尽管多数国家已批准所有国际劳工标准公约，仍有许多国家未完全认同部分条款，印度便是其中之一。该国仅部分接受国际劳工标准，并持续被敦促采纳其余条款。本文旨在为印度批准国际劳工标准的讨论提供观点。通过分析，我们试图论证：印度未批准某些公约并不意味着其劳动立法论述必然存在缺陷。研究聚焦国际劳工组织确定的8项核心公约，从国际劳工标准视角剖析印度国内劳动立法。. . 全文分为三部分：第一部分依据国际劳工组织标准勾勒印度概况；第二部分含多个子章节，将探讨印度未批准公约对应的国内法律，并借助案例研究解析其未批准动因；最后部分就印度不批准决定提出见解。讨论结束后，本文作出结论。
tags: labor law, international labor standards, India, Freedom of Association, Child Labor

title: Harmonization of Slovenian AccountingStandardswithInternationalFinancial ReportingStandards
