We analyze whether regulatory arbitrage using lax enforcement of capital requirements was a motive for Japanese banks to continue loans to weak firms. We find evidence supporting the view that regulatory arbitrage was a motive of bad loans Two measures of regulatory arbitrage, the difference between the risk-based capital and the market-valued capital as a proportion of bank asset, and the subordinated debt as a proportion of bank asset, are useful in uncovering evidence that Japanese banks had the perverse incentive of extending bad loans in an attempt to inflate regulatory capital in the 1990s.
ch_abstract: 银行对弱势企业的宽容贷款是日本不良贷款问题长期存在的主要原因之一。我们分析了利用资本要求宽松执行进行监管套利是否是日本银行继续向弱势企业放贷的动机。研究发现支持监管套利是不良贷款动机的证据——两种监管套利衡量指标（风险资本与市值资本的差额占银行资产比例，以及次级债务占银行资产比例）有效揭示了日本银行在1990年代存在通过扩大不良贷款来虚增监管资本的扭曲动机。
tags: regulatory arbitrage, bad loans, capital requirements, accounting discretion

title: Cybersecurity and SafetyMeasures
abstract: In recent years, the Cyber Security is most important challenge which plays most important role and must require in digital era where cybercrime become so frequent. Cyber security is all about to stop cyber-crime. Cyber security is must and we have to know about all safety measures required to stop cybercrime. This paper gives details information about cyber security and its safety measure. Also we will discuss about the activities related to it and how actually cybercrime happens and all steps taken by the various organization and Government to have cyber ethics everywhere. Cyber security provides protection against the cybercrime and teaches us what essential safety measures one need to follow from all cybercrimes. Securing online information is priority where everyone is involved with technology. Whenever anyone talked about cyber security, straight one thing comes in mind that is cybercrime and what safety measures need to take to be safe from it.
ch_abstract: 近年来，网络安全已成为数字时代最重要的挑战，其作用至关重要且不可或缺，尤其是在网络犯罪日益频繁的背景下。网络安全的核心在于阻止网络犯罪。我们必须了解防范网络犯罪所需的所有安全措施。本文详细介绍了网络安全及其防护措施，同时探讨了相关活动、网络犯罪的实际发生方式，以及各组织和政府为普及网络伦理所采取的措施。网络安全能有效防御网络犯罪，并指导我们遵循必要的安全措施以防范各类网络威胁。在技术普及的今天，保护在线信息是每个人的首要任务。每当提及网络安全，人们首先想到的便是网络犯罪及如何采取防护措施确保安全。
tags: Cyber security, cybercrime, safety measures, cyber ethics

title: Changing Dimensions of Investor-State Dispute Settlement in India – Protecting theregulatorypower of the ‘Host-State’?
abstract: Dispute settlement clauses in the recent Indian BITs are far more inclined towards shielding the states’ regulatory power by limiting the tribunals’ jurisdiction. The India-Brazil BIT in particular has moved a step ahead to seize the power from the arbitral tribunals in awarding compensations. Since the beginning, most of the Indian BITs contained both investor-state dispute settlement (ISDS) and state-state dispute settlement (SSDS) clauses as investment dispute settlement mechanisms. But, for the first time, India signed a BIT with Brazil on terms that investment disputes shall be settled (or prevented) only through the SSDS mechanism. Furthermore, the current BIT regime in India is heavily guarded with several checkpoints, such as the absence of the most favoured nation clause, keeping taxation related measures outside the purview of BITs, the requirement to exhaust locally available remedies before invoking ISDS, etc. the list is long and includes several other similar provisions. In short, it signifies that India’s approach towards ISDS in particular, and investment protection in general, is a movement from a sceptical position in the past to a protectionist one in the present. Therefore, to justify the above claim, the paper will attempt to study the background of ISDS in India, analyse the jurisdictional scope of the arbitral tribunals, the practicability of the exhaustion of local remedies (ELR) clause and the power of the arbitral tribunals to award compensation in case of loss suffered by the investors. The paper concludes that India’s approach towards ISDS as contained in the Indian BITs (those are based on the new model) and especially in the India-Brazil BIT of 2020 proves to be a step to protect the regulatory power of the host-states.
ch_abstract: 近期印度双边投资条约中的争端解决条款更倾向于通过限制仲裁庭的管辖权来保护国家的监管权力。尤其是《印度-巴西双边投资条约》，更进一步剥夺了仲裁庭裁定赔偿的权力。从一开始，大多数印度双边投资条约就同时包含投资者-东道国争端解决机制（ISDS）和国家间争端解决机制（SSDS）作为投资争端解决方式。但印度首次在与巴西签署的条约中规定，投资争端仅能通过SSDS机制解决（或预防）。此外，当前印度的双边投资条约体系设置了多重限制，例如不包含最惠国待遇条款、将税收措施排除在条约适用范围之外、要求投资者在启动ISDS前用尽当地救济等，此类限制性条款不胜枚举。简言之，这表明印度对ISDS（尤其是）及投资保护（总体上）的态度，已从过去的怀疑立场转向如今的保护主义立场。为论证上述观点，本文将通过研究印度ISDS机制的背景、分析仲裁庭的管辖范围、用尽当地救济条款的可行性，以及仲裁庭裁定投资者损失赔偿的权限，最终得出结论：印度双边投资条约（基于新范本制定）特别是2020年《印度-巴西双边投资条约》中体现的ISDS立场，实质上是保护东道国监管权力的一种举措。
tags: BIT, ICSID, India, ISDS, Regulatory Powers

title: Annual Review ofRegulatoryBurdens on Business: Primary Sector
abstract: The Productivity Commission's report on regulatory burdens on the primary sector - released today - identifies a number of ways to reduce unnecessary burdens on farmers and miners and other primary sector producers arising from Commonwealth regulations. The report - Annual Review of Regulatory Burdens on Business: Primary Sector - is the first of a five year cycle of reports aimed at reducing unnecessary regulatory burdens from the stock of regulation.  It follows a wide-ranging 2006 report by the Regulation Taskforce (Rethinking Regulation) and is part of an ongoing commitment by the Australian, State and Territory governments to enhancing regulatory consistency and reducing burdens on all businesses. While this current review focuses on the burdens arising from Commonwealth regulation, in subsequent years, the effectiveness of these reviews in achieving regulatory reform would be enhanced by greater coordination among all jurisdictions.
ch_abstract: 澳大利亚生产力委员会今日发布的关于初级产业监管负担的报告，提出了若干减轻联邦法规对农民、矿工及其他初级产业生产者造成不必要负担的途径。这份名为《企业监管负担年度审查：初级产业篇》的报告是五年系列审查的首份成果，旨在从现行法规中削减不必要的监管负担。该报告延续了2006年监管工作组《重新审视监管》报告的广泛审查工作，体现了澳大利亚联邦、州及地区政府持续推动监管一致性并减轻企业负担的承诺。尽管本次审查聚焦于联邦法规产生的负担，但未来若能加强各司法管辖区间的协调配合，将更有效推动监管改革目标的实现。
tags: regulatory reform, primary industry, agriculture, Nation Reform Agenda

title: Social Entrepreneurs and the Management of theRegulatoryState: The Latent Need for an Updating of Law School Curricula
abstract: Presentation to the Southeastern Association of Law Schools (SEALS) 2017 Annual Conference; Discussion Group: Educating Citizens on Rulemaking, Administrative Hearings and Other Administrative Procedures, August 4, 2017. The legal profession is the discipline which establishes the rules for the management of the regulatory state although they have been augmented in recent years by members of the economics profession. A number of scholars outside the legal profession have concluded that the early advances of the United States in the management of the regulatory state are now second to advances made by other nations. The deficiencies in the management of the regulatory state are directly attributable to deficiencies in the legal education system. In response to these deficiencies, the Center for Regulatory Effectiveness (CRE) embarked upon an initiative to revise and update law school curricula.
ch_abstract: 向东南部法学院协会（SEALS）2017年年会提交的演讲；讨论小组：关于规则制定、行政听证及其他行政程序的公民教育，2017年8月4日。法律专业是为监管型国家管理确立规则的学科，尽管近年来经济学专业人士的参与使其得到了补充。许多法律界以外的学者认为，美国在监管型国家管理方面的早期优势现已落后于其他国家的进展。监管型国家管理中的缺陷直接归因于法律教育体系的不足。针对这些不足，监管有效性中心（CRE）启动了一项修订和更新法学院课程的计划。
tags: Administrative law, Entrepreneurship, Education

title: Broadband in Parliaments: TheRegulatoryState & Technological Change
abstract: This paper compares and contrasts the processes used by the European, United Kingdom and Scottish parliaments in considering broadband policies, legislation,  regulatory systems and outcomes, within a complex triple-tiered governance system. Broadband is of increasing importance due to the digitalisation government services and of political processes, potentially excluding those without access from benefits and influence. Operators initially deliver new services in profitable areas, determined by the economics offensiveness, then more widely. Demands to accelerate and extend availability and to increase adoption generated modifications to legislation and regulations to increase investment incentives, plus the provision of state aid and the training of non-users. Parliamentarians had to reconcile demands for services from citizens and  constituents with the lobbying of perators. The issues are economically and technologically complex, with inquiries having to cut through terminology,  economics, lobbying and threats of litigation. The European Parliament scrutinises and adopts framework legislation for an increasingly diverse set of member states. The UK parliament has limited roles in EU legislation; scrutiny of tests and of ministers negotiating in Council. Its scommittees have been engaged with state aid for rural provision, and oversight of the ministry and regulatory authority.The Scottish Parliament has notionally no role, broadband being a reserved matter, but has produced one report. It failed to examine the proposals for broadband governance after independence, for which there were two irreconcilable proposals and an impossibly tight timetable to split the market.
ch_abstract: 本文比较并对比了欧洲、英国和苏格兰议会在复杂的三层治理体系下审议宽带政策、立法、监管体系及成果的过程。由于政府服务和政治流程的数字化，宽带的重要性日益凸显，可能导致无法接入者被排除在福利和影响力之外。运营商最初根据经济可行性在盈利地区推出新服务，随后逐步扩大覆盖范围。加速和扩展服务可用性、提高使用率的需求促使立法和监管进行调整，以增加投资激励，同时提供国家援助并培训非用户。议员们需要在公民和选民对服务的需求与运营商的游说之间寻求平衡。这些问题在经济和技术上极为复杂，调查必须穿透专业术语、经济考量、游说活动和诉讼威胁的重重迷雾。欧洲议会负责审查并通过框架性立法，以适应日益多元化的成员国需求。英国议会在欧盟立法中角色有限，主要承担对测试的审查及对部长理事会谈判的监督。其委员会曾参与农村宽带国家援助事务，并对政府部门及监管机构进行 oversight。苏格兰议会名义上无权干预宽带事务（因其属于保留事项），但仍发布过一份报告。该议会未能审查独立后的宽带治理提案——当时存在两项不可调和的方案，且分割市场的时间表紧迫到不切实际。
tags: Informal governance, Multi-tiered governance, Network governance,  Parliamentary oversight, Regulatory state.

title: RegulatoryCompliance and Quality Programs: Constraints and Opportunities for Integration
abstract: Management systems for regulatory compliance and quality programs are examined in this paper from the standpoint of their potential integration and in terms of the concept of a process. The paper identifies five common drags on management system optimization and outlines a scoring system that organizations may use to evaluate their management systems for potential adoption of an integrated process-based program.
ch_abstract: 本文从潜在整合及流程概念的角度，探讨了合规管理与质量计划的管理体系。研究识别了影响管理体系优化的五大常见障碍，并概述了一套评分系统，供组织用于评估自身管理体系，以考量是否可能采用基于流程的整合方案。
tags: Management system, implementation, integration, ISO, regulatory compliance

title: OIRA's  Formative Years: The Historical Record of Centralized Review Preceding OIRA's  Founding
abstract: A history of centralized regulatory review conducted by the White House Office of Management Budget.
ch_abstract: 白宫管理与预算办公室集中监管审查的历史。

title: The NationalRegulatoryStructure Against the Background of the EuropeanRegulatorySystem
abstract: States and their representatives, national governments, play a key role in national telecommunication markets. As lawmakers, they determine the playing field of the agents in the markets and the decision powers of national regulators. Simultaneously, they are involved in appointing presidential chambers of national regulators. On the other hand, governments keep shares in regulated companies and support single infrastructure projects based on financial and legal state aid measures. Therefore, European Union regulatory frameworks require a strict separation of tasks between national ministries. However, the European Commission has repeatedly criticized member states for in-transparency and insufficient separations of tasks in national implementation. While the Second Regulatory Package balanced competition and investment aims, the new Regulatory Package implemented in December 2009 dedicates a higher weight to the role of infrastructure quality as a driver of service innovations. Moreover, national regulators become more independent, and former national regulation tasks are partially shifted to the pan-European level. In consequence, the role of governments also changes. I discuss the transposition process of Regulatory Packages to national laws and how they have been implemented on the national level to learn more about how the new Regulatory Package will affect the national situation and the European integration process.
ch_abstract: 各国及其代表——即国家政府——在国内电信市场中扮演着关键角色。作为立法者，他们决定着市场参与者的竞争环境以及国家监管机构的决策权限。同时，他们也参与任命国家监管机构的领导层。另一方面，政府通过持有受监管企业的股份，并依据财政和法律上的国家援助措施支持特定基础设施项目。因此，欧盟监管框架要求各国部委之间严格分离职能。然而，欧盟委员会多次批评成员国在实施过程中缺乏透明度且职能分离不足。虽然第二套监管方案平衡了竞争与投资目标，但2009年12月实施的新监管方案更加强调基础设施质量作为服务创新驱动力的作用。此外，国家监管机构变得更加独立，部分原属国家层面的监管职责转移至泛欧层面。其结果是，政府的角色也随之改变。我探讨了监管方案转化为国内法律的过程及其在国家层面的实施情况，以进一步了解新监管方案将如何影响各国现状及欧洲一体化进程。
tags: Telecommunication Infrastructure, Local Loop Competition, Regulatory Independence

title: RegulatoryBurdens and International Income Performance
abstract: Many studies indicate that excessive regulatory burdens can hamper national economic performances. In spite of that, there are relatively few empirical estimates of the potential income gains that may accrue to countries that deregulate their business sectors. This paper partially fills that gap in the literature by using World Bank data to estimate the relationships between various measures of national regulatory burdens and per capita incomes. Potential impacts of deregulation and greater transparency on income performance are also estimated for the various countries in the sample.
ch_abstract: 许多研究表明，过度的监管负担可能阻碍国家经济表现。尽管如此，关于放松商业部门监管可能为各国带来的潜在收入增长，实证估计相对较少。本文通过使用世界银行数据来评估国家监管负担的各类指标与人均收入之间的关系，部分填补了文献中的这一空白。同时，研究还估算了样本国家放松监管和提高透明度对收入表现的潜在影响。
tags: Regulatory burdens, International Income performance, International growth

title: Regulation andRegulatoryProcesses
abstract: Regulation of business activity is nearly as old as law itself.  In the last century, though, the use of regulation by modern governments has grown markedly in both volume and significance, to the point where nearly every facet of today's economy is subject to some form of regulation.  When successful, regulation can deliver important benefits to society; however, regulation can also impose undue costs on the economy and, when designed or implemented poorly, fail to meet public needs at all.  Given the importance of sound regulation to society, its study by scholars of law and social science is also of paramount importance.  In this chapter, we review the state of the field by focusing on four major areas of empirical research: (1) regulatory policy making, (2) regulatory enforcement, (3) business responses to regulation, and (4) innovative models of regulation.  We begin by reviewing the political economy literature on the factors that influence government regulators as well as the ways that overseers may use administrative procedures to affect decisions of regulatory agencies.  We next highlight the varied empirical findings on adversarial versus cooperative enforcement styles.  We then review explanations for business responses to regulatory pressures, including the range of factors influencing compliance and beyond-compliance behavior.  Finally, we survey the ever-growing research literature on innovative approaches to regulation, including self-regulation, performance standards, and market-based incentives.  This chapter serves both as a stand-alone account of the existing state of empirical regulatory research by political scientists and researchers from other disciplines, as well as an introduction to the authors' edited volume that reprints a diverse collection of classic studies of regulation and regulatory processes.
ch_abstract: 对企业活动的监管几乎与法律本身一样古老。然而在上个世纪，现代政府对监管的运用在数量和重要性上都显著增长，以至于当今经济的几乎每个方面都受到某种形式的监管。成功的监管能为社会带来重要益处；然而，监管也可能给经济带来不当成本，若设计或执行不当，则完全无法满足公共需求。鉴于健全监管对社会的重要性，法学和社会科学学者对其研究也至关重要。本章我们聚焦实证研究的四大领域来梳理该领域现状：（1）监管政策制定，（2）监管执行，（3）企业对监管的应对，（4）创新监管模式。我们首先回顾政治经济学文献中关于影响政府监管机构的因素，以及监督者如何运用行政程序影响监管机构决策的研究。接着重点对比对抗性与合作性执法风格的实证发现。然后梳理企业对监管压力的反应机制，包括影响合规与超合规行为的各种因素。最后综述日益增长的创新监管研究，涵盖自我监管、绩效标准及市场化激励等方向。本章既是对政治学及其他学科学者现有实证监管研究的独立总结，亦作为作者编纂文集（收录多篇经典监管研究论文）的导论呈现。
tags: Administrative law, regulatory agencies, federal regulation, empirical research, regulatory policy making, regulatory enforcement, business responses to regulation, innovative models of regulation, self-regulation, performance standards, market-based incentives

title: Design ofRegulatoryContracts – Example of the Urban Transport Industry
abstract: The present article discusses economic issues related to the design of optimal regulatory contracts on the example of the urban public transport industry. It highlights the importance of the design of efficient regulatory contracts in the context of changes facing the urban transportation industry in the European Union. Furthermore, it provides an overview of the main issues put forward in economic literature related to the design of regulatory contracts. It discusses several problems relevant in this context such as informational asymmetries, transaction costs, and regulatory capture. It also comments on a selection of views presented in economic literature dealing with these issues. Finally, the article presents the regulatory framework, contractual practices and characteristics of the French urban public transport industry. France is well known for its long standing tradition of contracting between the State and the private sector in transportation. The analysis of the French example may help to prove useful insights in this regard.
ch_abstract: 本文以城市公共交通行业为例，探讨了与最优监管合同设计相关的经济问题。文章强调了在欧盟城市交通行业面临变革的背景下，设计高效监管合同的重要性。此外，概述了经济学文献中提出的与监管合同设计相关的主要议题，讨论了信息不对称、交易成本和监管俘获等关键问题，并对经济学文献中针对这些问题的代表性观点进行了评述。最后，文章介绍了法国城市公共交通行业的监管框架、合同实践及行业特征。法国在交通领域公私合作方面具有悠久的传统，对其案例的分析可为该领域提供有益借鉴。
tags: contracts, informational asymmetries, regulatory capture, transaction costs, urban public transport

title: Market Failure or Politics? A Systematic Review of Literature on Price Spikes and a Case Study of theRegulatoryResponses to Surging Electricity Prices in European Countries
abstract: We present a systematic literature review on price spikes and a case study of Europe's energy crisis of 2021-22. We discuss the causes of price spikes, outline the recommended measures to deal with them, and compare the recommended measures in the literature with those applied in practice. Our review shows that there is a discrepancy between the arguments presented in the literature and the regulatory narrative in practice.  While theoretical arguments assume market efficiency as the fundamental driver of regulatory decisions, political concerns can shape regulatory measures to a great extent.
ch_abstract: 我们对价格飙升现象进行了系统的文献综述，并以2021-22年欧洲能源危机为案例研究。我们探讨了价格飙升的成因，概述了文献中建议的应对措施，并将理论建议与实际应用措施进行对比。研究发现，学术论述与监管实践存在明显脱节：理论观点将市场效率视为监管决策的根本驱动力，而实际监管措施往往深受政治考量影响。
tags: electricity markets, price spikes, regulation

title: How Well Does the Government Do Cost-Benefit Analysis?
abstract: To make prudent recommendations for improving the use of cost-benefit analysis in policy settings, some measures of how well it is actually done are essential. This paper develops new insights on the potential usefulness of government cost-benefit analysis by examining how it is actually performed. We assess the quality of a particularly rich sample of cost-benefit analyses of federal regulations. The data set we use for assessing the quality of regulatory analysis is the largest assembled to date for this purpose. The 55 analyses we examine span the Reagan administration, the first Bush administration and the Clinton administration. The paper is the first to assess systematically how government cost-benefit analysis has changed over time. There are three key findings. First, a significant percentage of the analyses in all three administrations do not provide some very basic economic information, such as information on net benefits and policy alternatives. For example, over 70 percent of the analyses in the sample failed to provide any quantitative information on net benefits. Second, there is no clear trend in the quality of cost-benefit analysis across administrations. Third, there is a great deal of variation in the quality of individual cost-benefit analyses.
ch_abstract: 为就如何在政策制定中更好地运用成本效益分析提出审慎建议，必须对其实际执行效果建立衡量标准。本文通过考察政府成本效益分析的实际操作情况，对其潜在效用提出了新见解。我们评估了一批特别详尽的联邦法规成本效益分析样本的质量，所用数据集是迄今为止为此目的构建的最大规模集合。所研究的55份分析报告跨越里根政府、老布什政府和克林顿政府时期。本文首次系统评估了政府成本效益分析随时间的演变趋势，得出三项关键发现：首先，三个政府时期均有相当比例的分析未提供诸如净效益和政策替代方案等最基本经济信息——例如样本中超过70%的分析未量化呈现净效益数据；其次，不同政府时期成本效益分析质量未呈现明显变化趋势；第三，个体分析报告质量存在显著差异。
tags: cost-benefit analysis, federal regulations, regulatory analysis

tags: regulatory coordination, regulation, competition defense, Cade, regulatory agencies

title: TheRegulatoryState in East Asia
abstract: The societies of East Asia, which here refers to Japan, South Korea, Taiwan, and the People’s Republic of China (China), have followed a broadly similar path in adopting structures and methods of the regulatory state or regulatory capitalism,' a path which continues to influence the scope and functioning of regulatory government in the region. This chapter will outline that path, which, to generalize, preferred civil servants to judges and emphasized informal collaboration more than it did formal process, or, for that matter, conflict resolution. It highlights commonalities as well as differences among the countries within the region, and discusses historical, political, and economic underpinnings for that path. The chapter will also explore areas where that path differs most significantly from the trajectories of the United States and of Germany, the Western systems that have had the most influence in the region. Although all elements of the regulatory state model will be discussed in the East Asian context, focus will be on legal-institutional attributes such as independent regulatory agencies and rule-based governance rather than substantive policy choices such as privatization and deregulation, though this approach treats legal institutions and substantive policies as intimately related.
ch_abstract: 东亚社会，此处指日本、韩国、台湾地区及中华人民共和国（中国），在采纳规制国家或规制资本主义的结构与方法上遵循了大致相似的路径，这一路径持续影响着该地区规制政府的范围与运作。本章将概述这一路径——概括而言，它更青睐公务员而非法官，并更强调非正式协作而非正式程序或冲突解决。本章既突出该地区国家间的共性，也关注其差异，并探讨这一路径的历史、政治及经济基础。同时，本章还将深入分析该路径与美国及德国（对该地区影响最深的西方体系）发展轨迹差异最为显著的领域。尽管将在东亚语境下讨论规制国家模式的所有要素，但重点将集中于法律-制度属性（如独立监管机构与基于规则的治理），而非私有化与放松管制等实质性政策选择——尽管这一方法将法律制度与实质政策视为紧密关联。
tags: comparative law, regulatory institutions, legal institutions

title: Bank Stress Testing: Public Interest orRegulatoryCapture?
abstract: We test whether measures of potential influence on regulators affect stress test outcomes. The large trading banks – those most plausibly ‘Too big to Fail’ – face the toughest tests. In contrast, we find no evidence that either political or regulatory connections affect the tests. Stress tests have a greater effect on the value of large trading banks’ portfolios; the large trading banks respond by making more conservative capital plans; and, despite their more conservative capital plans, the large trading banks still fail their tests more frequently than other banks. These results are consistent with a public-interest view of regulation, not regulatory capture.
ch_abstract: 我们检验了对监管机构潜在影响力的衡量是否会影响压力测试结果。大型交易银行——那些最有可能“大到不能倒”的银行——面临最严格的测试。相比之下，我们没有发现任何证据表明政治或监管关系会影响测试。压力测试对大型交易银行投资组合价值的影响更大；这些银行通过制定更保守的资本计划来应对；尽管资本计划更为保守，大型交易银行的测试失败率仍高于其他银行。这些结果与监管的公共利益观点一致，而非监管俘获。
tags: Stress Testing, Bank Regulation, Regulatory Capture

title: Toward a More Perfect Union:RegulatoryAnalysis and Performance Management
abstract: Two separate but similar initiatives attempt to apply a scientific approach to improve government decision-making and results: performance management and regulatory analysis. Both initiatives seek to identify the nature of the problems government is trying to solve, develop alternative solutions, and evaluate the effectiveness and costs of the alternatives. Both require measurement of costs and outcomes. Both involve rigorous analysis to identify whether, and to what extent, government actions cause particular results to occur. Their analytical methods can be used ex ante, to evaluate alternative prospective courses of action, or ex post, to assess what consequences actually flowed from the alternative that was chosen and identify opportunities for improvement. Yet performance management and regulatory analysis rarely cross paths. Scholars who specialize in performance management tend to be in public administration or policy analysis departments; scholars who focus on regulatory analysis tend to be economists or lawyers. Ideologically, performance management is usually viewed as a means of making government more effective and customer-focused; regulatory analysis is often characterized as an attempt to throw sand in the gears of the regulatory state. For the U.S. government, the most prominent performance management directive is the Government Performance and Results Act (GPRA).  The principal source of regulatory analysis mandates is Executive Order 12,866.  In federal agencies, the plans and reports mandated by GPRA are usually the responsibility of the chief financial officer or a senior official in charge of management. Regulatory analysis is usually the responsibility of a policy office that writes regulations or an economic analysis division. Even in the President's Office of Management and Budget (OMB), which oversees both performance management and regulatory analysis, responsibility is divided. GPRA guidance and other performance-related initiatives are under OMB's deputy director for management. Regulatory analysis is overseen by the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs (OIRA). Due to these divisions, there are significant unexploited synergies between regulatory analysis and performance management. GPRA, and the performance-oriented practices it spawned, provide a vehicle to improve the quality of regulatory analysis in both executive branch and independent agencies. Similarly, the theory and practice of regulatory analysis suggests some opportunities to strengthen federal performance management in ways that more fully implement the spirit of GPRA. This Article explores the actual and potential linkages between regulatory analysis and performance management in theory and in practice.
ch_abstract: 两项独立但相似的举措试图运用科学方法来提升政府决策与成效：绩效管理与监管分析。两者都致力于厘清政府待解决问题的本质，制定备选解决方案，并评估方案的有效性与成本。它们均要求对成本与成果进行量化，都需要通过严谨分析来判断政府行为是否以及能在多大程度上引发特定结果。这些分析方法既可用于事前评估不同行动方案的预期效果，也可用于事后检验所选方案的实际成效并寻找改进空间。然而绩效管理与监管分析鲜少产生交集——绩效管理学者多来自公共行政或政策分析领域，监管分析研究者则多为经济学家或律师。意识形态层面，绩效管理常被视为提升政府效能与服务导向的工具，监管分析则常被刻画为阻碍监管国家运行的掣肘。  . . 在美国政府体系中，最著名的绩效管理指令是《政府绩效与成果法案》（GPRA），而监管分析的主要依据则是第12866号行政命令。联邦机构中，GPRA要求的计划与报告通常由首席财务官或管理事务高级官员负责，监管分析则由政策制定办公室或经济分析部门承担。即便在统筹这两项工作的总统管理与预算办公室（OMB）内部，职责也被分割：GPRA指南等绩效事务由OMB管理副主任分管，监管分析则由信息与监管事务办公室（OIRA）监督。  . . 这种分割导致监管分析与绩效管理之间存在大量未开发的协同效应。GPRA及其衍生的绩效实践为提升行政机构和独立机构的监管分析质量提供了载体；而监管分析的理论与实践经验，也为更全面贯彻GPRA精神、强化联邦绩效管理提供了可能路径。本文将从理论与实践层面，探讨监管分析与绩效管理之间现有及潜在的关联。
tags: performance management, regulatory review, oira, regulation, benefit-cost, gpra, omb

title: RegulatoryEffectiveness: Namibia's CommunicationsRegulatoryFramework
abstract: Communications regulatory frameworks are established to achieve regulatory objectives such as affordable pricing, universal ICT access and usage, and competition. These objectives may however not be met. In this paper however, we present the regulatory outcomes of Namibia’s communications regulatory framework. We studied the performance of the two dominant and publicly owned telecommunications corporations. We assessed how the national institutional endowment in relation to the regulatory governance and regulatory incentives, such as benchmarking, influenced the performance of the telecommunications sector. We use this analysis to explain the effectiveness of the regulatory framework in achieving the regulatory purpose. One of the major findings of the study was that the roles of the Minister of ICT, as policy maker and as shareholder representative over the dominant public operator Telecom Namibia Limited (TN) are in conflict. There is a concentration of the telecommunications market, with the exit of the only privately owned mobile cellular operator. A paradigm shift in policy is therefore required to address the poor performance of Namibia’s communications regulatory framework to be able to achieve the regulatory purpose.
ch_abstract: 建立通信监管框架旨在实现诸如可负担的定价、普遍的信息通信技术接入和使用以及促进竞争等监管目标。然而，这些目标可能无法达成。本文展示了纳米比亚通信监管框架的实际监管成效。我们研究了两家占主导地位的国有电信公司的表现，评估了国家制度禀赋（涉及监管治理和基准化等监管激励措施）如何影响电信行业绩效。通过这一分析，我们解释了该监管框架在实现监管目的方面的有效性。研究主要发现之一是：信息通信技术部长同时作为政策制定者和主导性公共运营商——纳米比亚电信有限公司（TN）的股东代表，存在角色冲突。随着唯一私营移动运营商退出市场，电信行业集中度加剧。因此，需要推动政策范式转变，以解决纳米比亚通信监管框架绩效不佳的问题，从而实现监管目标。
tags: communications regulatory framework, regulatory effectiveness, institutional endowment, regulatory governance, regulatory purpose, regulatory incentives, competition, regulatory independence, telecommunications sector performance, Telecom reform, indicators, policy

title: Licensing Measurement and Monitoring Systems:RegulatoryScience Applied to Human ServicesRegulatoryAdministration
abstract: This eHandBook describes licensing measurement and monitoring systems for state licensing administrators and their staff providing the idiosyncracies and nuances of licensing metrics.
ch_abstract: 本电子手册为州执照管理员及其工作人员介绍了执照测量与监控系统的授权，详细阐述了执照指标的特质与细微差别。
tags: licensing measurement, regulatory science, program monitoring, regulatory compliance, quality

title: The Grand Experiment inRegulatoryReporting
abstract: This paper evaluates a grand regulatory experiment - the first of its kind in the world - aimed at providing objective and comprehensive characterization of the costs and benefits of U.S. federal regulation as well as identifying opportunities for reform. This experiment, if successful, could have important implications for reviewing the impact of regulation across the world. Five government reports on the costs and benefits of regulation are now complete. We offer a critical evaluation of these reports, using an approach that scores the reports on various dimensions. By and large, the reports represent a significant step forward in providing insights into the regulatory process and in providing information on the costs and benefits of regulation. But they also illustrate the shortcomings of having a government agency do the analysis. We recommend that the Office of Management and Budget require agencies to issue a scorecard evaluating each agency regulation; that OMB summarize the strengths and weaknesses of regulations using this scorecard; that OMB include not only executive agencies, but also independent agencies in its analysis; and that Congress create an agency or office outside of the executive branch to perform a regulatory evaluation function similar to that of OMB. While we are highly critical of some aspects of these important reports, we are guardedly optimistic about their potential to improve regulation and the regulatory process.
ch_abstract: 本文评估了一项开创性的重大监管实验，旨在对美国联邦监管的成本与效益进行客观全面的分析，并识别改革机遇。这项实验若成功，可能对全球范围内的监管影响评估产生深远影响。目前已完成五份关于监管成本效益的政府报告。我们采用多维度评分方法对这些报告进行批判性评估。总体而言，这些报告在揭示监管过程、提供监管成本效益信息方面取得了显著进展，但也暴露出政府机构主导分析的局限性。我们建议：管理与预算办公室应要求各机构发布监管评分卡；利用评分卡总结监管优劣；将独立机构纳入分析范围；国会应在行政体系外设立专职机构承担类似OMB的监管评估职能。尽管我们对这些重要报告的某些方面提出严厉批评，但仍对其提升监管质量与流程的潜力持审慎乐观态度。
tags: costs and benefits, federal regulation, reporting, OMB

title: The Challenge ofRegulatoryExcellence
abstract: Regulation is a high-stakes enterprise marked by tremendous challenges and relentless public pressure. Regulators are expected to protect the public from harms associated with economic activity and technological change without unduly impeding economic growth or efficiency. Regulators today also face new demands, such as adapting to rapidly changing and complex financial instruments, the emergence of the sharing economy, and the potential hazards of synthetic biology and other innovations. Faced with these challenges, regulators need a lodestar for what constitutes high-quality regulation and guidance on how to improve their organizations’ performance. In the bookAchieving Regulatory Excellence, leading regulatory experts across various disciplines seek to provide the guidance regulators so often lack, and to elucidate what it means to be an excellent regulator. This introductory chapter sets the stage for defining regulatory excellence by clarifying regulators’ primary challenges, functions, and ultimate goals. The chapter also emphasizes that even though regulation is widely associated with technical expertise, excellent regulators must also focus on “people excellence” by building an internal culture that fosters and reinforces humility, openness, empathy, and a steadfast commitment to public service.
ch_abstract: 监管是一项高风险的事业，充满巨大挑战和持续不断的公众压力。监管者既要保护公众免受经济活动和技术变革带来的危害，又不能过度阻碍经济增长或效率。当今监管者还面临诸多新要求，例如适应快速变化且复杂的金融工具、共享经济的兴起，以及合成生物学等创新技术带来的潜在风险。面对这些挑战，监管者需要明确高质量监管的标准，并获取提升组织绩效的指导。在《实现卓越监管》一书中，来自各领域的顶尖监管专家试图提供监管者普遍缺乏的指导，并阐释卓越监管者的内涵。本章作为开篇，通过厘清监管者的核心挑战、职能和终极目标，为定义监管卓越性奠定基础。本章同时强调，尽管监管常被视为技术性工作，但卓越的监管者还必须注重"人的卓越性"，通过培育谦逊、开放、共情和坚定公共服务信念的组织文化来实现这一目标。
tags: Administrative law, regulation, regulatory excellence, quality management, regulatory performance, public value, problem-solving, human capital, governmental improvement, public policy and administration

title: Communitizing TransnationalRegulatoryConcerns
abstract: In this article we argue that the conventional command-and-control theories related to regulatory requirements fall away in the face of transnational regulatory governance. We therefore seek a new explanatory model that prioritizes and recognizes the discursive nature of international regulatory proceedings. Importantly, we contend that the way regulatory problems are discussed, and thus the way they are communitized, affects the way parties ultimately reconcile. We conclude that collaborative and less confrontational regulatory exchanges tend to be significantly more successful than formal and inquisitive ones.
ch_abstract: 本文认为，面对跨国监管治理，传统的与监管要求相关的命令控制理论已不再适用。因此我们寻求一种新的解释模型，该模型优先考虑并承认国际监管程序的话语本质。关键的是，我们认为监管问题的讨论方式——亦即其被社群化的方式——会影响各方最终的协调结果。我们的结论是：协作性且对抗性较低的监管交流，往往比正式且带有质询性质的交流更为成功。
tags: WTO, TBT Committee, Regulatory Governance, Regulatory Communitization

title: When Planning is Not Enough: The Self-RegulatoryEffect of Implementation Intentions on Changing Snacking Habits
abstract: Objective: This study examined whether matching implementation intentions to people’s regulatory orientation affects the effectiveness of changing unhealthy snacking habits. Design: Participants’ regulatory orientation was either measured (as a chronic trait) or manipulated (as a situational state), and participants were randomly assigned to implementation intention conditions to eat more healthy snacks or avoid eating unhealthy ones. Main outcome measures: A self-reported online food diary of healthy and unhealthy snacks over a two-day period. Results: Participants with weak unhealthy snacking habits consumed more healthy snacks when forming implementation intentions (regardless of match or mismatch with their regulatory orientation), while participants with strong unhealthy snacking habits consumed more healthy snacks only when forming implementation intentions that matched their regulatory orientations. Conclusion: Results suggest that implementation intentions that match regulatory orientation heighten motivation intensity and put snacking under intentional control for people with strong unhealthy snacking habits.
ch_abstract: 目的：本研究探讨了将执行意向与个体的调节定向相匹配是否会影响改变不健康零食习惯的效果。设计：测量（作为长期特质）或操纵（作为情境状态）参与者的调节定向，并随机分配参与者至执行意向条件，即多食用健康零食或避免食用不健康零食。主要结果指标：通过两天的在线食物日记自我报告健康与不健康零食的摄入情况。结果：不健康零食习惯较弱的参与者在形成执行意向后（无论是否与其调节定向匹配）会摄入更多健康零食，而不健康零食习惯较强的参与者仅在执行意向与其调节定向匹配时才会摄入更多健康零食。结论：结果表明，对于不健康零食习惯较强的个体，与其调节定向匹配的执行意向能增强动机强度，使零食摄入行为处于意向控制之下。
tags: snacking habits, implementation intentions, regulatory fit, regulatory focus

title: Do Agencies Consider Distribution and Equity in their Rules?
abstract: Since 1993, Executive Order 12866 has required agencies not only to conduct analysis of the benefits and costs of “significant” regulatory actions but also to consider “distributive impacts and equity” in selecting among regulatory alternatives. How often, and in what manner, have agencies complied with this requirement? A growing literature on existing agency practices on distributional analysis of regulations generally finds that federal agencies do not fully account for the distribution of benefits and costs in their final rules. However, existing studies focus on a relatively small sample of rules, rather than capturing the broader frequency of how agencies consider distribution and equity, even if partially or informally. Establishing such a baseline of historical agency practice will lay a foundation for future assessments of the Biden administration’s initiative to reinvigorate distributional analysis. To fill this research gap, this paper uses text analysis tools to examine the regulatory preambles of significant final rules published in the Federal Register from 1994 to 2021. After developing quantitative estimates of the frequency with which agencies include distributional considerations in their analysis, the paper conducts descriptive and statistical analysis of the data and finds that while distributional analysis is relatively uncommon, it has become more common over time and differs considerably by agency.
ch_abstract: 自1993年以来，第12866号行政命令要求各机构不仅要对"重大"监管行动的效益和成本进行分析，还要在选择监管方案时考虑"分配影响和公平性"。各机构在多大程度上以何种方式遵守了这一要求？关于现行监管分配分析的文献普遍发现，联邦机构在最终规则中并未充分考量效益与成本的分配情况。然而现有研究仅聚焦于少量规则样本，未能全面反映机构考虑分配与公平问题的整体频率——即使这种考量是部分或非正式的。建立此类历史实践基准数据，将为评估拜登政府重振分配分析举措的未来研究奠定基础。为填补这一研究空白，本文运用文本分析工具检视了1994至2021年间《联邦公报》发布的重大最终规则序言部分。通过量化统计机构分析中包含分配考量的频率，本文对数据进行描述性与统计性分析后发现：尽管分配分析整体占比不高，但其应用频率随时间推移逐渐上升，且不同机构间存在显著差异。
tags: distribution, equity, regulation, regulatory impact analysis, text analysis

title: Exploring The Dynamics of The Money Cycle ThroughRegulatoryLenses
abstract: Over the years, I have become increasingly captivated by the intricate relationships within the money cycle and how regulatory measures shape its dynamics. By examining enforcement and escape savings, I will guide you through how different investments influence economic structure and stability. Your understanding of regulatory policies can empower you to appreciate how they impact the flow of money within an economy, ultimately determining its vitality and resilience. Join me in this exploration to uncover the fascinating interplay between money, investment, and governance.
ch_abstract: 多年来，我日益着迷于资金循环中错综复杂的关系，以及监管措施如何塑造其动态。通过分析执法与规避储蓄的现象，我将带您了解不同投资如何影响经济结构与稳定性。对监管政策的理解能让您认识到它们如何左右经济体内的资金流动，最终决定其活力与韧性。让我们共同探索金钱、投资与治理之间引人入胜的相互作用。
tags: dynamics, money cycle, regulatory lences

title: Assessing the Economic Value ofEarlyWarningSystems
abstract: As of today, investments into early warning systems are, to a large extent, politically motivated and “disaster-driven.” This means that investments tend to increase significantly if a disaster strikes, but are often quickly reduced in the following disaster-free years. Such investment patterns make the continuous operation, maintenance and development of the early warning infrastructure a challenging task and may lead to sub-optimal investment decisions. The paper presented here proposes an economic assessment model for the tangible economic impact of early warning systems. The model places a focus on the false alert problematic and goes beyond previous approaches by incorporating some socio-cultural factors (qualitatively estimated as of now). By doing so, it supports policymakers (but also private investors) in their investment decisions related to early warning applications.
ch_abstract: 截至目前，对预警系统的投资在很大程度上受政治动机和“灾害驱动”影响。这意味着一旦灾害发生，投资往往会大幅增加，但在随后无灾年份又迅速减少。这种投资模式使得预警基础设施的持续运营、维护和发展成为一项艰巨任务，并可能导致投资决策不尽理想。本文提出了一种针对预警系统实际经济影响的经济评估模型。该模型重点关注误报问题，并通过纳入一些社会文化因素（目前为定性估计）超越了以往的方法。由此，该模型为政策制定者（也包括私人投资者）在预警应用相关的投资决策中提供了支持。
tags: disaster management, early warning systems, investment decisions, assessment model

title: EarlyWarningSystemsfor Identifying Financial Instability
abstract: Financial crises prediction is an essential topic in finance. Designing an efficient Early Warning System (EWS) can help prevent catastrophic losses resulting from financial crises. We propose different EWSs for predicting potential market instability conditions, where market instability refers to large asset price declines. The EWSs are based on the logit regression and employ  Early Warning Indicators (EWIs) based on the realized variance (RV) and/or price-volatility feedback rate. The latter EWI is supposed to describe the ease of the market in absorbing small price perturbations. Our study reveals that, while RV is important in predicting future price losses in a given time series, the EWI employing the price-volatility feedback rate can improve prediction further.
ch_abstract: 金融危机预测是金融领域的一个重要课题。设计高效的早期预警系统（EWS）有助于防范金融危机造成的灾难性损失。我们提出了多种EWS模型来预测潜在的市场不稳定状况，其中市场不稳定指资产价格大幅下跌。这些EWS基于逻辑回归算法，并采用以已实现方差（RV）和/或价格-波动反馈率为基础的早期预警指标（EWI）。后一个EWI旨在反映市场吸收小额价格波动的能力。研究表明，虽然RV对预测特定时间序列的未来价格下跌具有重要作用，但引入价格-波动反馈率的EWI能进一步提升预测效果。
tags: Financial Crises; Early Warning System; Non-Parametric Estimation; Price- Volatility Feedback Rate; Realized Variance; Logit Regression

title: EarlyWarningSystemswith Real-Time Data
abstract: This paper investigates the performance of early warning systems in real-time, using forecasts of indicators that were available at the moment predictions are to be made. The study analyzes currency crises in eight Latin American and Central and Eastern European countries, distinguishing an estimation period 1990-2009 and a prediction period 2010-2014. We apply two varieties of early warning systems: the signal approach and the logit models. For both methods we find that using forecasts of the indicators worsens the predictive ability of early warning systems compared to using the most recently available information (ex post).
ch_abstract: 本文研究了预警系统在实时预测中的表现，使用预测时点可获取的指标预测值。研究分析了八个拉丁美洲及中东欧国家的货币危机，区分了1990-2009年的估计期和2010-2014年的预测期。我们采用两种预警系统方法：信号法和logit模型。两种方法均发现，与使用最新可用信息（事后）相比，采用指标预测值会降低预警系统的预测能力。
tags: Real-time data, Early warning system, Signal approach, Logit model, Emerging economies

title: Improving FloodEarlyWarningSystemsin Kabbe, Namibia: A Situational Analysis Approach
abstract: The social, economic and environmental construct of communities formulates the core of the resilience capacity paradigm, which requires great consideration when developing, implementing and strengthening early warning systems. Though several guiding principles are documented in research, no single method for assessing community resilience exists, and complexities in quantifying capacities are often exacerbated by the diversity of probable hazard occurrence, interconnections between social, economic and environmental components, and difficulty in variable selection to gather data. By implementing a situational analysis approach, this study details an exploratory investigation into the socioeconomic and environmental constructs of rural high flood-risk communities' to identify capacities that may be enhanced for improved flood risk reduction through participatory early warning system approaches. The perception is that, in the face of disaster, even the most vulnerable communities possess some resilience, and this should be exploited for effective, long-term sustainable disaster reduction. The critical question then is: what social, economic and environmental capacities are available to communities to improve early warning system efficacy while building resilience against flood risks and improving their standard of living? The study reveals multiple options that form effective conduits for tailoring flood early warning systems to the exactitude of target community needs.
ch_abstract: 社区的社会、经济和环境结构构成了抗灾能力范式的核心，在开发、实施和加强早期预警系统时需要重点考量。尽管研究中记载了若干指导原则，但目前尚无评估社区抗灾能力的统一方法，且量化能力的复杂性常因潜在灾害的多样性、社会经济与环境要素间的相互关联、以及数据收集变量选择的困难而加剧。本研究采用情境分析法，对农村高洪水风险社区的社会经济与环境结构进行了探索性调查，旨在识别可通过参与式预警系统方法加以提升、以改善洪水风险防控的能力。其核心理念在于：面对灾害时，即使最脆弱的社区也具备一定抗灾韧性，应充分利用这种韧性来实现有效且长期可持续的减灾。关键问题在于：社区可利用哪些社会、经济和环境能力来提升预警系统效能，同时增强洪水风险抵御力并改善生活水平？研究表明，存在多种途径可为特定社区需求量身定制有效的洪水预警系统。
tags: community, capacity-building, resilience, preparedness, floods, early warning systems, situational analysis

title: Improving FloodEarlyWarningSystemsin Kabbe, Namibia: A Situational Analysis Approach
abstract: The social, economic and environmental construct of communities formulates the core of the resilience capacity paradigm, which requires great consideration when developing, implementing and strengthening early warning systems. Though several guiding principles are documented in research, no single method for assessing community resilience exists, and complexities in quantifying capacities are often exacerbated by the diversity of probable hazard occurrence, interconnections between social, economic and environmental components, and difficulty in variable selection to gather data. By implementing a situational analysis approach, this study details an exploratory investigation into the socioeconomic and environmental constructs of rural high flood-risk communities' to identify capacities that may be enhanced for improved flood risk reduction through participatory early warning system approaches. The perception is that, in the face of disaster, even the most vulnerable communities possess some resilience, and this should be exploited for effective, long-term sustainable disaster reduction. The critical question then is: what social, economic and environmental capacities are available to communities to improve early warning system efficacy while building resilience against flood risks and improving their standard of living? The study reveals multiple options that form effective conduits for tailoring flood early warning systems to the exactitude of target community needs.

title: Predicting Retail Customers' Distress:EarlyWarningSystemsand Machine Learning Applications
abstract: Predicting credit defaults is crucial for financial institutions to assess risk and make informed lending decisions. One of the most recent strategies banks and financial institutions have been testing to minimize loses that arrise from credit default is the deployment of Early Warning Systems (EWS). By nature this technique was primarily proposed and have been explored for commercial customers, however, this study aims to propose a comprehensive data-driven approach to model Early Warning Systems (EWS) for retail customers in the financial industry while using different Machine Learning (ML) models. We use Logistic Regression (LR), Gradient Boosting (GB), and Random Forest (RF) to classify customers status, indicating the need to include potential default in a ```watch list". Additionally, we implement a fourth model (i.e., meta-model), which predictions are based on the output of the other algorithms used (LR, GB, RF). Results have shown that the RF achieves an average Area Under the Curve (AUC) of 0.775, while GB and LR reach 0.750, and our proposed model outperforms these algortihms with an AUC of 80\%. From a managerial standpoint, the data analysis suggest that setting a higher threshold for warning signals leads to notifications that are closer to the overdue date, showing a heightened sensitivity to the early signs of client deterioration. In contrast, lower criteria prioritize the client's overall condition. In addition, utilizing the top ten features for training produces satisfactory overall outcomes. However, integrating features beyond the top ten offers useful supplemental data to aid in the decision-making process.
ch_abstract: 预测信贷违约对金融机构评估风险和做出明智贷款决策至关重要。银行和金融机构近期为减少信贷违约损失而测试的最新策略之一是部署早期预警系统(EWS)。该技术最初主要针对商业客户提出并探索，但本研究旨在为金融行业零售客户建立早期预警系统提出全面的数据驱动方法，同时运用不同机器学习(ML)模型。我们采用逻辑回归(LR)、梯度提升(GB)和随机森林(RF)对客户状态进行分类，以识别需要列入"观察名单"的潜在违约客户。此外，我们还构建了第四种模型（即元模型），其预测基于其他算法（LR、GB、RF）的输出结果。实验表明，RF模型的平均曲线下面积(AUC)为0.775，GB和LR模型为0.750，而我们提出的模型以80%的AUC值优于这些算法。从管理角度看，数据分析表明设定更高的预警信号阈值会使通知更接近逾期日期，显示出对客户状况恶化的早期迹象具有更高敏感性；而较低标准则更关注客户整体状况。此外，使用前十项特征进行训练可获得满意结果，但整合前十项之外的特征能为决策过程提供有价值的补充信息。
